chapter.verse: Ɗum woni inɗe maamiraaɓe Iisa *Almasiihu, jippotooɗo he Daawda e *Ibrahim:
*Ibrahim rimi Isiyaaku. Isiyaaku rimi Yakuuba. Yakuuba rimi *Yahuuda he rimdaaɓe muuɗum.
*Yahuuda he deekum Tamar ndimi Fares he Jara. Fares rimi Hesruuna. Hesruuna rimi Aram.
Aram rimi Aminadaabu. Aminadaabu rimi Naason. Naason rimi Salmon.
Salmon he deekum Rahab ndimi Bo'as. Bo'as he deekum Ruut ndimi Obed. Obed rimi Yesa.
Yesa rimi laamiiɗo Daawda. Daawda he dee-Uriya mo o teetunoo Uriya ndimi Suleymaanu.
Suleymaanu rimi Robo'am. Robo'am rimi Abiya. Abiya rimi Asa.
Asa rimi Yusufat. Yusufat rimi Yoram. Yoram rimi Ujiya.
Ujiya rimi Yotam. Yotam rimi Akas. Akas rimi Hejekiya.
Hejekiya rimi Manasa. Manasa rimi Amon. Amon rimi Yusiya.
Nder jamaanu mo Isra'el honaa faa *Yahudankooɓe njaaraa leydi *Baabiila, Yusiya rimi Yekuniya he rimdaaɓe muuɗum.
Nder jonnde maɓɓe nder *Baabiila, Yekuniya rimi Salaatiyel. Salaatiyel rimi Jorobaabiila.
Jorobaabiila rimi Abihuda. Abihuda rimi Eliyakim. Eliyakim rimi Ajoro.
Ajoro rimi Sadok. Sadok rimi Akim. Akim rimi Eliyuda.
Eliyuda rimi Eliyajaaru. Eliyajaaru rimi Maatan. Maatan rimi Yakuuba.
Yakuuba rimi Yusufu, jom ɓaade Mariyaama. Mariyaama woni inna Iisa bi'eteeɗo *Almasiihu.

Hakkune *Ibrahim he Daawda walaana jamanuuji sappo he nay. Hakkune jamaanu Daawda warde jamaanu mo Isra'el honaa faa *Yahudankooɓe njaaraa leydi *Baabiila walaana jamanuuji sappo he nay. Hakkune jamaanu mo Isra'el honaa faa *Yahudankooɓe njaaraa leydi *Baabiila warde jamaanu *Almasiihu walaana jamanuuji sappo he nay.
No Iisa *Almasiihu wardi duuniyaaru nii: Mariyaama inna Iisa no nannganaaɗo Yusufu non. Amma fadde makko ɓaŋeede, tawi o saawi nder baawɗe *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.
Yusufu mo o nannganaa oon no dartiiɗo, o hiɗaa semtinde mo yeeso himɓe fuu. Nden o anniyi faasitaade kaɓɓal ngaal nder cuccukka.

Amma wakkati o wonnoo omo miiloo ɗum ndeen, sey maleykaajo Joomiraawo gom wanngani mo nder koyɗol, wi'i mo: —Yusufu, taan Daawda, taa hulu ɓaŋude Mariyaama, ngam ɓinngel ngel reedu mum o saawi ngeel he *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo ngel ƴuwi.
O riman ɓiɗɗo gorko, inndiraa mo Iisa. Kanko hisinta himɓe makko he hakkeeji mum'en.
Ɗum fuu, ɗum waɗi ngam humnude haala ka Alla lilunoo annabiijo gom wi'a himɓe:
Surbaajo mo anndaa gorko saawan, nden rima ɓiɗɗo gorko. O innditiree Imanuwel. Maana innde ndee woni: « Alla no wondi he meeɗen ».
Wakkati Yusufu finunoo, o waɗi ko maleykaajo Joomiraawo oon wi'unoo mo ɗum. O ɓaŋi Mariyaama,
dey o hawtaay he makko naako o rimi ɓiɗɗo gorko oon. Yusufu inndiri mo Iisa.
Iisa rimaama Baytilaama, leydi Yahudiya nder jamaanu laamiiɗo *Hirudus. Wakkati mum jom'en anndal gom ƴuwi lettugal, ngari *Ursaliima,
mbi'i: —Toy laamiiɗo *Yahudankooɓe dimaaɗo joonin oon woni? Min ngi'ii hoodere makko wanngi har lettugal, min ngari sujidande mo.
Wakkati laamiiɗo *Hirudus nanunoo habaru oon, ɗum wemmbii mo, kanko he himɓe *Ursaliima fuu.
Sey o noddi mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla he jannginooɓe *Tawreeta. Ɓe fuu, o ƴami ɓe toy *Almasiihu oon foti rimeede.
Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Baytilaama nder leydi Yahudiya, ngam non annabiijo gom winndunoo wi'i:
Aan, Baytilaama, nder leydi Yahudiya, hakiika caka gure Yahudiya mawɗe ɗeen, a hanaa wuro pamaro. Ngam ardotooɗo gom no ƴuwan nder maaɗa, garoowo dura Isra'ilankooɓe, himɓe am.
Sey *Hirudus noddi jom'en anndal ɓeen nder cuccukka, ƴami ɓe wakkati mo hoodere ndeen wanngi. Ɓe kaalani mo.
Nden o lili ɓe Baytilaama. O wi'i ɓe: —Njehee, heɓa kakkinkinen dimeeki cukalel ngel. Nde nii on ngi'ii ngel, ngaron kumpitoɗon kam ngam miin duu mi yaha, mi sujidana ngel.
Wakkati ɓe nanunoo ko laamiiɗo oon haalannoo ɓe ɗum, ɓe ndilli. Hoodere nde ɓe ngi'unoo har lettugal ndeen, ardii ɓe faa nde yottii dey-dey to cukalel ngel woni, sey nde darii.
Wakkati ɓe ngi'unoo hoodere ndeen darinoo, ɓe nani belɗum sanne sanne.

Ɓe naati nder ɓaade ndeen, sey ɓe ngi'i cukalel ngel he innum Mariyaama. Ɓe turii faa he leydi, ɓe cujidani ngel. Ɓe piirti gineeji maɓɓe, ɓe kokki ngel kanŋe, iri uurdi mbelni gom he ɗakke uurɗe gom.
Nden ɓe kootiri laawol feerewol gom ngam Alla holli ɓe nder koyɗol to ɓe coƴƴoo ɓe kaalanowa *Hirudus.

Gaɗa dilludu jom'en anndal ɓeen, maleykaajo Joomiraawo gom wanngani Yusufu nder koyɗol, wi'i mo: —Umma, hooƴu cukalel ngel he innum, ndoggon, njehon Misira. Njooɗowoɗon toon sey wakkati mbi'oymaami ngarton, ngam *Hirudus no tefan warde cukalel ngel.
Yusufu ummii nder jemma oon, hooƴi cukalel ngel he inniigel, ɓe pa'i Misira.
O jooɗii toon naako *Hirudus maayi. Ɗum waɗi duu ngam humnude haala Alla ka annabiijo makko gom yottini wakkati o wi'unoo: Mi noddi Ɓiyam wurtoo nder Misira.

Wakkati *Hirudus faamunoo ko jom'en anndal ɓeen njammbake ɗum, o tikki sanne. O tilsini cukaloy ngoroy ngonkoy nder Baytilaama he takkol mum fuu mbaree, illa keccoy faa warde he ngaɗukoy duuɓi ɗiɗi. O waɗi ɗum dey-dey he wakkati mo jom'en anndal ɓeen kokki mo.
Nyannde mum, haala ka annabi Yeremiya haalunoo kaan humnaa wakkati o wi'unoo:
Daaɗe nanaama nder Rama, bojji he cimayeeli mawɗi: Rahiila no woya cukaloy muuɗum ngam koy keddaaki, o jaɓaay duu sawrineede.
Gaɗa maayde *Hirudus, maleykaajo Joomiraawo gom wanngani Yusufu nder koyɗol toon nder leydi Misira,
wi'i mo: —Umma, hooƴu cukalel ngel he innum, coƴƴoɗon nder leydi *Isra'el, ngam hiɗunooɓe mbara ngel ɓeen maayii.
Yusufu ummii, hooƴi cukalel ngel he innum, ngam soƴƴaade *Isra'el.
Amma wakkati o nanunoo ko Arkala'us mellaa laamiiɗo leydi Yahudiya nokku bammum *Hirudus, sey o huli yottaade toon. Nden, nder koyɗol kaden, o hollitaa yahde leydi Galili.
O hoɗowi toon nder wuro wi'eteengo Nasaratu, ngam humnude haala ka annabiiɓe mbi'unoo: O wi'etee Nasaratuujo.
Duuɓi he duuɓi gaɗa mum, Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma wanngi nder ladde yeeruure leydi Yahudiya, omo wi'a himɓe:
—Tuubee, ngam Laamu Alla ɓadake.
Kanko woni mo annabi *Esaaya sappinoo, wakkati wi'unoo: —Daane no huuɓa nder ladde yeeruure no wi'a: Ciryanee Joomiraawo laabi ɗi o tokkata, moƴƴinee laabi makko !
Omo ɓornii koltal canyiraangal leeɓi ngolooba. Omo tunndi tunndorgol nguru. Ɓaɓɓatti he njuumri ngoni nyaamdu makko.
Himɓe no ƴuwa huɓeere *Ursaliima, he leydi Yahudiya he takkol maayo Urdun fuu, no ngara to makko.
Iɓe njardoo yeeso Alla e yeeso himɓe fuu dow hakkeeji maɓɓe, Yahaaya no waɗana ɓe *batisma nder maayo Urdun.
Wakkati o hi'unoo *Fariisa'en he *Sadduki'en heewɓe no ngara faa ngaɗanee *batisma, o wi'i ɓe: —Ɓiɓɓe bolle ! Moy wi'ii ndogganon tikkere Alla waroore?
Ngaɗee ko hollata on tuubii.
Nde on mbi'i nder ɓerɗe mooɗon on jippotooɓe he *Ibrahim, miin mi wi'an on: Alla no waawi waylii kaaƴe ɗee, ɗe laatoo taaniraaɓe *Ibrahim.
Joonin, jammbere aagaama ngam soppude ɗaɗi leɗɗe. Ndenne, lekki fuu ki rimataa ɓiɓɓe lobbe, no soppetee, faɗɗee nder hiite.
Miin, ndiyam ngaɗirananmi on *batisma ngam hollude ko on tuubii. Amma garoowo gaɗa am oon, no ɓuri kam baawɗe. Mi fotaay baa ɓortude paɗe makko. Kanko, *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo e hiite o waɗiranta on *batisma.
Omo jogii ƴarorde makko ngam ƴaraade alkamaari makko faa laaɓa. O hawra gabbe makko, o loowa nder ƴeelu. Nden o wula nyaane ndeen nder hiite nge nyifataa abada.
Nder wakkati mum, Iisa wari ƴuwi Galili, o wari dow maayo Urdun to Yahaaya, ngam o waɗanee *batisma.
Amma Yahaaya hosi salaade, nden wi'i mo: —Aan haani waɗande kam *batisma. Amma noy ngarirtaa to am, miin, faa mi waɗane *batisma?
Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Accu ɗum laatoroo non joonin, ngam non kaanuɗen humnirde ko dartii fuu. Nden, Yahaaya jaɓi
waɗani Iisa *batisma. Wakkati Iisa ummii dari nder ndiyam ɗam, kammu omti. O hi'i *Ruuhu Alla no jippoo nder nanndi wuugaanu, no wara dow makko.
Wakkati mum da, daane gom ƴuwi dow, wi'i: —Oo woni Ɓiyam korsuɗo, mo nananmi belɗum mum.
Nder wakkati mum, *Ruuhu Alla ɗowi Iisa nder ladde yeeruure, ngam Ibiliisa sii'oo mo.
Jemma he nyalooma faa ɗum waɗi balɗe lasooji ɗiɗi, Iisa no suumi, o rafaa.
Nden, Cii'otooɗo oon ɓadii mo, wi'i: —Se goonga fuu a *Ɓii-Alla, tilsin kaaƴe ɗee laatoo nyaamdu.
Sey Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Dewtere Alla wi'i: Hanaa nyaamdu tan neɗɗo wuurdata, amma haala fuu ƴuwka to Alla.
Gaɗa mum, Ibiliisa yaari Iisa nder *Ursaliima huɓeere seniine, darni mo dow hoore *Juulirde mawne.
Nden wi'i mo: —Se goonga fuu a *Ɓii-Alla, jikku dow leydi, ngam Dewtere Alla wi'i: Alla tilsinan maleykaaɓe mum taɓɓite to koyngal maaɗa fii he hayre.
Sey Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Dewtere Alla wi'i kaden: A sii'ataako Alla Joomiraawo maa.
Gaɗa mum Ibiliisa yaari Iisa dow waamnde toowne sanne gom, holli mo laamuuji duuniyaaru fuu he no ɗi ngoodiri darja.
Nden wi'i mo kaden: —Mi hokkete ɗi, ɗi fuu, nde nii a hofake, a sujidanii kam.
Sey Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Woɗɗam Ibiliisa ! Ngam Dewtere Alla wi'ii: Alla Joomiraawo maa tan kaanɗaa sujidande. Kanko tan kaanɗaa rewude.
Nden Ibiliisa dilli acci mo. Maleykaaɓe gom ngari to makko, no ngollana mo.
Wakkati Iisa nanunoo ko Yahaaya uddaama, o fa'i Galili.
O eggi Nasaratu, o hoɗowi Kafarnahum takkol peta Galili, ci'e gonɗe nder leykoy Jabulon he Naftali.
Ɗum waɗi ngam humnude haala ka annabi *Esaaya haalunoo wakkati o wi'unoo:
Onon leykoy Jabulon he Naftali ngonkoy takkol peta Galili, ngonkoy gaɗa maayo Urdun, tawaakoy nder leydi Galili, leydi ɓe kanaa *Yahudankooɓe:
Wonɓe nder nimre, hi'uɓe jeyngol manngol. Wonɓe nder ɗowdi maayde, jeyngol wanngani ɓe.
Nder wakkati oo non, Iisa fuɗɗi waajaade no wi'a: —Tuubee, ngam Laamu Alla ɓadake.
Wakkati Iisa gosotonoo daane peta Galili, o hi'i worɓe ɗiɗo nanngooɓe liƴƴi gom, Simon inndirteeɗo Piyer he rimdaaɗo mum Andiire. Iɓe paɗɗa taaruuji maɓɓe.
Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Ngaree, tokkee kam. Mi waɗan on nanngooɓe himɓe.
Wakkati mum da ɓe mboppi taaruuji maɓɓe, ɓe tokki mo.
O yehi yeeso, o hi'i kaden rimdaaɓe ɗiɗo gom Yakuuba he Yahaaya he baabiiɓe Jebede, iɓe nder laana, iɓe moƴƴina taaruuji maɓɓe. O noddi ɓe, kamɓe duu.
Wakkati mum da ɓe mboppi laana kaan, ɓe acci baabiiɓe, ɓe tokki mo.
Iisa tinni no fiiloo nder leydi Galili, omo waajoo nder *baajorɗi maɓɓe. Omo filloo filla *Habaru lobbo, filla Laamu Alla. Omo nyawta iri nyawuuji he iri laruuji fuu.

Nden habaru makko sankitii nder leydi Siriya fuu. Himɓe no ngadda nyawɓe mum'en, wonduɓe he nyawuuji feere-fereeji to makko. Woɓɓe no ngondi he ginnaaji, woɓɓe no ngondi he paɗɗe, woɓɓe duu no bonnguuɓe. O nyawti ɓe, ɓe fuu.
Jama'aare mawne tokki mo. No woodi ƴuwɓe Galili, ƴuwɓe leydi Gure-sappo, *Ursaliima, Yahudiya, he ƴuwɓe gaɗa maayo Urdun.
Wakkati Iisa hi'unoo jama'aare warde ndeen, o ƴeenyi dow waamnde, o jooɗowii. *Aahiiɓe makko ngari to makko.
Sey o fuɗɗi waajaade ɓe, o wi'i:
—On mbelii ko'e, onon annditinɓe ko oɗon kaani wattude hoolaare mooɗon he Alla, ngam onon njeyi Laamu Alla.
On mbelii ko'e, onon woyooɓe, ngam Alla fukkinan ɓerɗe mon.
On mbelii ko'e, onon leesiniiɓe, ngam Alla ronnan on duuniyaaru.
On mbelii ko'e, onon hiɗuɓe dartinaaku sanne, ngam on kaaran, on ɗomɗitan.
On mbelii ko'e, onon yurmotooɓe, ngam Alla yurmoto on.
On mbelii ko'e, onon laaɓuɓe ɓerɗe, ngam on ngi'an Alla.
On mbelii ko'e, onon waddooɓe jam, ngam on noddirtee ɓiɓɓe Alla.
On mbelii ko'e, onon torraaɓe ngam dartinaaku, ngam onon njeyi Laamu Alla.
On mbelii ko'e nde himɓe njenni on, torrii on, ndeki on iri bononda fuu ngam am.
Mbelnee, keewiree welwelo, ngam baraaje mawɗe no ndoomi on dow kammu. Ngam hano non annabiiɓe artuɓe on ɓeen torriraa.
—Onon ngoni lamɗam duuniyaaru nduu. Amma nde ɗam lamsaa, ɗume wattetee kaden ko ɗam lamsa? Ɗam nafataa baafuy ! Ɗam faɗɗetee yaasin, himɓe njaaɓa ɗam.
Onon ngoni jeyngol duuniyaaru nduu. Huɓeere nyiɓaande dow waamnde waawaa suuɗaade.
Walaa kuɓɓanɗo fitilla, nden hippa tummbude dow makka. Sey nii joomum ɓila ka, ka yaynana tawaaɗo nder suudu nduun fuu.
Hano non jeyngol mooɗon haani yaynirde yeeso himɓe, ngam ɓe ngi'a golleeji lobbi ɗi ngatton, nden ɓe njetta Baabii'on gonɗo dow.
—To miilee mi wari ngam moytude tilsinooje binndaaɗe nder *Tawreeta naa nder dewte annabiiɓe. Mi waraay ngam mi moyta ɗe amma ngam mi humna ɗe.
Goonga kaalananmi on: Se nii kammu e leydi no keddii, toɓɓel naa masel moytataake nder *Tawreeta faa ɗum fuu ɗum tabbita.

Ndenne, neɗɗo fuu jedduɗo ko ɓuri famɗude nder tilsinooje ɗeen, dey ekkitii woɓɓe faa ngaɗa non, joomum laatotoo ɓurɗo famɗude nder Laamu Alla. Amma neɗɗo fuu tokkuɗo *Tawreeta goonga e goonga, dey ekkitii woɓɓe ngaɗa ko winndaa nder mayre, joomum laatoto mawɗo nder Laamu Alla.
Ngam miɗo haalana on: Se nii on ɓuraay jannginooɓe *Tawreeta he *Fariisa'en fuu dartinaaku, on naatataa nder Laamu Alla.
—On nani maamiraaɓe meeɗen mbi'anooma: To ittu yonki goɗɗo, ittuɗo yonki fuu no haani hiiteede.

Amma miin kay, miɗo wi'a on: Tikkanɗo banndum fuu, no haani hiiteede. Neɗɗo fuu bi'uɗo banndum no kaaŋaaɗo, no haani darneede yeeso alkaali. Kaden duu, neɗɗo fuu bi'uɗo banndum no milkaaɗo no haani watteede nder jahannama.
Ndenne, nde nii a warii dow hirsirde faa ngaɗaa *sadaka, nden miccitiɗaa wakkati mum da ko mettal ɓerne no hakkune maa, aan he bannda:
Too ! Accu *sadaka maa toon, njahaa njaafodiron ginan, nden ngartaa ngaɗaa *sadaka maa.

Nde goɗɗo felii ma, wakkati njaadoton to sariya, yawɗa tefaa potal hakkune maa, aan e joomum, fadde mooɗon yottaade ngam to o watte nder juuɗe hiitotooɓe. Nden kamɓe duu, ɓe ngatte nder juuɗe doomoowo kasu, uddeɗaa.
Goonga kaalananmaami, a wurtataako abada nde a yoɓaay ko tokketeɗaa ɗum faa laaɓa.
—On nani wi'anooma: To yeenu !
Amma miin kay, miɗo wi'a on: Ƴeewuɗo debbo janaano faa suunaa mo, joomum yeenii mo nder ɓerne mum.
Ndenne, nde hitere maa nyaamo no waɗa ngaɗaa hakke, ittu nde, paɗɗaa nde to woɗɗi ! Ceedaa he mayre no ɓuri moƴƴande ma dina ɓanndu maa fuu faɗɗee nder jahannama.
Nde junngo maa nyaamo no waɗa ngaɗaa hakke, taƴu ngo, paɗɗaa ngo to woɗɗi ! Ceedaa he maggo no ɓuri moƴƴande ma dina ɓanndu maa fuu naata jahannama.
—Wi'anooma kaden: Ceerɗo deekum fuu, hokka mo talkuru ceergal.
Amma miin kay, miɗo wi'a on: Neɗɗo fuu ceerɗo deekum ko hanaa ngam jeenu, joomum waɗii mo jeenoowo. Neɗɗo fuu ɓaŋuɗo debbo ceeraaɗo, kam duu yeeni.
—On nanii kaden, maamiraaɓe meeɗen mbi'anooma: Taa ummin hunayeere maa, amma sey nii kumnaa ko kunaniɗaa ɗum yeeso Joomiraawo.
Amma miin kay, miɗo wi'a on: Taa huna baa. Taa hunoraa kammu, ngam ngu jooɗorgal Alla.
Taa hunoraa leydi, ngam ndi yaaɓirde koyɗe makko, naa *Ursaliima, ngam ngo huɓeere Laamiiɗo mawɗo.
Taa hunoraa hoore maa, ngam a waawaa rawninde naa ɓawlinde baa leeɓol mayre gootol.
Nde nii a jaɓi, mbi'aa tan a jaɓi, nde nii a jaɓaay duu, mbi'aa tan a jaɓaay. Ko ƴaari ɗum, to bonɗo oon ƴuwi.
—On nanii wi'anooma: Hitere yomnitortee hitere, nyiire yomnitortee nyiire.
Amma miin kay, miɗo wi'a on: To njomnitee gaɗuɗo on ko boni. Nde goɗɗo feenyii ma dow nyaamo, linnyu mo gooto duu.
Nde goɗɗo noddi ma kiite ngam teeta toggoore maa, accu o yaada he jabbaare maa duu.
Nde goɗɗo tilsinii ma ronndaade donngal yaadu kilo go'o, ronndaa ngal yahde kilooji ɗiɗi.
Nde goɗɗo ƴamii ma, hokku ɗum. Nde goɗɗo wi'ii ma mbuƴoɗaa ɗum, to sala.
—On nanii wi'anooma: Ngiɗaa gondo maa, mbanyaa ganyo maa.
Amma miin kay, miɗo wi'a on: Ngiɗee wayɓe mon, ndu'anoɗon torrooɓe on,

ngam laatoɗon ɓiɓɓe Baabii'on gonɗo dow. Ngam no o fuɗinirta naange makko dow bonɓe, hano non duu o fuɗinirta nge dow moƴƴuɓe. No o tomnirta ndiyam dow dartiiɓe nii, non duu o tomnirta ɗam dow oonyiiɓe.
Nde hiɗuɓe on tan ngiɗɗon, baraaje ɗeye keɓoton? Baa *jaɓooɓe janngal non ngaɗata !
Nde banndiraaɓe mon tan njewtanton, ndenne ɗume senndi on he ɓeeto? Baa ɓe anndaa Alla non ngaɗata !
Ngam majjum, laatee huuɓuɓe hano Baabii'on kuɓɗo gonɗo dow.
—Tinnee to ngaɗee golleeji lobbi ngam himɓe ngi'a on. Nde on ngaɗii ɗum, on keɓataa baraaje fuu to Baabii'on gonɗo dow.
Ndenne, nde aɗa sakkana talkaaɓe, taa huuɓu ngam himɓe ngi'e. Non munaafiki'en ngaɗata nder cuuɗi *baajorɗi he dow laabi ngam himɓe mana ɗum'en. Goonga kaalananmi on, ɓe keɓidii baraaje maɓɓe fuu.
Amma aan kay, nde nii aɗa sakkana talkaaɓe, to nano maa faamu ko nyaamo maa waɗata.
Ko cakkataa fuu, sakku ɗum nder cuccukka. *Baabiraawo maa gi'oowo ko suuɗi fuu yoɓete.
—Nde oɗon ndu'oo, to nyemminee munaafiki'en darotooɓe nder cuuɗi *baajorɗi he dow pottirɗi laabi, no ndu'oo ngam himɓe fuu ngi'a ɓe. Goonga kaalananmi on, ɓe keɓidii baraaje maɓɓe fuu.

Amma aan kay, wakkati fuu mo ndu'otoɗaa, naatu nder suudu maa, ommba dammbugal ngaal, eelaa *Baabiraawo maa gonduɗo he maa nder nokkuure suuɗiine. Nden, *Baabiraawo maa gi'oowo ko suuɗi fuu, no yoɓete.
Nde oɗon ndu'oo, to njuunnee du'aa'uuji mon he haalaaji meereeji ɗi ngalaa fuu nafakka hano no ɓe anndaa Alla ndu'ortoo, miilooɓe kam'en no njaabantee nde nii ɓe ɗunni haalaaji maɓɓe.
To nyemminee ɓe, ngam Baabii'on no anndi ko kaajaɗon illa on eelaay mo.
Ndaa no ndu'ortoɗon nii: *Baabiraawo amin gonɗo dow, innde maa seniine teddinee.
Laamu maa wara. Muuyɗe maa ngaɗee ɗo dow leydi hano no ɗe ngaɗiraa dow kammu nii.
Hoynan min hannden nyaamdu heƴunu ndu min kaajaa.
Yaafana min gacceeji amin hano no min njaafonortoo toonyiiɓe min nii.
Taa accu min cii'ee, amma hisin min bonɗo oon. [Ngam laamu, baawɗe he teddungal no ngonani ma faa abada abadin. Aamiin !]
Ndenne, nde nii on njaafake toonyiiɓe on, Baabii'on gonɗo dow duu no yaafoto on.
Amma nde nii on njaafataako toonyiiɓe on, Baabii'on duu yaafataako gacceeji mon.
—Nde nii oɗon cuumii, to njoofee ɓalli mooɗon, ɓalinoɗon hano munaafiki'en ɓalintooɓe ngam himɓe fuu anndita ko ɓe cuumiiɓe. Goonga kaalananmi on: Ɓe keɓidii baraaje maɓɓe fuu.
Amma aan kay, nde nii a suumake, lootu yeeso maa, mbujaa nebbam uurɗam,
to neɗɗo fuu faamu a cuumiiɗo. *Baabiraawo maaɗa gonɗo nder to suuɗi oon tan anndata. Wooɗi duu, *Baabiraawo maa gi'oowo ko ngaɗɗaa nder cuccukka oon, no yoɓete.
—To ndesanee ko'e mooɗon njawdi nder duuniyaaru nduu, to mooƴu he puunyol mbonninta, to wuyɓe kelata ommbooɗe, mbujja.
Ndesanee ko'e mooɗon njawdi dow kammu, to baafuy bonnataa, mooƴataa, fuunyataa, to wuyɓe duu kelataa ommbooɗe sako mbujja.
Ngam to njawdi maa woni, toon ɓerne maa duu wonata.
—Gite ngoni fitillaaji ɓanndu. Nde gite maa no mbooɗi, ɓanndu maa fuu no yaynan.
Amma nde nii ɗe mbooɗaa, ɓanndu maa fuu no niɓɓan. Ndenne, nde nii jeyngol tawaangol nder ɓanndu maa niɓɓi, sikka fuu walaa nimre ndeen no tekkiɗan !
—Neɗɗo fuu waawtaa gollande mawɓe ɗiɗo, ngam joomum wanyan gooto, hiɗaa ooto, naa teddina gooto, yawo ooto. On mbaawtaa gollande Alla ngollanon njawdi.
Ngam majjum waɗi miɗo wi'a on: To cuulee ko'e mooɗon nder mbuurnam mooɗon dow ko nyaamton, ko njarton naa ko ɓornotoɗon. Ngam mbuurnam no ɓuri nyaamdu, ɓanndu duu no ɓuri koltal, naa hanaa?
Ndaaree pooli piirooji ɗii: Ɗi aawataa, ɗi kettataa, ɗi ndesataa, amma Baabii'on gonɗo dow nyamnata ɗi. Onon nee, on ɓuraa pooli ɗii teddungal naa?
Moy he mooɗon waawi ɓeydude nyalooma gooto dow balɗe mum ngam hoore mum haɓɓake?
Ɗume waɗi ko kolte no cuuli on? Ndaaree no piindiiji ladde mawnirta: Ɗi ngollataa, ɗi mottataa.
Amma miɗo haalana on: Baa Suleymaanu he darjaaji mum fuu holtiraay ko foti gootel nder majji.
Nde nii Alla no holtina huɗo taweteeko nder ngesa hannden, taƴeteeko faɗɗee nder hiite jaaŋo, ɗume haɗata mo holtinde on faa ɓura nii, onon famɗuɓe goonɗinol?
Ndenne, to ko'e mooɗon kaɓɓo faa mbi'on: « Ɗume nyaameten? Ɗume njarten? Ɗume ɓornotoɗen? »
Ngam kujje ɗee fuu, ɓe anndaa Alla pilotoo ɗe. Nde goonga, Baabii'on gonɗo dow no anndi ko oɗon kaajaa ɗum, ɗum fuu.
Ndenne, tefee Laamu Alla he dartinaaku makko ginan, o ɓeydanan on kujje ɗee fuu.
Nyalaane fuu he donngal mum. To ko'e mooɗon kaɓɓo ngam jaaŋo, ngam jaaŋo duu no wardan he ko muuɗum.
—To kiitee himɓe, ngam to Alla hiito on.
Ngam no kiitortoɗon woɓɓe, non onon duu kiiterteɗon. Kaden duu etirgal ngal etirton, kanngal etiranteɗon.
Ko waɗi ko aɗa hi'a kuɗel nder hitere bannda, amma a hi'ataa bonjariyal gonngal nder nde maaɗa?
Naa noy mbaawɗaa wi'ude bannda: « Accu mi ittane kuɗel gom nder hitere maa », amma aan kay, bonjariyal no nder nde maaɗa?
Munaafiki, ittu bonjariyal tawaangal nder hitere maaɗa ginan heɓa ngi'iraa no wooɗiri, keɓaa no ittirɗaa kuɗel tawaangel nder hitere bannda ngeel.
To kokkee dawaaɗi ko senii, to paɗɗee kaaƴe mooɗon dime yeeso girooji, ngam to ɗi njaaɓu ɗe, dawaaɗi duu mbaylito ŋata on.
—Eelee, on keɓan. Tefee, on ngiitan. Calminee, on omtantee.
Ngam eeluɗo fuu heɓan. Tefuɗo fuu hiitan. Calminɗo fuu omtantee.
Moy nder mooɗon hokkata ɓiyum hayre nde eeli buuru?
Naa hokka mo mboddi se o eeli linngu?
No mbonirɗon nii fuu, oɗon kokka ɓiɓɓe mooɗon kujje lobbe, sako Baabii'on gonɗo dow. Omo hokka eeluɗo mo fuu ko moƴƴi.
Ndenne, ngaɗiranee himɓe no ngiɗɗon ɓe ngaɗana on. Ngam ɗum woni ko *Tawreeta Muusa he dewte annabiiɓe mbi'i.
—Naatiree dammbugal paaɗungal ! Ngam dammbugal halkere no yaaji, laawol maggal no hoyi, tokkooɓe ngol duu no ɗuuɗi.
Amma dammbugal mbuurnam no faaɗi, laawol maggal no ɓillii, hiitooɓe ngol duu ɗuuɗaa.
—Tinnee he annabiiɓe fewreeɓe, warooɓe to mooɗon nder nanndi baali, amma nder guri maɓɓe ɓe cuuli dafaaɗi.
Har golleeji maɓɓe annditirton ɓe, hano no lekki annditirtee har ɓiɓɓe mum. Cabiije teɓataake he kebbe, ibbe duu teɓataake he tuppe.
Lekki lobbi, ɓiɓɓe lobbe rimata. Amma lekki mbonki, ɓiɓɓe bonɗe rimata.
Lekki lobbi waawtaa rimude ɓiɓɓe bonɗe. Wooɗi duu, lekki mbonki waawtaa rimude ɓiɓɓe lobbe.
Lekki fuu ki rimataa ɓiɓɓe lobbe soppetee, faɗɗee nder hiite.
Ndenne, har golleeji maɓɓe annditirton ɓe.
—Hanaa wi'ooɓe no mbi'itoo kam Joomiraawo mum'en fuu naatata nder Laamu Alla. Sey waɗooɓe muuyɗe *Baaba am gonɗo dow, ɓeen ngoni naatooɓe nder maggu.
Nyannde darŋal, heewɓe mbi'an kam: « Joomiraawo ! Joomiraawo ! Hanaa he innde maa min mbaajori haala Alla? Hanaa he innde maa min ndiiwiri ginnaaji? Hanaa he innde maa min ngaɗiri kaayɗe ɗuɗɗe? »
Wakkati mum mbi'anmi ɓe: « Mi anndaa on abada. Mboɗɗee kam, onon waɗooɓe ko boni ! »
—Ndenne, neɗɗo fuu kettiniiɗo haalaaji am, golliri ɗi, nanndan he jom hakkillo nyiɓuɗo suudu mum dow tepaare.
Ndiyam toɓi, gooruuji mbubbi, keni mawɗi mbifiri semmbe dow mayru. Ɗum fuu ndu saamaay, ngam ndu sinngaama dow tepaare.
Amma neɗɗo fuu kettiniiɗo haalaaji am ɗii, dey golliraay ɗi, no nanndi he bahiima, nyiɓuɗo suudu mum dow taasiri.
Ndiyam toɓi, gooruuji mbubbi, keni mawɗi mbifiri semmbe dow mayru. Ndu saami, ndu sankitii.
Wakkati Iisa timminoo waaju mum, ɗum haayɗini jama'aare ndeen sanne.
Ngam o waajoraaki ɓe hano no jannginooɓe *Tawreeta mbaajorto, amma he baawɗe o waajorii ɓe.
Wakkati Iisa jippinoo waamnde ndeen, jama'aare ɗuunde gom tokki mo.
Sey gorko ceppinɗo gom ɓattii mo, hofi yeeso makko, wi'i mo: —Moodibbo, nde nii a jaɓi, aɗa waawi yamɗintinde kam.
Iisa foorti junngo mum, meemi mo, wi'i: —Mi jaɓi, yamɗitin ! Wakkati mum da, gorko oon yamɗiti.
Gaɗa mum, Iisa wi'i mo: —Tinna taa haalan ɗum neɗɗo fuu. Amma yah, holloy hoore maa *cakkanoowo Alla mooɗon, ngaɗaa cakkol ngol *Muusa tilsini waɗee, ngam hollude himɓe ko sikka fuu walaa a yamɗiti.
Wakkati Iisa naatannoo Kafarnahum, hooreejo soogeeji *Rooma gom ɓattii mo, eeli mo, wi'i:
—Moodibbo, golloowo am no fukkii nder suudu, sellaa baa seɗɗa faa bonngake. Omo torroo sanne !
Iisa wi'i mo: —Mi waran, mi yamɗintina mo.
Amma hooreejo soogeeji oon jaabii, wi'i: —Moodibbo, miin, mi fotaay to naataa ɓaade am. Haala maaɗa tan heƴi, golloowo am yamɗitaa.

Miin, miɗo woodi dawranooɓe kam, amma miɗo dawrana soogeeji *Rooma duu. Nde nii mi tilsini gooto nder maɓɓe yaha, o yahan. Nde mi wi'i gooto nder maɓɓe wara, o waran. Nde nii mi wi'i maccuɗo am gom waɗa goɗɗum, o waɗan ɗum.
Wakkati Iisa nanunoo haala kaa, ɗum haayɗini mo, o wi'i tokkuɓe mo ɓeen: —Goonga kaalananmi on, baa nii hakkune himɓe *Isra'el fuu, mi hi'aay ir goonɗinol ngool.
Miɗo haalana on, heewɓe ƴuwataana lettugal he gorgal, ngara njooɗodoo *Ibrahim, Isiyaaku he Yakuuba, ɓe nyaamda nder Laamu Alla.
Amma haanunooɓe naata Laamu ɓeen, paɗɗetee nder nimre niɓɓude. Toon ɓe mboyata, iɓe ŋerƴodira nyiiƴe.
Gaɗa mum, Iisa wi'i hooreejo soogeeji oon: —Hootu. Ɗum laatane no ngoonɗinirɗaa. Wakkati mum da, golloowo hooreejo soogeeji *Rooma oon yamɗiti.
Wakkati Iisa yehunoo wuro Piyer, tawi esoo Piyer debbo no wondi wulowulo.
O meemi junngo makko, sey wulowulo makko heli, o yamɗiti. O ummii, o jaɓɓii Iisa.
Wakkati hiirunoo ndeen, Iisa waddanaa himɓe heewɓe ɓe ginnaaji ngoni dow mum'en. Haala makko tan o riiwri ginnaaji gonɗi dow maɓɓe ɗiin, o nyawti nyawɓe ɓeen fuu.
O waɗi kujje ɗee fuu ngam humnude ko annabi *Esaaya haalunoo wakkati o wi'unoo: Kanko he hoore makko itti torraaji meeɗen, o ronndi nyawuuji meeɗen.
Wakkati Iisa hi'unoo jama'aare no fiilii ɗum, sey o wi'i *aahiiɓe makko: —En njolu, ummowoɗen fonngo gooto.
Nden jannginoowo *Tawreeta gom ɓadii mo, wi'i: —Moodibbo, mi tokkete to njahataa fuu.
Iisa jaabii mo wi'i: —Junkuuji no ngoodi gayɗe, pooli duu no ngoodi cuuɗi, amma *Ɓii-Neɗɗo walaa baa nokku to fukkoo, fowtina hoore mum.
Nden *aahiijo makko gom, wi'i mo: —Moodibbo, accu mi mooɓowa baaba am ginan.
Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Tokkam, accu maayɓe mooɓa maayɓe mum'en.
Iisa naati nder laana, *aahiiɓe makko tokki mo.
Say ƴuwonde ummii, henndu mawnu wifi sanne dow peta ngaan, faa benkeƴƴe no ummoo no naata nder laana kaan. Tawi Iisa no ɗaanii.
*Aahiiɓe ɓeen ɓadii mo, pindini mo, iɓe mbi'a: —Moodibbo, dannu en ! En maayan !
Sey o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i: —Ɗume hulƴinta on? Onon famɗuɓe goonɗinol ! O ummii wakkati mum, o sappii henndu nduun he benkeƴƴe ɗeen. Ɗum fuu ɗum deƴƴiti, ɗum waɗi siw !
Ɗum haayɗini *aahiiɓe ɓeen sanne, ɓe tokki iɓe mbi'odira: —Moy woni neɗɗo oo, mo baa keni e ndiyam no ɗowtanoo ɗum?

Wakkati Iisa'en ummii, pedditi peta Galili, panndowi dow fonngo leydi Gadara, sey worɓe ɗiɗo ɓe ginnaaji ngonnoo dow mum'en mburtii nder annyeeje, potti he makko. Iɓe kulƴini sanne faa neɗɗo fuu suusaa tokkude laawol maɓɓe.
Ɓe tinni iɓe kuuɓa, iɓe mbi'a: —*Ɓii-Alla, ɗume ngiɗaa waɗude min? Naa a warii ngam torrude min fadde wakkati podaaɗo oon yottaade?
Tawi sewre girooji mawne gom no toowti ɓe seɗɗa inde dura.
Ginnaaji ɗiin ŋaarii mo, mbi'i: —Nde riiwude min ngiɗaa, accu min naatowa nder sewre girooji ɗii.

Nden Iisa wi'i ɗi: —Naatowee ! Ginnaaji ɗiin mburtii, naatowi nder girooji ɗiin. Wakkati mum da, sewre ndeen fuu doggi no simmitoo waamnde ndeen, iɗi tallitoo, iɗi caamowa nder peta ngaan, iɗi njooloo.
Durooɓe ɓeen ndoggi kooti wuro, kaalowi ko hewti ɗum'en. Ɓe pilli habaru himɓe ɓe ginnaaji wonnoo dow mum'en ɓeen duu.
Himɓe wuro ngoon fuu mburtii, kawrowi to Iisa. Wakkati ɓe ngi'unoo mo ndeen, ɓe ŋaarii mo o dilla nder leydi maɓɓe.
Iisa naati laana, fedditi peta ngaan, warti siire mum.
Himɓe gom ngaddani mo bonnguujo gom no fukkinaa dow kooƴirngal maayɓe. Wakkati o hi'unoo no goonɗinol maɓɓe foti, o wi'i bonnguujo oon: —Higo, fukkin ɓerne maa. Hakkeeji maa njaafaama.
Wakkati jannginooɓe *Tawreeta gom nanunoo ɗum sey ɓe mbi'odiri hakkune maɓɓe: —Gorko oo no bonna innde Alla.
Amma Iisa faami miilooji maɓɓe, nden wi'i ɓe: —Ɗume waɗi ko oɗon miiloo miilooji bonɗi nder ɓerɗe mooɗon?
Hakkune wi'ude « Hakkeeji makko njaafaama » naa « O ummoo, o yaha », ɗume ɓuri hoyde?
Amma miɗo hiɗi paamon ko *Ɓii-Neɗɗo no jogii baawɗe yaafaade hakkeeji himɓe nder duuniyaaru nduu. Sey o wi'i bonnguujo oon: —Umma, hooƴu kooƴirngal maayɓe ngal ngaddiraɗaa, hootu !
Gorko oon ummii, hooti.
Wakkati jama'aare ndeen hi'unoo ɗum, ɓe kuli, ɓe tinni iɓe njetta Alla ngam iri baawɗe ɗe o hokki ɓii-aadama.
Wakkati Iisa waɗannoo jahaangal mum, o hi'i gorko gom bi'eteeɗo Matta no jooɗii nder suudu janngal. Sey o wi'i mo: —Tokkam. Sey Matta ummii, tokki mo.
Gaɗa mum, nyannde gom Iisa no nyaama nder suudu Matta. Jaɓooɓe janngal gom he ɓooyɓe nder gaɗol hakke gom, kamɓe ɗuɓɓe ngari njooɗii no nyaamda he makko, kanko he *aahiiɓe ɓeen.
Wakkati *Fariisa'en ngi'unoo ɗum, mbi'i *aahiiɓe makko: —Ɗume waɗi ko moodibbo mooɗon no nyaamda he *jaɓooɓe janngal, he waɗooɓe hakke ɓee?
Amma wakkati Iisa nanunoo ɗum, wi'i ɓe: —Nyawɗo haajaa cawroowo hanaa jamɗuɗo.
Njehee, njanngee ko Dewtere Alla wi'i: Yurmeene ngiɗumi, hanaa *sadaka. Miin, mi waraay noddude miilooɓe kam'en no dartiiɓe, amma mi waraana ngam annduɓe kam'en no waɗooɓe hakke.
Gaɗa mum aahiiɓe Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma ngari to Iisa, ƴami mo mbi'i: —Ko waɗi minen he *Fariisa'en miɗen cuumoo, amma *aahiiɓe maaɗa kay cuumataako?
Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Warɓe ɓanngal no mbaawi ɓalinaade wakkati ɓaŋuɗo oon no wondi he maɓɓe naa? Amma nyalaaɗe ngaran ɗe ɓaŋuɗo oon suutetee hakkune maɓɓe. Nder balɗe ɗeen, ɓe cuumoto.
Neɗɗo fuu nyootataa lefol kesol he koltal kiinngal ngam lefol ngool serkan koltal kiinngal ngaal, cerkol ngool ɓeydoo.

Kaden duu cabiijam kesam loowataake nder sumalleeji kiɗɗi. Nde ɗum waɗi, sumalleeji ɗiin pusan, cabiijam ɗaam rufa, sumalleeji ɗiin mbona. Ndenne, cabiijam kesam nder sumalleeji kesi loowetee, faa ɗum fuu ɗum reenoo.
Wakkati Iisa haaldannoo he *Fariisa'en, sey hooreejo *waajordu gom nii yottii, hofi yeeso makko, wi'i mo: —Jooni ɓiyam debbo maayi, amma war, yowu junngo maaɗa dow makko, heɓa o ummitoo.
Iisa, he *aahiiɓe muuɗum, ummii tokki mo.
Iisa yeeƴitii, hi'i mo, wi'i: —Banndam debbo, fukkin hakkillo maaɗa, goonɗinol maa dannii ma. Wakkati mum da, debbo oon daɗi.
Wakkati Iisa yottinoo wuro hooreejo *waajordu oon, o hi'i fuufooɓe seeseeji ciryake ngam mooɓoyde maayɗo oon, himɓe gom duu no har ɗo no mboya.
O wi'i ɓe: —Mburtee, suka oo maayaay. O ɗaanii tan. Sey himɓe ɓeen njali jaleeɗe yawaare.
Wakkati ɓe njaltintoo mo yaasin ndeen, o naati nder suudu nduun, o nanngi junngo suka oon, sey suka oon ummii.
Habaru oon sankitii nder leydi ndiin fuu.
Wakkati Iisa dillannoo toon, wumɓe ɗiɗo gom tokki mo, no kuuɓa no mbi'a: —Taan Daawda, yurma min !
Wakkati o naatunoo to o wernoo, wumɓe ɓeen ngari to makko. O ƴami ɓe, o wi'i: —On ngoonɗini ko miɗo waawi wallude on naa? Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Ayyo Moodibbo, min ngoonɗini.
Nden o meemi gite maɓɓe, o wi'i: —Ɗum laatanoo on, no ngoonɗinirɗon nii.
Ɓe mbumti wakkati mum, nden o fooɗi noppi maɓɓe, o wi'i ɓe: —Tinnee, to kaalanee ɗum neɗɗo fuu.
Amma ɓe mburtii tan ɓe cankitowii habaru Iisa nder leydi ndiin fuu.
Wakkati wumtinaaɓe ɓeen ndillannoo, Iisa waddanaa gorko gom mo ginnaaru beebi.
O riiwi ginnaaru nduun, sey beebaaɗo oon fuɗɗi no haala. Ɗum haayɗini jama'aare ndeen fuu faa iɓe mbi'a: —Hano ɗum hi'aaka nder *Isra'el abada !
Amma *Fariisa'en ɓeen mbi'i ko hooreejo ginnaaji oon, kam hokki mo baawɗe riiwude ɗi.
Illa ɗon Iisa fuɗɗi no fiiloo nder ci'e he gure fuu, omo waajoo nder cuuɗi *baajorɗi, omo filloo filla *Habaru lobbo, filla Laamu Alla. Omo nyawta nyawuuji he laruuji ir iri fuu.
Wakkati o hi'unoo jama'aare wonnde gaɗa makko, o nani yurmeene maɓɓe, ngam ɓe tampi, ɓe cuulake sanne hano baali ɗi ngalaa duroowo.
Sey o wi'i *aahiiɓe makko ɓeen: —Kettol no ɗuuɗi, hettooɓe ɗuuɗaa.
Ndenne, eelee Jom kettol lilda hettooɓe ngam kettol mum.
Iisa noddi *aahiiɓe muuɗum sappo he ɗiɗo ɓeen, hokki ɓe baawɗe riiwude ginnaaji he nyawtude iri nyawuuji he laruuji fuu.
Ndaa inɗe *lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen nii: Arano maɓɓe woni Simon inndirteeɗo Piyer he minyiiko Andiire, Yakuuba ɓii-Jebede he minyiiko Yahaaya,
Filipa, Bartolome, Tomas, Matta jaɓoowo janngal, Yakuuba ɓii-Alfee, Tadde,
Simon kiranoowo suudu baaba he Yahuuda Iskariyot mo yahde yeeso jammboytoo Iisa oon.
Iisa lili *lilaaɓe mum sappo he ɗiɗo ɓeen, o wi'i ɓe: —To njehee to ɓe kanaa *Yahudankooɓe, kaden duu to naatee gure *Samariya.
Amma njehee nder ɓaadeeji Isra'ilankooɓe laatiiɓe hano baali majjuɗi ɓeen.
To njehoton fuu, mbaajoɗon mbi'on: « Laamu Alla ɓadake ! »
Nyawton nyawɓe, ummintinon maayɓe, nyawton seppinɓe, ndiiwon ginnaaji. Forba keɓuɗon moƴƴere ndee, kokkitiron nde forba.
To njaaree kanŋe, cardi naa ceede gaɗa mooɗon.
To kooƴee basi ɗiɗi naa toggooje ɗiɗi. To kooƴee paɗe naa cabbi, ngam golloowo no haani nyaamdu.
Nder siire fuu naa nder wuro fuu ngo ngarɗon nder mum, tefee bernoowo lobbo, wooɗi njooɗoɗon to bernoowo mooɗon faa nyannde ndilloton.
Nde oɗon naata nder ɓaade, ndu'oɗon Alla hokka nde jam.
Nde nii ɓaade lobbere non, barke du'aa'u mooɗon tabbitan he mayre. Amma nde nii nde lobbiɗaa, nde heɓataa barke du'aa'u mooɗon.
Wuro fuu ngo jaɓɓaaki on, naa ngo himɓe mum calii jaɓude haala mooɗon, piɗɗee sollaare koyɗe mooɗon nde nii on mburtake ngo.
Goonga kaalananmi on: Nyannde darŋal, kiite wuro ngoon no ɓuran ɗe kuɓeeje *Sodooma e Gomoora naawde.
—Kettinee ! Mi lili on hano baali caka pobbi. Ndenne kakkilanee ko'e mooɗon hano no bolle ngaɗata, laatoɗon jom'en jam hano buugaali.
Tinnoɗon he himɓe ɓeen, ngam ɓe ngattan on nder kiite, ɓe ɓoccan on nder *baajorɗi maɓɓe.
On njaaretee yeeso hooreeɓe he yeeso laamiiɓe ngam sabbu am, ngam ceedonoɗon kam yeeso maɓɓe, kamɓe he ɓe kanaa *Yahudankooɓe.
Wakkati ndarnaɗon nder hiitorde fuu, to ko'e mooɗon kaɓɓo dow ko kaaloton. Ngam on kokketee haalaaji ɗi kaanuɗon haalude wakkati mum.
*Ruuhu *Baabiraawo mooɗon, kam haalata nokku mooɗon.
Himɓe no kokkitiran sakiraaɓe mum'en mbaree, baaba no hokkitiran ɓiyum. Sukaaɓe no ummanto saarooɓe mum'en, gaɗa dabare ɓe mbaree.
Ngam am, himɓe fuu mbanyan on. Amma tarsiniiɗo faa yottii he timmoode, joomum no hisintee.
Nde nii on torraama nder wuro gom, pa'ee wonngo. Goonga kaalananmi on: On timmintaa gure *Isra'el ɗeen fuu tawa *Ɓii-Neɗɗo wartaay.
Walaa *aahiijo ɓurɗo moodibbo mum, naa maccuɗo ɓurɗo joomum.
Aahiijo no waawi laatoo hano moodibbo mum, maccuɗo duu laatoo hano joomum. Miin he hoore am ɓe noddiri kam Be'eljebul, mawɗo ginnaaji, sako faa onon banndiraaɓe am.
—Ndenne, to kulee himɓe. Walaa fuu ko suuɗi ko wanngintaake, walaa sirri ndi anndataake.
Ko kaalanmi on nder nimre, kaalee ɗum nder jeyngol. Ko nyo'anmi on fuu, kaalee ɗum yaasin nder daane toowne.
To kulee warooɓe ɓanndu, ɓe mbaawanaa yonkiiji fuy. Alla kaanɗon hulude. Kanko woni baawɗo halkude ɓanndu he yonki fuu nder jahannama.
Pooloy ɗiɗoy no connee tammal gootal. Amma baa gootel nder makkoy saamataa he leydi tawa hanaa nder muuyɗe *Baabiraawo mooɗon.
Onon, baa leeɓi ko'e mooɗon fuu no limaaɗi faa laaɓi.
Ndenne, to kulee, ngam oɗon ɓuri pooloy ɗukkoy koy teddungal.
Neɗɗo fuu bi'uɗo no anndi kam yeeso himɓe, miin duu, mi annditan ɗum yeeso *Baaba am gonɗo dow.
Amma caliiɗo kam yeeso himɓe fuu, miin duu, mi salanto ɗum yeeso *Baaba am gonɗo dow.
—To miilee ko mi wari ngam waddude jam nder duuniyaaru nduu. Mi waraay ngam waddude jam, amma konu ngarmi waddude.
Mi wari ngam mi sennda ɓiɗɗo gorko he bammum, ɓiɗɗo debbo he inna mum, ɓaŋaaɗo he esum debbo.
Koreeji neɗɗo laatoo wayɓe mum.
Korsinɗo innum naa bammum faa ɓuri kam fuu, fotaay laatoo *aahiijo am. Korsinɗo ɓiyum gorko naa debbo faa ɓuri kam fuu, fotaay laatoo aahiijo am.
Mo wakkaaki leggal mum *bardugal, tokki kam fuu, joomum fotaay laatoo *aahiijo am.
Tefuɗo hisinde yonki mum fuu, mursan ki. Amma mursuɗo ki ngam am fuu, heɓitan ki.
—Jaɓɓiiɗo on fuu, jaɓɓake kam. Jaɓɓiiɗo kam fuu jaɓɓake lilɗo kam oon.
Jaɓɓiiɗo annabiijo ngam o annabiijo Alla, heɓan ir baraaje ɗe annabiijo oon fodanaa ɗeen. Jaɓɓiiɗo neɗɗo dartiiɗo ngam dartinaaku mum, heɓan ir baraaje ɗe dartiiɗo oon fodanaa ɗeen.
Goonga kaalananmi on: Neɗɗo fuu kokkuɗo ɓurɗo famɗude nder *aahiiɓe am, baa nii laatoo nyeɗerde ndiyam peewɗam non ngam o aahiijo am, joomum heppataa baraaje muuɗum.
Wakkati Iisa haalidinnoo ko hiɗi he *aahiiɓe mum sappo he ɗiɗo ɓeen, sey o ummii o fiilowi nder gure takkol ɗon. Omo janngina himɓe, omo waajoo ɓe.
Wakkati mum tawi Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma no nder kasu. Sey o nani ko *Almasiihu gollata, nden o lili *aahiiɓe makko he Iisa.
Ɓe ngari, ɓe ƴami Iisa, ɓe mbi'i: —Aan woni *Almasiihu bi'aaɗo waran oon, naa min ndooma goɗɗo?
Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Njehee, kaalanowee Yahaaya ko nanuɗon he ko ngi'uɗon fuu:
Wumɓe no mbumtaa, laƴooɓe no njaha faa wooɗa, seppinɓe no nyawtee, pahuɓe no pahitee, maayɓe no ummintinee, talkaaɓe duu no pillanee *Habaru lobbo.
Barkinaaɗo woni mo salaaki goonɗinde kam.
Wakkati aahiiɓe Yahaaya ɓeen ndillunoo, Iisa fuɗɗi fillanaade jama'aare ndeen filla Yahaaya, o ƴami ɓe, o wi'i: —Ko njaanoɗon nder ladde yeeruure, ɗume ndaaroyɗon? Huɗo ko henndu wifata ndaaroyɗon?
Naa ɗume njaaɗon daaroyde? Oɗon miila ngi'on gorko ɓorniiɗo koltal nyaaƴo naa? Ɓornotooɗo koltal nyaaƴo nder ɓaade laamiiɗo tawetee.
Ndenne, ɗume ndaaroyɗon? Naa annabiijo njaaɗon daaroyde? Too, miɗo haalana on, Yahaaya no ɓuri annabiijo.
Kanko woni mo haala Alla wi'i dow mum har hunnduko annabiijo gom: Ndaa, mi ardinan lilaaɗo am moƴƴinane laawol maaɗa.
Goonga kaalananmi on: Dimaaɗo waɗaay nder duuniyaaru nduu ɓurɗo Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma. Amma fuu nii, ɓurɗo famɗude nder Laamu Alla no ɓuri mo teddude.
Illa jamaanu Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma warde hannden, himɓe no kaɓa, no nyaamodira dow Laamu Alla sanne. Jom'en semmbe duu no tefa teeta ngu.
*Tawreeta Muusa he dewte annabiiɓe fuu kaali dow Laamu nguun fadde jamaanu Yahaaya warde.
Nde nii on njaɓiino haala maɓɓe, Yahaaya woni Eliya, mo garol muuɗum hollaa.
Jom nowru fuu nana.
Amma he ɗume mbaawmi nanndinde himɓe jamaanu hannden oo? Iɓe nanndi he sukaaɓe jooɗiiɓe nder luuɓe, no nodda higiraaɓe mum'en, no mbi'a:
« Min puufanii on seeseeji, amma on mbomaay ! Min njimanii on jimi jurminiiɗi, amma on mboyaay ! »
Ngam wakkati Yahaaya warnoo, omo suumoo, o yarataa cabiijam, amma wi'aama o laddaaɗo.

*Ɓii-Neɗɗo duu wari, no nyaama, no yara, amma wi'aama: « Ndaaree neɗɗo oo, nyaamɗe he jarɗe tan adi hakkillo makko, o higo *jaɓooɓe janngal he waɗooɓe hakke ! » Dey goonɗinɓe anndal Alla no kolla nder mbuurnam mum'en ko laawol Alla no goonga.
Nden Iisa fuɗɗi felude himɓe gure ɗe o ɓuri waɗude kaayɗe nder mum, ngam wonɓe nder majje tuubaay.

Omo wi'a: —Bone saaman dow maa, aan Korasin ! Bone saaman dow maa, aan Baytisayda ! Ngam nde nii kaayɗe gaɗanooɗe nder mooɗon ɗeen, ngaɗanooma nder Tirus he nder Sidon, tawan wonɓe nder majje tuubinoo ila. Ɓe ɓoornakeno saakuuji, ɓe mbujakeno ndooni, ngam hollude ko ɓe tuubii.
Ngam majjum, miɗo wi'a on: Nyannde darŋal, kiite mooɗon no ɓuran ɗe Tirus he Sidon naawde.
Aan duu Kafarnahum, aɗa miila a townetee faa dow naa? Too, a leynetee faa laahara. Ngam nde nii kaayɗe gaɗanooɗe nder maaɗa ɗeen, ngaɗanooma nder *Sodooma, nden wuro ngoon no heddotonoo faa joonin.
Ngam majjum, miɗo wi'a on: Nyannde darŋal, kiite mooɗon no ɓuran ɗe *Sodooma naawde.
Nder wakkati mum non Iisa haali, wi'i: —Mi yettii ma, *Baabiraawo jom dow he ley, ngam a suuɗanii jom'en hakkillo he anndal kujje ɗee fuu amma a wannginanii ɗe sukaaɓe famarɓe.
Noon non jaati *Baaba, ngam kanƴum welii ma.
*Baaba am watti huune fuu nder juuɗe am. Walaa annduɗo Ɓiɗɗo oon nde hanaa *Baabiraawo oon. Walaa annduɗo *Baabiraawo oon duu nde hanaa Ɓiɗɗo oon, he mo Ɓiɗɗo oon muuyi wannginande *Baaba oon.
Onon tampuɓe, ronndiiɓe donle tedduɗe, on fuu ngaree to am, mi fowtinan on.
Ɗowtanee kam baa ko ɗum hoyaa, accon mi janngina on. Ngam mi leesiniiɗo hoore, ɓerne am duu no feewi, yonkiiji mooɗon keɓan powtiri.
Ngam ɗowtanaaki am nannduki ko satti no hoyi, donngal am duu no huyfi.
Balɗe seɗɗa gaɗa majjum, Iisa he *aahiiɓe muuɗum no peddita gese alkamaaje. Nyannde mum ɗum fototiri he *nyalaane fowteteene, *aahiiɓe ɓeen ndafaa, iɓe mborsoo camme alkama, iɓe ƴakka.
Wakkati *Fariisa'en ngi'unoo ɗum ndeen, ɓe mbi'i Iisa: —A hi'i *aahiiɓe maaɗa no ngaɗa ko haɗaa nder *nyalaane fowteteene !
Nden o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i: —On njanngaay ko Daawda waɗunoo wakkati kanko he yaadiraaɓe makko fuu ndafanoo?
O naatidi he maɓɓe nder suudu Alla. Ɓe nyaami buuru ittanaaɗo Alla oon. Ɓe kaanaa nyaamude mo, *cakkanooɓe Alla tan kaani nyaamude mo.

Naa duu, on njanngaay nder *Tawreeta Muusa, ko baa nder *nyalaane fowteteene *cakkanooɓe Alla no ngolla nder *Juulirde mawne ndeen? Nyannde mum iɓe lutta he tilsinooje nyalaane ndeen, amma ɓe pelirtaake ɗum.
Miɗo wi'a on ko ɓuri *Juulirde mawne ndeen no ɗo.
Nde nii on paaminoo ko haala Alla kaa fiirtata: Yurmeene ngiɗumi, hanaa *sadaka, nden on ndekataano gacce dow mo gaccaaka.
Ngam *Ɓii-Neɗɗo woni jom *nyalaane fowteteene.
Iisa dilli toon, naatowi nder *waajordu maɓɓe.
Gorko gom mo junngo mum waati no tawa toon. Wonɓe ɗon ɓeen no tefa ko pelirta Iisa, nden ɓe ƴami mo ɓe mbi'i: —*Tawreeta hokki laawol neɗɗo nyawtee nder *nyalaane fowteteene naa hokkaay?
Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Alal misaali, oɗon ngoodi mbaalu mon ngootu, dey ngu saama nder luggere nder *nyalaane fowteteene, ndenne on mburtinoyta ngu naa?
Oɗon anndi sanne ko neɗɗo no ɓuri mbaalu teddungal ! Ndenne, no dagii neɗɗo waɗanee ko wooɗi nder *nyalaane fowteteene.
Nden o wi'i gorko oon: —Foortu junngo maa ! Oon foorti ngo, ngo yamɗiti, ngo warti hano ngooto.
Sey *Fariisa'en mburtii, kawrowi ngam caawodira dow no ɓe mbardata Iisa.
Wakkati Iisa heɓunoo habaru majjum, o dilli toon, jama'aare mawne tokki mo. O nyawti nyawɓe ɓeen fuu,
o wi'i ɓe to ɓe kaalan neɗɗo fuu moy o woni.
Ɗum duu ngam humnude ko annabi *Esaaya haalunoo wakkati o wi'i:
Ndaa golloowo am mo cuɓiimi. Omo horsi he am, omo welna ɓerne am. Mi jippinan *Ruuhu am dow makko, o yottinan laawol dartinaaku to lenyol fuu.
O yeddodirtaa he neɗɗo fuu, o olkataa. Daane makko nanataake dow laabi.
O jokkititta ƴommbal kelngal, o nyifataa fitilla ka jeyngol muuɗum famɗi sey nii nyannde o waɗi dartinaaku jaali.
Lenyol fuu dekan gokka mum dow makko.
Wakkati gorko gom, mo ginnaaru wumni, beebi, waddaa to makko, Iisa nyawti mo. Gorko oon no hi'a, no haala.
Ɗum haayɗini himɓe ɓeen fuu, nden ɓe tinni iɓe mbi'a: —Gorko oo, sikka fuu walaa o taanu Daawda.
Amma wakkati *Fariisa'en nanunoo ɗum ndeen, ɓe mbi'i: —Baawɗe Be'eljebul hooreejo ginnaaji, o riiwrata ɗi.
Ngam Iisa no anndi miilooji maɓɓe, waɗi o wi'i ɓe: —Laamu fuu feccii ɗiɗi, no ɓoorodira ɓooyataa. Wuro fuu fecciingo naa ɓaade fuu fecciine pecce ɗiɗi, himɓe mum potataa, ɓe cankititto.
Nde nii Ibiliisa riiwi ginnaaji muuɗum, feccii hoore mum. Ndenne, noy laamu mum darortoo?
Nde tawi Be'eljebul ndiiwiranmi ginnaaji, aahiiɓe mooɗon, ɗume ndiiwirta ɗi? Ndenne, golleeji maɓɓe he hoore mum kollata ko on ngalaa goonga !
Amma nde nii *Ruuhu Alla ndiiwiranmi ginnaaji, iɗum holla ko Laamu Alla wari to mooɗon.
Neɗɗo fuu waawaa naati wuro jom semmbe, teeta njawdi makko, nde nii hanaa no artu haɓɓi mo non ginan, nden hooƴa njawdi ndiin fuu.
Mo wondaa he am fuu no ganyo am. Mo wallataa kam mi hawra, joomum no cankitoowo.
Ngam majjum, miɗo wi'a on: Hakkeeji himɓe he haalaaji mum'en bonɗi fuu no mbaawi yaafeede. Amma bonnuɗo innde *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo fuu yaafataake.
Neɗɗo fuu kaaluɗo ko boni dow *Ɓii-Neɗɗo, joomum no waawi yaafeede. Amma neɗɗo fuu kaaluɗo ko boni dow *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, yaafataake hannden, yaafataake duu nder wakkati garoowo.
—Nde nii lekki no wooɗi, ɓiɓɓe muuɗum mbooɗan. Nde lekki wooɗaa, ɓiɓɓe muuɗum mbooɗataa. Ngam lekki ɓiɓɓe mum annditirtee.
Ɓiɓɓe bolle ! Noy mbaawirton haalude ko wooɗi tawee on bonɓe? Ngam ko heewi nder ɓerne, hunnduko wurtinta.
Neɗɗo moƴƴuɗo, ko moƴƴi ko resi nder ɓerne mum, kam hunnduko mum wurtinta. Neɗɗo bonɗo duu, ko boni ko resi nder ɓerne mum, kam hunnduko mum wurtinta.
Miɗo wi'a on: Nyannde darŋal, neɗɗo fuu jaaboto ngam haalaaji muuɗum meereeji.
Ngam neɗɗo fuu haalaaji muuɗum hiitortee. Ndenne, kanƴi ngatta neɗɗo dartiiɗo naa jukketeeɗo.
Nyannde gom, jannginooɓe *Tawreeta he *Fariisa'en gom mbi'i Iisa: —Moodibbo, miɗen ngiɗi kollaa min alaama ko Alla lili ma.
Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Onon himɓe jamaanu bonɗo, mo hulataa Alla. Oɗon ngiɗi holleede alaama. Amma alaama fuu non on kollataake ko ƴaari alaama annabi Yunuusa.
Ngam no Yunuusa waɗiri balɗe tati jemma he nyalooma nder reedu linngu manngu nguun, hano non *Ɓii-Neɗɗo duu waɗirta balɗe tati jemma he nyalooma nder leydi.
Nyannde darŋal, himɓe Niniwe ummodoto he himɓe jamaanu hannden. Ɓe kiitodoo he maɓɓe, ɓe liɓa ɓe, ngam kamɓe, ɓe tuubii wakkati ɓe nanunoo waaju Yunuusa. Haya, ɓurɗo Yunuusa nii ɗo !

Nyannde darŋal, debbo laamiiɗo leydi hoore huɗo gom ummodoto he himɓe jamaanu hannden oo. O hiitodo he maɓɓe, o liɓa ɓe. Debbo oo ƴuwi faa to woɗɗi, wari ngam hettinaade haalaaji Suleymaanu keewɗi hikmaaku. Haya, ɓurɗo Suleymaanu nii ɗo !
—Nde nii ginnaaru wurtake neɗɗo, ndu yahan indu warta. Ndu tefan nokkuuje joorɗe to ndu fowtata, amma ndu heɓataa.
Nden ndu wi'a: « Ndaa, mi soƴƴoto wuro am to ƴuwnoomi. » Nde nii ndu wartii, ndu tawaa, nokkuure ndeen wuuwaama, moƴƴinaama.

Nden ndu yaha, ndu waddowa ginnaaji jeɗɗi ɓurɗi ndu bonde gom. Ɗi naata, ɗi koɗa nder wuro ngoon. Sakitoo mbuurnam neɗɗo mo ndu wurtinoo nder mum oon ɓura ɗam arannde ɗam bonde. Nii himɓe jamaanu bonɗo oo laatortoo.
Wakkati Iisa haaldannoo he jama'aare ndeen, sey inniiko he minyiraaɓe makko worɓe njottii, ɓe ndarii yaasin. Iɓe ngiɗi hi'ude mo.
Sey goɗɗo wi'i mo: —Ndaa, inna maa he rimdaaɓe maaɗa no ndarii yaasin, no ngiɗi ngi'e.
O jaabii neɗɗo oon, o wi'i mo: —Moy woni inna am? Ɓeye ngoni rimdaaɓe am?
O sappii *aahiiɓe makko ɓeen, o wi'i: —Ndaaree inna am he rimdaaɓe am nii.
Gaɗoowo muuyɗe *Baabiraawo am gonɗo dow, kam woni dimdaaɗo am, kam woni inna am.
Nyannde mum, Iisa no wonnoo nder suudu sey o wurtii, o jooɗowii daane peta Galili.
Jama'aare mawne gom wari, fiilii mo, ngam majjum o naatowi laana ndiyam o jooɗii. Himɓe ɓeen ndarii hunnduko maayo ngoon.
O haalani ɓe kujje keewɗe nder kippol haala. Omo wi'a: —Aawoowo gom dilli faa aawowa aawdiiri mum.
Nder aawre ndeen, gabbe gom caami sera laawol. Nden pooli ngari coppi ɗe.
Gere majje caami nder korkaaƴe to leydi ɗuuɗaa. Ɗe puɗilawi ngam luggiɗaa sanne.
Amma wakkati naange wulnoo ndeen, ɗe ɗayli, ɗe njoori ngam ɗe ngaɗaay ɗaɗi.
Gere majje caami to kebbe puɗata. Kebbe ɗeen mawni, nanngi ɗe.
Gere majje duu caami nder leydi lobbiri. Ɗe puɗi, ɗe ndimi: Wassaaŋo gom rimi camme hemre, wonngo lasooji tati, wonngo duu woronja.
Jom nowru fuu nana !
Sey *aahiiɓe ɓeen ɓattii, ƴami mo, mbi'i: —Ɗume waɗi ko aɗa haalana ɓe kujje ɗee nder kippol haala?
Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Onon, Alla hokkii on baawɗe anndude ko suuɗi dow habaru Laamu muuɗum. Amma kamɓe, ɓe kokkaaka ɗum.
Ngam jogiiɗo fuu, no ɓeydantee faa heewa. Amma mo walaa oon, baa seɗɗa mo jogii oon, no teetetee.
Ko waɗi miɗo haalana ɓe kujje ɗee nder kippol haala woni: Baa nde ɓe ndaari, ɓe ngi'ataa, baa nde ɓe kettinake, ɓe nanataa, ɓe paamataa.
Hakiika ko annabi *Esaaya haalunoo dow maɓɓe ɗum tabbiti, wakkati wi'unoo ɓe: On nanan faa wooɗa, amma on paamataa. On ndaaran faa wooɗa, amma on ngi'ataa.
Ngam himɓe lenyol ngool no njoori ɓerɗe: Ɓe cukkii noppi maɓɓe, ɓe maɓɓii gite maɓɓe, ngam to gite maɓɓe ngi'u, to noppi maɓɓe nanu, to hakkillooji maɓɓe paamu, to ɓe tuubu sako mi danna ɓe.
Amma onon, on welɓe ko'e. Gite mooɗon ngi'an, noppi mooɗon duu nanan !
Goonga kaalananmi on, annabiiɓe heewɓe he dartiiɓe ɗuɓɓe muuyiino hi'ude ko ngi'oton ɗum, amma ɓe ngi'aay ɗum. Ɓe muuyiino hettinaade ko nanuɗon ɗum, amma ɓe nanaay ɗum.
Nden Iisa wi'i *aahiiɓe mum: —Kettinee piirtol kippol haala dow aawoowo ngool nii.
Sera laawol to aawdiiri ndiin saami woni nanuɓe haala Laamu Alla, dey paamaay ka. Gaɗa mum bonɗo oon waran, ɗoofa ko aawaa nder ɓerne maɓɓe.
Korkaaƴe to aawdiiri ndiin saami woni nanuɓe haala kaan, njaɓɓorii ka welwelo wakkati mum da.
Amma ngam ka waɗaay ɗaɗi nder maɓɓe, ɓe nanngan ka wakkati seɗɗa tan. Nde nii ɓe ɓillake naa nde nii ɓe torraama ngam makka, ɓe mboppan ka wakkati mum da.
To kebbe puɗidi aawdiiri ndiin woni nanuɓe haala kaan, amma sakkulla duuniyaaru he suuno njawdi kuman ka nder maɓɓe, ka laatoo ndimara.
Leydi lobbiri to aawdiiri ndiin saami woni nanuɓe haala kaan, paamii ka faa ɓe ngaɗi barke: Woɓɓe kile hemre, woɓɓe kile lasooji tati, woɓɓe duu kile woronja.
Iisa waɗani ɓe kippol haala gom, wi'i ɓe: —Ndaa no Laamu Alla nanndi nii: Gorko gom wicci aawdiiri alkama lobbiri nder ngesa muuɗum.
Amma wakkati himɓe fuu ɗaaninoo ndeen, ganyo makko gom wari, wicci huɗo bonko nder magga, dilli.
Wakkati aawdiiri ndiin fuɗunoo ndeen faa ndi fii camme, huɗo bonko koon wanngi.
Maccuɓe jom ngesa oon mbi'owi mo: « Alla sabbinane, hanaa aawdiiri lobbiri aawuɗaa naa? Ndenne toy huɗo bonko koo ƴuwi? »
O jaabii ɓe, o wi'i: « Ganyo gom waɗi ɗum. » Nden maccuɓe ɓeen ƴami mo, mbi'i: « Aɗa hiɗi min ɗoofowa ko naa? »
Amma o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i: « Aa'a, ngam nde nii oɗon ɗoofa ko, on ɗoofidan ko he alkama oon.
Accidee ko he alkama oon faa kettol. Nden, mi wi'an hettooɓe ɓeen ɗoofa ko ginan, ɓe kaɓɓa ko kaɓɓe kaɓɓe faa ko wulee, nden ɓe ketta alkama oon, ɓe kawra mo nder ƴeelu am. »
Iisa waɗani ɓe kippol haala gom, wi'i ɓe: —Laamu Alla no nanndi he wabbere mutaari nde neɗɗo hooƴi, aawi nder ngesa muuɗum.
Wabbere ndeen woni ɓurde gabbe fuu famɗude, amma nde nii nde fuɗi, nde ɓuran leɗɗe koogol ngool fuu. Nde laatoto lekki mawki faa pooli ngara nyiɓa cuuɗi mum'en dow licce makki.
Iisa waɗani ɓe kippol haala gom kaden, wi'i ɓe: —Laamu Alla no nanndi he ƴuufinirɗum ko debbo budi nder muddiiji conndi alkama tati mawɗi faa ɗum fuu ɗum ƴuufi.
Iisa haalani ɓe kujje ɗee fuu nder kippol haala. Walaa fuu ko o haalani ɓe ko hanaa nder kippol haala o haali ɗum.
O waɗiri non duu ngam tabbintinde haala kaa annabiijo gom haalunoo wakkati wi'unoo: Mi haaldan he himɓe nder kippol haala, mi haalanan ɓe kujje cuuɗaaɗe fadde duuniyaaru tageede.
Iisa ummii, acci himɓe ɓeen, naatowi nder suudu. *Aahiiɓe makko ɓattii mo, mbi'i mo: —Fiirtan min kippol haala ngool.
Nden o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i: —Aawɗo aawdiiri lobbiri ndiin, oon woni *Ɓii-Neɗɗo.
Ngesa ngaan duu woni duuniyaaru. Aawdiiri lobbiri ndiin woni ɓiɓɓe Laamu Alla. Huɗo bonko koon woni ɓiɓɓe bonɗo oon.
Ganyo jom ngesa oon woni Ibiliisa. Kettol ngool woni timmoode duuniyaaru, hettooɓe ɓeen ngoni maleykaaɓe.
Hano no huɗo koon ittirtee, faɗɗee nder hiite nii, hano non timmoode duuniyaaru duu laatortoo.
*Ɓii-Neɗɗo lilan maleykaaɓe muuɗum, kawra itta nder laamu mum waɗooɓe woɓɓe ngaɗa hakke ɓeen, he waɗooɓe ko boni fuu.
Ɓe paɗɗee nder kaatane hiite nge nyifataa. Toon ɓe mbuletee, iɓe ŋerƴodira nyiiƴe.
Amma wakkati mum, dartiiɓe ɓeen no ƴelkiɗan hano naange nder Laamu *Baabiraawo mum'en. Jom nowru fuu, nana !

Iisa waɗi kippol haala gom wi'i kaden: —Laamu Alla no nanndi he njawdi cuuɗiini nder ngesa. Gorko gom hiiti ndi, suuɗitini, suuɗi kam duu. Nder welwelo makko, o yehi, o sottowi ko o joginoo fuu, nden o soodi ngesa ngaan.
Laamu Alla no nanndi kaden he luumotooɗo tefoowo kaaƴe dime.
Nde joomum hi'i hayre rimre soodeteene law, joomum no yahan sonnowa ko jogii fuu nden sooda nde.
Iisa waɗi kippol haala gom kaden wi'i: —Laamu Alla no nanndi he taaruwol paɗɗaangol nder maayo, dey nanngi iri liƴƴi fuu.
Wakkati taaruwol ngool heewunoo, nanngooɓe liƴƴi ɓeen pooɗi ngol faa he hunnduko ndiyam. Ɓe njooɗii, iɓe cennda liƴƴi ɗiin. Liƴƴi lobbi ɗiin no ngattee nder kandeeje, bonɗi ɗiin duu no paɗɗee.
Hano non timmoode duuniyaaru ndu laatortoo. Maleykaaɓe ngaran cennda bonɓe he dartiiɓe.
Ɓe paɗɗan bonɓe ɓeen nder hiite jahannama, toon ɓe mbuletee, iɓe ŋerƴodira nyiiƴe.
Iisa ƴami ɓe, wi'i: —On paamii maana ɗum fuu naa? Nden ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Ayyo, min paamii.
Sey, o wi'i ɓe: —Jannginoowo *Tawreeta fuu laatiiɗo aahiijo nder Laamu Alla, no nanndi he jom ɓaade keɓoowo nafakka nder kujje kese he kujje kiɗɗe.
Wakkati Iisa hanti kippi haala mum, ummii,

hooti nder Nasaratu, wuro ngo o mawnunoo nder mum. Omo waajoo nder *waajordu maɓɓe. Ɗum haayɗini hettinaniiɓe mo ɓeen sanne, ɓe tinni iɓe mbi'a: —Toy o heɓi anndal ngal? Noy o heɓiri baawɗe waɗude kaayɗe ɗee?
Hanaa ya kanko woni ɓii sekkeejo oon? Hanaa Mariyaama woni inniiko? Hanaa kanko woni mawnu Yakuuba, Yusufu, Simon he Yahuuda'en?
Hanaa enen he minyiraaɓe makko rewɓe ngondi? Ndenne, moy hokki mo anndal ngaal he baawɗe ɗee fuu?
Ngam majjum waɗi ɓe calii mo. Amma Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Annabiijo no teddinee nder nokkuuje fuu, dey hanaa nder wuro muuɗum he ɓaade muuɗum.
Iisa waɗaay toon kaayɗe ɗuɗɗe ngam ɓe ngoonɗinaay mo.
Wakkati *Hirudus, laamiiɗo leydi Galili, nanunoo filla Iisa no waɗee.
Sey o wi'i gollooɓe makko: —Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma ! Maayɗo oon, kam ummitii. Ngam majjum waɗi, omo jogii baawɗe waɗude kaayɗe.
*Hirudus no hiɗi wara Yahaaya amma suusaa, ngam himɓe fuu no mbi'a o annabiijo.
Ko wakkati nyalaane miccintinoore dimeeki *Hirudus yottinoo, ɓii-Hirudiya debbo womi yeeso noddaaɓe-ngari to juulɗe ɗeen. *Hirudus nani belɗum majjum sanne,
faa hunii no hokkan mo huune fuu ko o eeli ɗum.
Surbaajo oon tokki haala innum, wi'i *Hirudus: —Waddanam jooni jooni hoore Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma nder le'al !
Ɗum naawi ɓerne *Hirudus, amma ko heƴi o huni ɗum yeeso noddaaɓe ɓeen, tilay makko o hokka laawol surbaajo oon hokkee ko ŋaarii ɗum.
O lili goɗɗo yaha nder kasu oon, taƴowa hoore Yahaaya.
Hoore ndeen taƴaa, tummbaa nder le'al, nde hokkaa suka debbo oon. Kam duu hokkowi nde innum.
Aahiiɓe Yahaaya ɓeen ngari kooƴi ɓanndu makko, mooɓowi. Nden ɓe njehi, ɓe kaalanowi Iisa ko waɗi.

Wakkati Iisa nanunoo habaru maayde Yahaaya ndeen, o ummii kanko tan o dilli, o naatowi nder laana ndiyam, o fa'i nokkuure yeewne gom. Wakkati himɓe nanunoo ɗum ndeen, mburtii nder gure takkiiɗe daane peta ngaan, tokki mo.
Wakkati o wurtinoo nder laana kaan, o hi'i jama'aare mawne no hawri. Ɓe njurminii mo sanne. O nyawti nyawɓe wonɓe nder maɓɓe fuu.
Wakkati hiirunoo ndeen, *aahiiɓe ɓeen ɓattii Iisa, mbi'i mo: —Joonin kay futuro waɗi, nokkuure ndee duu no ladde. Accu jama'aare ndeen yaha, naatowa nder gure ngam coodowa ko nyaamata.
Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Fotaay ɓe njaha nder gure. Onon he ko'e mooɗon, kokkee ɓe ko ɓe nyaamata.
Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Buuruuje joy he liƴƴi ɗiɗi tan min njogii.
O wi'i ɓe: —Ngaddanee kam ɗum ɗo.
O wi'i himɓe ɓeen njooɗoo dow huɗo koon. O hooƴi buuruuje joy ɗeen he liƴƴi ɗiɗi ɗiin, o tiggitii, o yetti Alla. O helti buuruuje ɗeen, o hokki *aahiiɓe ɓeen kokka jama'aare ndeen.
Ɓe fuu ɓe nyaami faa ɓe kaari. *Aahiiɓe ɓeen kawri kelte koddiiɗe ɗeen. Ɗum hebbini kandeeje sappo he ɗiɗi.
Nyaamuɓe ɓeen no ngaɗa hano worɓe ujunaaji joy mbaka rewɓe he sukaaɓe ɓeen ngalaa.
Wakkati mum da, o hokki laawol *aahiiɓe ɓeen naata nder laana kaan, ardoo, peddita peta ngaan, fadde makko waynaade jama'aare ndeen.
Gaɗa waynitaaki jama'aare ndeen, o ƴeenyowi dow waamnde ngam du'aade kanko tan. Naange yani, tawi mo dow mayre.
Laana *aahiiɓe ɓeen duu woɗɗowake. Ika dilli yahde ika fotta he henndu, sey benkeƴƴe puɗɗi no piya ka.
Wakkati ɓadinoo weetude, o wari to *aahiiɓe ɓeen, omo dilla he koyɗe dow ndiyam ɗaam.
Amma wakkati *aahiiɓe ɓeen ngi'unoo omo dilla he koyɗe dow ndiyam ɗaam, ɓerɗe maɓɓe taƴi, ɓe mbi'i: —Mbeelu maayɗo non ! Ɓe kuli kulal manngal.
Wakkati mum da Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Pukkinee hakkillooji mooɗon ! Miin non. To kulee !
Sey Piyer jaabii mo, wi'i: —Joomam, nde nii aan non, waɗu mi wara to maa.
Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —War ! Piyer wurtii laana kaan, no yaaɓa dow ndiyam ɗaam, no fa'i to Iisa.
Amma wakkati o hi'unoo henndu nduun sattii sanne ndeen, o huli, sey o fuɗɗi yoolaade, nden o huuɓi, o wi'i: —Joomam, hisinam !
Wakkati mum da, Iisa foorti junngo mum, nanngi mo, wi'i: —Hey pamɗuɗo goonɗinol, ko waɗi cikkuɗaa?
Gaɗa mum ɓe fuu ɗiɗo, ɓe naati laana kaan, sey henndu nduun duu darii.
Nden *aahiiɓe wonɓe nder laana kaan cujidani mo, mbi'i: —Hakiika, aan woni *Ɓii-Alla !
Wakkati ɓe pedditinnoo peta ngaan, ɓe njottii leydi Genesaret.
Himɓe wuro ngoon fuu annditi mo, ɓe ngaɗi lilaaɓe leydi ndiin fuu haalanee garki makko. Himɓe ɓeen ngaddani mo nyawɓe mum'en fuu.
Ɓe eeli mo o acca nyawɓe ɓeen meema baa nii hunnduko jabbaare makko tan. Meemuɗo nde fuu nyawti.
*Fariisa'en he jannginooɓe *Tawreeta ƴuwi *Ursaliima, ngari to Iisa ƴami mo, mbi'i:
—Ɗume waɗi ko *aahiiɓe maaɗa tokkataa laabi finaa-tawaaji maamiraaɓe meeɗen? Ɓe lootataa juuɗe maɓɓe fadde maɓɓe nyaamude.
Sey Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Onon nee, ɗume waɗi ko on tokkataa tilsinooje Alla, oɗon tokka finaa-tawaaji mooɗon?
Ngam Alla wi'i: Teddin inna maa he bammaa. O wi'i kaden: Kuɗuɗo innum naa bammum fuu no haani wareede.
Amma onon, oɗon njanngina ko neɗɗo no waawi wi'ude innum naa bammum, kam sakkani Alla ko haani wallirde ɓe ɗum.
Oɗon mbi'a fotaay joomum teddina saarooɓe muuɗum. Ndenne ngam sabbu finaa-tawaaji mooɗon, oɗon ngartira haala Alla meere !
Munaafiki'en ! *Esaaya woofaay sam wakkati o waɗunoo annabaaku dow mooɗon.
Nder maggu Alla wi'i: Himɓe ɓee no mbi'an kam'en no teddina kam, amma ɓerɗe maɓɓe no mboɗɗi kam.
Dewal maɓɓe no meere ngam ko ɓe ngoni iɓe njanngina ɗum to ɓiɓɓe aadama ƴuwi.
Nden Iisa noddi jama'aare ndeen, wi'i nde: —Kettinee.
Paamee ko hanaa ko naatata nder hunnduko neɗɗo, tunninta ɗum, amma ko wurtotoo nder makko.
Sey *aahiiɓe ɓeen ɓattii mo, mbi'i: —Aɗa anndi ko haalaaji maaɗa ɗiin metti ɓerɗe *Fariisa'en?
Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Wasaango fuu ngo *Baaba am gonɗo dow aawaay, no ɗoofetee.
Accee ɓe, ɓe wumɓe ɗowooɓe wumɓe ! Nde bumɗo ɗowi bumɗo, sey ɓe fuu ɗiɗo ɓe caamowan nder ngayka.
Sey Piyer wi'i mo: —Fiirtan min banndol ngool.
Nden Iisa jaabii mo wi'i: —Onon duu, faa hannden ɗum laaɓanaay on naa?
On anndaa ko naati nder hunnduko fuu no yahan nder reedu, gaɗa mum ɗum yehee gaɗa wuro naa?
Amma ko wurtotoo nder hunnduko ɗum, nder ɓerne ɗum ƴuwata, kanƴum jaati tunninta neɗɗo.
Ngam nder ɓerne neɗɗo miilooji bonɗi, uppooji neɗɗo itta yonki, yeena, fija, wujja, seedo dow fewre, he mbonka fuu ƴuwata.
Ɗum woni ko tunninta neɗɗo. Amma nyaama tawee lootaay juuɗe muuɗum hano no finaa-tawaaji wi'iri ɗum nii tunnintaa neɗɗo.
Nyannde gom Iisa ummidii *aahiiɓe mum, fonndi seraaji Tirus he Sidon.
Sey Kanananke debbo gom tawaaɗo nder seraaji ɗiin waddi bojji mum to makko, wi'i: —Joomam, taan Daawda, yurmam ! Ɓiyam debbo, ginnaaru woni dow mum, indu torra mo sanne !
Amma Iisa jaabaaki mo. Nden *aahiiɓe ɓeen ɓattii mo, mbi'i: —Riiwu debbo oo, omo nii gaɗa meeɗen, omo wulla.
Sey Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Ngam baali *Isra'el majjuɗi ɗiin waɗi lilaami.
Nden debbo oon wari, sujidi yeeso makko, wi'i: —Joomam, wallam !
Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Hegaaki neɗɗo hooƴa nyaamdu sukaaɓe, faɗɗana dawaaɗi.
Debbo oon jaabitii mo, wi'i kaden: —Goonga non, Joomam. Amma dawaaɗi duu no nyaama nyaamdu joomiraaɓe mum'en ɓiltotoondu nder le'e maɓɓe no saama.
Nden, Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Goonɗinol maa ngool no mawni ! Ɗum laatane no ngiɗirɗaa fuu. Nder wakkati mum, ɓiyiiko debbo nyawti.
Iisa dilli Tirus he Sidon, o tokkitii daane peta Galili yahde. O ƴeenyi waamnde gom, o jooɗowi toon.
Himɓe heewɓe ngari to makko, ngaddani mo laƴooɓe, wumɓe, larɗuɓe, pahuɓe, he nyawɓe heewɓe. Ɓe ngaddi ɓe yeeso makko, nden o nyawti ɓe.
Wakkati ɓe ngi'unoo pahuɓe ɓeen no kaala, larɗuɓe ɓeen no larɗita, laƴooɓe ɓeen no laƴita, wumnooɓe ɓeen no ngi'a. Ɗum haayɗini ɓe sanne. Ɓe tinni iɓe njetta Alla mo *Isra'el.
Iisa noddi *aahiiɓe mum, wi'i ɓe: —Himɓe ɓee no njurminii. Balɗe tati nii hannden ko iɓe ngondi he am, ɓe ngalaa fuu ko nyaamee. Mi hiɗaa ɓe ndilla tawee ɓe nyaamaay, to rafo liɓoy ɓe dow laawol.
Nden *aahiiɓe ɓeen mbi'i mo: —Toy keɓeten ko nyamni jama'aare ndee fuu nder ladde yeeruure ndee?
Sey o ƴami ɓe, o wi'i: —Buuruuje foti njogiɗon? Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Buuruuje jeɗɗi, he likkoy seɗɗa min njogii.
Nden o wi'i jama'aare ndeen jooɗoo he leydi.
O hooƴi buuruuje jeɗɗi ɗeen he likkoy koy. O yetti Alla, o helti ɗe, o hokki *aahiiɓe ɓeen, njeddani jama'aare ndeen.
Ɓe fuu ɓe nyaami faa ɓe kaari. *Aahiiɓe ɓeen kawri kelte ɗeen, ɗe kebbini kandeeje jeɗɗi.
Worɓe nyaamuɓe ɓeen tan no ngaɗa ujunaaji nayo, sukaaɓe he rewɓe ɓeen ngalaa nder.
Gaɗa Iisa waynii himɓe ɓeen, o naati laana, o fa'i leydi Magadan.
*Fariisa'en he *Sadduki'en gom ngari to Iisa faa tunna mo. Ɓe ŋaarii mo o holla ɓe alaama kaayɗiniiɗo ƴuwɗo dow kolloowo ko Alla lili mo.
Nden o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i: —Wakkati naange hiɗi yanude, kammu no wojji, oɗon mbi'a nyalooma jaaŋo oon no welan.
Illa beete duu, nde duule boɗeeje ƴeenyi, faa kammu niɓɓi, oɗon mbi'a hannden ndiyam no toɓan. Oɗon mbaawi senndodirde alamaaji kammu, amma on mbaawaa senndodirde alamaaji wakkatiiji !
Himɓe jamaanu bonɗo mo hulataa Alla ngiɗi holleede alaama. Alaama fuu non on kollataake ko ƴaari alaama annabi Yunuusa. Nden o dilli, o acci ɓe.
Wakkati *aahiiɓe ɓeen pedditannoo peta Galili, ɓe njeggiti ɓe pantiraay buuru gaɗa maɓɓe.
Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Kakkilee, paddee ko'e mooɗon he ƴuufinirɗum *Fariisa'en he *Sadduki'en oo.
Sey *aahiiɓe ɓeen puɗɗi no mbi'odira: —Ngam en pantiraay buuru, waɗi omo wi'a haalaaji ɗii.
Iisa faami ko ɓe ngoni iɓe kaala, nden o wi'i ɓe: —Onon famɗuɓe goonɗinol ! Ɗume waɗi oɗon mbi'odira hakkune mooɗon ngam on ngalaa buuru non?
On paamaay faa hannden? On njeggitani buuruuje joy, ɗe njeddanmi worɓe ujunaaji joyo ɗeen naa? Nyannde mum kandeeje foti kebbinirɗon kelte buuru oon?
On njeggitani kaden buuruuje jeɗɗi, ɗe njeddanmi worɓe ujunaaji nayo ɗeen naa? Nyannde mum kandeeje foti kebbinirɗon kelte ɗeen?
Noy waɗi ko on paamaay, hanaa haala buuru kaalananmi on? Mi wi'aana paddoɗon ko'e mooɗon he ƴuufinirɗum *Fariisa'en he *Sadduki'en.
Nden *aahiiɓe ɓeen paami ko o wondaa ƴuufinirɗum tawaaɗo nder buuru oon, amma ɓe kakkilo he ko *Fariisa'en he *Sadduki'en njannginta.
Wakkati Iisa yottinoo nder leydi Kaysariya Filipi. O ƴami *aahiiɓe makko, o wi'i: —Moy himɓe mbi'ata *Ɓii-Neɗɗo oon woni?
Sey ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Woɓɓe no mbi'a a Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma. Woɓɓe no mbi'a a Eliya. Woɓɓe duu kaden no mbi'a a Yeremiya naa a gooto nder annabiiɓe.
Nden Iisa ƴami ɓe wi'i: —Dey onon nee, moy mbi'oton ngonmi?
Sey Simon Piyer jaabii mo, wi'i: —Aan, a *Almasiihu, *Ɓii-Alla duumiiɗo.
Nden Iisa wi'i mo: —Aan Simon ɓii-Yunuusa, a barkinaaɗo. Ngam hanaa ɓii-aadama wannginani ma ɗum, amma *Baabiraawo am gonɗo dow.
Miin duu, mi inndirte Piyer, ɗum woni hayre. Dow hayre ndeen nyiɓanmi hawriine goonɗinɓe kam. Maayde naa jahannama he semmbe mum fuu walaa ko waawani nde.
Mi hokkete omtirɗe dammbugal Laamu Alla: Huune fuu ko kaɗuɗaa dow leydi, haɗetee dow kammu. Huune fuu ko njaɓuɗaa dow leydi, jaɓetee dow kammu.
Nden, Iisa fooɗi noppi maɓɓe wi'i to ɓe kaalan neɗɗo fuu ko kam woni *Almasiihu.

Gaɗa tabbintinol ngol Piyer waɗi, Iisa fuɗɗi anndinde *aahiiɓe mum ko no tilsi kam yaha *Ursaliima. To mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe, mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla he jannginooɓe *Tawreeta torrata ɗum sanne, nden ɓe mbara ɗum. Balɗe tati gaɗa mum kam ummitittoo.
Sey, Piyer fooɗi mo senngo, tinni no haalda he makko, no wi'a: —Alla reene, Joomam ! Ɗum hewtotaako ma sam !
Iisa yeeƴitii Piyer, wi'i: —Woɗɗam, aan Seyɗan ! A fergere dow laawol am, ngam miilooji maaɗa ɗii ƴuwaay to Alla, amma to himɓe ɗi ƴuwi !
Nden Iisa wi'i *aahiiɓe mum: —Muuyɗo tokkude kam fuu, acca daarude hoore mum, hooƴa *leggal bardugal mum, tokka kam.
Ngam giɗɗo hisinde yonki mum, mursan ki. Amma mursuɗo ki ngam am, heɓitan ki.
Ɗume keɓol duuniyaaru nduu fuu nafirta neɗɗo, nde joomum mursi yonki mum? No woodi ko neɗɗo waawi hokkitirde ngam heɓita ki naa?
*Ɓii-Neɗɗo no wardan he maleykaaɓe mum nder teddungal *Baabiraawo mum. Wakkati mum, o yoɓan neɗɗo fuu ko foti he golle muuɗum.
Goonga kaalananmi on: Woɓɓe nder tawaaɓe ɗo hannden maayataa tawee ngi'aay *Ɓii-Neɗɗo no wara nder laamu mum.
Balɗe jeegom gaɗa tabbintinol ngol Piyer waɗi, Iisa nyakkodi Piyer, Yakuuba he dimdaaɗo mum Yahaaya dow waamnde toowne gom.
Tagaadi makko waylitii yeeso maɓɓe. Yeeso makko no yayna hano naange, kolte makko duu no ƴelkita hano jeyngol.
Wakkati mum da *aahiiɓe tato ɓeen ngi'i *Muusa he Eliya mbanngii, iɓe kaalda he makko.
Sey Piyer wi'i Iisa: —Joomam, no wooɗi ko tawaaɗen ɗo. Nde nii aɗa hiɗi, mi nyiɓan hukumuuji tati ɗo: Aan worru, *Muusa worru, Eliya worru.
Wakkati o haalannoo ndeen sey luuldere ƴelkitoore gom wari suddi ɓe. Daane gom ƴuwi nder luuldere ndeen, wi'i: —Oo woni Ɓiyam mo korsinmi, mo mbelniranmi. Kettinanee mo !
Wakkati *aahiiɓe ɓeen nanunoo daane ndeen, kippi he leydi. Ɓe kuli sanne.
Iisa ɓattii ɓe, meemi ɓe, wi'i: —Ummee ! To kulee !
Sey ɓe ɓanti ko'e maɓɓe, ɓe ngi'aay neɗɗo fuu, se hanaa Iisa.
Wakkati ɓe njippotonoo waamnde ndeen, Iisa fooɗi noppi maɓɓe, wi'i: —To kaalanee neɗɗo fuu ko ngi'uɗon ɗum, sey wakkati *Ɓii-Neɗɗo ummitii e maayde.
Nden *aahiiɓe ɓeen ƴami mo, mbi'i: —Ɗume waɗi ko jannginooɓe *Tawreeta no mbi'a no tilsi Eliya arta *Almasiihu warde?
O jaabii ɓe, o wi'i: —Goonga non, Eliya artata wara, moƴƴina kujje fuu.
Amma miɗo wi'a on: Eliya warii faa yawti, ɓe annditaay mo, ɓe ndaaraay mo goɗɗum. Hano non duu ɓe ndaarataa *Ɓii-Neɗɗo goɗɗum, ɓe torra mo.
Nden *aahiiɓe ɓeen paamii ko filla Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma o waɗani ɓe.
Wakkati Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum ngartunoo to jama'aare ndeen, gorko gom ɓadii mo, hofi yeeso makko,
wi'i: —Moodibbo, yurma ɓiyam gorko oo ! Paɗɗe o woodi, ɗum tampinii mo sanne. Kile keewɗe omo saama nder hiite naa nder ndiyam.
Mi yaarii mo to *aahiiɓe maaɗa amma ɓe keppi nyawtude mo.
Sey Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Hey onon himɓe jamaanu bonɗo, ɓe ngoonɗinaay ! Faa nde ngondanmi he mooɗon? Faa nde tinnotoomi miɗo munyana on? Ngaddanee kam suka oon ɗo !
O sajiti ginnaaru nduun. Ndu takkiti suka oon. Wakkati mum da suka oon nyawti.
Wakkati Iisa wonnoo feere mum, *aahiiɓe ɓeen ɓadii mo, ƴami, mbi'i: —Ɗume waɗi ko minen, min keppi riiwude ginnaaru nduun?

Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Ngam oɗon pamɗi goonɗinol. Goonga kaalananmi on: Nde goonɗinol mooɗon no famɗi faa foti gabbel mutaari, nde nii on mbi'i waamnde ndee: « Sottu ɗo, njahaa to », nde sottan. Huune fuu hepportaa on. [
Amma iri ginnaaru nduu riiwataako nde hanaa du'aa'u he suumayeere non.]
Nyannde gom, wakkati Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum pottunoo nder leydi Galili, o wi'i ɓe kaden: —*Ɓii-Neɗɗo no jammbetee, wattee nder juuɗe.
O waree, balɗe tati gaɗa mum, o ummitoo. Haala kaa metti ɓerɗe *aahiiɓe ɓeen sanne.
Wakkati Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum njottinoo Kafarnahum, *jaɓooɓe janngal *Juulirde mawne gom ngari to Piyer, mbi'i mo: —Moodibbo mooɗon no yoɓa janngal *Juulirde mawne naa?

Piyer jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Omo yoɓa. Wakkati Piyer naatannoo nder Juulirde ndeen, fadde makko yeccaade, sey Iisa wi'i mo: —Simon, ɗume miiliɗaa? Moy haani yoɓande laamiiɓe duuniyaaru janngal? Ɓiɓɓe leydi naa hoɓɓe?
Nden Piyer jaabii mo, wi'i: —Hoɓɓe. Sey Iisa wi'i mo: —Ndenne, ɓiɓɓe leydi kaanaa yoɓude naa?

Amma, en ngiɗaa mettinde ɓerɗe himɓe ɓee. Yah toon dow peta, paɗɗaa mamaruwol maa. Linngu ngu artuɗaa nanngude nguun, omtu hunnduko maggu. A tawan tammal cardi, joɓoowal janngal meeɗen. Ittaa ngal, njoɓana en, miin he maa.
*Aahiiɓe ɓeen ɓadii Iisa, ƴami mo, mbi'i: —Moy ɓuri teddude nder Laamu Alla?
Nden Iisa noddi cukalel gom, darni yeeso maɓɓe,
wi'i: —Goonga kaalananmi on: Nde nii on mbattitaay, faa nannduɗon he cukaloy koy, on naatataa nder Laamu Alla.
Leesinɗo hoore mum faa nanndi he cukalel ngel, kam woni ɓurɗo teddude nder Laamu Alla.
Jaɓɓiiɗo suka gooto hano cukalel ngel dow innde am, miin jaati joomum jaɓɓii.
Neɗɗo fuu waɗi cukalel gootel goonɗinngel kam waɗa hakke, ko ɓuri moƴƴande joomum woni kaaƴa mannga haɓɓee he daane mum, yoolee nder nokkuure ɓurne luggiɗidde nder maayo.
Kaari duuniyaaru nduu no heewi laabi gaɗol bone. Sikka fuu walaa laabi gaɗol ko boni keppataa nder mayru faa abada. Amma bone saama dow neɗɗo fuu laatii sabiili majji !

Se tawi junngo maaɗa naa koyngal maaɗa no waawi waɗa ngaɗaa hakke, taƴa junngo ngoon naa koyngal ngaal paɗɗaa. Naataa nder mbuurnam nduumiiɗam a larɗuɗo no ɓuri moƴƴande ma dina paɗɗeɗaa nder hiite duumiinge tawi aɗa huuɓi.
Se tawi hitere maaɗa no waawi waɗa ngaɗaa hakke, itta nde paɗɗaa. Naataa nder mbuurnam nduumiiɗam a ɗokko, no ɓuri moƴƴande ma dina paɗɗideɗaa gite maaɗa ɗiɗi fuu no kuuɓi nder hiite jahannama.
Kakkilee to njawee baa gooto nder cukaloy koy. Ngam miɗo wi'a on: Maleykaaɓe makkoy wonɓe dow kammu ɓeen, wakkati fuu iɓe yeeso *Baabiraawo am gonɗo dow, iɓe ngi'a huune fuu. [
Ngam *Ɓii-Neɗɗo waraana hisinde majjuɓe.]
—Ɗume miilotoɗon? Nde nii tawaama neɗɗo no jogii baali hemre, dey ngootu majjaa, hanaa joomum no accan baali hemre go'o walaa ɗiin nder ferro ɗi ndura, nden tefowa majjungu nguun naa?
Goonga kaalananmi on: Nde nii o hiitii ngu, o welniran ngu faa ngu ɓura hemre go'o walaa ɗiito.
Hano non *Baabiraawo mooɗon gonɗo dow oon, hiɗaa baa gooto nder cukaloy koy majjaa.
—Nde nii bannda goonɗinɗo gom waɗani ma gacce, yah to makko, nodda mo feere kollaa mo gacce makko. Nde nii o hettinake, o jaɓi kollitooje maa, a wartiri enɗam hakkune mooɗon.
Amma nde nii o jaɓaay, soƴƴa to makko, aan he neɗɗo gom naa njahdaa himɓe ɗiɗo. Ngam seedeeɓe ɗiɗo naa tato tabbintina haala ngaɗaaka fuu.
Nde nii o jaɓaay faa hannden, kaalanaa ɗum hawriine goonɗinɓe. Nde nii o salake jaɓude haala hawriine goonɗinɓe kaan, adu mo hano neɗɗo mo anndaa Alla naa jaɓoowo janngal, caliiɗo tuubude.
Goonga kaalananmi on: Huune fuu ko kaɗuɗon dow leydi, no haɗetee dow kammu. Huune fuu ko njaɓuɗon dow leydi, no jaɓetee dow kammu.
Miɗo haalana on kaden: Nde nii himɓe ɗiɗo nder mooɗon potii dow huune worre nder duuniyaaru faa ŋaarake ɗum Alla, *Baabiraawo am gonɗo dow no jaabanto ɓe ɗum.
Ngam nokku fuu to himɓe ɗiɗo naa tato kawri dow innde am, miɗo wondi he maɓɓe.
Piyer ɓadii Iisa, ƴami mo wi'i: —Joomam, nde nii banndam waɗanii kam gacce, kile foti kaanumi yaafanaade mo? Kile jeɗɗi, naa kile foti?
Nden Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Mi wi'aay ma kile jeɗɗi tan. Njaafoɗaa mo kile lasooji tati he sappo faa nde jeɗɗi.
Ngam majjum waɗi Laamu Alla no nanndinee he laamu laamiiɗo gom, anniyiiɗo lima njawdi mum wondi nder juuɗe gollanooɓe ɗum.
Wakkati o fuɗɗunoo limude ndeen, o waddanaa golloowo gom mo o tokkata nyamaane nde golloowo oon waawtaa yoɓi keerol mbuurnam mum fuu.
Ko gorko oon heppi yoɓidide mo fuu, sey laamiiɗo oon hokki laawol gorko oon, deekum, sukaaɓe mum he ko jogii fuu connee, faa ɗum yoɓa nyamaane ndeen.
Sey golloowo oon hofi yeeso laamiiɗo oon, eeli mo, wi'i: « Munyanam, mi yoɓete fuu ! »
Nden laamiiɗo oon yurmii mo, yaafanii mo nyamaane ndeen, acci mo o dilli.
Amma golloowo oon no wurtorii, sey fotti he mo ɓe ngolliditta gom mo o tokkata nyamaane seɗɗa. O nanngi daane onɗon, o ɗeɗɗi, o wi'i mo: « Yoɓan ceede am ! »
Gollidoowo he makko oon hofi yeeso makko, eeli mo, wi'i: « Munyanam, mi yoɓete ! »
Amma o jaɓaay. O uddowii mo kasu, sey nde o yoɓi nyamaane ndeen fuu.
Wakkati gollooɓe ɓeeto ngi'unoo ɗum ndeen, ɗum metti ɓerɗe maɓɓe sanne. Ɓe njehi ɓe kaalanowi ɗum laamiiɗo oon.
Nden, laamiiɗo oon noddi golloowo oon, wi'i mo: « Aan a neɗɗo bonɗo ! Wakkati eelunoɗaa kam, mi yaafanake ma ko tokkanoomaami fuu.
Ndenne aan, a haanaa yurmaade jaada oo naa, hano no njurmorimaami nii? »
Laamiiɗo oon tikki sanne, nanngi mo portol sey nyannde o yoɓidi nyamaane ndeen fuu faa laaɓi.
Non duu *Baabiraawo am gonɗo dow waɗanta gooto mooɗon fuu, caliiɗo yaafaade banndum he ɓerne worre.
Wakkati Iisa timminnoo waaju mum, o dilli Galili o fa'i gaɗa maayo Urdun nder leydi Yahudiya.
Jama'aare mawne tokki mo, o nyawti nyawɓe maɓɓe.
Fariisa'en gom ngari to makko faa tunna mo. Ɓe ƴami mo ɓe mbi'i: —No dagii gorko seera deekum ngam daliila fuu naa?
Sey o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i: —Ndenne, on njanngaay ko winndaa nder dewte ɗeen naa? Illa fuɗɗorde Alla tagi himɓe gorko he debbo.
Ngam majjum waɗi gorko no acca innum e bammum ngam hawtaa he deekum, ɓe fuu ɗiɗo ɓe laatoo ɓanndu worru.
Ndenne, joonin ɓe kanaa ɗiɗo kaden, amma ɓe go'o. To neɗɗo fuu senndu ko Alla hawri.
Ɓe ƴami mo kaden, ɓe mbi'i: —Ndenne ɗume waɗi *Muusa tilsini gorko hokka deekum talkuru ceergal, nde no seera mo?
O jaabii ɓe, o wi'i: —On tiɓɓe-nyireeɓe, ngam majjum waɗi *Muusa hokki on laawol no ceerirton rewɓe mooɗon. Amma illa fuɗɗorde, hanaa non ɗum worri.
Miɗo wi'a on: Neɗɗo fuu ceerɗo deekum ko hanaa ngam jeenu, dey ɓaŋi debbo gom, joomum yeeni.
Sey *aahiiɓe ɓeen mbi'i mo: —Nde nii hakkune neɗɗo he deekum nii worri, tawee neɗɗo ɓaŋaay mo no ɓuri.
Amma Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Hanaa neɗɗo fuu waawi jaɓude haala kaa, sey nii mo Alla hiɗani ɗum.

Daliila kaɗoowo gorko ɓaŋa no woodi. Ngam goɗɗo rimaama no baatoraaɗo. Goɗɗo no tappaaɗo. Goɗɗo duu, kam haɗi hoore mum ɓaŋude ngam ngollana Laamu Alla. Neɗɗo fuu waawi yardaade he haala kaa, jaɓa ka !
Himɓe ngaddi cukaloy mum'en ngam o yowa juuɗe makko dow makkoy, o du'anoo koy, amma *aahiiɓe ɓeen nduki ɓe.
Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Accee cukaloy koy ngara to am. To kaɗee koy, ngam nannduɓe he makkoy njeyii Laamu Alla.
O yowi junngo makko dow makkoy, o du'anii koy, nden o dilli.
Iɓe ɗon nii, sey gorko gom ɓadii Iisa, ƴami mo, wi'i: —Moodibbo, yerre ndeye kaanumi waɗude ngam heɓude mbuurnam nduumiiɗam?
Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Ɗume ƴamantaa kam yerre nde kaanuɗaa waɗude? Alla tan woni jeɗɗuɗo ! Nde aɗa hiɗi naata nder mbuurnam nduumiiɗam, tokku tilsinooje *Tawreeta.
Nden gorko oon ƴami mo wi'i kaden: —Tilsinooje *Tawreeta ɗeye tokkanmi? Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —To ittu yonki goɗɗo, to yeenu, to wujju, to seedana fewre.
Teddin inna maa he bammaa, ngiɗaa gondo maa no ngiɗirɗaa hoore maa.
Suka jokolle oon wi'i mo: —Miɗo waɗa kujje ɗee fuu. Ɗume hoddi kaden?
Sey Iisa wi'i mo: —Nde aɗa hiɗi laatoɗaa kuuɓuɗo, sonnoy ko njogiɗaa fuu, njeddana talkaaɓe, a heɓan baraaje dow. Gaɗa mum, ngaraa tokkaa kam.
Jokolle oon no diikuɗo sanne. Wakkati o nanunoo haalaaji ɗii, o ɓalinii, o dillidi mettorgal ɓerne.
Gaɗa mum, sey Iisa wi'i *aahiiɓe mum: —Goonga kaalananmi on: Naatol diikuɗo nder Laamu Alla no tiiɗi faa !
Miɗo haalana on duu: Naatol ngolooba nder wudde battal no ɓuri hoyde dina naatol diikuɗo nder Laamu Alla.
Wakkati *aahiiɓe ɓeen nanunoo haala kaan, ɗum haayɗini ɓe sanne. Nden ɓe mbi'i: —Ndenne, moy hisata?
O daari ɓe, o wi'i: —To himɓe ɗum waɗataako naa? Amma walaa fuu ko hepportaa Alla.
Piyer itti hunnduko, wi'i Iisa: —Minen, min mboppii fuu, min tokkii ma. Noy min laatoytoo?

Sey Iisa jaabii, wi'i: —Goonga kaalananmi on: Nder duuniyaaru heyru warooru nduu, nde *Ɓii-Neɗɗo jooɗake dow jooɗorgal laamu mum teddungal, onon sappo he ɗiɗo tokkuɓe kam ɓee, onon duu on njooɗoto dow jooɗorɗe laamiiɓe sappo he ɗiɗi, laamoɗon lenyi *Isra'el sappo e ɗiɗi ɗiin.

Kaden neɗɗo fuu boppuɗo ɓaade mum, naa rimdaaɓe mum worɓe naa rewɓe, naa woppi innum naa bammum, naa sukaaɓe mum, naa gese mum ngam am, joomum heɓan ko ɓuri ko woppi ɗum kile hemre. Kaden duu joomum heɓan mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
Amma ardiiɓe heewɓe keedan gaɗa. Gaɗaaɓe ɓeen duu laatoto ardiiɓe.
Ndaa no Laamu Alla wa'i nii: —Ingu nanndi he jom ngesa cabiije, dilluɗo illa beete faa hooƴowa gollooɓe, gollanooɓe ɗum.
O heɓi ɓe, o fotidi he maɓɓe dow ko nyalooma fuu, o yoɓataana neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu tammal cardi gootal. Nden o yaari ɓe nder ngesa makko.
Nyawli seɗɗa, sey o wurtii kaden, o hi'i woɓɓe no njooɗii nder luumo, ɓe ngalaa gollal fuu.
O wi'i ɓe: « Njehee onon duu ngollowon nder ngesa am. Mi yoɓan on ko haani yoɓeede. »

Ɓeen duu njehi ngollowi. Har caka nyalooma o wurtii kaden, o hi'i woɓɓe, o wi'i ɓe njaha ɓe ngollowa nder ngesa makko. O wurtitii kaden har juura sey o hi'i woɓɓe, o wi'i ɓe kamɓe duu ɓe ngollowa nder ngesa makko.
Faa hannden har laasara pewɗo dey-dey yamnde joy, o wurtii kaden. O tawi woɓɓe nder luumo, ɓe ngalaa golle. O wi'i ɓe: « Ko waɗi ko nyalluɗon ɗo on ngollaay? »
Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: « Neɗɗo fuu hooƴaay min golle. » Nden o wi'i ɓe: « Too, njehee onon duu ngollowon nder ngesa am. »
Wakkati naange yanunoo ndeen, sey o wi'i golloowo makko gom: « Noddu gollooɓe ɓeen, njoɓaa ɓe. Artir sakitiiɓe warde ɓeen, nden ngayniraa artuɓe ɓeen. »
Warɓe laasara pewɗo ɓeen ngari, neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu hokkaa tammal cardi gootal.
Artunooɓe ɓeen duu ngari, miili no njoɓetee ko ɓuri non. Amma kamɓe duu, neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu hokkaa tammal cardi gootal.
Wakkati ɓe njoɓanoo ndeen, sey ɓe tinni iɓe nguunitoo yeeso jom ngesa oon.
Iɓe mbi'a: « Sakitiiɓe warɓe ɓeen yamnde worre tan ngolli, dey njobdi amin fonnee. Minen nyalluɓe no tampa nder naange wulnge ! »
Sey jom ngesa oon jaabii gooto nder maɓɓe, wi'i: « Neɗɗo am, mi toonyaaki ma. Hanaa dow tammal cardi gootal kaalduɗen ngam ngollanon kam nyalooma oon fuu naa?
Ndenne, jaɓu njobdi maa, tinnoɗaa. Mi muuyi hokkude sakitiiɓe warɓe ɓeen dey-dey ko kokkumaami.
Hanaa ko weli kam ngaɗiranmi ceede am naa? Naa moƴƴere nde ngaɗumi ndeen woni welaay ma? »
Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Non non ardiiɓe ɓeen keedan gaɗa, gaɗaaɓe ɓeen duu laatoo ardiiɓe.
Nyannde gom Iisa he *lilaaɓe mum sappo he ɗiɗo ɓeen no pa'i *Ursaliima. Dow laawol, sey o henni ɓe senngo, o wi'i ɓe:
—Kettinee, eɗen ɗon njaha *Ursaliima. Toon *Ɓii-Neɗɗo wattetee nder juuɗe hooreeɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla he jannginooɓe *Tawreeta. Ɓe kiitoo mo kiite maayde.
Ɓe ngatta mo nder juuɗe ɓe kanaa *Yahudankooɓe. Kamɓe duu ɓe njawoo mo, ɓe ɓocca mo, ɓe tonta mo dow *leggal bardugal ngam o maaya. Amma nyalaane tataɓere mum o ummitittoo.
Inna ɓiɓɓe Jebede ɓattini sukaaɓe mum to Iisa. O sujidi yeeso makko ngam eelude mo.
Sey Iisa wi'i mo: —Ɗume ngiɗaa? Nden yeyraajo oon jaabii mo, wi'i: —Miɗo hiɗi podanoɗaa ɓiɓɓe am worɓe ɗiɗo ɓee, ɓe njooɗoo takkol maaɗa nder laamu maa. Gooto nyaamo maa, ooto nano maa.
Nden Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i Yakuuba he Yahaaya: —On anndaa ko eeloton. Oɗon mbaawi yarirde nyeɗerde nde njaranmi ndeen naa? Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Miɗen mbaawi.
O wi'i ɓe: —Goonga, on njaran nde. Amma jooɗaade nyaamo am naa nano am, hanaa miin woodi baawɗe hokkude ɗum. *Baabiraawo am moƴƴini jooɗorɗe ɗee ngam ɓe o suɓi.
Wakkati *lilaaɓe sappo ɓeeto nanunoo ɗum, ɓerɗe maɓɓe metti he ɗiɗo ɓeeto.
Nden Iisa noddi ɓe, ɓe fuu wi'i ɓe: —Oɗon anndi ko doole doole laamiiɓe ɓe kanaa *Yahudankooɓe laamorii himɓe mum'en. Mawɓe maɓɓe ɓeen duu kolli baawɗe.
Amma onon kay, ɗum waɗataa hakkune mooɗon. Giɗɗo laatoo tedduɗo hakkune mooɗon on fuu, no haani laatoo golloowo mooɗon.
Kaden duu, giɗɗo ardaade nder mooɗon, no haani laatoo maccuɗo mooɗon.
Noon duu, *Ɓii-Neɗɗo waraay faa gollanee, amma o wari faa o ngollana himɓe fuu, o mursa yonki makko ngam hisinde himɓe heewɓe.
Wakkati Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum njawtannoo nder Yeriko, jama'aare mawne no tokki mo.
Wumɓe ɗiɗo gom no njooɗii sera laawol. Wakkati ɓe nanunoo no wi'ee Iisa woni no yawta, sey ɓe kuuɓi, iɓe mbi'a: —Moodibbo ! Taan Daawda, yurma min !
Jama'aare ndeen darii no sajitoo he maɓɓe, no wi'a ɓe ndeƴƴita. Sey ɓe tinni iɓe kuuɓa, iɓe mbi'a: —Moodibbo ! Taan Daawda, yurma min !
Iisa darii, noddi ɓe, ƴami ɓe, wi'i: —Ɗume ngiɗuɗon mi waɗana on?
Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Moodibbo, miɗen ngiɗi min mbumtaa.
Iisa yurmii ɓe, meemi gite maɓɓe. Wakkati mum da ɓe mbumti, ɓe tokki mo.
Wakkati Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum njottinoo ci'el Baytifaaji hadde *Ursaliima har waamnde wi'eteene waamnde Jaytun, sey o lili *aahiiɓe makko ɗiɗo gom,
o wi'i ɓe: —Ummee, njehee nder wurel gonngel yeeso mooɗon ngeel. No njottoriɗon, on tawan ara gom no haɓɓii, he ɓiyum. Kaɓɓitee nga, ngaddanon kam ɗi.
Nde nii goɗɗo ƴamii on, njaaboɗon mo mbi'on Joomiraawo haajaa ɗi. Dey ɗi ngartirtee law.
Ɗum waɗi ngam tabbintinde ko annabiijo gom haalunoo wakkati o wi'unoo:
Mbi'ee himɓe huɓeere *Siyon: Ndaaree da, laamiiɗo mooɗon no wara to mooɗon, no leesinkini, no waɗɗii ara, ɓinngel mum gorel no tokki.
Sey *aahiiɓe ɓeen njehi, ngaɗowi ko o wi'i ɗum'en.
Ɓe ngaddi ara ngaan he ɓinngel mum. Ɓe ngaɗi kolte maɓɓe jappe, ɓe njowi dow majji, nden Iisa waɗɗii.
Himɓe ɗuɓɓe mbeɗɗiti kolte mum'en dow laawol. Woɓɓe duu kelti licce, mbeerti dow maggol.

Jama'aare wonnde yeeso Iisa ndeen, he tokkude gaɗa makko fuu no ilina, no mbi'a: — Hosanna ! Jettooje ngoodani Taan Daawda ! Barkinaaɗo woni garɗo dow innde Joomiraawo ! Jettooje ngoodani Alla Toowɗo !
Wakkati o naatunoo *Ursaliima, huɓeere ndeen fuu iirti. Himɓe no kuuɓa no mbi'a: —Moy woni gorko oo?
Sey jama'aare wonnde gaɗa makko ndeen no jaaboo, no wi'a: —Ay, oo woni annabi Iisa mo Nasaratu nder leydi Galili.
Iisa naati jawreeru *Juulirde mawne ndeen. O riiwi soodooɓe he sonnooɓe wonɓe nder mayru fuu. O liɓi teburuuji weccooɓe ceede he jooɗorɗe sonnooɓe buugaali.
Nden o wi'i ɓe: —No winndaa nder dewte Alla ko suudu am noddirtee suudu du'aa'u. Amma onon, on ngartiri ndu wumpere wuyɓe !
Wumɓe he laƴooɓe ngari to makko, o nyawti ɓe.

Mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla he jannginooɓe *Tawreeta ngi'ii kujje kaayɗiniiɗe, ɗe o waɗata. Ɓe nani duu sukaaɓe no ilina nder *Juulirde mawne no mbi'a: — Hosanna ! Jettooje ngoodani Taan Daawda ! Ɗum tiimi, ɗum metti ɓerɗe maɓɓe faa noy walaa.

Sey ɓe mbi'i Iisa: —A nanii ko cukaloy koy mbi'ata naa? Nden o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i: —Mi nani. Ndenne, on njanngaay baa nde worre nder dewte Alla to winndaa, wi'aa: A waɗi kunndule entaaɓe e musinooɓe no njette?
Illa ndeen, o seedi he maɓɓe. O dilli nder huɓeere ndeen, o yehi, o waalowi Baytaniya.
Beete, wakkati Iisa wartannoo nder huɓeere ndeen, sey o rafaa dow laawol.
O holliri ibbi gom sera laawol ngool. O fanti ki, amma o tawraay ki fuy nde hanaa haako. Nden o huɗi ki, o wi'i: —Taa rimu abada kaden ! Wakkati mum da, ibbi kiin yoorii koƴon.
Wakkati *aahiiɓe ɓeen ngi'unoo ɗum, ɗum haayɗini ɓe. Ɓe ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Noy waɗi ko ibbi kii yoorii, wakkati gooto?

Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Goonga kaalananmi on: Nde nii on ngoonɗini, on cikkay, oɗon mbaawi ngaɗi ko ɓuri ko ngaɗumi ibbi kii. On mbaawan wi'ude baa waamnde ndee: « Ɗoofa, saamoy nder maayo », ɗum laato non duu.
Nde nii on ngoonɗini, ko eeluɗon nder du'aa'u fuu no jaabetee.
