Iisa naati nder *Juulirde mawne, omo waajoo. Sey hooreeɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla he mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe ɓadii mo, ƴami mo, mbi'i: —Baawɗe ɗeye ngaɗirtaa kujje ɗee fuu? Moy hokki ma laawol waɗude ɗe?
Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Miin duu, huune worre tan ƴamanmi on. Nde nii on njaabake kam, miin duu, mi haalanan on baawɗe ɗeye ngaɗiranmi kujje ɗee fuu.
Alla naa himɓe kokki Yahaaya laawol waɗude *batisma? Sey iɓe caawodira hakkune maɓɓe, iɓe mbi'a: —Nde nii en mbi'i Alla, o wi'an ko waɗi en ngoonɗinaay Yahaaya?
Amma nde en mbi'i himɓe, too, eɗen kaani kulen jama'aare ndee, ngam himɓe fuu no anndi tabbat Yahaaya no annabiijo.
Sey ɓe njaabii, ɓe mbi'i: —Min anndaa. Iisa duu jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Too, miin duu, mi haalantaa on baawɗe ɗeye ngaɗiranmi kujje ɗee fuu.

Iisa wi'i hooreeɓe *Yahudankooɓe ɓeen kaden: —Too ! Ɗume miilotoɗon nder huune ndee: Gorko gom no woodunoo ɓiɓɓe worɓe ɗiɗo. O ɓadii arano oon, o wi'i mo: « Ɓinngel am, yah golloy hannden nder ngesa cabiije meeɗen. »
Sey ɓiɗɗo oon jaabii mo, wi'i kam yahataa. Gaɗa mum o nimsiti, o yehi, o gollowi.
Nden *Baaba oon ɓadii ɗiɗaɓo oon, wi'i mo ko wi'unoo arano oon. Oon duu jaabii mo, wi'i: « Wooɗi *Baaba, mi yahan. » Amma o yehaay.
Nder maɓɓe moy waɗi ko bammum hiɗi? Nden ɓe njaabii, ɓe mbi'i: —Arano oon. Sey Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Goonga kaalananmi on: Jaɓooɓe janngal he rewɓe fijooɓe no artan on nder Laamu Alla.
Ngam Yahaaya wari to mooɗon, o holli on laawol dartinaaku, amma on ngoonɗinaay mo. *Jaɓooɓe janngal he rewɓe fijooɓe kam'en ngoonɗini mo. Baa wakkati ngi'unoɗon ɗum ndeen, on tuubaay, ngoonɗinɗon mo.

Iisa wi'i hooreeɓe *Yahudankooɓe ɓeen: —Too, kettinee kippol haala gom nii kaden: Neɗɗo gom waɗi ngesa mum cabiije, waɗi koogol fiiltini nga. O wasi luggere ɓoosirde cabiijam ɗaam. O nyiɓi suudu toownu ngam doomooɓe magga. Nden o wuƴi nga remooɓe gom, o waɗi jahaangal.
Wakkati teɓol cabiije ɗeen yottinoo, o lili gollooɓe makko gom to remooɓe ɓeen, ngam ɓe ngaddanowa ɗum mbaka mum nder ɓiɓɓe cabiije ɗeen.
Amma remooɓe ɓeen nanngi gollooɓe ɓeen, piyi arano oon, mbari ɗiɗaɓo oon, paɗɗi tataɓo oon kaaƴe faa maayi.
Jom ngesa oon lili gollooɓe gom kaden, ɓurɓe aranɓe ɓeen ɗuɗde. Remooɓe ɓeen ngaɗi ɓe no ngaɗunoo aranɓe ɓeen.
Nden o sakitii, o lili ɓiyiiko gorko he maɓɓe, o wi'i hoore makko: « Ɓe teddinan mo ngam o ɓiyam. »
Amma wakkati remooɓe ɓeen ngi'unoo ɓiyiiko ndeen, ɓe mbi'odiri hakkune maɓɓe: « Ma'adalla. Oo nii woni donoowo oon. Ngaree mbaren mo, heɓa ndonen ngesa ngaa ! »
Sey ɓe nanngi mo, ɓe mburtini nder ngesa ngaan, ɓe mbari mo.
Joonin nee, nde nii jom ngesa cabiije oon wari, noy o waɗata remooɓe ɓee?
Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —O halkan himɓe bonɓe ɓee no boniri. O halfina ngesa ngaan remooɓe gom, kokkooɓe mo mbaka makko nder ɓiɓɓe magga wakkati teɓol majje.
Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Ndenne on njanngaay ko winndaa nder dewte ɗeen, wi'aa naa? Hayre nde nyiɓooɓe mboppi ndeen, kayre laatii hoore nyibdi ndiin. Ɗum golle Joomiraawo, haayne non duu he giiɗe meeɗen !
Ngam majjum miɗo wi'a on: —Laamu Alla no teetetee he juuɗe mooɗon, hokkee waɗirooɓe ngu ko haani.
Neɗɗo fuu caamuɗo dow hayre ndeen, helan. Neɗɗo fuu, mo nde saami dow mum, no mornyotoo.
Wakkati hooreeɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla he *Fariisa'en nanunoo kippi haala ɗiin, ɓe paami ko filla mum'en o waɗi.
Ɓe tefi no ɓe nanngirta mo, amma ɓe kuli jama'aare ndeen, ngam nde adii mo o annabiijo.
Iisa waɗani ɓe kippol haala gom, wi'i ɓe:
—Ndaaree no Laamu Alla nanndi nii: Laamiiɗo gom mo ɓiyum ɓaŋi, waɗi nyaamdu ngam batu dewngal ngaal.
O lili gollooɓe makko noddowa noddaaɓe ɓeen ngara ɓe nyaama. Amma noddaaɓe ɓeen calii warde.

O lili kaden gollooɓe gom, o wi'i ɗum'en: « Mbi'ee noddaaɓe ɓeen nyaamdu ɓanngal ngaal moƴƴinaama faa wooɗi. Mi hirsii ga'i he nyalbi payɗi. Ɗum fuu ɗum siryaama. Ɓe ngara, ɓe nootoo kam nder nyalaane welwelo am ndee. »
Amma noddaaɓe ɓeen limtaay mo baa, ɓe naati haaju maɓɓe: Oo yehi ngesa mum, ooto duu naati haaju mum.
Hoddiiɓe ɓeen nanngi gollooɓe ɓeen, torri ɓe, mbari ɓe.
Laamiiɗo oon tikki, lili soogeeji mum mbarowa waruɓe lilaaɓe ɓeen, ɓe mbula wurooji maɓɓe.
Gaɗa mum, o wi'i gollooɓe makko ɓeen: « Nyaamdu welwelo am nduun moƴƴinaama, amma noddaaɓe ɓeen kaandinaaka ndu.
Ndenne, ummee njehee dow laabi mawɗi, noddon neɗɗo fuu mo pottuɗon wara nyaama. »
Gollooɓe ɓeen ummii njehi dow laabi ɗiin, noddi mo ɓe potti fuu. Bonɗo yahde moƴƴuɗo faa wuro jom ɓanngal oon heewi himɓe pet.
Wakkati laamiiɗo oon naatunoo faa hi'a noddaaɓe ɓeen, sey o holliri gorko gom mo ɓornaaki kolte ɓanngal ngaal.
Nden o wi'i mo: « Higo, noy naatirɗaa ɗo, dey a ɓornaaki kolte ɓanngal ngaal? » Amma oon wi'aay mo fuy.
Sey laamiiɗo oon wi'i gollooɓe mum: « Nanngee mo, kaɓɓee juuɗe makko he koyɗe makko, paɗɗon mo toon yaasin nder nimre. Toon o woyan, omo ŋerƴodira nyiiƴe. »
Nden Iisa wi'i: —Noddaaɓe no ɗuuɗi amma suɓaaɓe ɓeen no pamɗi.
Iɓe ɗon nii sey *Fariisa'en njehi ndawridowi no tunnirta Iisa ngam nanngude mo nder haalaaji mum.

Ɓe lili aahiiɓe maɓɓe gom he tokkuɓe *Hirudus to Iisa. Lilaaɓe ɓeen mbi'i Iisa: —Moodibbo, miɗen anndi ko goonga tan kaalataa. Aɗa janngina laawol Alla goonga e goonga. A hulataa neɗɗo fuu, a ɓurdinaay himɓe.
Ndenne, haalan min se no hegii min kokka laamiiɗo *Rooma mawɗo janngal naa hegaaki?
Amma ngam Iisa no anndi anniyaaji maɓɓe bonɗi ɗiin. O wi'i ɓe: —Onon munafikiiɓe ! Ɗume waɗi ko oɗon tunna kam?
Kollee kam tammal joɓirteengal janngal. Ɓe kolli mo tammal cardi gootal.
Nden o ƴami ɓe, o wi'i: —Foto moy he innde moy woni ɗo?
Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Laamiiɗo *Rooma. Sey o wi'i ɓe: —Ndenne, kokkee laamiiɗo *Rooma ko jeyi, kokkon Alla duu ko jeyi.
Wakkati ɓe nanunoo ko o jaabii ɓe, ɗum haayɗini ɓe. Ɓe acci mo, ɓe ndilli.
Nder nyalooma gooto oon, himɓe gom, wonɓe nder hawriine *Sadduki'en ngari to Iisa. Kamɓe ngoni yeddooɓe no mbi'a ko maayɗo fuu ummitittaako.
Ɓe ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Moodibbo, *Muusa wi'iino, nde nii gorko maayi heɓaay ɓiɗɗo, minyum naa mawnum dewla deekiiko ngam heɓana mo jippotooɓe.
Waɗinoo worɓe rimdaaɓe jeɗɗo gom. Arano oon dewli, maayi, heɓaay ɓiɗɗo. Minyiiko haɓɓani deekiiko,
kam duu maayi, heɓaay ndimki. Tataɓo oon duu tokki, faa jeɗɗo ɓeen fuu maayi.
Gaɗa maayde maɓɓe, debbo oon duu maayi.
Ndenne, nyannde darŋal, moy nder jeɗɗo ɓeen laatoto goro debbo oo? Ngam ɓe fuu kaɓɓani mo.
Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —On mboofi, ngam on paamaay ko dewte ɗeen mbi'i, on anndaa duu baawɗe Alla.
Ngam nyannde maayɓe ummitii, worɓe ndewlataa, rewɓe duu ndewlataake. Himɓe fuu no mbuuran hano no maleykaaɓe mbuurdiri nder kammu.
Wooɗi, dow haala ummitaaki maayɓe, ndenne on njanngaay ko Alla wi'i on ɗum naa? O wi'i:
Miin woni Alla *Ibrahim, Alla Isiyaaku, Alla Yakuuba. Nden Iisa ɓeydi wi'ude ɓe: —O Alla wuurɓe, o hanaa Alla maayɓe.
Wakkati himɓe nanunoo waaju makko, ɗum haayɗini ɓe sanne.
Wakkati *Fariisa'en nanunoo ko Iisa jaalake *Sadduki'en nder yewtere maɓɓe, sey ɓe kawri ngam ndaarodirde kaden.
Nden jannginoowo *Tawreeta gom tawaaɗo nder maɓɓe ƴami Iisa ngam tunnude mo, wi'i:
—Moodibbo, tilsinoore ndeye ɓuri tilsinooje fuu semmbe nder *Tawreeta?
Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: — Hiɗir Alla Joomiraawo maa he ɓerne maa fuu he yonki maa fuu he hakkillo maa fuu.
Ɗum woni tilsinoore arandere, kayre duu ɓuri semmbe.
Ndaa tilsinoore ɗiɗaɓere ndeen nii, ɗe fuu ɗe potu: Ngiɗaa gondo maa no ngiɗirɗaa hoore maa.
*Tawreeta he dewte annabiiɓe ɗeen fuu dow tilsinooje ɗiɗi ɗee tiggii.
Wakkati *Fariisa'en kawrunoo nokkuure worre, sey Iisa ƴami ɓe, wi'i:
—Ɗume miiliɗon dow *Almasiihu? O taan moy? Nden ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —O taan Daawda.
O wi'i ɓe kaden: —Ndenne, noy Daawda nder baawɗe *Ruuhu Alla noddiri mo Joomam wakkati o wi'unoo:
Alla Joomiraawo wi'i Joomiraawo am: War, njooɗaa nyaamo am, faa mi sorna wayɓe maa ley teppere maa.
Nde nii Daawda noddiri mo Joomiraawo, ndenne, noy o laatortoo taanum tan?
Ɓe fuu ɓe keppi jaabaade mo. Illa nyannde mum, neɗɗo fuu suusaay ƴamude mo goɗɗum kaden.
Wakkati jama'aare hawrunoo hadde Iisa, o haalani nde, kayre he *aahiiɓe makko, o wi'i:
—Jannginooɓe *Tawreeta he *Fariisa'en, kam'en kalfinaa jannginol *Tawreeta Muusa.
Ngam majjum waɗi, oɗon kaani waɗude huune fuu ko ɓe mbi'i on. Amma to nyemminee golleeji maɓɓe, ngam ɓe ngaɗataa ko ɓe mbaajotoo.
Iɓe kaɓɓa donle tedduɗe, ɗe donngal mum'en no tiiɗi, ɓe ndeka dow himɓe. Amma ɓe ngiɗaa meemirde ɗe baa daane honndu maɓɓe ngam wallude ɓe.
Huune fuu ko ɓe ngaɗata, ɓe ngaɗan ɗum ngam himɓe ngi'a. Iɓe kaɓɓa talki mawɗi dow tiiɗe maɓɓe he jokkule juuɗe maɓɓe, iɓe njuutina daane kolte maɓɓe faa no ndaasoo.
Iɓe ngiɗi jooɗorɗe ɓurɗe teddude nde nii ɓe noddaama batu. Iɓe ngiɗi duu jooɗorɗe ɓurɗe teddude nder *baajorɗi.
Iɓe ngiɗi sanneede cannooje tedduɗe nder luuɓe he noddireede « moodibbo ».
Amma onon, to njaɓee noddireɗon « moodibbo », ngam Moodibbo gooto tan ngooduɗon. On fuu on banndiraaɓe.
To mbi'ee neɗɗo fuu « baaba » nder duuniyaaru. Ngam *Baabiraawo gooto tan ngooduɗon, gonɗo dow.
To njaɓee noddireɗon « hooreejo ». Ngam Hooreejo gooto tan ngooduɗon, kanko woni *Almasiihu.
Ɓurɗo teddude hakkune mooɗon laatoo golloowo mooɗon.
Ƴettuɗo hoore mum dow, no leesintee. Leesinɗo hoore mum, no ƴettetee.
Bone saaman dow mooɗon onon jannginooɓe *Tawreeta he *Fariisa'en, munaafiki'en ! Oɗon ommbana himɓe dammbugal Laamu Alla. Onon e ko'e mooɗon, on naatataa. On accataa naatooɓe naata. [

Bone saaman dow mooɗon, onon jannginooɓe *Tawreeta he *Fariisa'en, munaafiki'en ! Oɗon nyaama njawdi rewɓe ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en maayi, oɗon njunna du'aa'uuji mooɗon ngam ngi'eɗon. Ngam majjum, on kiitetee kiite naawɗe.]

Bone saaman dow mooɗon, onon jannginooɓe *Tawreeta he *Fariisa'en, munaafiki'en ! Oɗon piiloo nder leyɗe, oɗon peddita maayooji ngam keɓon neɗɗo gooto tuubuɗo tokki on. Amma nde nii on keɓii mo, sey ngaɗon o laatoo ɓii-jahannama ɓurde on.
Bone saaman dow mooɗon, onon wumɓe, ɗowooɓe himɓe ! Oɗon mbi'a: « Nde neɗɗo hunorake *Juulirde mawne ɗum ɓolum, amma nde hunorake kanŋe mayre, hunayeere mum nanngan. »
Wumɓe, bahimaaɓe ! Ɗume ɓuri teddude: Kanŋe ɗeen naa Juulirde senɗinoore kanŋe ɗeen?
Oɗon mbi'a kaden: « Nde neɗɗo hunorake sakkirde ɗum ɓolum, amma nde joomum hunorake sadaka gonɗo dow mayre oon, hunayeere mum nanngan. »
Wumɓe ! Ɗume ɓuri teddude: Sadaka oon naa sakkirde senɗinoore sadaka oon?
Ndenne, neɗɗo fuu kunoriiɗo sakkirde ndeen, hunorake nde, kayre he huune fuu ko yowaa dow mayre.
Neɗɗo fuu kunoriiɗo Juulirde ndeen, hunorake nde, kayre he Alla gonɗo nder mayre.
Neɗɗo fuu kunoriiɗo kammu, hunorake jooɗorgal Alla ngaal he Jooɗiiɗo dow maggal.

Bone saaman dow mooɗon, onon jannginooɓe *Tawreeta he *Fariisa'en, munaafiki'en ! Oɗon ittana Alla *jakka baa dow kaakooli mbelɗi ɗi ndemoton hano mantu, anisa he kume. Amma oɗon njeeboo ko ɓuri huune fuu teddude nder tilsinooje *Tawreeta: Kanƴe ngoni dartinaaku, yurmeene he goonɗinol. Ɗum kaanuɗon waɗude tawee on mboppaay ɗiito duu.
Onon wumɓe ardiiɓe himɓe ! Oɗon cuuta buubel, amma oɗon moɗa ngolooba !
Bone saaman dow mooɗon, onon jannginooɓe *Tawreeta he *Fariisa'en, munaafiki'en ! Oɗon lawƴa gaɗa kore e gaɗa le'e mooɗon, amma har nder iɗe keewi golleeji mooɗon bonɗi, gineeji guyka e kiram.
Fariisaajo bumɗo ! Lawƴu nder kore ɗeen ginan, nden gaɗa majje duu laaɓan.
Bone saaman dow mooɗon, onon jannginooɓe *Tawreeta he *Fariisa'en, munaafiki'en ! Oɗon nanndi he annyeeje dawninaaɗe, ɗe dow mum'en no mbooɗi, tawee nder toon no heewi gi'e maayɓe he ko tuuni fuu.
Onon duu, hano non nga'uɗon: He hitere oɗon nanndi dartiiɓe, amma nder mooɗon no heewi pet he munafikaaku he rafi dartinaaku.
Bone saaman dow mooɗon, onon jannginooɓe *Tawreeta he *Fariisa'en, munaafiki'en ! Oɗon nyiɓana annabiiɓe annyeeje lobbe, oɗon peɗa annyeeje dartiiɓe.
Oɗon mbi'a: « Nde nii min pottiino he jamaanu maamiraaɓe amin, nden min kaɓɓiditaano daane he maɓɓe nder barol annabiiɓe. »
Nii kollirɗon ko onon he ko'e mooɗon on jippotooɓe he warunooɓe annabiiɓe.
Ndenne, kuumnee ko maamiraaɓe mooɗon puɗɗunoo !
Firsooje, ɓiɓɓe bolle bonɗe ! Noy ndaɗirton kiite jahannama?

Ngam majjum waɗi miɗo lilda on annabiiɓe, jom'en hikmaaku he jannginooɓe *Tawreeta. On mbaran woɓɓe maɓɓe, tonton woɓɓe nder maɓɓe, ɓoccon woɓɓe maɓɓe nder *baajorɗi mooɗon, oɗon tokkitii ɓe wuro warde wuro oɗon tampina ɓe.

Ndenne, onon Alla tampinta ngam sabbu yonkiiji dartiiɓe ittaaɗi nder duuniyaaru nduu ɗiin. Illa *Haabiila dartiiɗo oon faa wara he Jakariya ɓii-Barakiya mo mbarnoɗon caka *Juulirde mawne he sakkirde oon.
Goonga kaalananmi on: Kiite majjum fuu saaman dow himɓe jamaanu oo !
—Hey *Ursaliima ! *Ursaliima, huɓeere warude annabiiɓe. A wariri lilaaɓe he maaɗa kaaƴe ! Mi muuyi kile keewɗe hawrude ɓiɓɓe maa hano no gortogal hawrirta coppi mum ley bippoole nii. Amma a jaɓaay.
Joonin kam nii ɓaade mooɗon no ɗon no woppee. Neɗɗo fuu jooɗotaako nder, nde laatotoo winnde.
Miɗo wi'a on: On ngi'ataa kam illa joonin faa wara wakkati mo mbi'oyton: Barkinaaɗo woni garɗo dow innde Joomiraawo !
Wakkati Iisa wurtinoo nder *Juulirde mawne ndeen, sey *aahiiɓe makko ɓadii mo, kolli mo nyibdi mayre.
Nden o haalani ɓe, o wi'i: —On ngi'ii kujje ɗee fuu naa? Goonga kaalananmi on: Baa hayre worre hoddataako no deki dow wonnde. Ndi fuu ndi liɓetee.

Wakkati Iisa jooɗinoo dow waamnde wi'eteene waamnde Jaytun ndeen, sey *aahiiɓe ɓeen ngari to makko kam'en tan, mbi'i mo: —Haalan min nde ɗum waɗata? Alaama oye hollata gartol maa, he timmoode duuniyaaru?
Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Kakkilee to neɗɗo fuu majjina on.
Ngam heewɓe no ngardan innde am, iɓe mbi'a: « Miin woni *Almasiihu. » Ɓe majjina himɓe heewɓe.
On nanan habaru konuuji naa siri majji, amma to kulee. No tilsi ɗum waɗa, amma ɗum hanaa alaama kolloowo timmoode duuniyaaru.
Lenyol habdan he lenyol, laamu habdan he laamu. Rafooji he dimmbaaki leydi ngaɗan nokku nokkuuje.
Kujje garooje ɗee fuu, nanndoytaana he fuɗɗorde ŋatawere.
Nden nanngeɗon, njaareɗon nder kiitorɗe ngam torreɗon, mbareɗon. Lenyi ɗiin fuu mbanyan on ngam sabbu am.
Wakkati mum, heewɓe nder goonɗinɓe pergoto, mboppa goonɗinol mum'en, tinnoo no njammbodira, no mbanyodira.
Annabiiɓe fewreeɓe heewɓe mbanngan, kiila himɓe heewɓe.
Bonandaaji keewan faa hidde himɓe heewɓe ɓuytoo.
Amma tarsiniiɗo faa yottii he timmoode, joomum no hisintee.
*Habaru lobbo filla Laamu Alla no sankitittee nder duuniyaaru fuu, faa o fillee nder lenyol fuu. Nden duuniyaaru timma.
—On ngi'an huune bonde, ɓurne nyiddinaade nde annabi Daniyel haalunoo filla muuɗum. Huune ndee, waddetee nder nokkuure seniine ndeen. (Jannguɗo ɗum fuu faama ɗum no wooɗiri.)
Nden tawaaɓe nder Yahudiya fuu ndoggira baamle.
Tawaaɗo dow suudu fuu, to jippoo hooƴa ginol gom nder mayru.
Tawaaɗo ngesa, to yeeƴito hooƴa koltal mum.
Nder balɗe mum bone no saaman dow saawɓe he musinooɓe !
Eelee Alla to doggudu mooɗon nduun fottodir he dunngu naa *nyalaane fowteteene.
Ngam nder wakkati mum, torra mawka no waɗan kaa hano mum waɗaayno illa fuɗɗorde duuniyaaru faa warde hannden. Iri makka waɗataa kaden duu faa abada.
Nde nii tawiino balɗe ɗeen raɓɓinɗinaaka, neɗɗo fuu hisataano. Amma Alla raɓɓinɗinii ɗe ngam suɓaaɓe muuɗum.
Nder wakkati mum, nde nii goɗɗo wi'i on, ndaaree *Almasiihu nii ɗo naa too'en, to ngoonɗinee joomum.
Ngam almasiihuuɓe fewreeɓe he annabiiɓe fewreeɓe mbanngowan, ɓe ngaɗa alamaaji mawɗi he kaayɗe, ngam majjinde baa suɓaaɓe Alla ɓeen, nde nii no waɗoo.
Paamee ko mi haalani on ɗum illa ɗum waraay.
Nde nii on mbi'aama: « Kanko nii nder ladde yeeruure », to njehee. Naa nde nii ɓe mbi'ii on: « Kanko nii to nder cuuɗi », to ngoonɗinee.
Hano no maƴƴere yaynirta nder kammu illa lettugal faa gorgal, hano non *Ɓii-Neɗɗo wardata.
To caangu woni, ɗon jigaaje kawrata.
—Gaɗa saɗɗormaaji nyalaaɗe ɗeen, sey naange niɓɓa, lewru accaa yeynude, koode caama, Alla waɗa baawɗe gonɗe dow fuu ndimmboo.
Wakkati mum, alaama *Ɓii-Neɗɗo wanngata dow, ɓerɗe lenyi duuniyaaru fuu mettan. Ɓe ngi'an *Ɓii-Neɗɗo no wara dow duule. Omo warda baawɗe e teddungal manngal.
Luwal manngal fuufee, nden o lila maleykaaɓe makko nder kappa kuula duuniyaaru fuu, ɓe kawrowa suɓaaɓe makko, illa hoore leydi ndii faa hoore leydi ndiito.
Too, ndaaree ibbi kii, ekkitoɗon goɗɗum he makki. Nde nii licce makki keyɗitii, kaakooli makki mbilitii, oɗon anndi ko dunngu ɓadake.
Hano non kaden, nde nii on ngi'ii kujje ɗee fuu no ngara, paamee ko wakkati oon ɓadake, *Ɓii-Neɗɗo no dammbugal wuro.
Goonga kaalananmi on: Jamaanu oo timmataa tawee kujje ɗee fuu ngaraay.
Kammu e leydi taggan, amma haalaaji am timmataa abada.
—Walaa annduɗo nyalaane ndeen naa wakkati mo ɗum waɗoyta, baa maleykaaɓe wonɓe dow ɓeen, naa Ɓiɗɗo oon anndaa ɗum, sey nii *Baabiraawo oon tan.
Hano no ɗum waɗirnoo nder jamaanu Nuhu, hano non gartol *Ɓii-Neɗɗo duu waɗirta.
Hano no fadde ndiyam tuufaana warde, himɓe no nyaama, no njara, no ɓaŋa, no ɓaŋee, faa nyannde Nuhu naati laana kaan.
Ɓe paamaay fuu nder ko ɓe ngoni, naako ndiyam tuufaana wari, yooli ɓe, ɓe fuu. Hano non duu gartol *Ɓii-Neɗɗo, waɗirta.
Wakkati mum, worɓe ɗiɗo tawetee nder ngesa. Gooto hooƴee, ooto accee.
Rewɓe ɗiɗo tawetee no unida dow boɓi. Gooto hooƴee, ooto accee.
Ndenne, tinnee heɓa taweɗon on ciryiiɓe, ngam on anndaa wakkati Joomiraawo mooɗon wartoyta.
Paamee, ko nde nii jom wuro no anndi wakkati mo gujjo warta nder jemma, nden o ɗaanataakono, o acca oon naata suudu makko.
Ndenne, onon duu ciryee, to gartol *Ɓii-Neɗɗo juhu on.
—Moy woni golloowo kolniiɗo, jom hakkillo? Golloowo mo mawɗo mum halfini ɓaade mum, wi'i o hokka maccuɓe mum gom nyaamdu mum'en nder wakkati mo haani.
Belɗo hoore woni golloowo mo mawɗo mum warti, tawi no waɗa golle mum.
Goonga kaalananmi on: Mawɗo oon no halfinan mo njawdi mum fuu.
Amma nde golloowo oon no bonɗo, o wi'annoo hoore makko, mawɗo am wartilawtaa.
Sey o fuɗɗa fiyude banndiraaɓe makko gollooɓe. Omo nyaamda, omo yarda he jarooɓe.
Too, mawɗo golloowo oo no wartan nyannde nde o miilaaka.
Mawɗo makko riiwan mo, fiya mo sawru munafikiiɓe, toon o woyata omo ŋerƴodira nyiiƴe.
—Ndaa Laamu Alla nanndaana he taariihi surbaaɓe sappo, ɓe anndaa worɓe, kooƴuɓe fitillaaji mum'en njehi faa njaɓɓowoo ɓaŋuɗo gom.
Nder maɓɓe joyo ngalaa hakkillo, joyo ɓeeto duu no jom'en hakkillo.
Ɓe ngalaa hakkillo ɓeen kooƴi fitillaaji mum'en amma pantiraay nebbam.
Jom'en hakkillo ɓeen kay adi fitillaaji mum'en, ɓe njaldi nebbam nder paali maɓɓe.
Ɓaŋuɗo oon jenngi waraay, ɓe fuu ɓe ŋoŋi, sey ɓe ɗaanii.
Har caka jemma, kuuɓaali nanaa, no wi'ee: « Ɓaŋuɗo wari ! Ɓaŋuɗo wari ! Ummee njaɓɓowee mo ! »
Sey surbaaɓe ɓeen fuu pini, no moƴƴina fitillaaji mum'en.
Surbaaɓe ɓe ngalaa hakkillo ɓeen mbi'i jom'en hakkillo ɓeen: « Kokkaree min seɗɗa he nebbam mooɗon, fitillaaji amin no ɗon no nyifa. »
Jom'en hakkillo ɓeen njaabii, mbi'i: « Ɗam heƴataa en, en fuu. Njehee to sonnooɓe ɓeen, coodowon no ɓuri ! »
Wakkati ɓe mburtii, ɓe coodowi nebbam, sey ɓaŋuɗo oon yottii. Siryiiɓe taɓɓitaade mo ɓeen naatidi he makko nder batu nguun, nden dammbugal ngal ommbaa.
Ɓooyi seɗɗa gaɗa mum, sey surbaaɓe wurtiiɓe ɓeen ngarti, tawi ingal ommbii. Ɓe tiimi iɓe nodda, iɓe mbi'a: « Moodibbo, Moodibbo ! Omtan min ! »
Amma ɓaŋuɗo oon jaabii ɓe, wi'i: « Goonga kaalananmi on: Mi anndaa on. »
Nden Iisa sakitii wi'i ɓe: —Kakkilee ndenne, ngam on anndaa nyalaane ndeen naa wakkati oon.
—Laamu Alla no nanndi he gorko gom gaɗuɗo jahaangal, noddi gollooɓe mum, halfini ɓe njawdi mum.
Gooto nder maɓɓe o halfini ɗum cabbi kanŋe keme joy, ooto o halfini ɗum cabbi keme ɗiɗi, tataɓo oon cabbi hemre. Neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu dey-dey he ko waawi, gaɗa mum o dilli.
Wakkati mum da, kalfinaaɗo cabbi kanŋe keme joy oon yehi luumorii ɗi, heɓi cabbi keme joy gom.
Jom keme ɗiɗi oon duu, luumorii ɗi mum, heɓi kam duu cabbi keme ɗiɗi gom.
Amma jom cabbi hemre oon kay wasoy ngayka non, ufi ko hokkanoo ɗum fuu.
Ɓooyi seɗɗa gaɗa majjum, sey nyannde gom mawɗo maɓɓe warti, noddi ɓe, ngam daara, hiiso ceede ɗeen.
Kalfinaaɗo cabbi kanŋe keme joy oon wari, waddi cabbi keme joy gom, wi'i: « Joomam, a halfinii kam cabbi keme joy. Ndaa, mi luumorake ɗi, mi heɓi cabbi keme joy gom. »
Sey joomiiko wi'i mo: « Gasii. A golloowo lobbo, kolniiɗo. Ngam a hilnake ko famɗi, mi halfinte ko ɗuuɗi. War naatu, mbelniden ! »
Kalfinaaɗo cabbi keme ɗiɗi oon duu wari, wi'i: « Joomam, a halfinii kam cabbi kanŋe keme ɗiɗi. Ndaa, mi lumtorake ɗi, mi heɓi cabbi keme ɗiɗi gom. »
Sey joomiiko wi'i mo: « Gasii. A golloowo lobbo, kolniiɗo. Ngam a hilnake ko famɗi, mi halfinte ko ɗuuɗi. War naatu, mbelniden ! »
Kalfinaaɗo cabbi kanŋe hemre oon wari, kam duu, wi'i: « Joomam, miɗo anndi a gorko cattuɗo. Aɗa hetta ko a aawaay. Aɗa ɓotta ko a hawraay.
Ngam majjum waɗi, kulumi, njehumi, ufoymi kanŋe maa. Joonin, ndaa cabbi maaɗa nii. »
Sey joomiiko jaabii mo, wi'i: « Bonɗo, jaayɗo ! Janɗo ! Aɗa anndi miɗo hetta ko mi aawaay, miɗo ɓotta ko mi hawraay?
Nde nii a wattiino kanŋe am ɗeen nder banki, faa nde ngartumi, nden ɗe ngaddanan kam riiba.
Joonin, teetee cabbi kanŋe hemre ɗiin, kokkon ɗi jom keme joy oon.
Ngam jogiiɗo fuu no ɓeydantee faa heewa. Amma mo walaa oon, baa seɗɗa mo jogii oon, no teetetee.
Paɗɗee golloowo jaayɗo oo yaasin nder nimre. Toon, o tinnotoo omo woya, omo ŋerƴodira nyiiƴe. »
—Wakkati *Ɓii-Neɗɗo wardi he teddungal mum, he maleykaaɓe mum fuu, o jooɗoto dow jooɗorgal laamu makko teddungal.
Himɓe duuniyaaru fuu no kawretee yeeso makko, o senndan ɓe, no duroowo senndirta baali he be'i mum.
O wartiran baali ɗiin har junngo makko nyaamo, o wartira be'i ɗiin har nano makko.
Wakkati mum Laamiiɗo oon wi'a wonɓe nyaamo makko: « Ngaree, onon ɓe *Baabiraawo am barkini, ndonee laamu ngu ndesanaɗon illa tagol duuniyaaru.
Ngam mi rafanooma, on nyamnii kam. Mi ɗomɗiino, on njarnii kam. Mi laatakeno beero, on mbernii kam.
Mi walaano koltal, on koltinii kam. Mi nyawiino, on kilnake kam. Mi uddanooma, on ndaarowii kam. »
Nder wakkati mum, dartiiɓe ɓeen njaabotoo mo, mbi'a: « Joomiraawo, wakkati oye min ngi'ii ndafeɗaa, min nyamnii ma, naa wakkati oye ɗomɗeɗaa, min njarnii ma?
Wakkati oye min ngi'ii a beero, min mbernii ma, naa a walaa koltal, min koltinii ma?
Naa wakkati oye min ngi'ii a nyawɗo naa a uddaama, min ndaarowii ma? »
Sey Laamiiɗo oon jaaboo ɓe wi'a: « Goonga kaalananmi on: Ko ngaɗanɗon gooto nder ɓurɗo famɗude nder banndiraaɓe am fuu, miin ngaɗanɗon. »
Gaɗa mum, o wi'an wonɓe nano makko: « Mboɗɗee kam, onon naalaaɓe ! Njehee nder hiite duumiinge, nge Alla resani Ibiliisa he maleykaaɓe tokkuɓe mo !
Ngam mi rafaama, on nyamnaay kam. Mi ɗomɗaama, on njarnaay kam.
Mi weeraniino on, on njippinaay kam. Mi walaano koltal, on koltinaay kam. Mi nyawiino, mi uddanooma, on ngaraay ndaaruɗon kam. »
Sey ɓe njaaboo mo kamɓe duu, ɓe mbi'a: « Joomiraawo, wakkati oye min ngi'ii ndafeɗaa, naa ɗomɗeɗaa, naa mbeeruɗaa, naa a holtaay, naa nyawɗaa, naa uddeɗaa, min mballaay ma? »
Wakkati mum sey o jaaboo ɓe o wi'a: « Goonga kaalananmi on: Ko on ngaɗanaay gooto nder ɓurɓe famɗude ɓee, miin woni on ngaɗanaay. »
Himɓe ɓee, ngoni naatooɓe nder torra duumiiɗo, amma dartiiɓe ɓeen duu ngoni keɓooɓe mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
Wakkati Iisa timminnoo waaju mum, o wi'i *aahiiɓe makko:
—Oɗon anndi ko balɗe ɗiɗi kori he *Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe, *Ɓii-Neɗɗo hokkitirtee ngam tontee dow *leggal bardugal.
Mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla e mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe kawri wuro mawɗo mawɓe *cakkanoowo Alla gom bi'eteeɗo Kayafas.
Ɓe caawodiri ngam ɓe keɓa no ɓe kiiliri Iisa ɓe nannga, ɓe mbara mo.
Amma ɓe mbi'i: —To en ngaɗu ɗum wakkati juulɗe ɗeen, ngam to himɓe murtu.
Wakkati Iisa wonnoo Baytaniya nder ɓaade Simon inndirteeɗo Simon Ceppinnga,
debbo gom ɓadii mo no jogii faanu nebbam uurɗam, caadiɗam sanne. O tawi Iisa no nyaama, o joorti ɗam dow hoore makko.
Wakkati *aahiiɓe ɓeen ngi'unoo ɗum, ɓerɗe maɓɓe metti, iɓe mbi'a: —Ɗum bonnere, ɗume ɗum nafata?
Iɗam waawi sonneede ceede ɗuɗɗe, ɗe kokkee talkaaɓe.
Iisa faami ko ɓe ngoni iɓe kaala, nden o wi'i ɓe: —Ko waɗi ko oɗon torra debbo oo? Ko o waɗani kam ɗum no wooɗi sanne.
Talkaaɓe no tawdee he mooɗon wakkati fuu. Amma miin, mi tawdataake he mooɗon wakkati fuu.
O wuji nebbam uurɗam ɗam he ɓanndu am ngam siryaade mooɓol am.
Goonga kaalananmi on, nokku fuu to *Habaru lobbo oo waajaa nder duuniyaaru, ko debbo oo waɗi ɗum no filletee ngam miccitaade he makko.
Yahuuda Iskariyot, gooto nder *lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen, yehi to mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla ɓeen,
wi'i ɓe: —Ɗume kokkoton kam nde nii mi watti Iisa nder juuɗe mooɗon? Nden ɓe kokki mo tammaaje cardi woronja.
Illa nyannde mum, Yahuuda no tefa, no jammborii Iisa.
Nyalooma arano *Juulɗe buuru mo walaa ƴuufinirɗum, *aahiiɓe ɓeen ngari to Iisa, ƴami mo, mbi'i: —Toy ngiɗaa min ciryanowe hiraane *Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe?
O jaabii ɓe, o wi'i: —Njehee nder huɓeere to waane, mbi'on mo: « Moodibbo wi'i, wakkati oon yonii. Nder ɓaade maaɗa kam waɗata *Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe ɗeen, kanko he *aahiiɓe makko. »
Sey *aahiiɓe ɓeen ngaɗi ko Iisa wi'i ɓe, ɓe ciryii hiraane ndeen.
Futuro, wakkati naange yanunoo, Iisa jooɗodii he *lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen iɓe ndoomi hiraane ndeen.
Wakkati ɓe kiirtotonoo ndeen, o wi'i: —Goonga kaalananmi on: Gooto nder mooɗon no jammboto kam.
Sey ɓe ɓalinii sanne, ɓe keddii iɓe ƴama mo gooto gooto, neɗɗo fuu no wi'a mo: —Moodibbo, kori hanaa miin non?
O jaabii ɓe, o wi'i: —Cuuwidiɗɗo he am junngo mum nder le'al ngaal, oon jammbotoo kam.
*Ɓii-Neɗɗo accan duuniyaaru hano no ɗum winndiraa dow makko nder dewte. Amma bone saaman dow jammbotooɗo mo ! Joomum nde nii rimaakano, nden no ɓurananoo ɗum.
Yahuuda jammboytooɗo mo oon fiirti hunnduko, ƴami mo, wi'i: —Moodibbo, kori hanaa miin non? O jaabii mo, o wi'i: —Aan haali he hunnduko maa.
Wakkati ɓe nyaamannoo ndeen, Iisa hooƴi buuru, yetti Alla, helti mo, hokki *aahiiɓe mum, wi'i: —Njaɓee, nyaamee. Ɗum woni ɓanndu am.
Gaɗa mum, o hooƴi nyeɗerde cabiijam, o yetti Alla, o hokki ɓe, o wi'i: —Njaree, on fuu.
Ɗum woni ƴiiƴam am tabbintinoojam amaana Alla, ƴiiƴam ndufeteeɗam ngam hakkeeji himɓe heewɓe njaafee.
Miɗo haalana on: Mi yarataa cabiijam ɗam kaden, sey nii nyannde njardowanmi kesam gom he mooɗon nder Laamu *Baabiraawo am.
Gaɗa ɓe njimi jimi *Jabuura, ɓe mburtii, ɓe njehi dow waamnde wi'eteene waamnde Jaytun.
Dow waamnde ndeen Iisa wi'i *aahiiɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen: —Nder jemma oo, on fuu on mboppan kam, ngam no winndaa, wi'aa: Mi fiyan duroowo oon, sewre baali ndeen sankitoo.
Sey o wi'i ɓe kaden: —Nde mi ummitake, mi artan on Galili.
Nden Piyer itti hunnduko, wi'i mo: —Baa nde nii ɓe fuu ɓe pergake, ɓe mboppi ma, miin kay, abada mi woppataa ma.
Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Goonga kaalananmaami: Nder jemma oo, fadde ndontoori jogginde, a wi'an a anndaa kam kile tati !
Sey Piyer wi'i mo: —Baa nde a maayan non, mi maaydan he maaɗa, abada mi wi'ataa mi anndaa ma. Non *aahiiɓe ɓeeto duu mbi'i.
Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum ummii, njehi nokkuure wi'eteene Gesemaane, toon o wi'i ɓe: —Njooɗee ɗo, faa mi du'owo.
O yahdi Piyer he ɓiɓɓe Jebede ɗiɗo ɓeen Yakuuba he Yahaaya. Iɓe ɗon nii sey taƴo-taƴo fuɗɗi nanngude mo, ɓillaare naatani mo sanne.
Sey o wi'i ɓe: —Bononda ɓerne am ɗuuɗi sanne faa no tefa warude kam. Ndaree ɗo, ndoomee, kakkilee to on ɗaanee.
O woɗɗi ɓe seɗɗa, o turni yeeso makko faa he leydi, omo du'oo, omo wi'a: —*Baaba, nde nii tawi iɗum waɗoo, woɗɗinam nyeɗerde torra kaa. To ɗum laatoo muuyɗe am, amma ɗum laatoo muuyɗe maa aan.
Gaɗa mum o warti, o tawi *aahiiɓe makko no ɗaanii. O wi'i Piyer: —Jaa on mbaawaa doomude kam baa nii yamnde worre naa?
Ummee, ndu'ee, to on caamu nder cii'aaki. Ɓerne no hiɗi amma ɓanndu tampi.
O soƴƴii kaden, o du'ii, o wi'i: —*Baaba, nde nii tawi nyeɗerde torra kaa waawtaa woɗɗi kam, sey nii mi yarii nde. Too ! Muuyɗe maa laato.
O warti, o tawi iɓe ɗaanii kaden, ɗoyngol maɓɓe moddi sanne.
O soƴƴii kaden, o du'owii nde tataɓere, hano no o du'orinoo illa arannde nii.
Gaɗa mum, o warti to *aahiiɓe makko, o wi'i ɓe: —Oɗon ɗaanii, oɗon powta naa? Ndaaree, wakkati oon yottake ! *Ɓii-Neɗɗo no wattetee nder juuɗe waɗooɓe hakke.
Ummee, ndillen ! Ndaa, jammbotooɗo kam oon nii, no wara !
Iisa no caka haala, sey Yahuuda, gooto nder *lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen, yottii no wondi he jama'aare mawne. Mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla he mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe lili ɓe, iɓe njogii takubaaje he cabbi.
Tawi Yahuuda jammbotooɗo mo oon tinndinnoo ɓe wi'i: —Mo mbunndotoomi oon kam woni mo. Nanngon mo.
No ɓe njottorii, sey o fa'i to Iisa, o wi'i: —Foofoo, Moodibbo ! Nden o wunndii mo.
Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Giɗo am, waɗu ko waddi ma. Wakkati mum da, ɓe ɓadii Iisa, ɓe caami dow makko, ɓe nanngi mo.
Gooto nder wondunooɓe he Iisa ɓeen sorti takubaahi mum, soppi gollanoowo mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla fuu, taƴi nowru makko.
Nden, Iisa wi'i mo: —Soornu takubaahi maa nder hulgo mum, ngam kaɓidoowo he takubaahi fuu, takubaahi warata ɗum.
Oɗon miiloo joonin ko mi waawaa tefude balla to *Baaba am naa? O lilda kam jonnda maleykaaɓe ɓurɓe cefe soogeeji sappo he ɗiɗi.
Too, amma nde nii mi waɗi ɗum, noy ko winndaa nder dewte ɗum tabbitirta?

Wakkati mum, o wi'i jama'aare ndeen: —Ko waɗi ngarduɗon takubaaje e cabbi faa nanngon kam hano miin woni mawɗo murtuɓe? Wakkati fuu miɗo wondunoo he mooɗon nder *Juulirde mawne, miɗo waajoo, on nanngaay kam.
Amma ɗum fuu, ɗum waɗan ngam ko dewte annabiiɓe kaali ɗum tabbita. Wakkati *aahiiɓe makko ɓeen nanunoo haalaaji ɗii, ɓe fuu ɓe ndoggi ɓe mboppi Iisa.
Nanngunooɓe Iisa ɓeen njaari Iisa to Kayafas mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla fuu. Tawi jannginooɓe *Tawreeta he mawɓe Isra'ilankooɓe kawri.
Amma Piyer toowti ɓe seɗɗa, tokkitii ɓe, naako nder batamaare ɓaade mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla oon. O naati nder ɓaade ndeen, o jooɗii hadde doomooɓe ɓaade ndeen ngam o hi'a no ɗum sakitortoo.
Mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla he hawriine dawrooɓe no tefa fewre nde peliri Iisa ngam o waree.
Himɓe heewɓe ngari seedanaade mo dow fewre, amma ɗum fuu waɗaay ɓe keɓa no ɓe mbarirta mo. Ko sakitii worɓe ɗiɗo gom ngari,
mbi'i: —Kanko wi'unoo omo waawi liɓude Juulirde meeɗen mawne, o nyiɓitoo nde nder balɗe tati.
Nden mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla oon ummii, wi'i Iisa: —Ɗume njaabotoɗaa dow ko himɓe ɓee mbi'i?
Iisa wi'aay baafuy. Nden mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla oon wi'i mo kaden: —Mi eelirii ma innde Alla duumiiɗo, kaalanaa min ko aan a *Almasiihu *Ɓii-Alla.
Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Aan, e hoore maaɗa wi'i ka. Kaden, miɗo wi'a on: Illa joonin, on ngi'an *Ɓii-Neɗɗo no jooɗii nyaamo Jom baawɗe, no wara dow duule.
Mone majjum wari mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla oon faa o serki kolte makko, o wi'i: —O bonni innde Alla ! Walaa fuu ko kaajaɗon seedaade dow makko kaden ! On narrii noppi mooɗon ko o bonni innde Alla.
Ɗume miiliɗon? Sey ɓe njaabii, ɓe mbi'i omo haani wareede.
Nder maɓɓe woɓɓe kaarti, tutti dow yeeso Iisa, woɓɓe duu luƴƴii mo.
Nder maɓɓe woɓɓe peenyii mo, no mbi'a: —Hey *Almasiihu ! Nde nii a annabiijo, haalan min moy fiyi ma !
Piyer no jooɗii yaasin nder batamaare ɓaade ndeen. Sey korɗo ɓaade ndeen gom ɓadii mo, wi'i: —Aan duu, aɗa wondunoo Iisa ɓii-Galili oo.
Hakkune himɓe fuu sey Piyer yeddi, wi'i: —Mi faamaay ko kaalataa.
Wakkati Piyer fonndinoo har dammbugal ɓaade ndeen, sey korɗo gom hi'i mo, wi'i wonɓe ɗon ɓeen: —Gorko oo no wondunoo he Iisa mo Nasaratu.
Sey Piyer yeddi kaden, huni wi'i: —Mi anndaa gorko oo.
Ɓooyi seɗɗa gaɗa mum, sey dariiɓe ɗon ɓeen ɓadii Piyer, mbi'i mo: —Sikka fuu walaa, nder maɓɓe njeyaɗaa, ngam ɗemngal maaɗa ngal tabbintinta ɗum.
Sey Piyer fuɗɗi hunaade no huniitoo no wi'a: —Mi anndaa gorko oo ! Wakkati mum da, ndontoori joggini.
Nden Piyer miccitii ko Iisa wi'unoo ɗum: —Fadde ndontoori jogginde, a wi'an a anndaa kam kile tati. Nden Piyer darii yaasin tinni no wulla no wulla.
Illa beete, mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla he mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe kawri, kaɓɓi anniya mbara Iisa.
Ɓe kaɓɓi mo, ɓe njaari, ɓe ngatti nder juuɗe Pilaatus kawjiiɗo leydi Yahudiya.
Wakkati Yahuuda jammbiiɗo Iisa oon hi'unoo no Iisa hiitira kiite maayde, o nimsiti. O wartiri tammaaje cardi woronja ɗeen to mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla he mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe ɓeen.
O wi'i ɗum'en: —Mi waɗi hakke ngam mi jammbake mo waɗaay gacce fuu faa o waree ! Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Ko hilli min ! Aan ɗum daarata.
Yahuuda faɗɗi tammaaje ɗeen nder *Juulirde mawne ndeen, dilli, hooƴowi ɓoggol, wari hoore mum.
Mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla ɓeen kooƴi tammaaje ɗeen, mbi'i: —Dagaaki tammaaje ɗe ngattee nder keesuwal, ngam ɗe njobdi ƴiiƴam.
Nden ɓe caawodiri dow majje, ɓe kooƴi ɗe, ɓe coodowi nokkuure gom wi'eteene ngesa mahoowo looɗe. Ɓe ngaɗi nga annyeeje ɓe kanaa *Yahudankooɓe.
Ngam majjum waɗi faa warde hannden ngesa ngaan no wi'ee « Ngesa Ƴiiƴam ».
Ɗum humnii haala ka annabi Yeremiya haalunoo mbi'unooka: Ɓe kooƴi tammaaje cardi woronja, ceede ɗe himɓe *Isra'el kiisorii yonki makko,
ɓe coodiri ɗe ngesa mahoowo looɗe, hano no Joomiraawo wi'iri kam ɗum nii.
Iisa darii yeeso Pilaatus kawjiiɗo leydi Yahudiya oon. Oon ƴami mo, wi'i: —Aan a laamiiɗo *Yahudankooɓe naa? Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Aan, e hoore maaɗa wi'i ka.
Amma wakkati mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla he mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe pelannoo mo ndeen, o nootaaki ɓe.
Nden Pilaatus wi'i mo kaden: —A nanaay ko woni no wi'ee dow maaɗa ɗum fuu naa?
Iisa nootaaki mo baa. Ɗum haayɗini Pilaatus sanne.
He *Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe fuu, Pilaatus kawjiiɗo leydi Yahudiya no woowi yoofande *Yahudankooɓe kasunke gooto mo ɓe ngiɗi yoofee.
Nder wakkati mum, no woodunoo kasunke bonɗo gom, bi'eteeɗo [Iisa] Barabas gaɗɗo innde sanne.
Wakkati jama'aare ndeen warunoo sey Pilaatus ƴami ɓe, wi'i: —Moy ngiɗuɗon mi yoofana on: [Iisa] Barabas, naa Iisa bi'oowo kam no *Almasiihu?
Ngam hakiika, Pilaatus no anndi ko haasidaaku waɗi ɓe ngaddi Iisa to mum.
Wakkati Pilaatus jooɗinoo nder suudu kiite nduun, jom suudu makko lili he makko, wi'i o sela gorko dartiiɗo oo, ngam hankin koyɗi ɗi o waɗi dow makko ɗiin tampinii mo sanne.
Mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla he mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe uppi jama'aare ndeen, eela Pilaatus yoofana ɓe Barabas, amma o wara Iisa.
Pilaatus ƴamtinii ɓe, wi'i: —Moy nder ɗiɗo ɓeen ngiɗuɗon mi yoofana on? Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Barabas !
Pilaatus ƴami ɓe, wi'i: —Dey noy ngaɗanmi Iisa bi'eteeɗo *Almasiihu oon? Ɓe fuu ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Tontu mo dow *bardugal !
O ƴami ɓe, o wi'i: —Dey ɗume o waɗi ko foti nii fuu? Nden ɓe kuuɓi sanne, ɓe mbi'i: —Tontu mo dow *bardugal !

Pilaatus hi'i walaa fuu ko kam waawi, omo hula duu murtol ummoo. Sey o hooƴi ndiyam, o looti juuɗe makko yeeso himɓe fuu, o wi'i: —Miin kay, juuɗe am ngalaa hen, nder dufol ƴiiƴam gorko oo. Onon ɗum daarata.
Nden ɓe fuu ɓe njaabii, ɓe mbi'i: —Hakke dufol ƴiiƴam makko no dow amin, minen he ɓiɓɓe amin !
Nden, Pilaatus yoofani ɓe Barabas, hokki laawol Iisa ɓoccee, gaɗa mum, o tontowee dow *leggal bardugal.
Illa ɗon soogeeji kawjiiɗo leydi Yahudiya ɗiin njaari Iisa nder batamaare ɓaade Pilaatus. Ɓe ngaddi sewre soogeeji gom piilii mo.
Ɓe ɓorti kolte makko, ɓe ɓornii mo alkubbaare woɗeere.
Ɓe canyi taarde gi'e, ɓe kippi dow hoore makko, ɓe ngatti loocol nder junngo makko nyaamo. Nden ɓe kofi yeeso makko, iɓe njawoo mo iɓe mbi'a: —Alla sabbinane, laamiiɗo *Yahudankooɓe !
Ɓe kaarti dow makko, ɓe kooƴi loocol iɓe piya mo dow hoore.
Wakkati ɓe njawinoo mo faa heƴi ɓe, ɓe itti alkubbaare ndeen, ɓe ɓornii mo kolte makko. Ɓe njaari mo yaasin faa ɓe tontowa mo.
Wakkati ɓe njahannoo ndeen, sey ɓe potti he gorko gom jeyaaɗo Sirene bi'eteeɗo Simon. Soogeeji ɗiin tilsini mo o wakkoo *leggal bardugal Iisa ngaal.
O wakkii ngal faa ɓe njottii nokkuure gom wi'eteene Golgota. Maana Golgota woni « nokkuure laalagal hoore ».
Toon ɓe kokki Iisa cabiijam kawrodiriɗam he safaare haaɗune gom ngam o yara. Wakkati o wooɓunoo ɗam ndeen, o salii yarude ɗam.
Wakkati ɓe tontunoo mo ndeen, ɓe piyi caaca ngam senndude kolte makko caka maɓɓe.
Gaɗa mum, ɓe njooɗii, ɓe ndoomi mo.
Sabaabu gaɗɗo ɓe tonti mo, winndaa dow alluwal ɓe takki ngal dow timtude hoore makko. Ndaa ko winndaa nii: « Oo woni Iisa, Laamiiɗo *Yahudankooɓe. »
O tontidaama he wuyɓe ɗiɗo gom, oo no nyaamo, ooto duu no nano makko.
Yawtooɓe har toon ɓeen no njenna mo, no njinnga ko'e mum'en,
no mbi'a: —Aan Liɓoowel *Juulirde mawne, dey nyiɓitoo nde nder balɗe tati, dannu hoore maa ! Nde nii a *Ɓii-Alla, jippa dow *leggal bardugal ngaal !
Noon duu, mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla, jannginooɓe *Tawreeta e mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe tinni no njaltinoo mo hakkune mum'en, no mbi'a:
—O dannii woɓɓe, dey o waawaa dannude hoore makko. Oo woni Laamiiɗo *Isra'el naa? Nde nii o jippake joonin joonin, en ngoonɗinan mo !
O halfinii hoore makko Alla. Too, joonin nde Alla no hiɗi mo, hisinan mo, ngam nii o wi'i o *Ɓii-Alla.
Wuyɓe pasotooɓe tontidaaɓe he makko ɓeen duu, no njennira mo non.
Caka nyalooma, nimre huuri leydi ndiin fuu faa ɗum waɗi jamɗe tati.
Har yamnde tati juura, Iisa fii wullaanu mawnu, wi'i: Eli, Eli, lema sabaktani? Kam woni: Yaa Alla am ! Yaa Alla am ! Ɗume waɗi ko mboppuɗaa kam?
Wakkati darinooɓe toon ɓeen nanunoo ɗum, woɓɓe nder maɓɓe mbi'i: —Kettinee, omo nii omo nodda Eliya.
Sey gooto nder maɓɓe doggi waddowi tekkere, suuwi nder ndiyam lammuɗam gom, haɓɓi nde he loocol, waddi nde hadde hunnduko Iisa ngam Iisa siiɓoo ɗam.
Amma hoddiiɓe ɓeeto mbi'i: —Accu ndaaren tawte Eliya waran danna mo.
Iisa fii wullaanu mawnu kaden, sey o foofi foofaango makko sakitiingo.
Riido palaaɗo nder *Juulirde mawne oon serki illa dow faa ley, laatii pecce ɗiɗi. Leydi ndiin dimmbii, kaaƴe cerki,
annyeeji udditi. Seniiɓe maaynooɓe heewɓe ummitii,
mburtii nder annyeeje mum'en. Gaɗa ummitaaki Iisa, ɓe naatidi nder *Ursaliima wuro seniingo. Himɓe heewɓe ngi'ii ɓe.
Soogeeji doomuɗi Iisa ɗiin he hooreejo majji nani no leydi ndiin dimmbiri, ngi'ii duu ko waɗi fuu, kuli sanne, mbi'i: —Sikka fuu walaa, oo *Ɓii-Alla !
Rewɓe heewɓe tokkunooɓe mo, illa Galili ngam ɓe ngollana mo no ndarii to toowti, no ndaara.
Nder maɓɓe no tawa Mariyaama mo Magdaala, Mariyaama inna Yakuuba e Yusufu, he inna ɓiɓɓe Jebede.
Futuro, gorko jom njawdi gom jeyaaɗo wuro Arimatiya wari. Omo wi'ee Yusufu. Kanko duu, o aahiijo Iisa.
O yehi to Pilaatus, o ŋaarii mo ɓanndu Iisa. Pilaatus hokki laawol o hokkee ndu.
O hooƴi ɓanndu nduun, o fiili ndu nder kasanke.
O watti ndu nder annyeere heyre nde o seɓanii hoore makko nder tepaare mawne gom. Nden o waɗi kaaƴa mannga gom tallitaa, dammbugal annyeere ndeen uddaa, o dilli.
Mariyaama mo Magdaala he bi'eteeɗo Mariyaama gom no njooɗii, no kuccitii annyeere ndeen.
Jaangoore mum woni *nyalaane fowteteene. Mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla he *Fariisa'en kawri to Pilaatus,
mbi'i mo: —Alla sabbinane, min miccitake ko kiiloowo himɓe oon, wakkati wuurunoo wi'iino, ko kam no ummitittoo balɗe tati gaɗa maayde mum.

Ndenne, ngaɗaa annyeere ndeen ndoomee faa balɗe tati ɗeen njawta, ngam to *aahiiɓe makko ngaru, mbujja ɓanndu makko mbi'a himɓe o ummitake e maayde. Nden kay, hiila cakitittooɗo oon, no ɓuran arandeejo oon bonde.
Nden Pilaatus jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Ndaa soogeeji doomooji ɗiin nii. Njehee, ndoomon annyeere ndeen no mbaawruɗon fuu.
Ɓe njehi, ɓe ndoomowi annyeere ndeen. Ɓe pii kaatimiije laamiiɗo *Rooma dow mayre, ngam faamee se nde fiirtaama. Ɓe ngatti soogeeji ndaara nde.
Alal, gaɗa *nyalaane fowteteene ndeen, illa subaka kecco, Mariyaama mo Magdaala he Mariyaama gom njehi ndaarowi annyeere ndeen.
Wakkati mum da, leydi dimmbii sanne. Maleykaajo Joomiraawo gom jippii, talliti kaaƴa ngaan jooɗii dow magga.
Omo ƴelkiɗaa hano maƴƴere, kolte makko duu no ndawni tarr hano haabu.
Doomooɓe ɓeen kuli sanne faa no ndiwna, ɓe laatii hano maayɓe.
Sey maleykaajo oon wi'i rewɓe ɓeen: —To kulee ! Miɗo anndi Iisa tontanooɗo oon tefoton.
Amma o walaa ɗo, o ummitake hano no o wi'irnoo ɗum nii. Ngaree, ndaaree nokkuure to o fukkinaa nii.
Dey njaawɗee, njehee, kumpitowoɗon *aahiiɓe makko mbi'on o ummitake. Wooɗi, joonin o artan on Galili, toon ngi'oyton mo. Ɗum njoginoomi faa mi haalana on.
Rewɓe ɗiɗo ɓeen ummii, ndilli to annyeere ndeen. Kulal manngal he welwelo manngo heewi ɓe. Ɓe ndoggi, ɓe kaalanowi *aahiiɓe Iisa ɓeeto habaru oon.
Wakkati mum da, Iisa fotti he maɓɓe, wi'i ɓe: —Foofo mooɗon ! Ɓe ɓadii mo, ɓe nanngi koyɗe makko, ɓe cujidani mo.
Nden o wi'i ɓe: —To kulee ! Njehee mbi'owee giɗaaɓe am, ɓe njaha Galili. Toon ɓe ngi'oyta kam.
Wakkati rewɓe ɓeen ndillannoo ndeen, soogeeji doomuɗi annyeere Iisa ndeen kooti, kaalanowi mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla ɓeen huune fuu ko waɗi.
Mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla he mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe caawodiri, kokki soogeeji ɗiin ceede ɗuɗɗe,
mbi'i: —Mbi'on *aahiiɓe makko ngari nder jemma tawi oɗon ɗaanii. Ɓe mbujji ɓanndu makko.
Nde nii haala kaan yehi to kawjiiɗo leydi oon, min keɓan ko min mbi'i ngam suddude on. Min keedana on he torra fuu.
Soogeeji ɗiin njaɓi ceede ɗeen, ngaɗi ko mbi'aa. Nii haala kaa fillortee hakkune *Yahudankooɓe faa warde hannden.
*Aahiiɓe sappo he go'o ɓeen njehi Galili, dow waamnde nde Iisa tinndinnoo ɓe ndeen.
Wakkati ɓe ngi'unoo mo, ɓe cujidani mo, amma nder maɓɓe woɓɓe duu no cikka.
O ɓadii, o wi'i ɓe: —Mi hokkaama baawɗe fuu tawaaɗe dow e ley.
Ndenne, njehee nder kappa kuula duuniyaaru fuu, ngaɗee lenyi fuu *aahiiɓe am, ngaɗanon ɓe *batisma dow innde *Baabiraawo, Ɓiɗɗo he *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.
Njannginon ɓe, ɓe tokka ko mbi'umi on ɗum fuu. Paamee ko miɗo wondi he mooɗon wakkati fuu sey nyannde duuniyaaru timmi.
Filla *Habaru lobbo, habaru dow Iisa *Almasiihu *Ɓii-Alla, filla oo
fuɗɗirii haala Alla tawaaka nder dewtere annabi *Esaaya, mbi'uka: Ndaa, mi ardinan lilaaɗo am moƴƴinane laawol maaɗa.
Daane no huuɓa nder ladde yeeruure no wi'a: Ciryanee Joomiraawo laabi ɗi o tokkata, moƴƴinee laabi makko.
Omo waajoo nder daane toowne, omo wi'a himɓe: —Ɓurɗo kam baawɗe no wara gaɗa am. Miin, mi fotaay baa to turotoomi ngam fiirtude ɓoggi paɗe makko.
Miin, ndiyam ngaɗirananmi on *batisma, amma kanko kay, *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo o waɗiranta on *batisma.
Nder balɗe Yahaaya waɗanannoo himɓe *batisma, Iisa wari, ƴuwi Nasaratu nder leydi Galili. Yahaaya waɗani mo *batisma nder maayo Urdun.
Wakkati o umminoo o darii nder ndiyam ɗam, sey o hi'i kammu omtii, *Ruuhu Alla wari nder nanndi wuugaanu, jippii dow makko.
Daane gom ƴuwi dow wi'i: « Aan woni Ɓiyam korsuɗo, aan naniranmi belɗum. »
Wakkati mum da, *Ruuhu jippiiɗo dow makko oon, soggi mo yaari nder ladde yeeruure.
Balɗe makko lasooji ɗiɗi toon, Ibiliisa no sii'oo mo, omo hakkune dabbaaji ladde, maleykaaɓe no ngollana mo.
Balɗe seɗɗa gaɗa uddol Yahaaya, Iisa ummii, yehi Galili. Omo waajoo *Habaru lobbo ƴuwɗo to Alla.
Omo wi'a himɓe: —Wakkati doomaaɗo oon yottake, Laamu Alla ɓadake. Tuubee, ngoonɗinee *Habaru lobbo.
Nyannde gom, Iisa no fiiloo takkol peta Galili. Sey o hi'i nanngooɓe liƴƴi ɗiɗo gom: Simon inndirteeɗo Piyer he minyum Andiire, no paɗɗa taaruuji mum'en.
Sey Iisa wari to maɓɓe wi'i ɓe: —Ngaree, tokkee kam, mi waɗan on nanngooɓe himɓe.
Wakkati mum da ɓe mboppi taaruuji maɓɓe, ɓe tokki mo.
O yehi yeeso seɗɗa, sey o hi'i Yakuuba ɓii-Jebede he minyum Yahaaya no nder laana ndiyam mum'en, iɓe moƴƴina taaruuji maɓɓe.
Kamɓe duu no Iisa noddirnoo ɓe, sey ɓe acci baabiiɓe Jebede he gollooɓe mum, ɓe tokki mo ɓe ndilli.
Iisa e jaɓuɓe tokkude ɗum njehi Kafarnahum. *Nyalaane fowteteene gom Iisa naati nder *waajordu Kafarnahum, fuɗɗi waajaade.
Waaju makko haayɗini hettinaniiɓe mo. Ngam o waajoraaki ɓe hano no jannginooɓe *Tawreeta mbaajorto, amma he baawɗe o waajorii ɓe.
Nder *waajordu nduun no tawa gorko gom, mo ginnaaru woni dow mum no tampina. Sey ginnaaru nduun huuɓi,
wi'i: —Iisa mo Nasaratu, ɗume ngiɗaa waɗude min? A warii faa mbaraa min naa? Miɗo anndi moy woni ma, a Ceniiɗo ƴuwɗo to Alla !
Sey Iisa laayani ginnaaru nduun, sajiti he mayru wi'i ndu: —Maɓɓu hunnduko maa, takkita mo !
Wakkati mum da ginnaaru nduun dimmbiri gorko oon he semmbe, ndu huuɓi sanne, ndu takkitii mo.

Ɗum haayɗini jama'aare ndeen fuu. Himɓe tokki, no ƴamodira, no mbi'a: —Ɗume woni ɗum nee kaden? Ɗume woni anndal kesal jannginiraangal he baawɗe ngaal nee? Omo dawrana baa ginnaaji, iɗi ɗowtanoo mo duu.
Wakkati gooto habaru Iisa sankitii nder leydi Galili fuu.
Wakkati Iisa wurtinoo *waajordu Kafarnahum, Yakuuba e Yahaaya tokki mo ɓe njaadi wuro Simon Piyer he Andiire'en.
Eso Simon Piyer debbo no fukkii, no wondi wulowulo. No Iisa yottii naatiri ɓaade Simon Piyer, o waɗana filla rafi cellal debbo oon.
Iisa yehi to debbo oon, nanngi junngo makko, ummini mo. Wakkati mum da wulowulo ngoon heli, o yamɗiti. O ummii, o jaɓɓii ɓe.
Futuro nyannde mum, gaɗa janki naange, himɓe tinni no ngadda nyawɓe mum'en he wonduɓe he ginnaaji to Iisa.
Wuro ngoon fuu hawri dammbugal ɓaade Simon'en.
Iisa nyawti himɓe heewɓe, nyawɓe nyawuuji feere-fereeji. O riiwi ginnaaji keewɗi. Iɗi anndi mo amma o haɗi ɗi haalude.
Iisa ummii illa subaka kecco, wurtii wuro Simon Piyer'en. O yehi nder nokkuure yeewne gom to neɗɗo fuu walaa, o waɗi ko du'aade.
Simon Piyer he wondunooɓe he mum gom ummii, tinni no tefa mo.
Wakkati ɓe ngiitowi to o woni, ɓe ngari ɓe mbi'i mo: —Toy ngonnoɗaa ko himɓe fuu no tefe?
Sey Iisa wi'i ɓe: —En njah nder gure ɓadiiɗe gom, mi waajoo toon duu, ngam majjum waɗi ngarmi.
Iisa fiilii leydi Galili fuu. O riiwi ginnaaji dow himɓe. O waajii nder *baajorɗi leydi Galili fuu.
Nyannde gom gorko ceppinɗo gom wari, hofi yeeso Iisa, wi'i mo: —Nde nii a jaɓi, aɗa waawi yamɗintinde kam !
Yurmeene ceppinɗo oon nanngi Iisa, nden Iisa foorti junngo mum, meemi mo, wi'i: —Mi jaɓi, yamɗitin !
Wakkati mum da, ceppam ɗaam ƴuwi he gorko oon, o nyawti.
Iisa sallimii mo, amma fooɗi nowru makko,
wi'i mo: —Hakkila, to haalan ɗum neɗɗo fuu. Umma, yah holloy hoore maa *cakkanoowo Alla mooɗon, ngaɗaa cakkol ngol *Muusa tilsini waɗee, ngam hollude himɓe ko sikka fuu walaa a yamɗiti.

Amma no o dilliri to Iisa, o fuɗɗi sankitidde habaru oon. Iisa waɗi wakkati, wurtataako naata huɓeere gom. Himɓe fuu no kollira mo, ngam filla nyawtol ceppinɗo oo sankitake nokku fuu. Nder nokkuuje jeewɗe tan o woni omo jooɗo. Amma ɗum fuu haɗaay jama'aare he jama'aare no ƴuwa nokku fuu no wara to makko.
Balɗe seɗɗa gaɗa jonnde Iisa nder nokkuuje jeewɗe, o warti Kafarnahum. Himɓe nani ko o warti, omo nder suudu makko.
Jama'aare ɗuunde wari hawri dammbugal makko, faa walaa to neɗɗo tuttata joode baa seɗɗa. Iisa tinni no waajoo ɓe dow haala Alla.
Himɓe gom ngari to makko, ɓe ngardi he bonnguujo gom. Worɓe nayo ndoondii mo dow kooƴirngal maayɓe.

Jama'aare heewi nokkuure ndeen faa walaa to ɓe tokkira, ɓe njottina bonnguujo oon to Iisa. Sey ɓe ƴeenyi suudu nduun, ɓe kunci ndu dey-dey to fotata he to Iisa darii, ɓe njuri bonnguujo oon, omo foorti dow kooƴirngal maayɓe.
Wakkati Iisa hi'unoo no goonɗinol maɓɓe foti, o wi'i bonnguujo oon: —Higo, hakkeeji maa njaafaama.
Sey jannginooɓe *Tawreeta jooɗinooɓe ɗon tinni no miiloo nder ɓerɗe mum'en no mbi'a:
—Ɗume waɗi gorko oo no haalira nii? O bonni innde Alla ! Moy waawi yaafaade hakke se hanaa Alla?
Wakkati mum da Iisa faami miilooji maɓɓe, wi'i ɓe: —Ɗume waɗi ko oɗon miiloo ir miilooji ɗii nder ɓerɗe mooɗon?
Ɗume ɓuri hoyde hakkune wi'ude bonnguujo oo: « Hakkeeji mum njaafaama » naa o ummoo, o hooƴa kooƴirngal ngaal, o dilla?
Amma, miɗo hiɗi paamon ko *Ɓii-Neɗɗo no jogii baawɗe yaafaade hakkeeji himɓe nder duuniyaaru nduu. Nden, o wi'i bonnguujo oon:
—Aan, umma, hooƴu kooƴirngal maayɓe ngal ngaddiraɗaa, kootaa.
Wakkati mum da gorko oon ummii yeeso himɓe fuu, hooƴi ngal, dilli. Ɗum haayɗini ɓe, ɓe fuu, ɓe tinni iɓe njetta Alla, iɓe mbi'a: —Abada min ngi'aay ir ɗum !
Iisa ummii wuro, soƴƴii dow peta Galili. Jama'aare no wara to makko, omo waajoo ɓe.
Nyannde gom jaɓoowo janngal gom bi'eteeɗo *Lewi ɓii-Alfee no jooɗii nder suudu janngal. Wakkati Iisa yawtannoo, sey hi'i mo, wi'i mo: —Tokkam ! Lewi ummii, tokki mo.
Nyannde gom Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum no nyaama nder suudu Lewi. *Jaɓooɓe janngal gom, he ɓooyɓe nder gaɗol hakke, heewɓe no njooɗodii Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum, iɓe nyaamda. Iri maɓɓe heewɓe tokki Iisa.
Wakkati jannginooɓe *Tawreeta gom, jeyaaɓe nder hawriine *Fariisa'en, ngi'unoo ɗum, ɓe mbi'i *aahiiɓe Iisa: —Ɗume waɗi omo nyaamda he *jaɓooɓe janngal, he waɗooɓe hakke ɓee?
Wakkati Iisa nanunoo haalaaji maɓɓe, o wi'i ɓe: —Nyawɗo haajaa cawroowo hanaa jamɗuɗo. Mi waraay noddude miilooɓe kam'en no dartiiɓe, amma mi waraana ngam annduɓe kam'en no waɗooɓe hakke.

Nyannde gom aahiiɓe Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma he *Fariisa'en no cuumii, sey himɓe gom ngari to Iisa, ƴami mo, mbi'i: —Ko waɗi aahiiɓe Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma he *aahiiɓe *Fariisa'en no cuumoo, amma *aahiiɓe maaɗa kay cuumataako?
Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Warɓe ɓanngal no mbaawi suumaade wakkati ɓaŋuɗo oon wondi he maɓɓe naa? Nde nii ɓaŋuɗo oon no wondi he maɓɓe, ɓe cuumataako.
Amma nyalaaɗe ngaran ɗe ɓaŋuɗo oon suutetee hakkune maɓɓe. Nder balɗe ɗeen ɓe cuumoto.
Baa gooto nyootataa lefol kesol he koltal kinngal. Nde joomum waɗi ɗum, lefol kesol ngool serkata koltal kinngal ngaal, cerkol ngool ɓeydoo.

Kaden duu, walaa loowoowo cabiijam kesam nder sumalleeji kiɗɗi. Nde joomum waɗii ɗum, cabiijam ɗaam no fusan ɗi, joomum mursa ɗam, kanƴam he sumalleeji ɗiin fuu. Cabiijam kesam nder sumalleeji kesi loowetee !
*Nyalaane fowteteene gom, Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum ummii, no peddita gese alkamaaje. Iɓe caka yaadu sey *aahiiɓe ɓeen puɗɗi no mborsoo camme ɗeen.
Nden *Fariisa'en mbi'i mo: —Ndaa, ko waɗi *aahiiɓe maaɗa no ngaɗa ko haɗaa nder *nyalaane fowteteene?
Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Ndenne on njanngaay ko Daawda waɗunoo, wakkati kanko he yaadiraaɓe makko ndafanoo?

Nder jamaanu *cakkanoowo Alla mawɗo gom bi'eteeɗo Abiyatar, Daawda naati nder suudu Alla, o adi buuru ittanaaɗo Alla oon, o nyaami, o hokki mo yaadiraaɓe makko. Tawi duu nder *Tawreeta wi'aama ko *cakkanooɓe Alla tan kaani nyaamude mo.
Kaden duu, *nyalaane fowteteene himɓe waɗanaa, amma hanaa himɓe ngaɗaa ngam mayre.
Ndenne, *Ɓii-Neɗɗo woni jom *nyalaane fowteteene ndeen, kayre he hoore mayre.
Nyannde gom Iisa naati *waajordu. Gorko gom mo junngo mum waati no tawa nder mayru.
*Fariisa'en wonɓe nder mayru fuu no kora Iisa, ngi'a nde o nyawtan gorko oon nder *nyalaane fowteteene ndee, nden ɓe keɓa ko ɓe pelirta mo.
Iisa wi'i jom junngo waanngo oon ummoo, daroo yeeso himɓe fuu.
Sey o ƴami ɓe, o wi'i: —Nder *nyalaane fowteteene ɗume haani waɗeede? Ko wooɗi naa ko boni? Dannude neɗɗo naa accude mo o maaya? Ɓe calii jaabaade mo.
Iisa daari ɓe, ɓe fuu, ɓerne makko metti. O wanni ngam tiiɗal nyiraaku maɓɓe. Nden o wi'i gorko oon: —Foortu junngo maa ! Gorko oon foorti junngo mum, ngo yamɗiti.
Wakkati *Fariisa'en wonɓe nder *waajordu nduun mburtii, ɓe njehi law law, ɓe caawodirowi he Hirudus'en dow no ɓe mbardata Iisa.
Iisa ummii, he *aahiiɓe mum, ɓe ponndi peta Galili. Jama'aare mawne no tokki mo.
Nder maɓɓe no tawa ƴuwɓe Galili, *Ursaliima, Yahudiya, Idumiya, lettugal maayo Urdun, he seraaji Tirus he Sidon. Jama'aaje ɗee fuu nani ko o waɗannoo, ɓe ndillowi ɓe ngari to makko.
Ngam doggude himɓe njaaɓa mo, Iisa waɗi *aahiiɓe mum ngaddana ɗum laanel ndiyam gom.
Nyawɓe heewɓe no tefa yottaade mo, meema mo ngam o nyawtiino himɓe ɗuɓɓe.
Wakkati fuu mo ɓe ginnaaji bonɗi ngoni dow mum'en, ngi'ii mo, no kofo yeeso makko, no kuuɓa, no mbi'a: —Aan, a *Ɓii-Alla !
Amma omo hajoo ɓe ngam to ɓe mbanngin moy o woni.
Nyannde gom Iisa ƴeenyi waamnde, o noddi ɓe o haajaa nder tokkuɓe mo ɓeen, ngara to makko.
Ɓe ngari to makko, o suɓii sappo e ɗiɗo nder maɓɓe. O waɗi ɓe *lilaaɓe makko, laatiiɓe wakkati fuu no hadde makko. O suɓake ɓe duu ngam omo hiɗi, o lila ɓe, ɓe mbaajowoo himɓe.
O hokki ɓe baawɗe riiwude ginnaaji duu.
*Lilaaɓe makko sappo e ɗiɗo, ɓe o suɓi ɓeen nii: Simon mo o inndiri Piyer,
Yakuuba ɓii-Jebede he minyum Yahaaya sowirteeɓe Bowanerges kam woni nannduɓe he riggaaŋo,
Andiire, Filipa, Bartolome, Matta, Tomas, Yakuuba ɓii-Alfee, Tadde, Simon kiranoowo suudu baaba e
Yahuuda Iskariyot mo yahde yeeso jammboytoo Iisa.
Iisa hooti wuro, jama'aare wari, hawriti dow makko kaden faa kanko he *aahiiɓe makko fuu anndaa no ngatta ko nyaama.
Wakkati jeydaaɓe Iisa nanunoo himɓe no mbi'a: « Hoore Iisa sottake », ɓe ngarani mo.
Jannginooɓe *Tawreeta ƴuwɓe *Ursaliima gom ngari, no mbi'a Be'eljebul, hooreejo ginnaaji, woni dow makko. Kanko hokki mo baawɗe riiwude ginnaaji ɗiin.
Dow haalaaji ɗii, Iisa nootii ɓe, wi'i: —Ibiliisa no waawi riiwude Ibiliisa naa?
Nde nii laamu leydi he hoore mum feccake, feccere worre no habda he ndeeto, leydi ndiin no daroo naa?
Nde wuro senndake, ingo laatoo naa?
Nde nii Ibiliisa no habda he hoore mum, laamu mum feccake, hanti he maggu.
Kaden neɗɗo fuu waawaa naati wuro jom semmbe, teeta njawdi makko, nde nii hanaa no artu haɓɓi mo non ginan, nden hooƴa njawdi ndiin fuu.
Goonga kaalananmi on hakke he haala yawaare ko waɗanaa Alla fuu no mbaawi yaafeede.
Amma neɗɗo fuu bonnuɗo innde *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, yaafataake abada, ngam hakke duumotooɗo joomum waɗi.
Iisa wi'i kujje ɗee fuu ngam himɓe mbi'ii o walanaa hoore makko, ginnaaru o wondi.
Nden Iisa ƴami ɓe, wi'i: —Moy'en ngoni inna am he rimdaaɓe am?
O daari jooɗiiɓe no piilii mo ɓeen, o wi'i: —Ndaaree inna am e rimdaaɓe am nii.
Gaɗoowo muuyɗe Alla, kam woni dimdaaɗo am, kam woni inna am.
Iisa soƴƴii nyannde gom dow peta Galili no waajoo. Jama'aare mawne gom wari, fiilii mo. Ɗuuɗol himɓe ngool waɗi o naati laana ndiyam, o jooɗii. Jama'aare ndeen duu no darii hunnduko peta ngaan.
Omo waajoroo ɓe kippi haalaaji keewɗi, omo wi'a ɓe:
—Kettinee ! Aawoowo gom dilli nyannde gom faa aawowa aawdiiri mum.
Nder aawre ndeen, gabbe gom caami sera laawol. Nden pooli ngari coppi ɗe.
Gere majje caami nder korkaaƴe to leydi ɗuuɗaa. Ɗe puɗilawi ngam luggiɗaa sanne.
Amma wakkati naange wulnoo ndeen, ɗe ɗayli, ɗe njoori ngam ɗe ngaɗaay ɗaɗi.
Gere majje caami to kebbe puɗata. Kebbe ɗeen mawni, ɓillii ɗe, ɗe ndimaay.
Gere majje duu caami nder leydi lobbiri, puɗi, mawni, ndimi. Wassaaŋo gom rimi camme woronja, wonngo lasooji tati, wonngo duu hemre.
Jom nowru nanooru fuu, nana !
Wakkati Iisa wonnoo feere mum, *aahiiɓe makko sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen he woɓɓe nder piiliiɓe mo ƴami mo maana kippol haala ngool.
O jaabii ɓe o wi'i: —Onon, Alla hokkii on baawɗe anndude ko suuɗi dow habaru Laamu mum. Amma ɓe tawaaka hakkune mooɗon kippi haala kaalantee huune fuu.
Ngam majjum waɗi: Baa nde ɓe ndaari, ɓe ngi'ataa, baa nde ɓe nani, ɓe paamataa, ngam nde nii ɓe paamii, ɓe tuuban, ɓe njaafee.
Ndenne, nde nii on paamaay kippol haala ngool, noy paamirton ɗiito?
Aawoowo oon, haala Alla aawata.
Sera laawol to aawdiiri ndiin saami woni nanuɓe haala Alla, amma wakkati mum da Ibiliisa wari, itti ka nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
Korkaaƴe to aawdiiri ndiin saami woni nanuɓe haala Alla, njaɓɓorii ka welwelo wakkati mum da.
Amma ngam ka waɗaay ɗaɗi nder maɓɓe, ɓe nanngan ka wakkati seɗɗa tan. Nde nii ɓe ɓillake naa nde ɓe torraama ngam makka, ɓe mboppan ka wakkati mum da.
To kebbe puɗidi aawdiiri ndiin woni nanuɓe haala Alla,
amma sakkulla duuniyaaru, suuno njawdi, he muuyɗe ɓerne naatanta ɓe, kuma haala Alla, ka laatoo ndimara.
Leydi lobbiri to aawdiiri ndiin saami woni nanuɓe haala Alla dey njaɓi ka, naforii ka faa ɓe ngaɗi barke: Woɓɓe kile woronja, woɓɓe kile lasooji tati, woɓɓe duu kile hemre.
Iisa ɓeydi wi'ude ɓe kaden: —No woodi kuɓɓoowo fitilla dey hippa tummbude dow makka naa sorna ka ley leeso? Hanaa on ɓilan ka naa?
Huune fuu ko suuɗi no wanngowan nyannde gom. Ko soomaa fuu duu no somtetee.
Jom nowru nanooru fuu, nana !
Korkitee noppi mooɗon faa wooɗa ! Etirgal ngal etirton, kanngal etiranteɗon faa duu ɓeydaneɗon.
Jogiiɗo fuu no ɓeydantee. Amma mo walaa oon, baa seɗɗa mo jogii oon, no teetetee.
—No Laamu Alla tinndinirtee nii: Ngu nanndaana he neɗɗo biccuɗo aawdiiri mum nder ngesa.
Balɗe no njaha, balɗe no ngarta aawdiiri ndiin fuɗi, mawni. Amma neɗɗo oo anndaa baa seɗɗa no waɗi ko ndi mawni.
Leydi ndiin funni aawdiiri ndiin, ndi fiyi ƴommbe, wutaanu tokki, gaɗa mum, gabbe tokki.
Wakkati ngesa ngaan ɓenndowi, sey neɗɗo oo adi kettirngal mum, hetti nga, ngam nga foti hetteede.
He ɗume mbaawten nanndinde Laamu Alla kaden? Tinndinoore ndeye tinnidirten ngu?
Laamu Alla no nanndi he wabbere mutaari, ɓurde gabbe fuu famɗude.
Amma nde nii nde aawaama, nde fuɗan, nde mawna faa nde laatoo lekki mawki. Lekki kiin waɗa licce mawɗe, ɗe cukka faa pooli no mbaawi nyiɓi cuuɗi mum'en ley majje.
Iisa naforake iri kippi haala keewɗi, omo gollira ɗi, dey-dey no jama'aare ndeen waawirta faamude.
Walaa fuu ko o haalani ɓe ko hanaa nder kippol haala o haalii ɗum, amma wakkati o tawa kanko tan sey *aahiiɓe ɓeen, omo fiirtana ɓe maana majji.
Laasara, Iisa wi'i *aahiiɓe mum: —En pedditin peta ngaa, koɗowen fonngo gooto.
Ɓe ummii ɓe acci jama'aare ndeen, ɓe naati nder laana ka Iisa wonnoo nder mum kaan, iɓe peddita, laanaaji gom no tokki ɓe.
Henndu sattunu gom ummini benkeƴƴe no piya laana kaan faa ka hosi rufude.
Iisa no gaɗa, no wahii wawlaare, no ɗaanii. Sey *aahiiɓe ɓeen pindini mo, mbi'i mo: —Moodibbo, a faalaaka maayen naa?
Nden Iisa ummii, sappii henndu nduun, wi'i benkeƴƴe ɗeen: —Fatti ! Ndaree ! Henndu nduun darii, joonkay ɗum waɗi siw nokku fuu.
Iisa wi'i *aahiiɓe ɓeen: —Ko waɗi kulirɗon nii? Noy waɗi on ngoonɗinaay naa?
Kulkulal manngal nanngi ɓe, ɓe tokki iɓe mbi'odira: —Moy woni neɗɗo oo, mo baa henndu e ndiyam no ɗowtanoo ɗum?
Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum ummii, pedditi peta Galili, panndowi dow fonngo leydi Gerasa.
Wakkati Iisa jippinoo laana kaan, sey gorko gom mo ginnaaru bondu woni dow mum wurtowi nder annyeeje, no wara har makko.
Gorko oo nder annyeeje ɗeen jooɗii. Neɗɗo fuu waawaa haɓɓi mo, ngam baa o haɓɓiraama callali, ɗi nanngataa mo.
Himɓe no mbownoo haɓɓirde koyɗe he juuɗe makko callali, o taƴa ɗi, o hela jamɗe ɗeen. Ndenne, neɗɗo fuu waawaa faddii mo.
Jemma he nyalooma nder annyeeje naa ley baamle ɗeen o woni, omo huuɓa, omo nawna hoore makko he kaaƴe.
Illa to o hollirnoo Iisa, o doggi, o wari, o hofi yeeso Iisa.
Iisa ƴami ndu, wi'i: —Noy mbi'eteɗaa? Ndu jaabii mo, ndu wi'i: —Ujunaaji ngam miɗen ɗuuɗi.
Nden ɗi ŋaarii Iisa faa noy walaa, to wurtin ɗi nder leydi Gerasa.
Nyannde mum ɗum fotodiri, hadde maɓɓe ɗon da, sewre girooji mawne gom no durannoo hoore waamnde.
Sey ginnaaji ɗiin ŋaarii mo, o acca ɗum'en naata nder girooji ɗiin.
Iisa jaɓi, acci ɗi. Ginnaaji ɗiin takkiti gorko oon, naatowi nder girooji ɗiin. Sewre ndeen fuu doggi, saamowi nder peta Galili ngaan, njoolii. Sewre girooji ndeen no waɗa hano girooji ujunaaji ɗiɗi.
Durooɓe majji ndoggi, kaalanowi himɓe wuro ngoon he himɓe seraaji maggo ko hewtii ɗum'en. Himɓe njehi ƴeewowi ko waɗi.
Ɓe ngari to Iisa, ɓe ngi'i gorko mo ginnaaji ngonnoo dow mum oon no jooɗii hadde Iisa. Omo holti, hakkillo makko duu no huuɓi. Kulal nanngi ɓe.
Himɓe ɓe ɗum waɗunoo yeeso mum'en pillanii warɓe ndarii ɓeen huune fuu ko waɗi.
Warɓe ɓeen ŋaarii Iisa dilla nder leydi mum'en.
Wakkati Iisa naatannoo laana kaan, gorko nyawtaaɗo oon wi'i mo: —Mi eeli ma, accu mi tokke.
Iisa jaɓaay, wi'i mo: —Hootu wuro maa nder koreeji maa, kaalanaa ɓe ko Joomiraawo waɗani ma, he no o yurmorii ma.
Nden gorko nyawtaaɗo oon dilli, fuɗɗi no sankita habaru oon nder leydi Gure-sappo gonɗe hakkune hoore huɗo he lettugal peta Galili. Ɗum haayɗini himɓe fuu.
Iisa naati laana soƴƴitii gaɗa koyɗe mum. Jama'aare mawne gom wari hawri to makko takkol peta Galili.
Wakkati Jayrus, gooto nder hooreeɓe *waajordu wuro ngoon, hi'unoo Iisa, o wari, o hofi yeeso Iisa.
O ŋaarii Iisa, o wi'i: —Ɓiyam debbo woni no habda yonki. War ! Yowu junngo maa dow makko, heɓa o daɗa, o wuura !
Iisa ummii tokki Jayrus. Jama'aare mawne tokki mo faa himɓe no njaaɓodira.
Debbo gom mo ƴiiƴam sukkitani ko waɗata duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi no wonnoo hakkune maɓɓe.
O tampi sanne, o yehi to sawrooɓe heewɓe, ɓe nyaamdi njawdi makko fuu. O heɓaay jam, nyaw nguun no nii no ɓeydoo.
Wakkati mum da, ƴiiƴam ɗaam darii, o nani jam nder ɓanndu makko.
Iisa duu nani semmbe gom ƴuwi he muuɗum. O yeeƴitii hakkune jama'aare ndeen, o wi'i: —Moy meemii jabbaare am?
*Aahiiɓe makko mbi'i mo: —A hi'i jama'aare hawri, no ɓillii ma dey ƴamaa, mbi'aa moy meemii ma?
Iisa tinni no daara nder fiiliiɓe ɗum ɓeen fuu, ngam hi'a meemuɗo ɗum oon.
Debbo meemuɗo Iisa oon huli, no diwna ngam no anndi ko waɗi. O wari, o hofii yeeso Iisa, o haalani mo fuu no waɗi.
Nden Iisa wi'i mo: —Banndam debbo, goonɗinol maa danni ma. Yah he jam ! A daɗii nyaw maaɗa.
Wakkati Iisa haaldannoo he debbo oon, sey himɓe gom ngari ƴuwi wuro Jayrus, mbi'i Jayrus: —Ko tampintaa moodibbo oo kaden ! Ɓiya heddaaki.
Amma Iisa hettinaaki haala maɓɓe, nden o wi'i Jayrus: —Taa hulu, goonɗin tan !
Iisa accaay neɗɗo fuu yaada he mum wuro Jayrus se hanaa Piyer, Yakuuba he minyum Yahaaya.
Wakkati ɓe njottinoo wuro Jayrus, Iisa tawi jama'aare. Himɓe no mboya, no cimoo.
Nden o naati, o wi'i ɓe: —Ɗume woni bojji ɗii e hakkillo ummiingo ngoo nee? Suka oon maayaay, o ɗaanii tan.
Ɓe njali jaleeɗe yawaare. O waɗi ɓe mburtina, ɓe fuu. Nden ɓe naati dow suka oon, kanko Iisa oon, Jayrus e deekum, he *aahiiɓe tato ɓeen.
Iisa nanngi junngo suka oon, wi'i mo: —Talita kuum ! Kam woni: « Suka debbo, umma ! »
Ɓii-Jayrus debbo oo, duuɓi mum sappo e ɗiɗi. O ummii wakkati mum da, omo dilla. Ɗum haaynii himɓe ɓeen sanne sanne.
Nden Iisa wi'i to ɓe kaalan ɗum neɗɗo fuu. O wi'i kaden suka oon hokkee ko nyaamee.
Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum ndilli wuro Jayrus, pa'i Nasaratu, wuro ngo Iisa mawnunoo nder mum.

*Nyalaane fowteteene jaaƴi, o fuɗɗi waajaade nder *waajordu Nasaratu. Jama'aare hettinaniide waaju makko fuu haayɗinaama. Nden ɓe keddii iɓe mbi'a: —Toy o heɓi kujje ɗee fuu? Moy hokki mo anndal? Noy o heɓiri baawɗe waɗude kaayɗe ɗee?

Hanaa ya kanko woni sekkeejo oo? Hanaa kanko woni ɓii-Mariyaama naa? Hanaa kanko woni mawnu Yakuuba, Yoses, Yahuuda he Simon'en? Minyiraaɓe makko rewɓe no ngondi he meeɗen. Kujje ɗee ngaɗi ɓe calii Iisa.
Amma Iisa jaabii ɓe wi'i ko annabiijo no teddinee nokku fuu sey nder wuro mum, hakkune rimdaaɓe mum, he nder ɓaade mum'en.
Ko ƴaari junngo makko ngo o yowi dow nyawɓe gom, o nyawti ɓe, Iisa heɓaay waɗi haayne baa worre ɗon.
Rafi goonɗinol maɓɓe haayɗini Iisa sanne. Iisa ummii naati gure cakaaje ɗeen fuu, omo waajoo.
Nyannde gom o noddi *lilaaɓe makko sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen, o liliri ɓe ɗiɗɗiɗo. O hokki ɓe baawɗe riiwude ginnaaji,
o wi'i ɓe: —Nde nii oɗon njaha, to kooƴee huune fuu, se hanaa cabbi mooɗon. To kooƴee nyaamdu, mbasu naa ceede.
Ɓornee paɗe mooɗon, to ƴaaree toggooje ɗiɗi.
Nder wuro fuu ngo ngarɗon, ɓaade fuu nde njippiɗon nder mum, njooɗee nder mayre sey nyannde ndilloton.
Nde on ngari nder nokkuure, nde nii himɓe njaɓɓaaki on naa kettinanaaki on, nde nii on ummake ndilludu, piɗɗee sollaare koyɗe mooɗon ngam ɗum laatanoo ɓe seeda gacce maɓɓe.
*Aahiiɓe ɓeen ummii, njehi no mbaajoo, no mbi'a himɓe tuuba.
Ɓe ndiiwi ginnaaji ɗuɗɗi, ɓe mbuji himɓe heewɓe nebbam, himɓe ɓeen nyawti.
Innde Iisa walaa fuu to yehaay. *Hirudus, laamiiɗo leydi Galili, nani habaru Iisa no waɗee. No woodi wi'ooɓe Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma ummitii. Ngam majjum waɗi, omo waɗa kaayɗe.
Woɓɓe no mbi'a o Eliya. Woɓɓe duu no mbi'a o annabiijo nii non hano annabiiɓe aranɓe.
Wakkati *Hirudus nani haalaaji ɗii, o tinni omo ƴama hoore makko omo wi'a: —Yahaaya mo taƴunoomi hoore mum oon, kam ummitii, naa noy?
Hirudiya duu no jogitani Yahaaya ngam sabbu ko o wi'i *Hirudus ɗum. O tefi laawol fuu no o waɗata, o waɗa Yahaaya waree. Amma o heɓaay laawol majjum,

ngam *Hirudus no teddina Yahaaya sanne. Omo anndi duu ko Yahaaya gorko ceniiɗo non, dartiiɗo. Omo hakkilii he makko sanne. Haalaaji ɗi Yahaaya haaldata he makko no jiiɓodira hakkillo makko. Amma fuu nii haɗataa omo nana belɗum hettinaade haalaaji Yahaaya.

Balɗe no njaha balɗe no ngarta faa nyannde gom ɗum fotodiri he nyalaane nde *Hirudus rimaa. Nyannde mum *Hirudus hawri himɓe ɓadiiɓe ɗum. O hawri hawjiiɓe laamu, o hawri hooreeɓe soogeeji, ngam ɓe kiirto wuro makko. Nyannde mum duu Hirudiya heɓi laawol no waɗata ko Yahaaya waree.
Jama'aare ndee fuu wari hawri, sey ɓii-Hirudiya debbo naati no woma. Ɗum weli *Hirudus he warɓe kawri ɓeen fuu. *Hirudus ummii, wi'i suka debbo oon: —Haalanan ko ngiɗaa mi waɗane.
*Hirudus huni, wi'i kam no hokkan suka debbo oo huune fuu ko eeli ɗum, baa se tawi feccere leydi mum non.
Suka debbo oon wurtii, wi'i innum: —Ɗume eelanmi? Nden Hirudiya, inna suka debbo oon jaabii ɓiyum, wi'i: —Hoore Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma !
Sey suka debbo oon doggi, yehi to *Hirudus wi'i mo: —Joonin joonin, miɗo hiɗi hoore Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma waddee ɗo nder le'al !
Wakkati *Hirudus nanunoo haala kaa, ɓerne makko metti faa hanaa seɗɗa. O hiɗaa egginde haala makko ngam hunayeere nde o waɗi yeeso noddaaɓe ɓeen fuu.
Nder soogeeji doomooɓe mo ɓeen, o lili soogeeru gom, taƴowa hoore Yahaaya, waddaa. Soogeeru nduun yehi, taƴi hoore Yahaaya,
tummbi nder le'al, waddi, hokki suka debbo oon. Suka debbo oon duu hokki nde innum.
Wakkati aahiiɓe Yahaaya ɓeen nanunoo ɗum, ɓe ngari, ɓe kooƴi ɓanndu Yahaaya, ɓe mooɓowi.
Nyannde gom *lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen ngari kaalani Iisa, to kam'en mbaajii he ko kam'en ngaɗi.
Himɓe no njaha, no ngarta dow maɓɓe faa ɓe keppi fuu to ɓe njooɗoo ɓe nyaama. Sey Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Ngaree njehen to yeewii gom, heɓa baa powton.
Nden ɓe naati laana, kamɓe tan, ɓe ndilli.
Amma wakkati ɓe ndillannoo, himɓe heewɓe annditii to ɓe pa'i. Nden ɓe ƴuwri seraaji ɗiin fuu, ɓe ndoggi, ɓe artowi ɓe.
Wakkati Iisa wurtinoo laana kaan, o hi'i jama'aare ndeen, ɓe njurminii mo sanne, ngam iɓe nanndi baali ɗi ngalaa duroowo. O tinni omo waajoo ɓe
dow kujje keewɗe faa jenngi. Sey *aahiiɓe makko ɓadii, mbi'i mo: —Joonin no ɗon no jennga, nokkuure ndee walaa fuy, ladde non.
Accu jama'aare ndeen sankitoo, ɓe naata nder gure he nokkuuje ɓadiiɗe, ngam ɓe coodowa ko nyaamee.
Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Onon he ko'e mooɗon, kokkee ɓe ko ɓe nyaamata ! Nden ɓe mbi'i: —Aɗa hiɗi min coodanowa ɓe buuru tammaaje cardi keme ɗiɗi ɓe nyaama naa?
Sey Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Njehee ndaarowee, buuruuje foti njogiɗon? Wakkati ɓe ndaaroynoo, ɓe ngarti ɓe mbi'i Iisa buuruuje joy he liƴƴi ɗiɗi, kam'en njogii.
Nden Iisa wi'i *aahiiɓe mum, ɓe njonna jama'aare ndeen cefe cefe dow huɗo hecco ɗon da.
*Aahiiɓe ɓeen njonniri jama'aare ndeen cefe hemre hemre, he cefe woygu woygu.
Iisa hooƴi buuruuje joy ɗeen e liƴƴi ɗiɗi ɗiin, tiggitii, yetti Alla. Nden o helti buuruuje ɗeen, o hokki *aahiiɓe ɓeen njeddana himɓe. He liƴƴi ɗiin duu, o waɗiri non.
Jama'aare ndeen fuu nyaami faa haari.
*Aahiiɓe ɓeen kawrodiri buuru e liƴƴi koddiiɗum ɗum, ɗum hebbini kandeeje sappo e ɗiɗi.
Nyannde mum worɓe ujunaaji joyo nyaami buuru oon.
Gaɗa nyamnol worɓe ujunaaji joyo ɓeen, Iisa wi'i *aahiiɓe mum naata laana, peddita ardoo ɗum, njaha fonngo gooto hedde Baytisayda. Kanko duu o sallimoo jama'aare ndeen.
O seedi he jama'aare ndeen, o nyakki waamnde faa o du'oo.
Naange yani, laana *aahiiɓe ɓeen no caka peta ngaan. Iisa duu, kam tan no darii dow fonngo ngo ɓe ndillunoo dow mum.
Fajiri wakkati Iisa hi'unoo ko laana *aahiiɓe ɓeen no fotta henndu, awƴaaki makka duu no tampinii. Iisa dilli he koyɗe dow ndiyam ɗaam, tayni ɓe. O hewti ɓe, faa omo tefa yawtude he maɓɓe.
O naati laana kaan, henndu nduun darii. Haayne majjum nanngi *aahiiɓe ɓeen sanne.
Ngam ɓerɗe maɓɓe no bumɗe, ɓe paamaay maana nyamnol worɓe ujunaaji joyo ɓeen.
Ɓe pedditi peta ngaan, ɓe njottii leydi Genesaret, ɓe ndarii.
Wakkati ɓe mburtii laana kaan, himɓe annditi Iisa.
Wonnooɓe toon cankitii nder seraaji ɗiin fuu. Ɓe tinni iɓe ada nyawɓe maɓɓe dow kooƴirɗe maayɓe, iɓe njaara nokku fuu to ɓe nani Iisa woni.

Nokku fuu to Iisa yehi, rumtoowo non, siire non naa nder huɓeere non, o tawan himɓe no pukkina nyawɓe mum'en hunnduko luumo, iɓe eela mo, o acca nyawɓe ɓeen meema baa nii hunnduko jabbaare makko non. Nyawɓe heɓuɓe meemii mo ɓeen fuu nyawti.
Nyannde gom *Fariisa'en he jannginooɓe *Tawreeta gom ƴuwi *Ursaliima ngari to Iisa.
Nden ɓe ƴami Iisa, ɓe mbi'i: —Ɗume waɗi *aahiiɓe maaɗa tokkataa finaa-tawaaji maamiraaɓe meeɗen, iɓe nyaamira juuɗe tunnuɗe?
Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Munafiki'en ! *Esaaya woofaay sam, wakkati o waɗunoo annabaaku dow mooɗon. Nder maggu Alla wi'i: Himɓe ɓee no mbi'an kam'en no teddina kam, amma ɓerɗe maɓɓe no mboɗɗi kam.
Dewal maɓɓe no meere ngam ko ɓe ngoni iɓe njanngina ɗum to ɓiɓɓe aadama ƴuwi.
Onon *Fariisa'en, oɗon acca tilsinooje Alla, oɗon tokka finaa-tawaa ɓii-aadama.
Oɗon coofi finaa-tawaaji mooɗon he tilsinoore Alla !
Ngam nder *Tawreeta, *Muusa wi'i: Teddin inna maa he bammaa. O wi'i kaden duu: Kuɗuɗo innum naa bammum fuu no haani wareede.
Amma onon, ɗume mbi'oton, se neɗɗo wi'i innum naa bammum: Ko mbaawmi wallirde ma ɗum no « Korban », ko mi sakkanta Alla.
On mbi'an mo, o accaa waɗande inniiko naa baabiiko fuy naa?
Nii ngaɗirton, oɗon ngartira haala Alla meere ngam finaa-tawaaji mooɗon ɗi njannginton sukaaɓe. Ir majjum re'ataa ngonɗon oɗon ngaɗa.
Iisa nodditi jama'aare ndeen wi'i nde: —On fuu, kettinanee kam, paamee ko
huune fuu ko ƴuwi yaasin naati nder ɓanndu neɗɗo hanaa kam watta joomum tunna yeeso Alla. Amma ko wurtotoo nder neɗɗo kam tunninta neɗɗo yeeso Alla. [
Jom nowru nanooru fuu nana !]
Iisa seedi he jama'aare ndeen, warti wuro. *Aahiiɓe makko ngari, ƴami mo maana ko o wi'i ɗum.
Nden o jaabii ɓe o wi'i: —Onon duu, on paamaay naa? On paamaay ko huune fuu ko ƴuwi yaasin, naati ɓanndu neɗɗo, tunnintaa ɗum.
Ɗum naataay nder ɓerne joomum, nder reedu joomum tan ɗum naati, nden ɗum yehee gaɗa wuro. Nder haalaaji ɗii, Iisa no holla ko nyaamdu fuu no laaɓi.
O wi'i *aahiiɓe ɓeen kaden: —Ko wurtotoo ɓerne ɓii-aadama, kam tunninta ɗum.
Ngam nder ɓerne neɗɗo miilooji bonɗi mburtoto hano iri ko semtini, nguyka, ittol yonki,
jeenu, eelgal bonngal, bononda, jammba, golle nyidduɗe, haasidaaku, haala mbonka, mawnitaare, he bahimaare.
Golle bonɗe fuu nder ɓerne ƴuwata, kanƴe duu tunninta neɗɗo.
Iisa ummii, wari weeri leydi Tirus. O jippii nder ɓaade gom, o hiɗaa neɗɗo fuu faama to o woni. Amma ɗum fuu haɗaay himɓe anndi to o woni.
Nden Iisa wi'i mo: —Accu sukaaɓe nyaama faa kaara ginan. Ngam hegaaki neɗɗo hooƴa nyaamdu sukaaɓe faɗɗana dawaaɗi.
Debbo oon jaabii Iisa, wi'i: —Goonga non, Joomam. Amma dawaaɗi duu no nyaama ko sukaaɓe camninta yeeso mum'en.
Sey Iisa wi'i debbo oon: —Ngam njaabaaki maaɗa kii, hootu, ɓiya seedi he ginnaaru nduun.
Debbo oon hooti, tawi ɓiyum seedi he ginnaaru nduun, no fukkii dow leeso.
Iisa ummii leydi Tirus, fa'i leydi Sidon, nden warti har peta Galili, o naati leydi Gure-sappo.
Nder leydi Gure-sappo, o waddanaa gorko paho gom, mo haala mum laaɓaa. O eelaa, o yowa junngo makko dow gorko oon.
Iisa hakkiti paho oon he jama'aare ndeen, watti kolli mum nder noppi paho oon, tutti nder junngo mum, meemi ɗemngal makko.
O tiggitii, o uumi, nden o wi'i paho oon nder aramankoore: —Efata ! Kam woni: « Cukkitee ! »
Wakkati mum da, noppi gorko oon cukkiti, ɗemngal makko yoofaa, haala makko darti.
Nden Iisa wi'i to neɗɗo fuu haalan ɗum goɗɗo. Amma ngam omo haɗa ɓe, waɗi kamɓe duu iɓe ɓeyda sankitidde haala kaan.
Haayne nanngi ɓe faa noy walaa, ɓe tinni iɓe mbi'a: —Golle Iisa fuu no mbooɗi, faa yottii to Iisa no waɗa pahuɓe nana, beebeeɓe duu njeccoo.
Balɗe tati nii ko jama'aare mawne gom wari hawri to Iisa. Jama'aare ndee walaa fuu ko nyaama. Sey Iisa noddi *aahiiɓe mum, wi'i ɓe:
—Himɓe ɓee no njurminii, balɗe tati nii hannden ko iɓe ngondi he am, ɓe ngalaa fuu ko ɓe nyaama.
Nde nii mi acci, ɓe koota ɓe nyaamaay, ɓe tampan sanne dow laawol. Ngam nder maɓɓe no woodi ƴuwɓe to woɗɗi.
Nden *aahiiɓe ɓeen njaabii mo, mbi'i: —Toy keɓeten ko nyamnirten ɓe nder ladde yeeruure ndee?
Iisa ƴami ɓe, wi'i: —Buuruuje foti njogiɗon? Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Buuruuje jeɗɗi.
Nden o wi'i jama'aare ndeen jooɗoo he leydi. O hooƴi buuruuje jeɗɗi ɗeen, o yetti Alla, o helti ɗe, o hokki *aahiiɓe ɓeen njeddani jama'aare ndeen.
Iɓe njoginoo kaden likkoy seɗɗa gom. Iisa adi koy, yetti Alla, wi'i *aahiiɓe ɓeen njeddana ɓe koy, kankoy duu.
Jama'aare ndeen nyaami faa haari. *Aahiiɓe ɓeen kawri kelte ɗeen, ɗe kebbini kandeeje jeɗɗi.
Nyaamuɓe nyannde mum ɓeen, no ngaɗa hano worɓe ujunaaji nayo. Gaɗa mum, Iisa sallimii ɓe,
naddi *aahiiɓe mum laana, fonndi leydi Dalmanuuta.
Nyannde gom *Fariisa'en ngari faa tunna Iisa. Ɓe puɗɗi haaldude he makko, ɓe ƴami mo, o holla ɓe alaama kaayɗiniiɗo ƴuwɗo dow kolloowo ko Alla lili mo.
Sey Iisa uumi, wi'i ɓe: —Ɗume waɗi ko onon himɓe jamaanu oo, oɗon ngiɗi holleede alaama? Goonga kaalananmi on, alaama fuu walaa mo kolleteɗon !
Gaɗa haalaaji ɗii walaa ko o ɓeydi, nden o seedi he maɓɓe, o naati laana, o fonndi fonngo gooto.
Sey *aahiiɓe ɓeen puɗɗi no kaalda, no mbi'a: —Naa ngam eɗen njogii buuruure ndee tan, waɗi o haali haala kaa?
Iisa faami ko ɓe kaalata, nden wi'i ɓe: —Ɗume kaaloton hakkune mooɗon, oɗon mbi'a on ngalaa buuru? Ɗume waɗi ko on paamataa? Naa ɓerɗe mooɗon mbumu non?
Oɗon ngoodi gite, amma on ngi'ataa? Oɗon ngoodi noppi, amma on nanataa? On miccitaaki naa?
Wakkati njeddanmi worɓe ujunaaji joyo ɓeen buuruuje joy ɗeen, kandeeje foti kebbinirɗon ko nyaama hodda ɗum? Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Kandeeje sappo he ɗiɗi.
Iisa ƴami ɓe kaden, wi'i: —Nyannde njeddanmi worɓe ujunaaji nayo buuruuje jeɗɗi ɗeen, kandeeje foti kebbinɗon ko nyaama horii ɗum? Ɓe njaabii Iisa, ɓe mbi'i: —Kandeeje jeɗɗi.
Nden, Iisa wi'i ɓe: —On paamaay faa joonin naa?
Wakkati Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum njottinoo Baytisayda, sey himɓe ngaddani Iisa bumɗo gom. Wadduɓe bumɗo oo, eeli Iisa meema mo.
Iisa nanngi junngo bumɗo oon, hakkiti mo he himɓe, yaari mo gaɗa wuro ngoon. O tutti he gite bumɗo oon, o yowi juuɗe makko dow bumɗo oon, o wi'i: —Aɗa hi'a goɗɗum joonin naa?
Sey bumɗo oon feerti gite mum, wi'i: —Miɗo hi'a himɓe, amma iɓe nga'ani kam hano leɗɗe jehooje nii.
Iisa yowi juuɗe mum dow gite makko kaden. Gorko oon feerti gite mum, sey wumti faa wooɗi, gite makko laaɓi tarr.
Gaɗa mum Iisa wi'i mo: —Hootu, dey to naatu wuro ngoo.
Nyannde gom Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum ummii naati nder gure cakaaje Kaysariya Filipi. Dow laawol o ƴami *aahiiɓe makko o wi'i: —Moy himɓe mbi'ata ngonmi?
Nden ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —No woodi wi'ooɓe a Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma, no woodi wi'ooɓe a Eliya, no woodi wi'ooɓe kaden a gooto nder annabiiɓe.
O ƴami ɓe kaden, o wi'i: —Dey onon nee, moy mbi'oton ngonmi? Sey Piyer jaabii mo, wi'i: —Aan woni *Almasiihu.
Nden Iisa fooɗi noppi maɓɓe wi'i to ɓe kaalan ɗum neɗɗo fuu.

Wakkati Piyer wi'unoo ko Iisa woni *Almasiihu, Iisa fuɗɗi no famtina *aahiiɓe mum, omo wi'a ɓe ko no tilsi *Ɓii-Neɗɗo torree sanne. Ardiiɓe mawɓe, hooreeɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla he jannginooɓe *Tawreeta tottitoo mo. O waree, nden gaɗa balɗe tati o ummitoo.
O daraaki fuu o suuɗaana ɓe goɗɗum. Sey Piyer fooɗi mo senngo, tinni no haalda he makko dow ko o wi'i ɗum.
Nden Iisa hucciti har *aahiiɓe ɓeen, daari ɓe, nduki Piyer, wi'i mo: —Woɗɗam, aan Ibiliisa ! Sabu miilooji maaɗa, ƴuwaay to Alla, to himɓe ɗi ƴuwi.
Iisa noddi jama'aare ndeen, *aahiiɓe makko no tawaa nder mayre, o wi'i ɓe: —Muuyɗo tokkude kam fuu, acca daarude hoore mum, hooƴa *leggal mum bardugal, tokka kam.
Sabu giɗɗo hisinde yonki mum, mursan ki. Amma mursuɗo ki ngam am he ngam *Habaru lobbo oo, hisinan ki.
Ɗume keɓol duuniyaaru nduu fuu nafirta neɗɗo, nde joomum mursi yonki mum?
No woodi ko neɗɗo waawi hokkitirde ngam heɓita ki naa?

Neɗɗo fuu caliiɗo kam, miin he haalaaji am nder jamaanu bonɗo oo, murtuɗo he Alla, miin *Ɓii-Neɗɗo, miin duu, mi saloto joomum wakkati ngartitoymi, miin he maleykaaɓe seniiɓe, teddungal *Baabiraawo am no tokki.
O wi'i ɓe: —Goonga kaalananmi on, nder tawaaɓe ɗo ɓe hannden, woɓɓe maayataa ngi'aay Laamu Alla no warda he baawɗe.
Balɗe jeegom gaɗa kollitol no Iisa tokkirtee, Iisa adi Piyer, Yakuuba, he Yahaaya, ɓe ŋabbi waamnde toowne gom. Tagaadi makko waylitii yeeso maɓɓe.
Kolte makko no ƴelkita, ɗe ndawni tar. Walaa lonnoowo koltal baawɗo ɓoosi koltal ngal laaɓa faa ngal rawnira non.
*Aahiiɓe tato ɓeen ngi'ii Eliya he *Muusa mbanngi no kaalda he makko.
Luuldere gom wari suddi ɓe, sey daane gom ƴuwi nder luuldere ndeen wi'i: —Oo woni Ɓiyam mo korsinmi. Kettinanee mo !
Nden *aahiiɓe ɓeen ndaari ngi'aay neɗɗo fuu se hanaa Iisa.
Wakkati Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum ɓeen njippotonoo waamnde ndeen, Iisa wi'i ɓe to ɓe kaalan neɗɗo fuu ko ɓe ngi'ii sey wakkati *Ɓii-Neɗɗo ummitii e maayde.
Ɓe njaɓi, amma ɓe keddii, iɓe ƴamodira hakkune maɓɓe maana « ummitaaki ».
Nden ɓe ƴami Iisa, ɓe mbi'i: —Ɗume waɗi jannginooɓe *Tawreeta no mbi'a no tilsi Eliya arta *Almasiihu warde?
Sey Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Goonga, Eliya artata wara ginan, moƴƴina kujje fuu. Amma ɗume waɗi dewte Alla mbi'i no tilsi *Ɓii-Neɗɗo torree sanne, yennee?
Miɗo haalana on, Eliya wariinoo, himɓe ngaɗanii mo ko ngiɗi hano no dewte Alla pillori ɗum.
Wakkati ɓe ngartunoo to *aahiiɓe ɓeeto, ɓe tawi jama'aare mawne no fiilii ɓe. Jannginooɓe *Tawreeta no njeddodira he maɓɓe.
Wonnooɓe nder jama'aare ndeen miilaayno ngi'a Iisa. Wakkati ɓe ngi'unoo mo ɓe nani belɗum, nden ɓe ndoggi ɓe njaɓɓowii mo.
O ƴami ɓe, o wi'i: —Dow ɗume njeddodirton he jannginooɓe *Tawreeta ɓee?
Sey gorko gom fiirti hunnduko, wi'i Iisa: —Moodibbo, mi waddanii ma ɓiyam gorko mo ginnaaru beebi.
Wakkati ɗum ummani mo fuu, iɗum liɓa mo, hunnduko makko no wurtina nguufo. Omo ŋerƴodira nyiiƴe, o yoora karaw. Mi eeli *aahiiɓe maaɗa ndiiwa ginnaaru nduun, amma ɓe keppi.
Nden Iisa wi'i jama'aare ndeen: —Hey onon himɓe jamaanu ɓe ngoonɗinaay ! Faa nde ngondanmi he mooɗon? Faa nde tinnotoomi miɗo munyana on? Ngaddanee kam suka oon !
Iisa waddanaa suka oon. Wakkati ginnaaru nduun hi'unoo Iisa, ndu dimmbi suka oon, ndu liɓi suka oon. O heddi omo tallitoo, hunnduko makko no wurtina nguufo.
Iisa ƴami baaba oon, wi'i mo: —Illa nde ɗum heɓi mo? *Baaba oon jaabii mo, wi'i: —Illa omo famɗi.
Kile keewɗe indu liɓa mo nder hiite naa nder ndiyam ngam tefude no ndu warirta mo. Yurma min, mballaa min nde nii aɗa waawi !
Nden Iisa wi'i mo: —Nde nii miɗo waawi mbiiɗaa naa? Too, huune fuu no hoyani goonɗinɗo.
Wakkati mum da, baaba suka oon huuɓi, wi'i: —Mi goonɗini, amma wallam ngam goonɗinol saɗi kam.
Wakkati Iisa hi'unoo himɓe no ndogga warde, o sajiti ginnaaru nduun o wi'i: —Aan beebinoowo e pahinoowo, ƴuw gaɗa suka oo, to tokku mo kaden faa abada !
Ginnaaru nduun huuɓi, dimmbiri suka oon semmbe semmbe, ƴuwi gaɗa makko. Suka oon wa'i hano maayɗo nii, faa ko heewi nder wonnooɓe ɗon ɓeen no mbi'a o maayi.
Iisa nanngi junngo makko, umminii mo, o darii.
Wakkati Iisa naatunoo suudu, *aahiiɓe makko ngari ƴami mo, mbi'i: —Ɗume waɗi ko minen, min keppi riiwude ginnaaru nduun?
Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Du'aa'u tan, waɗataa neɗɗo riiwa iri ginnaaru nduu.
Gaɗa nyawtol suka beebaaɗo oon, Iisa ummidii *aahiiɓe mum, ɓe pedditi leydi Galili. O hiɗaa neɗɗo fuu faama to o woni.
Omo waajoo *aahiiɓe makko, omo wi'a ɓe *Ɓii-Neɗɗo no jammbetee, wattee nder juuɗe. O waree, balɗe tati gaɗa mum, o ummitoo.
*Aahiiɓe makko ɓeen paamaay maana haala makko, ɓe kuli duu ƴamude mo.
Wakkati Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum njottinoo Kafarnahum, ɓe naati suudu weerirde maɓɓe. Iisa ƴami ɓe, wi'i: —Dow ɗume ngonɗon oɗon njeddodira wakkati ngonnoɗen dow laawol?
Amma ɓe njaabaaki, ngam dow ɓurɗo teddude hakkune maɓɓe ɓe njeddodiri.
Iisa jooɗii, noddi ɓe, kamɓe *lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen, wi'i ɓe: —Neɗɗo fuu hiɗi ardaade himɓe, tilay sey heeda gaɗa, laatoo golloowo maɓɓe, ɓe fuu.
O nanngi junngo cukalel gom, o darni yeeso maɓɓe, o huufi ngel,
o wi'i ɓe: —Jaɓɓiiɗo suka gooto hano cukalel ngel dow innde am, miin jaati joomum jaɓɓii. Jaɓɓiiɗo kam fuu, hanaa miin tan jaɓɓii, lilɗo kam joomum jaɓɓii.
Nden Yahaaya wi'i mo: —Moodibbo, min ngi'ii gorko gom no riiwira innde maa ginnaaji. Min kaɗi mo, ngam o wondaa he meeɗen.
Sey Iisa wi'i: —To kaɗee mo, ngam neɗɗo fuu waawaa waɗude haayne gom dow innde am, dey seɗɗa gaɗa mum, sakitoo bonna innde am.
Mo wanyaay en, fuu no wondi he meeɗen.
Goonga kaalananmi on, neɗɗo fuu kokkuɗo on ndiyam nder nyeɗerde ngam oɗon ngondi he *Almasiihu, joomum heppataa baraaje mum baa seɗɗa.
Neɗɗo fuu waɗi gooto nder sukaaɓe goonɗinɓe kam ɓe waɗi hakke, ko ɓurani joomum wodde woni kaaƴa mannga haɓɓee he daane joomum, nden joomum faɗɗee nder maayo.

Se tawi junngo maaɗa waɗi ngaɗaa hakke, taƴu ngo. Ngam naatude nder mbuurnam nduumiiɗam he junngo wooto, no ɓuri moƴƴande neɗɗo dina naatirde juuɗe mum ɗiɗi nder jahannama, hiite nge nyifataa abada. [
Toon, gilƴi mum mbaatataa, hiite mum duu nyifataa. ]

Se tawi koyngal maa waɗi ngaɗaa hakke, taƴu ngal. Ngam naatude nder mbuurnam nduumiiɗam he koyngal gootal no ɓurani neɗɗo dina faɗɗeede koyɗe mum ɗiɗi fuu no kuuɓi he mum nder jahannama hiite nge nyifataa. [
Toon, gilƴi mum mbaatataa, hiite mum duu nyifataa. ]
Se tawi hitere maaɗa waɗi ngaɗaa hakke, ittu nde. Ngam naatude Laamu Alla a ɗokko, no ɓuri moƴƴande ma dina paɗɗideɗaa gite maaɗa ɗiɗi fuu no kuuɓi nder jahannama.
Toon, gilƴi mum mbaatataa, hiite mum duu nyifataa.
No nyaamdu gom tilay sey wattanee lamɗam ngam ndu wela, hano non duu himɓe fuu sey hiite tukkee he mum'en heɓa jikkuuji mum'en ngarta lobbi.
Lamɗam huune lobbere non, amma nde ɗam lamsaa, ɗume lamsinta ɗam? Laatee hakkune mooɗon hano lamɗam, ngondon he jam.
Iisa dilli Kafarnahum, fa'i gaɗa maayo Urdun nder leydi Yahudiya. Jama'aare wari, fiilii mo, o tinni omo waajoo ɓe hano no o woowrunoo waajoraade ɓe.
