Sey Fariisa'en gom ngari to makko faa tunna mo, nden ɓe ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i: —No daganii gorko seera deekum naa dagaaki?
Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Ɗume *Muusa tilsini on ngaɗon?
Ɓe njaabii, ɓe mbi'i: —*Muusa hokki laawol se gorko no seera deekum, winnda talkuru ceergal makko, nden seera mo.
Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Ngam on tiɓɓe-nyireeɓe, waɗi *Muusa winndani on tilsinoore ndee.
Amma illa fuɗɗorde, wakkati Alla no tagannoo huune fuu, o tagi himɓe gorko he debbo.
Ngam majjum waɗi ko gorko no acca innum e bammum hawtaa he deekum,
ɓe fuu ɗiɗo ɓe laatoo ɓanndu worru. Ndenne joonin, ɓe kanaa ɗiɗo kaden, amma ɓe go'o.
To neɗɗo senndu ko Alla hawri.
Wakkati Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum kootunoo, *aahiiɓe ɓeen ƴamti mo maana haala kaan.
Sey o wi'i ɓe: —Neɗɗo fuu ceerɗo deekum ɓaŋi goɗɗo, yeeni,
hano non duu, debbo fuu ceeduɗo he gorum, dey ɓaŋa, debbo oon duu yeeni.
Nyannde gom himɓe ngaddi cukaloy mum'en to Iisa ngam o yowa juuɗe dow makkoy, amma *aahiiɓe ɓeen nduki ɓe.
Wakkati Iisa hi'unoo ɗum, ɗum naawi mo, nden o wi'i *aahiiɓe ɓeen: —Accee cukaloy koy ngara to am. To kaɗee koy, ngam nannduɓe he makkoy njeyi Laamu Alla.
Goonga kaalananmi on, mo jaɓɓoraaki Laamu Alla hano no cukalel ngel jaɓɓoraa nii, joomum naatataa nder maggu.
Nden o wunndii cukaloy koy, o yowi juuɗe dow makkoy, o barkini koy.
Nyannde gom, Iisa no caka yaadu sey gorko gom doggi wari, hofi yeeso makko, wi'i mo: —Moodibbo lobbo, ɗume kaanumi waɗude ngam heɓude mbuurnam nduumiiɗam?
Iisa jaabii mo wi'i: —Ngam ɗume noddirtaa kam lobbo? Lobbo fuu walaa sey Alla.
Aɗa anndi tilsinooje bi'ooje: To ittu yonki goɗɗo, to yeenu, to wujju, to seedana fewre, to toonya. Teddin inna maa e bammaa. Aɗa anndi ɗe naa?
Gorko oon wi'i: —Moodibbo, kujje ɗee fuu miɗo hakkilii he majje illa cukaaku am.
Nden Iisa daari mo daarɗe hidde, wi'i mo: —Huune worre tan hoddanii ma. Sonnoy ko njogiɗaa fuu, njeddana talkaaɓe, a heɓan baraaje dow. Gaɗa mum, ngaraa tokkaa kam.
Gorko oo no diikuɗo sanne. Wakkati o nanunoo haalaaji ɗii, o ɓalinii, o dillidi mettorgal ɓerne.
Iisa daari *aahiiɓe mum, wi'i: —Naatol jom njawdi nder Laamu Alla no tiiɗi faa !
Nanol haala kaa haayɗini *aahiiɓe ɓeen sanne. O wi'i ɓe kaden: —Giɗaaɓe am, naatude Laamu Alla no tiiɗi faa !
Ngam naatol ngolooba nder wudde battal no ɓuri hoyde dina naatol jom njawdi nder Laamu Alla.
Haayne ɓeydi nanngude *aahiiɓe ɓeen kaden. Ɓe keddii, iɓe ƴamodira hakkune maɓɓe, iɓe mbi'a: —Ndenne, moy hisata?
Iisa daari ɓe, wi'i: —Ko heppori ɓii-aadama hepportaa Alla. Walaa fuu ko hepporta Alla.
Sey Piyer fiirti hunnduko wi'i mo: —Minen, min mboppii fuu, min tokki ma !
Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Goonga kaalananmi on. Neɗɗo fuu woppi wuro mum, rimdaaɓe mum worɓe naa rewɓe, neɗɗo fuu woppi innum naa bammum, woppi sukaaɓe mum naa gese mum ngam am he ngam *Habaru lobbo oo,

joomum no heɓan ko ɓuri ɗum kile hemre nder duuniyaaru ndu ngonɗen nder muuɗum joonin nduu. Joomum no heɓan cuuɗi, rimdaaɓe worɓe he rewɓe, inniraaɓe, ɓiɓɓe e gese. Joomum no torretee duu nder mayru. Amma nder wakkati garoowo, joomum no heɓan mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
Amma ardiiɓe heewɓe keedan gaɗa. Gaɗaaɓe ɓeen duu laatoto ardiiɓe.

Nyannde gom Iisa no ardi *aahiiɓe mum no tokki, iɓe pa'i *Ursaliima. Nder jahaangal maɓɓe ngaal, kulkulal no yaha no warta nder ɓerɗe *aahiiɓe ɓeen he nder ɓerɗe wondunooɓe he maɓɓe fuu. Iisa noddi *lilaaɓe mum sappo he ɗiɗo ɓeen feere, o haalani ɓe ko hewtoytoo mo *Ursaliima.

O wi'i ɓe: —Kettinee, joonin enen nii eɗen njaha *Ursaliima, *Ɓii-Neɗɗo no wattetee nder juuɗe mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla he jannginooɓe *Tawreeta. Ɓe ngatta mo nder juuɗe ɓe kanaa *Yahudankooɓe, ɓe kiitoo mo kiite maayde.
Ɓe njawoo mo, ɓe kartoo ɓe tutta dow makko, ɓe ɓocca mo, ɓe mbara mo. Amma balɗe tati gaɗa mum, o ummitoo.
Yakuuba he Yahaaya, ɓiɓɓe Jebede, ngari to Iisa mbi'i mo: —Moodibbo, miɗen ngiɗi min eele goɗɗum. Miɗen ngiɗi ngaɗanaa min ɗum duu.
Sey Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Ɗume ngiɗɗon mi waɗana on?
Nden ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Nyannde njooɗiɗaa dow jooɗorgal laamu maa ngu darja, accu min njooɗoo takkol maaɗa, gooto nyaamo maa, ooto nano maa.
Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —On anndaa ko eeloton. Oɗon mbaawi yarirde nyeɗerde nde njaranmi ndeen naa? Oɗon mbaawi munyi waɗaneede *batisma mo ngaɗanteemi oo naa?
Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Miɗen mbaawi. Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe: —On njaran nyeɗerde nde njaranmi ndeen, on ngaɗantee *batisma mo ngaɗanteemi oon,
amma jooɗaade nyaamo am naa nano am, hanaa miin woodi baawɗe hokkude ɗum. Alla moƴƴini jooɗorɗe ɗee ngam ɓe o suɓi.
Wakkati *aahiiɓe sappo ɓeeto nanunoo ko Yakuuba e Yahaaya ƴamani ko'e mum'en, ɗum monnini ɓe.
Sey Iisa noddi ɓe, ɓe fuu, wi'i: —Oɗon anndi doole doole laamiiɓe ɓe kanaa *Yahudankooɓe laamorii himɓe mum'en. Mawɓe maɓɓe ɓeen duu kolli baawɗe.
Amma onon kay, ɗum waɗataa hakkune mooɗon. Giɗɗo laatoo tedduɗo hakkune mooɗon, on fuu, no haani laatoo golloowo mooɗon.
Kaden duu, giɗɗo ardaade nder mooɗon, no haani laatoo maccuɗo mooɗon, on fuu.
*Ɓii-Neɗɗo he hoore mum waraay faa gollanee, amma o wari faa o ngollana himɓe fuu, o mursa yonki makko ngam hisinde himɓe heewɓe.
Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum ngari Yeriko. Wakkati Iisa, *aahiiɓe mum he jama'aare gom umminoo Yeriko no pa'i *Ursaliima, bumɗo gom bi'eteeɗo Bartima'us ɓii-Tima'us no jooɗii no garbina takkol laawol.
O nani no wi'ee Iisa mo Nasaratu woni no yawta, sey o fuɗɗi huuɓude, omo wi'a: —Iisa, taan Daawda, yurmam !
Himɓe heewɓe tokkitii no cajitoo he makko, no mbi'a o deƴƴita, amma kanko duu wakkati mum nii, o huuɓi kaden, o wi'i: —Taan Daawda, yurmam !
Sey Iisa darii, wi'i Bartima'us noddee. Nden, o noddaa o wi'aa: —Haya ! Umma, o wi'i ngaraa !
Bartima'us garbisi, faɗɗi suddamaare mum, wari to Iisa.
Iisa ƴami mo, wi'i: —Ɗume ngiɗaa mi waɗane? Bartima'us jaabii mo, wi'i: —Moodibbo, miɗo hiɗi mi wumta.
Sey Iisa wi'i mo: —Yah ! Goonɗinol maaɗa hisinii ma. Wakkati mum da o wumti, o tokki Iisa, ɓe ndilli.
Wakkati Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum wonnoo hakkune Baytifaaji he Baytaniya, hedde har waamnde wi'eteene waamnde Jaytun, ɓe mboɗɗaaki *Ursaliima sanne, sey Iisa lili *aahiiɓe mum ɗiɗo gom,
o wi'i ɓe: —Ummee, njehee nder wurel gonngel yeeso mooɗon ngeel. No nattirɗon nder maggel, on tawan ɓinngel ara gom, ngel waɗɗaaka abada gom no haɓɓii. Kaɓɓitee ngel, ngaddanon kam.
Nde nii goɗɗo ƴamii on wi'i ngam ɗume waɗi oɗon ngaɗa ɗum, mbi'on Joomiraawo haajaa ngel. Dey o wartiran ngel law.
Ɓe njehi, ɓe tawi ɓinngel ara ngel no haɓɓii yaasi dammbugal ɓaade ndeen, ɓe kaɓɓiti ngel.
Sey wonnooɓe no ndarii ɗon ɓeen ƴami ɓe, mbi'i: —Ɗume ngatton ɗo nii? Ɗume kaɓɓitanton arel ngeel?
*Aahiiɓe ɓeen njaaborii ɓe dey-dey no Iisa wi'irnoo ɓe. Himɓe ɓeen acci ɓe, ɓe ndillidi arel ngel.
Ɓe njaari ngel to Iisa, ɓe mbeɗɗiti kolte maɓɓe dow maggel, Iisa waɗɗii.
Dow laawol, himɓe ɗuɓɓe mbeɗɗiti kolte mum'en, woɓɓe kelti licce mbeerti dow maggol.
Ardiiɓe mo he heedanɓe mo gaɗa no kuuɓa no mbi'a: — Hosanna ! Barkinaaɗo woni garɗo dow innde Joomiraawo !
Barke tabbita he laamu ngaroowu, laamu maama meeɗen Daawda ! Jettooje ngoodani Alla Toowɗo !

Wakkati Iisa naatunoo *Ursaliima, o naati nder *Juulirde mawne. O hi'i huune fuu ko woni nder mayre. Amma ngam naange no yana, o wurtii *Ursaliima, o yehi Baytaniya, kanko he *aahiiɓe makko sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen.
Wakkati Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum ndawannoo Baytaniya no pa'i *Ursaliima, Iisa no nanannoo rafo.
Sey toon dow laawol, o holliri ibbi gom ngooduki haako. O yehi, o ƴeewowi nde iki tawdee ɓiɓɓe. Wakkati o yottinoo to makki, fuy non o tawaay he makki se hanaa kaakooli, wakkati dimol ibbe waɗaay.
Iisa wi'i ibbi kiin: —To neɗɗo fuu yeeƴito nyaama ɓiɓɓe maa kaden ! *Aahiiɓe makko nani ko o wi'i ki.
No Iisa'en njottorii *Ursaliima, Iisa naati jawreeru Juulirde *Ursaliima mawne, o fuɗɗi omo riiwa soodooɓe e sonnooɓe wonɓe nder mayru. O liɓi teburuuji weccooɓe ceede he jooɗorɗe sonnooɓe buugaali.
O haɗi yaha-warta ɓiɓɓe luumooɓe he donle mum'en nder mayre.
O waajii ɓe o wi'i: —Hanaa no winndii nder dewte, Alla wi'i: Suudu am no inndirtee suudu to lenyi fuu ngarta du'oo ! Amma onon, on ngaɗii ndu wumpere wuyɓe.
Mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla he jannginooɓe *Tawreeta nani ko o wi'i. Ɓe tefi joonkay no ɓe mbardata mo, amma ɓe kuli mo, ngam waaju makko naatii jama'aare ndeen sanne.
Wakkati naange yanunoo Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum mburtii huɓeere *Ursaliima pa'i Baytaniya.
Jaangoore kippol teburuuji weccooɓe ceede e sonnooɓe buugaali ɓeen, Iisa'en kejji illa beete coƴƴi *Ursaliima. Wakkati ɓe paani ibbi kiin sey ɓe ngi'ii ko ki yoorii karaw faa he ɗaɗi.
Nden Piyer miccitii, wi'i Iisa: —Moodibbo, ndaa ! Ibbi ki kuɗunoɗaa kiin yoorii.
Sey Iisa jaabii, wi'i ɓe: —Ngoonɗinee Alla !
Goonga kaalananmi on. Neɗɗo fuu bi'uɗo waamnde ndee ɗoofa, saamoy ley maayo, nde nii joomum goonɗinii nder ɓerne muuɗum, ko kam wi'i ɗum waɗan. Sikka fuu walaa joomum no jaabantee ko wi'i ɗum.
Ngam majjum waɗi miɗo wi'a on, ko eeluɗon nder du'aa'u fuu, ngoonɗinee ko on keɓii ɗum, on njaabantee ɗum duu.
Kaden wakkati fuu mo ndariɗon oɗon du'oo, nde nii no woodi mo njogitaniɗon, njaafanee mo ko o waɗi on ɗum, ngam Baabii'on gonɗo dow yaafanoo on gacceeji mooɗon. [
Amma se on njaafaaki, *Baaba mooɗon gonɗo dow oon duu yaafataako hakkeeji mooɗon.]
Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum ngarti *Ursaliima. Wakkati Iisa fiilotonoo nder *Juulirde *Ursaliima mawne, hooreeɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla, jannginooɓe *Tawreeta he mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe ɓadii mo,
ƴami mo mbi'i: —Baawɗe ɗeye ngaɗirtaa kujje ɗee fuu? Moy hokki ma laawol waɗude ɗe?
Sey Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Mi ƴaman on huune worre tan, onon duu. Nde nii on njaabake kam, mi haalanan on baawɗe ɗeye ngaɗiranmi kujje ɗee fuu.
Alla naa himɓe kokki Yahaaya laawol waɗude *batisma? Miɗo hettinanii on !
Sey iɓe caawodira hakkune maɓɓe, iɓe mbi'a: —Nde nii en mbi'i Alla, o wi'an ko waɗi en ngoonɗinaay Yahaaya?
Amma eɗen mbaawi wi'ude himɓe naa? Ɓe ƴamodiri nde iɓe mbaawi mbi'i nii ngam iɓe kula himɓe. To himɓe fuu, tabbat Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma no annabiijo.
Sey ɓe njaabii Iisa, ɓe mbi'i: —Min anndaa. Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Too, miin duu, mi haalantaa on baawɗe ɗeye ngaɗiranmi kujje ɗee fuu.

Nder *Ursaliima Iisa tinni no haalda *aahiiɓe mum he hooreeɓe *Yahudankooɓe nder kippol haala, omo wi'a: —Neɗɗo gom waɗi ngesa *cabiije. O waɗi koogol o fiiltini nga. O wasi luggere ɓoosirde, o nyiɓi suudu toownu ngam doomooɓe magga. Nden o wuƴi nga remooɓe gom, o waɗi jahaangal.
Wakkati teɓol cabiije ɗeen yottinoo, o lili golloowo makko gom jaɓowa mbaka makko to remooɓe ɓeen.
Remooɓe ɓeen nanngi lilaaɗo oon, piyi mo, njoofi mo juuɗe ɓole.
Jom ngesa kaan liliti golloowo mum gom kaden to maɓɓe. Ɓe eli mo, ɓe njenni mo.
Jom ngesa oon lili faa hannden golloowo mum gom kaden, ɓe mbari lilaaɗo oon. O lili gollooɓe makko re'ataa he maɓɓe. Ɓe piyi woɓɓe, ɓe mbari woɓɓe duu.
Neɗɗo gooto koraniiɗo mo oon, woni ɓiyiiko korsuɗo. Kanko duu o lili mo he maɓɓe, o wi'i hoore makko: « Ɓe teddinan mo ngam o ɓiyam. »
Amma remooɓe ɓeen mbi'odiri hakkune mum'en: « Ma'adalla. Oo nii woni donoowo oon. Ngaree mbaren mo, heɓa ndonen ngesa ngaa ! »
Sey ɓe nanngi mo, ɓe mburtini mo nder ngesa ngaan, ɓe mbari mo.
Gaɗa pillaaki kippol haala ngool, Iisa ƴami, wi'i: —Too ! Joonin, noy jom ngesa ngaan waɗata? O waran kanko he hoore makko, o wara remooɓe ɓeen, o halfina ngesa ngaan woɓɓe, naa noy?
On njanngaay ko winndaa nder dewte ɗeen, wi'aa: Hayre nde nyiɓooɓe ɓeen mboppi ndeen, kayre laatii hoore nyibdi ndiin.
Ɗum golle Joomiraawo, haayne non duu he giiɗe meeɗen !
Hooreeɓe *Yahudankooɓe tefi no nanngirta Iisa, ngam ɓe paamii ko kippol haala ngool, kamɓe ngol sappii. Amma ɓe cuusaay jama'aare ndeen, ngam majjum waɗi ɓe acci mo, ɓe ndilli.
Balɗe no njaha balɗe no ngarta sey nyannde gom *Fariisa'en he himɓe *Hirudus lili *lilaaɓe he Iisa ngam tunna mo nder haalaaji makko.

Ɓe ngari, ɓe mbi'i mo: —Moodibbo, miɗen anndi ko goonga tan kaalataa. A hulataa neɗɗo fuu, a ɓurdinaay himɓe, aɗa janngina laawol Alla goonga e goonga. No hegii min kokka laamiiɗo *Rooma mawɗo janngal naa hegaaki?
Min kokka mo naa to min kokku mo? Iisa faamani munafikaare maɓɓe, nden wi'i ɓe: —Ɗume waɗi ko oɗon tunna kam? Ngaddanee kam tammal cardi, mi hi'a.
Ɓe ngaddani mo. O ƴami ɓe o wi'i: —Foto moy he innde moy woni ɗo? Ɓe mbi'i mo: —Laamiiɗo *Rooma.
Nden o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i: —Ndenne kokkee laamiiɗo *Rooma ko jeyi, kokkon Alla duu ko jeyi. Ko Iisa jaabii ɗum haaynii ɓe sanne.
*Sadduki'en, kam'en ngoni yeddooɓe no mbi'a ko maayɗo fuu ummitittaako. Nyannde gom, ɓe ummii ɓe ngari to Iisa.
Ɓe ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Moodibbo, *Muusa tilsinii enen *Yahudankooɓe, nde gorko dewli, dey maayi rimaay, minyum naa mawnum dewla deekiiko ngam heɓana mo jippotooɓe.
Waɗiino rimdaaɓe jeɗɗo gom. Arano oon dewli debbo mum, dey maayi, rimaay.
Ɗiɗaɓo oon dewli debbo oon, kam duu maayi rimaay. Tataɓo oon duu waɗi hano non.
Rimdaaɓe jeɗɗo ɓeen fuu tokki ndewli debbo oon, baa gooto maɓɓe rimaay. Gaɗa maayde maɓɓe, ɓe fuu, debbo oon duu maayi.
Too, nyannde darŋal, moy nder maɓɓe laatoto goro debbo oo? Ngam ɓe fuu jeɗɗo kaɓɓani mo.
Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —On mboofii, oɗon anndi ngam ɗume? Ngam on paamaay ko dewte ɗeen mbi'i, on anndaa duu baawɗe Alla.
Ngam nyannde maayɓe ummitii, worɓe ndewlataa, rewɓe duu ndewlataake. Himɓe fuu no mbuuran hano no maleykaaɓe mbuurdiri nder kammu.

Har ko daarata ummitaaki maayɓe, on njanngaay ɗum jaa nder dewtere *Muusa, nder taariihi wuumoore huɓɓoore. Hano no Alla haaldiri he *Muusa nii, wi'i: Miin woni Alla *Ibrahim, Alla Isiyaaku, Alla Yakuuba.
Nden Iisa ɓeydi wi'ude ɓe: —O Alla wuurɓe, o hanaa Alla maayɓe. Ndenne, on mboofii sanne sanne.

Nyannde gom jannginoowo *Tawreeta gom nani yewtere Iisa he *Sadduki'en. O nani duu ko Iisa jaabake ɓe faa wooɗi. Jannginoowo *Tawreeta oo ɓadii Iisa, ƴami mo wi'i: —Nder tilsinooje ɗee fuu, ndeye ɓuri semmbe?
Nden Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Ɓurne ɗe fuu semmbe woni wi'ude: Hettina *Isra'el ! Alla Joomiraawo meeɗen tan woni Joomiraawo.
Hiɗir Alla Joomiraawo maa he ɓerne maa fuu he yonki maa fuu he hakkillo maa fuu he semmbe maa fuu.
Tilsinoore ɗiɗaɓere ndeen woni: Ngiɗaa gondo maa no ngiɗirɗaa hoore maa. Walaa fuu tilsinooje ɓurɗe tilsinooje ɗiɗi ɗee semmbe.
Nden jannginoowo *Tawreeta oon wi'i mo: —Moodibbo ! A haalii goonga, ko mbi'uɗaa Alla tan woni Joomiraawo, kaden duu Alla gom fuu walaa se hanaa kanko.
Hiɗirde Alla he ɓerne mum fuu he hakkillo mum fuu he semmbe mum fuu, he hiɗirde gondo mum hano neɗɗo hiɗiri hoore mum, no ɓuri sadakaaji buleteeɗi he sadakaaji fuu !
Wakkati Iisa hi'unoo ko jannginoowo *Tawreeta oo jaaborake ɗum he hakkillo, nden o wi'i mo: —A woɗɗaa Laamu Alla. Gaɗa jannginoowo *Tawreeta oo, neɗɗo fuu suusaay ƴamude Iisa goɗɗum kaden.
Nyannde gom Iisa no waajoo nder *Juulirde *Ursaliima mawne, sey o ƴami, o wi'i: —Noy waɗi jannginooɓe *Tawreeta no mbi'a ko *Almasiihu taan Daawda non?
Ngam Daawda he hoore mum haali nder baawɗe *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wi'i: Alla Joomiraawo wi'i Joomiraawo am: War, njooɗaa nyaamo am, faa mi sorna wayɓe maa ley teppere maa.
Daawda he hoore mum inndiri *Almasiihu Joomiraawo mum. Ndenne, noy o laatortoo taaniiko tan? Jama'aare e jama'aare woni no hettinanii Iisa nder welwelo.
Nder waaju makko, o wi'i ɓe: —Tinnee, kakkilee he jannginooɓe *Tawreeta. Iɓe ngiɗi ɓornaade kolte mawɗe. Iɓe ngiɗi sanneede cannooje tedduɗe nder luuɓe.
Iɓe ngiɗi jooɗorɗe ɓurɗe teddude nder *baajorɗi. Iɓe ngiɗi jooɗorɗe ɓurɗe teddude nde nii ɓe noddaama batu.
Iɓe eyta rewɓe ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en maayi ngam teetude njawdi maɓɓe. Iɓe njunna du'aa'uuji maɓɓe ngam ɓe limtee nder lobbuɓe. Kiite naawɗe ɓe ngaɗantee.
Iisa no jooɗii nder *waajordu, omo hucciti he keesuwal mayru. Omo daara no himɓe ngattirta hadiyaaji mum'en nder maggal. Riikuɓe heewɓe ngatti ceede ɗuɗɗe nder maggal.
Fotodiri nyannde mum debbo gom mo gorum maayi, mo walaa fuy, wari, watti buuɗoy ɗiɗoy nder maggal.
Sey Iisa noddi *aahiiɓe mum, wi'i ɓe: —Goonga kaalananmi on: Debbo oo, ko o watti nder keesuwal ngaal no ɓuri ko ɓeeto fuu ngatti.
Ngam ko ɓe ngatti nder keesuwal ngaal ɓuytataa fuy nder njawdi maɓɓe. Amma debbo oo, ko o joginoo ngam o wuurda, ɗum o watti nder maggal.
Nyannde gom wakkati Iisa wurtinoo nder *Juulirde mawne, aahiijo makko gom wi'i mo: —Moodibbo, ndaa kaaƴo mawko koo, kanko he nyibdiiji booɗuɗi ɗii fuu !
Sey Iisa jaabii mo wi'i: —A hi'i nyibdi ndii, no ndi foti manngu, baa hayre worre hoddataako no deki dow wonnde. Ndi fuu, ndi liɓetee.
Nyannde gom Iisa no jooɗii dow waamnde wi'eteene waamnde Jaytun. Omo hucciti har Juulirde *Ursaliima mawne. Sey Piyer, Yakuuba, Yahaaya he Andiire ummii njehi to makko kamɓe tan, ƴami mo, mbi'i:
—Haalan min nde liɓol ngool waɗata. Alaama oye hi'etee wakkati ɗum hiɗi waɗude?
Sey Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Kakkilee to neɗɗo fuu majjina on.
Himɓe heewɓe no ngardan innde am, iɓe mbi'a: « Miin woni *Almasiihu. » Ɓe majjina himɓe heewɓe.
Nde nii on nani habaru konuuji naa siri majji, to kulee. No tilsi ɗum waɗa, amma ɗum hanaa alaama kolloowo timmoode duuniyaaru.
Lenyol habdan he lenyol, laamu habdan he laamu. Dimmbaaki leydi waɗan nokku nokkuuje, rafooji duu ngaɗan. Ɗum nanndaana he fuɗɗorde ŋatawere.

Ndeenee ko'e mooɗon, ngam himɓe no njaaran on to hiitotooɓe. Ɓe piyan on nder *baajorɗi maɓɓe. Ɓe ndarna on yeeso hooreeɓe kam e laamiiɓe ngam sabbu am, ngam ceedoɗon yeeso maɓɓe dow *Habaru lobbo oo.
No tilsi *Habaru lobbo oon waajee nder lenyi fuu.
Wakkati ɓe nanngoyta on faa ɓe njaara on yeeso hiitotooɓe, to ko'e mooɗon kaɓɓo dow ko kaaloton. Nde wakkati oon warii fuu, on keɓan ko kaaluɗon. Ngam hanaa onon kaalata, *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo haalata.
Himɓe no kokkitiran sakiraaɓe mum'en mbaree, baaba no hokkitiran ɓiyum. Sukaaɓe no ummanto saarooɓe mum'en, gaɗa dabare ɓe mbaree.
Ngam am, himɓe fuu mbanyan on. Amma tarsiniiɗo faa yottii he timmoode, joomum no hisintee.
On ngi'an huune bonde, ɓurne nyiddinaade no waddetee, darnee to nde haanaa darneede. (Jannguɗo ɗum fuu faama ɗum no wooɗiri.) Nden, tawaaɓe nder Yahudiya fuu ndoggira baamle.
Tawaaɗo dow suudu, to jippoo wi'a naatan suudu hooƴa goɗɗum.
Tawaaɗo ngesa, to yeeƴito hooƴa koltal mum.
Nder balɗe mum bone no saaman dow saawɓe he musinooɓe !
Eelee Alla to ɗum fottodir he dunngu.
Ngam nder wakkati oon ɗon, torra mawka waran. Illa wakkati Alla tagi duuniyaaru faa warde hannden iri makka waɗaayno abada. Iri makka waɗataa kaden duu faa abada.
Nde nii Joomiraawo raɓɓinɗinaayno balɗe ɗeen, neɗɗo fuu hisataano. Amma o raɓɓinɗinii ɗe ngam suɓaaɓe makko.
Nder wakkati oon, nde nii goɗɗo wi'i on: « Ndaaree *Almasiihu nii ɗo » naa « too'en », to ngoonɗinee joomum.
Ngam almasiihuuɓe fewreeɓe he annabiiɓe fewreeɓe mbanngowan, ɓe ngaɗa alamaaji e kaayɗe, ngam majjinde baa suɓaaɓe Alla ɓeen, nde nii no waɗoo.
Ndenne, kakkilee ! Mi haalani on huune fuu illa ɗum waraay.
—Gaɗa saɗɗormaaji nyalaaɗe ɗeen, sey naange niɓɓa, lewru accaa yeynude,
koode caama, Alla waɗa baawɗe gonɗe dow fuu ndimmboo.
Wakkati mum, *Ɓii-Neɗɗo no hi'etee, no wara dow duule. Omo warda baawɗe e teddungal manngal.
O lilan maleykaaɓe makko nder kappa kuula duuniyaaru fuu, ɓe kawrowa suɓaaɓe makko illa hoore leydi ndii faa hoore leydi ndiito.
Too, ndaaree ibbi kii, ekkitoɗon goɗɗum he makki. Nde nii licce makki keyɗitii, kaakooli makki mbilitii, oɗon anndi ko dunngu ɓadake.
Hano non kaden, nde nii on ngi'ii kujje ɗee no ngara, paamee ko wakkati oon ɓadake, *Ɓii-Neɗɗo no dammbugal wuro.
Goonga kaalananmi on: Jamaanu oo timmataa tawee kujje ɗee fuu ngaraay.
Kammu e leydi taggan, amma haalaaji am timmataa abada.
Walaa annduɗo nyalaane ndeen naa wakkati mo ɗum waɗoyta, baa maleykaaɓe wonɓe dow ɓeen, naa Ɓiɗɗo oon anndaa ɗum, sey nii *Baabiraawo oon tan.
Kakkilee, tinnee to on ɗaanee ngam on anndaa nde wakkati oon warta.
Wakkati oo no wi'ee omo nanndi e gorko gaɗuɗo jahaangal. O acci ɓaade makko nder juuɗe gollooɓe makko. O holli neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu ko hakkiltoo. O wi'i doomoowo dammbugal oon dooma ngal no wooɗiri.
Ndenne, tinnee heɓa taweɗon on ciryiiɓe, ngam on anndaa wakkati jom ɓaade oon wartoyta. No waawi waɗa o warta futuro naa caka jemma, naa fajiri fadde dontooje jogginde naa illa beete.
To o juhu on, o tawa oɗon ɗaani !
Ko kaalananmi on ɗum, kam kaalananmi himɓe fuu: Tinnee to on ɗaanee !
Balɗe ɗiɗi fadde *Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe e *Juulɗe buuru mo walaa ƴuufinirɗum, mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla e jannginooɓe *Tawreeta no tefa nder cuccukka no nanngirii Iisa, mbara mo.
Amma iɓe mbi'odira hakkune maɓɓe: —To en nanngu mo wakkati juulɗe ɗeen, ngam to himɓe murtu.

Iisa no Baytaniya nder ɓaade Simon, inndirteeɗo Simon Ceppinnga. Omo jooɗii, omo nyaama, sey debbo gom naati, no jogii faanu nebbam uurɗam, caadiɗam sanne, ɗam hawrodiraaka he huune fuu. Debbo oon heli daane faanu nduun, joorti nebbam ɗaam dow hoore Iisa.
Nder himɓe tawaaɓe toon ɓeen, woɓɓe ɓerne mum'en metti, no mbi'odira: —Bonnude iri nebbam ɗaam, ɗume ɗum nafata?
Iɗam waawi sonneede, gollooɓe keme tato njoɓee, naa ceede ɗeen kokkee talkaaɓe ! Ɓe tokki iɓe njanca debbo oon.
Sey Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Accee mo ! Ngam ɗume njancoton mo? Ko o waɗanii kam ɗum no wooɗi sanne.
Talkaaɓe no tawdee he mooɗon wakkati fuu, nde muuyɗon fuu oɗon mbaawi waɗande ɓe moƴƴere. Amma miin, mi tawdataake he mooɗon nyannde fuu.
O waɗi ko o waawi. O wuji nebbam uurɗam ɗam he ɓanndu am ngam siryaade mooɓol am.
Goonga kaalananmi on: Nokku fuu to *Habaru lobbo oo waajaa nder duuniyaaru, ko debbo oo waɗi ɗum, no filletee, ngam miccitaade he makko.
Yahuuda Iskariyot, gooto nder *lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen, yehi to mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla ngam wattude Iisa nder juuɗe maɓɓe.
Ɓe kettinani mo, ɓe nani belɗum, faa ɓe adi alkawal ɓe mbi'i kam'en kokkan mo ceede. Illa wakkati oo, Yahuuda no tefa, no jammborii Iisa.
Nyalooma arano *Juulɗe buuru mo walaa ƴuufinirɗum, nyalooma mo ɓe kirsannoo jawɗi ngam *Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe, *aahiiɓe Iisa ƴami Iisa, mbi'i: —Toy ngiɗaa min ciryowoo hiraane juulɗe ɗeen?
Iisa lili ɗiɗo nder maɓɓe, wi'i ɓe: —Ummee naatee huɓeere ndee, on pottan gorko gom no ronndi loone ndiyam, tokkon mo.
Ɓaade nde o naati ndeen, mbi'on joomiire moodibbo lili min, min ƴame toy suudu ndu o nyaamdata he *aahiiɓe makko hiraane juulɗe nduun woni?
Jom ɓaade ndeen hollan on suudu mawnu gom, wonndu no deki dow wonndu. Moƴƴinee ndu, nder mayru ngaɗanton en hiraane ndeen.
Sey *aahiiɓe ɗiɗo ɓeen njehi, naatowi huɓeere ndeen. Ɓe ngiiti huune fuu ko Iisa wi'unoo ɓe, ɓe ciryii hiraane ndeen.
Futuro, wakkati naange yanunoo, Iisa wardi he *lilaaɓe mum sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen.
Wakkati ɓe kiirtotonoo, Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Goonga kaalananmi on: Hakkune mooɗon, onon nyaamdooɓe he am, gooto nder mooɗon no jammboto kam.
Ɓe ɓalinii sanne, sey ɓe ƴami mo gooto gooto, ɓe mbi'ii: —Kori hanaa miin non?
Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Gooto nder mooɗon, onon sappo e ɗiɗo ɓee, gonɗo no suuwida junngo mum he am nder le'al gootal, oon non.
*Ɓii-Neɗɗo accan duuniyaaru hano no ɗum winndiraa dow makko nder dewte. Amma bone saaman dow jammbotooɗo mo ! Joomum nde nii rimaakano non, nden no ɓuranan ɗum.
Wakkati ɓe nyaamannoo ndeen, Iisa hooƴi buuru, yetti Alla, helti mo, hokki ɓe, wi'i: —Njaɓee, ɗum woni ɓanndu am.
Gaɗa mum, o hooƴi nyeɗerde cabiijam, o yetti Alla, o hokki ɓe, ɓe fuu ɓe njari.
O wi'i ɓe: —Ɗum woni ƴiiƴam am, ƴiiƴam ndufeteeɗam ngam sabbu himɓe heewɓe, ƴiiƴam tabbintinoojam amaana Alla.
Goonga kaalananmi on. Mi yarataa cabiijam kaden, sey nii nder Laamu Alla.
Iisa he *aahiiɓe ɓeen njimi jimi *Jabuura, ɓe mburtii, ɓe njehi dow waamnde wi'eteene waamnde Jaytun.
Toon Iisa wi'i ɓe: —On fuu, on mboppan kam ndoggon, ngam no winndaa, wi'aa: Mi fiyan duroowo oon, baali ɗiin cankitoo.
Amma nde mi ummitake, mi artan on Galili.
Sey Piyer itti hunnduko, wi'i mo: —Baa nde nii ɓe fuu ɓe ndoggi ɓe mboppii ma, miin kay, mi woppataa ma.
Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Goonga kaalananmaami. Nder jemma oo, fadde ndontoori jogginde kile ɗiɗi, a wi'an a anndaa kam kile tati !
Amma ɗum fuu haɗaay Piyer wi'i mo kaden: —Baa nde a maayan non, mi maaydan he maaɗa, abada mi wi'ataa mi anndaa ma. Non *aahiiɓe ɓeeto duu mbi'i.
Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum ngari nokkuure wi'eteene Gesemaane, toon o wi'i ɓe: —Njooɗee ɗo, mi yahan mi du'owo.
O noddi Piyer, Yakuuba e Yahaaya, o yahdi he maɓɓe. Iɓe ɗon nii sey taƴo-taƴo fuɗɗi nanngude mo, ɓillaare naatani mo sanne.
Sey o wi'i *aahiiɓe makko: —Bononda ɓerne am ɗuuɗi sanne faa no tefa warude kam. Ndaree ɗo, ndoomee kam, kakkilee to on ɗaanee.
O woɗɗi ɓe seɗɗa, o turni yeeso makko faa he leydi, omo du'oo, omo wi'a: —*Baaba, nde nii tawi iɗum waɗoo, woɗɗinam nyeɗerde torra kaa.
Yaa Abba am ! Walaa ko hepporte. Amma to ɗum laatoo muuyɗe am, ɗum laatoo muuyɗe maa aan.
Nden o warti, o tawi *aahiiɓe ɓeen no ɗaanii. Sey o wi'i Piyer: —Simon ! Simon ! A ɗaanii naa? Jaa a waawaa doomude kam baa nii yamnde worre?
Ummee, ndu'ee, to on caamu nder cii'aaki. Ɓerne no hiɗi amma ɓanndu tampi.
Iisa soƴƴii kaden, du'ii hano no o du'ori arannde nii.
O warti, o tawi iɓe ɗaanii kaden. Ɗoyngol maɓɓe moddi sanne. Ɓe mbaawaa jooɗaade ndoomi, ɓe keppi duu fuu ko ɓe njaabortoo Iisa.
Iisa yehi, warti tataɓere mum, o wi'i ɓe kaden: —Faa joonin oɗon ɗaanii, oɗon powta naa? Too, joonin kay hanti. Wakkati mo *Ɓii-Neɗɗo wattetee nder juuɗe waɗooɓe hakke oon wari.
Ummee ndillen ! Ndaa, jammbotooɗo kam oon nii, no wara.

Iisa no caka haala, sey Yahuuda, gooto nder lilaaɓe makko sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen, yottii no wondi he himɓe heewɓe. Mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla, jannginooɓe *Tawreeta, he mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe gom lili ɓe, iɓe njogii takubaaje he cabbi.
Tawi Yahuuda jammbotooɗo mo oon, tinndinnoo ɓe wi'i: —Mo mbunndotoomi oon, kam woni mo. Nanngon mo, njaaron, paddoɗon mo.
No Yahuuda yottorii, fonndi Iisa, wi'i mo: —Moodibbo ! Sey o wunndii mo.
Warduɓe he makko, nanngi Iisa.
Aahiijo Iisa gom tawaaɗo hadde maɓɓe, sorti takubaahi mum, soppi gollanoowo mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla, o taƴi nowru makko.
Sey Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Ko waɗi ngarduɗon takubaaje e cabbi faa nanngon kam hano miin woni mawɗo murtuɓe?
Miɗo wondunoo he mooɗon wakkati fuu nder *Juulirde mawne miɗo waajoo. On nanngaay kam, amma tilay ko dewte Alla mbi'i ɗum tabbita.
Sey *aahiiɓe ɓeen fuu ndoggi mboppi mo.
Jokolle gom no wakkii wudere mum, tokkitii gaɗa koyɗe Iisa. Ɓe tefi ɓe nannga mo,
o woppi wudere makko, o doggi ɓanndu ɓoldu.
Nanngunooɓe Iisa ɓeen njaari Iisa to mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla fuu. Mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla, jannginooɓe *Tawreeta, he mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe gom kawri nokkuure ndeen.
Piyer toowti ɓe seɗɗa, tokkitii ɓe naako nder batamaare ɓaade mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla oon. Nden kanko duu o wari, o jooɗii hadde doomooɓe ɓaade ɓeen, omo ƴilfoo.
Mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla he hawriine dawrooɓe no tefa ko peliri Iisa ngam o waree, amma ɓe keɓaay ɗum.
Heewɓe no tuuma mo dow fewre, amma haalaaji maɓɓe ngalaa no tokkodira.
Nder maɓɓe woɓɓe tuumi mo, mbi'i:
—Min nani omo wi'a, o liɓan *Juulirde mawne nde himɓe mahiri juuɗe mum'en. Nden nder balɗe tati o nyiɓa juulirde nde junngo fuu mahaay.
Ɓe potaay baa dow haala ka ɓe mbi'i kaa.
Nden mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla oon ummii, darii caka jama'aare ndeen, ƴami Iisa wi'i: —No woodi ko njaabotoɗaa dow ko ɓe mbi'i dow maaɗa ɗum naa?
Iisa deƴƴiti, wi'aay baa. Mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla oon ƴami mo kaden, wi'i: —Aan woni *Almasiihu, Ɓii-Alla Jom barke naa?
Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Miin non. On ngi'an *Ɓii-Neɗɗo no jooɗii nyaamo Jom baawɗe, no wara dow duule.
Sey mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla oon ɓerne mum ummii, serki kolte mum, wi'i: —Haala gom no gaɗa kaden ɓurka ka naa?
On narrii noppi mooɗon ko o bonni innde Alla. Ɗume ngi'uɗon nder huune ndee? Nden ɓe fuu, ɓe mbi'i omo haani wareede, omo haani wareede.
Nder maɓɓe, woɓɓe kaarti tutti dow makko, cuddi yeeso makko, luƴƴii mo, mbi'i mo: —Nde nii a annabiijo, haalan min moy fii ma ! Doomooɓe ɓaade ndeen duu tinni no piya mo.
Wakkati Piyer wonnoo nder batamaare ɓaade mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla oon, sey gooto nder horɓe ɓaade ndeen yottii.
O hi'i Piyer no ƴilfoo, o ƴeewi Piyer faa wooɗi, o wi'i mo: —Aan duu, aɗa wondunoo Iisa mo Nasaratu.
Piyer yeddi, wi'i mo: —Mi anndaa ! Mi faamaay ko kaalataa. No Piyer haaliri haala kaa, sey o ummii, o darowi dammbugal ɓaade ndeen. [Wakkati mum da ndontoori joggini.]
Korɗo oon wurtii, fotti he makko kaden, sey haalani darinooɓe ɗon ɓeen, wi'i ɓe: —Oo duu, no gooto nder maɓɓe !
Piyer yeddi kaden. Ɓooyi seɗɗa gaɗa mum, sey darinooɓe ɗon ɓeen mbi'i mo: —Sikka fuu walaa, nder maɓɓe njeyaɗaa, ngam a ɓii-leydi Galili.
Sey Piyer fuɗɗi hunaade. Omo hunoo, omo hutto, omo wi'a: —Mi anndaa gorko mo kaalaton haala mum oo sam !

Wakkati mum da, ndontoori joggini nde ɗiɗaɓere. Sey Piyer miccitii ko Iisa wi'unoo ɗum: « Fadde ndontoori jogginde kile ɗiɗi, a wi'an a anndaa kam kile tati. » Nden Piyer darii yaasin tinni no wulla no wulla.
Mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla, jannginooɓe *Tawreeta, mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe he tawaaɓe nder hawriine dawrooɓe, kawri illa beete caawodiri. Ɓe kaɓɓi Iisa, ɓe njaari to Pilaatus.
Nden Pilaatus ƴami mo, wi'i: —Aan woni laamiiɗo *Yahudankooɓe oon naa? Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Aan e hoore maa wi'i ka.
Sey mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla ɓeen tinni no pela Iisa dow kujje keewɗe.
Pilaatus ƴamti Iisa kaden wi'i: —Walaa ko njaabotoɗaa naa? A nanaay ko ɓe mbi'i dow maaɗa ɗum fuu naa?
Amma Iisa fiirtaay hunnduko, jaabii ɓe. Rafi njaabaaki Iisa kiin haayɗini Pilaatus.
*Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe fuu, himɓe no cuɓo kasunke gooto mo yoofantee.
*Juulɗe dimɗinol gom ngari fotodiri, gorko gom bi'eteeɗo Barabas no uddidaa he murtuɓe gom. Murtuɓe ɓee, nder murtol mum'en mbaraana goɗɗo.
Nyannde juulɗe ɗee jama'aare wari to Pilaatus, eeli mo o waɗana ɓe ko woowi waɗeede he juulɗe fuu ɗum. Kam woni o yoofana ɓe kasunke gom.
Nden o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i: —Oɗon ngiɗi mi yoofana on laamiiɗo *Yahudankooɓe oo naa?
Pilaatus jaaborake nii ngam no anndi ko haasidaaku waɗi mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla ngaddi Iisa to mum.
Kamɓe duu tutii jama'aare ndeen wara, eela ɗum kam yoofa Barabas no ɓuri kam yoofa Iisa.
Pilaatus ƴamii ɓe kaden, wi'i: —Ndenne, ɗume ngiɗɗon mi waɗa, mo mbi'oton laamiiɗo *Yahudankooɓe oon nee?
Sey ɓe kuuɓi, ɓe mbi'i: —Tontu mo dow *bardugal !
Pilaatus ƴami ɓe, wi'i: —Ɗume o waɗi ko foti nii fuu? Sey ɓe kuuɓi sanne ɓe mbi'i: —Tontu mo dow *bardugal !
Pilaatus yoofi Barabas ngam welnude ɓerne jama'aare ndeen. O hokki laawol Iisa ɓoccee, tontowee dow *leggal bardugal.
Soogeeji ɗiin njaari Iisa nder batamaare ɓaade Pilaatus, ɓe kawri soogeeji ɗiin fuu.
Ɓe ɓornii Iisa alkubbaare woɗeere gom. Ɓe canyi taarde gi'e, ɓe kippi dow hoore makko.
Ɓe puɗɗi salminde he makko, iɓe mbi'a: —Alla sabbinane, laamiiɗo *Yahudankooɓe.
Ɓe piiri mo loocol dow hoore, ɓe kaarti ɓe tutti dow makko. Ɓe kofi yeeso makko, iɓe cujidana mo.
Wakkati ɓe njawinoo mo faa heƴi ɓe, ɓe itti alkubbaare ndeen, ɓe ɓornii mo kolte makko. Ɓe njaari mo yaasin faa ɓe tontowa mo.
Simon, baaba Skandaaru e Rufus, gorko jeyaaɗo Sirene, no wara no ƴuwa gese sey fotti Iisa he soogeeji ɗiin. Soogeeji ɗiin tilsini mo o wakkoo *leggal bardugal Iisa ngaal.
Ɓe njaari Iisa nokkuure wi'eteene Golgota. Maana Golgota woni « nokkuure laalagal hoore ».
Ɓe kokki Iisa cabiijam kawrodiriɗam he ɗakke kaaɗɗe gom ngam o yara, amma o salii.
« Laamiiɗo *Yahudankooɓe » winndaa dow alluwal, ɓe takki ngal dow timtude hoore makko. Ɗum woni sabaabu mo waɗi o tontaa.
Ɓe tontidi mo he wuyɓe ɗiɗo gom, oo nyaamo makko, ooto nano makko. [
Ɗum tabbintini ko dewte mbi'ii: O fiyetee sawru bonɓe. ]
Yawtooɓe har toon ɓeen no njenna mo, no njinnga ko'e mum'en, no mbi'a: —Hey ! Liɓowel *Juulirde mawne, dey nyiɓitoo nde nder balɗe tati,
dannu hoore maa. Jippa dow *leggal bardugal ngaal !
Noon duu, mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla e jannginooɓe *Tawreeta tinni no njaltinoo mo hakkune mum'en, no mbi'a: —O dannii woɓɓe, dey o waawaa dannude hoore makko !
*Almasiihu, Laamiiɗo *Isra'el jippoo dow *leggal bardugal ngal joonin joonin. Nde nii en ngi'ii ɗum, en ngoonɗinan mo ! Himɓe ɗiɗo tontidaaɓe he makko ɓeen duu no njenna mo.
Nyannde Iisa tontanoo ndeen, caka nyalooma, nimre huuri leydi ndiin fuu faa ɗum waɗi jamɗe tati.
Har yamnde tati juura, Iisa fii wullaanu mawnu, wi'i: —Eli, Eli, lema sabaktani? Kam woni: Yaa Alla am ! Yaa Alla am ! Ɗume waɗi ko mboppuɗaa kam?
Wakkati darinooɓe toon ɓeen nanunoo ɗum, woɓɓe nder maɓɓe mbi'i: —Kettinee, omo nii omo nodda Eliya !
Nden gooto nder maɓɓe doggi, suuwowi tekkere nder ndiyam lammuɗam, haɓɓi he loocol, waddi nde hadde hunnduko Iisa ngam Iisa siiɓoo ɗam. Nden o wi'i: —Accee, ndaaren tawte Eliya no waran jippina mo !
Iisa fii wullaanu mawnu kaden, sey o foofi foofaango makko sakitiingo.
Riido palaaɗo nder *Juulirde mawne oon serki illa dow faa ley, laatii pecce ɗiɗi.
Hooreejo soogeeji *Rooma darinooɗo yeeso Iisa oon hi'i no Iisa acciri duuniyaaru. Nden o wi'i: —Sikka fuu walaa, neɗɗo oo no *Ɓii-Alla !
Rewɓe gom toowti ɗon seɗɗa, ndarii no ndaara. Nder maɓɓe no tawa: Mariyaama mo Magdaala, Salome he Mariyaama inna Yoses he Yakuuba inndirteeɗo Pamarel.
Rewɓe ɓee, tokkunoo Iisa no ngollana mo, wakkati o wonnoo Galili. Rewɓe heewɓe gom duu, yaadunooɓe he makko *Ursaliima no ngonnoo ɗon.
Hiiri, fotodiri he jemma *nyalaane fowteteene, himɓe no ciryanoo juulɗe ɗeen.
Sey Yusufu mo Arimatiya, tawaaɗo nder hawriine dawrooɓe, neɗɗo non kettinanteeɗo sanne nder mayre, keɗiiɗo banngol Laamu Alla. O hulaay fuu yahde to Pilaatus ngam ŋaaraade mo ɓanndu Iisa.
Wakkati Pilaatus nanunoo ko Iisa ɓooyaay dow *bardugal ngal ko maayi, ɗum haaynii mo. Nden o noddi mawɗo soogeeji *Rooma, o ƴami ɗum se goonga fuu Iisa maayi.
Wakkati mawɗo soogeeji ɗiin haalannoo mo ɗum, o hokki Yusufu laawol hooƴa ɓanndu Iisa.
Yusufu soodi kasanke, jippini ɓanndu Iisa, waɗi ndu kasanke. O watti mo nder annyeere seɓaane nder tepaare. Gaɗa mum, o waɗi kaaƴa mannga gom tallitaa, dammbugal annyeere ndeen uddaa.
Mariyaama mo Magdaala e Mariyaama inna Yoses ngi'ii to Iisa wattaa.
*Nyalaane fowteteene ndeen wari, yawti. Mariyaama mo Magdaala, Salome he Mariyaama inna Yakuuba, coodi uurdiiji faa mbuja ɓanndu Iisa.
Amma wakkati ɓe njottinoo, ɓe ngi'ii kaaƴa ngaan tallitaama.
Wakkati ɓe naatunoo nder annyeere ndeen, sey ɓe ngi'i har nyaamo maɓɓe, jokolle gom no jooɗii, no ɓornii kolte daneeje, sey ɓe kuli.
Jokolle oon itti hunnduko wi'i ɓe: —To kulee ! Iisa mo Nasaratu tontanooɗo oon, tefoton. O ummitake, o walaa ɗo. Ndaa nokku to o wattanoo ɗon nii.
Joonin sey njehon, mbi'owon Piyer he *aahiiɓe makko ɓeeto ko o artan ɓe Galili. Toon ngi'oyton mo hano no o wi'irnoo on ɗum.
Rewɓe ɓeen ndoggi, mburtii, no ndiwna, ɗum wemmbii ɓe sanne. Ɓe kuli sanne faa ɓe keppi haalande ɗum neɗɗo fuu. [
Alal, illa subaka wakkati Iisa ummitii, Mariyaama mo Magdaala, mo o riiwunoo ginnaaji jeɗɗi dow mum, kam o arti wanngande.
Mariyaama yehi haalanowi wondunooɓe he Iisa ɓeen, o tawi iɓe ɓalinii, iɓe mboya.
Amma baa ko Mariyaama wi'i ɓe he hoore mum hi'i mo, ɓe ngoonɗinaay ummitaaki Iisa kiin.
Gaɗa Iisa wanngani Mariyaama, *aahiiɓe Iisa ɗiɗo gom no pa'i nguroy gom, kamɓe duu o wannganii ɓe nder nanndi gom.
Ɓe ngarti ɓe kaalani *aahiiɓe ɓeeto, amma *aahiiɓe ɓeen ngoonɗinaay haala maɓɓe.

Ko sakitii, o wanngani *aahiiɓe makko sappo e go'o ɓeen, wakkati ɓe nyaamannoo. O nanaay belɗum rafi goonɗinol e njorki ɓerɗe maɓɓe. O duki ɓe duu ngam ɓe ngoonɗinaay warɓe mbi'i kam'en ngi'ii mo, o ummitake.
Nden o wi'i ɓe: —Njehee, mbaajee himɓe dow *Habaru lobbo oo nder kappa kuula duuniyaaru fuu.
Neɗɗo fuu goonɗini, waɗana *batisma, joomum no hisintee. Amma neɗɗo fuu mo goonɗinaay no hiitetee.
Alamaaji kaayɗiniiɗi gi'eteeɗi he goonɗinɓe nii: Ɓe ndiiwan ginnaaji bonɗi dow innde am. Ɓe ndu'oto nder ɗemle feere feereeje ɗe ɓe meeɗaay haalude.
Ɓe nanngiran juuɗe maɓɓe bolle. Baa nii ɓe njari tooke, ɗum waɗantaa ɓe huune fuu. Ɓe njowan juuɗe maɓɓe dow nyawɓe, nyawɓe ɓeen nyawtaa.
Iisa Joomiraawo meeɗen haalani *aahiiɓe mum kujje ɗee fuu, nden o ƴencinaa dow. O yehi o jooɗowi nyaamo Alla.
*Aahiiɓe makko ɓeen duu cankiti nder duuniyaaru, no mbaajoo nokku fuu. Joomiraawo wondi he maɓɓe, o hokki ɓe baawɗe waɗude kaayɗe ngam tabbintinde ko ɓe mbi'ata fuu to makko ɗum ƴuwi.]
Yaa Tawfilus tedduɗo, himɓe ɗuɓɓe puɗɗi winndude habaru dow ko Iisa waɗi hakkune meeɗen.
Habaru mo ɓe mbinndi oo duu, ƴuwaana he kunndule aranɓe seedoriiɓe gite mum'en ko Iisa waɗi. Kamɓe duu laatii halfinaaɓe golle anndinde himɓe haala Alla.
Miin duu, mi tewtirii hakkillo am kujje ɗeen fuu ngam mi winnda ɗe dey-dey no ɗe ngaɗiraa.
Mi winndanii ma habaru oo ngam tabbintina goongaaku ekkintinol ngol keɓuɗaa.

Nder laamu *Hirudus, laamiiɗo leydi Yahudiya, no woodunoo *cakkanoowo Alla gom bi'eteeɗo Jakariya, jeyaaɗo nder hawriine *cakkanooɓe Alla wi'eteene Abiya. Dee-Jakariya no wi'ee Elisabet, o ƴuwi he lenyol Haaruuna.
Jakariya e deekum fuu no dartiiɓe yeeso Alla, feloore fuu walaa he maɓɓe. Ɓe tokkuɓe tilsinooje Joomiraawo e farillaaji mum duu.
Ɓe keɓaay ɓeyŋu, ngam Elisabet no dimaro, ɓe fuu ɗiɗo duu, ɓe naywi.
Wakkati uurdi ndiin wuletee, jama'aare ndeen fuu darii yaasin no du'oo.
Sey maleykaajo Joomiraawo gom wanngani mo, no darii nyaamo urorde ndeen.
Wakkati Jakariya hi'unoo maleykaajo oon, hakkillo makko ummii, kulol nanngi mo.
Amma maleykaajo oon wi'i mo: —Jakariya, taa hulu, ngam du'aa'u maaɗa jaabaama. Elisabet, jom suudu maa, no rimante ɓiɗɗo gorko, inndiraa mo Yahaaya.
Suka dimaaɗo oo no waddante welwelo manngo. Himɓe ɗuɓɓe nanan belɗum dimeeki makko.
O laatoto neɗɗo mawɗo yeeso Joomiraawo. O yarataa cabiijam e ko soptinta hoore fuu. O heewan *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo illa nder reedu inniiko.
O wartiran ɓiɓɓe *Isra'el ɗuɓɓe to Alla Joomiraawo mo ɓe ndewata.

O artan *Almasiihu warde. Nder ir baawɗe Ruuhu Alla ɗe annabi Eliya heɓunoo o wartirta ɓerɗe baabiraaɓe har ɓiɓɓe mum'en, hakkillooji murtuɓe har himɓe dartiiɓe. O siryoo lenyi duu ngam garki Joomiraawo.
Jakariya ƴami maleykaajo oon, wi'i mo: —Noy anndiranmi ko mbiiɗaa ɗum no goonga? Ngam miin, mi naywi, deekam duu, duuɓi mum ɗuuɗi.
Maleykaajo oon jaabii mo, wi'i: —Miin woni Jibirilla takkiiɗo Alla, lilaaɗo he maaɗa ngam haalane habaru lobbo oo.
Joonin a beebeete, a waawtaa yecci sey nyannde ko mbi'umaami ɗum tabbiti, ngam a goonɗinaay. Amma ɗum tabbitowan nde wakkati majjum waɗi.
Himɓe no yaasin no ndoomi Jakariya. Ɗum haayɗini ɓe ko o ɓooyi nder *Juulirde mawne ndeen.
Wakkati o wurtinoo, o heppi fuu haaldude he maɓɓe. Nden ɓe paami ko o hi'i ko haayɗini gom nder mayre. O beebii, o darii omo tinndina ɓe he juuɗe.
Wakkati golle makko kantunoo, o hooti wuro makko.
Balɗe seɗɗa gaɗa mum, deekiiko Elisabet saawi, suuɗii lebbi joy, no wi'a:
—Ndaaree ko Joomiraawo waɗani kam. Nder wakkati mo hiɗi, o hi'i yurmeene am, o ittanii kam mone yeeso himɓe.
Nder lewru Elisabet jeegaɓuru, Alla lili maleyka Jibirilla Nasaratu nder leydi Galili.
O lili mo he surbaajo nannganaaɗo Yusufu, ƴuwɗo he lenyol Daawda. Surbaajo oo no wi'ee Mariyaama, o anndaa gorko abada.
Jibirilla wari to makko, wi'i mo: —Jam woni, aan keɓuɗo moƴƴere ƴuwne to Alla. Joomiraawo no wondi he maaɗa.
Haala Jibirilla ummini hakkillo Mariyaama sanne faa omo ƴama omo ƴamtinoo hoore makko maana sannoore ndee.
Jibirilla wi'i mo: —Taa hulu, Mariyaama, ngam a heɓii moƴƴere ƴuwne to Alla.
Ndaa, a saawan, ndimaa ɓiɗɗo gorko, inndiraa mo Iisa.
O laatoto mawɗo, o noddirtee *Ɓii-Alla Toowɗo. Alla Joomiraawo hokkan mo laamu maamiiko Daawda.
O laamoto dow lenyol Yakuuba faa abada abadin, laamu makko duu walaa keerol.
Mariyaama ƴami maleyka Jibirilla, wi'i: —Noy ɗum laatortoo, miin mo anndaa gorko sam?
Jibirilla jaabii mo, wi'i: —*Ruuhu Ceniiɗo no jippoto dow maaɗa, baawɗe Alla Toowɗo no huurete. Ngam majjum, ɓiɗɗo ceniiɗo mo ndimataa oon no noddirtee *Ɓii-Alla.
Ndaa Elisabet, sakiike maa duu saawi. Baa ko o naywi, o riman ɓiɗɗo gorko. Kanko mo himɓe mbi'annoo no dimaro, jooni omo nder lewru makko jeegaɓuru,
ngam walaa fuu ko hepporta Alla.
Mariyaama jaabii mo, wi'i: —Ndaa, mi korɗo Joomiraawo. Ɗum waɗa he am hano no mbi'irɗaa. Nden maleykaajo oon dilli.
Nder balɗe Jibirilla haaldunoo he Mariyaama, nyannde gom Mariyaama ummii dow ko yaawi yehi nder wuro leydi Yahudiya gom tawaango nder baamle.
Wakkati o yottinoo, o naati nder hoggo Jakariya, o sanni Elisabet.
Wakkati Elisabet nanunoo sannoore Mariyaama ndeen, ɓiyiiko dimmbi nder reedu makko. Elisabet hebbinaa *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo,
o huuɓi daane mawne, o wi'i: —A barkinaaɗo ɓurɗo rewɓe fuu, ɓiɗɗo gonɗo nder reedu maa duu no barkinaaɗo !
Noy potumi, faa inna Joomiraawo am wara to am?
Ndaa, wakkati sannoore maa toɓɓinoo nder nowru am, ɓiɗɗo gonɗo nder reedu am dimmborake welwelo.
A belɗo hoore, aan goonɗinɗo kumnol ko Joomiraawo wi'unoo ma !
Mariyaama wi'i: —Yonki am no teddina Joomiraawo,
ɓerne am duu heewi welwelo Alla Kisinoowo kam,
ngam o jaɓi daarude kam, miin korɗo makko leesuɗo. Illa jooni, jamanuuji fuu no noddiran kam belɗo hoore.
Ngam Jom baawɗe waɗanii kam kujje mawɗe ! Innde makko no seniine.
Yurmeene makko no faa abada dow hulooɓe mo fuu nder jamanuuji fuu.
O waɗi kujje mawɗe he junngo makko semmbiɗingo, o sankitii ɓe ɓerɗe mum'en keewiri mawnitaare.
O jippinii laamiiɓe dow laamu mum'en, leesuɓe duu, o ɓanti ɗum'en.
O harni rafaaɓe kujje lobbe, riikuɓe duu, o soƴƴi ɗum'en juuɗe ɓole.
Mariyaama jooɗodii he Elisabet ko waɗata lebbi tati, nden gaɗa mum o hooti.
Wakkati lebbi Elisabet kuuɓunoo, o rimi ɓiɗɗo gorko.
Wondiraaɓe makko e koreeji makko fuu nani moƴƴere mawne ndee nde Joomiraawo waɗani mo. Nden ɓe kawri ɓe mbelbeltidi he makko.
Wakkati cukalel ngel waɗunoo balɗe jeɗɗi, himɓe ngari juulnol maggel. Ɓe ngiɗiino wattande ngel Jakariya,
amma inniigel jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Aa'a, ngel wattee Yahaaya.
Nden ɓe njaabii Elisabet, ɓe mbi'i: —Nder lenyol maa fuu, walaa inndiraaɗo ir innde ndee.
Ɓe ƴami baabiigel nder beebeere, noy o hiɗi ngel wattanee.
O wi'i kam hokkee alluwal. O hokkaa ngal nden o winndi dow maggal o wi'i: —Ngel wattanee Yahaaya. Ɗum haayɗini himɓe fuu.
Wakkati Jakariya wi'unoo ngel wattanee Yahaaya, wakkati mum da, hunnduko makko fiirtii, ɗemngal makko yoofaa, o fuɗɗi omo haala, omo teddina Alla.
Kulal nanngi tawaaɓe seraaji makko fuu. Habaru oon sankitii nder wurooji tawaaɗi nder baamle Yahudiya fuu.
Nanuɗo habaru oo fuu jogii mo nder ɓerne mum, tinni no ƴama hoore mum no wi'a: « Ɗume cukalel ngel laatoytoo nde ngel mawni? » Ngam nde goonga junngo Joomiraawo no wondi he maggel.
Jakariya, baaba cukalel ngel heewnaa *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, nden waɗi annabaaku, wi'i:
—Teddungal laatanoo Joomiraawo, Alla *Isra'el, ngam o walli himɓe makko, o soptini ɓe.
O lildani en Kisinoowo jom semmbe, jippotooɗo he golloowo makko Daawda.
Ɗum duu woni ko o haalunoo illa arannde har kunndule annabiiɓe makko seniiɓe.
O wi'i o hisinan en honnooɓe en, o soptinan en he juuɗe wayɓe men fuu.
O holli maamiraaɓe men yurmeene o jogake amaana makko ceniiɗo,
amaana mo o hunaninoo maamii'en *Ibrahim.
Aan duu, ɓinngel am, a noddirtee annabiijo Alla Toowɗo, ngam a ardoto Joomiraawo moƴƴinana mo laawol makko.
Anndinaa himɓe makko laawol kisinam ngam hakkeeji maɓɓe no njaafetee.
Alla meeɗen no keewɗo yurmeene mawne, ngam yurmeene makko, o lildowan en jeyngol makko manngol diga dow,
ngam ngol yaynana tawaaɓe nder nimre e wonɓe nder ɗowdi maayde, ngol ɗowa en dow laawol jam.
Yahaaya no mawna, hakkillo mum no ɓeydoo. O hoɗowi nder ladde yeeruure naako wakkati mo o wanngintee yeeso himɓe *Isra'el oon yottii.
Nder balɗe dimeeki Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma, Ogustus mawɗo laamiiɓe leydi *Rooma, tilsini jooɗiiɓe nder laamu *Rooma fuu limee.
Limngal ngaal duu woni limngal aranal gaɗaangal wakkati Kiriniyus wonnoo guferner leydi Siriya.
Neɗɗo fuu yehi nder wuro mum'en ngam limee.
Wakkati ɓe njottinoo Baytilaama, ŋatawere nanngi mo.
Ɓe keɓaay nokku nder suudu nannganaadu weerɓe nduun. Nden ɓe cori ley mayru, toon to dabbaaji kaɓɓetee ɓe njippi. Ɗon o rimi afo makko, o soomi nder wudere lobbere, o fukkini nder akala.
Nder jemma mo Iisa rimetee, durooɓe gom ngari no coggina dabbaaji mum'en nder seraaji Baytilaama.
Maleykaajo Joomiraawo gom wanngani ɓe, teddungal Joomiraawo yayni ɓe, sey kulal manngal nanngi ɓe.
Nden Maleykaajo oon wi'i ɓe: —To kulee, ngam mi waddani on habaru lobbo. Habaru laatantooɗo himɓe fuu welwelo manngo.
Hannden nder wuro Daawda on ndimanaama Kisinoowo, kanko woni *Almasiihu, Joomiraawo.
Ndaaree, ɗum woni alaama mo kokkeɗon: On tawan cukalel keccel no soomaa nder wudere lobbere, no fukkinaa nder akala.
Wakkati mum da maleykaaɓe ɗuɓɓe gom duu, ƴuwi dow, ngari, tawi maleykaajo arano oon, nden ɓe fuu ɓe tinni iɓe njetta Alla, iɓe mbi'a:
—Teddungal laatanoo Alla toon dow, jam laatoo dow leydi ngam horsuɓe e makko.
Wakkati maleykaaɓe ɓeen ƴeenyunoo dow kammu, sey durooɓe ɓeen mbi'odiri: —En njaha Baytilaama, ndaarowen ko waɗi, ko Joomiraawo anndini en ɗum.
Nden ɓe njaawɗi, ɓe njehi, ɓe tawi Mariyaama, Yusufu he cukalel keccel ngeel, ingel fukkinaa nder akala.
Wakkati ɓe ngi'unoo cukalel ngeel, ɓe pillii ko maleykaajo oon haalannoo ɓe fuu dow maggel.
Nanuɓe ko durooɓe ɓeen mbi'unoo fuu ɗum haayɗini ɗum'en sanne.
Mariyaama kam duu jogii ko ɓe mbi'i ɗum nder ɓerne mum, tinni no miiloo dow majjum.
Durooɓe ɓeen coƴƴiti, no teddina Alla, no njetta mo, ngam ko ɓe nani e ko ɓe ngi'ii ɗum, waɗiri dey-dey no maleykaajo oon wi'irnoo ɓe.
Balɗe jeɗɗi gaɗa dimeeki cukalel ngeel, ngel juulnaa, ngel wattanaa Iisa. Innde ndee woni innde nde maleykaajo oon haalannoo Mariyaama illa saawaaynoo reedu maggel.
Wakkati balɗe lamnol Mariyaama kuuɓunoo, hano no *Tawreeta Muusa tilsiniri ɗum, Yusufu e Mariyaama njaari Iisa *Ursaliima ngam halfinde mo Joomiraawo.
Ngam ɗum woni ko Joomiraawo wi'i nder *Tawreeta: Ɓiɗɗo, gorko afo fuu no cuɓanaaɗo Joomiraawo.
Ɓe ngari sakkude buugaali ɗiɗi naa tantabalaaji pamari ɗiɗi hano no ɗum woni iɗum winndiraa nder *Tawreeta nii.
Simeyon, gorko dartiiɗo, tokkuɗo Alla he ɓerne worre, no wonnoo nder wuro *Ursaliima. Omo heɗi wakkati gonɗi *Isra'el moytetee. *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo no wondi he makko.
Ruuhu oo wannginani mo ko o maayataa o hi'aay *Almasiihu Joomiraawo.
Nyannde Yusufu e Mariyaama ngaddunoo Iisa faa ngaɗana mo ko *Tawreeta tilsini, nyannde mum *Ruuhu oon ɗowi Simeyon faa nder *Juulirde mawne.
Nden Simeyon adi Iisa temmbi mo, yetti Alla, wi'i:
—Joonin Joomam, accu miin, maccuɗo maa, mi maaya he jam, ngam a jogake haala maa.
Mi hi'iri gite am kisinam maaɗa,
kisinam ɗam ciryiɗaa ngam himɓe fuu,
jeyngol bannginaangol ngam lenyi duuniyaaru fuu, jeyngol teddinoowol *Isra'el, lenyol maa.
Ko haalaa dow cukalel ngeel haayɗini inniigel e baabiigel.
Simeyon barkini ɓe, wi'i inniigel Mariyaama: —Cukalel ngeel, ngel giɗaangel, ngel wari liɓude ɗuɓɓe e umminde ɗuɓɓe nder *Isra'el. Ngel laatoto alaama Alla mo himɓe caloto.
Ngel wannginan miilooji ɓerɗe himɓe ɗuɓɓe gonɗi no cuuɗi. Aan duu, Mariyaama, naawɗum yuwan ɓerne maa hano no takubaahi yuwirta goɗɗum.

Nder wakkati juulnol cukalel ngel nii no woodunoo annabiijo debbo gom bi'eteeɗo Anna, ɓii-Fanu'el, jeyaaɗo he lenyol Asiira. Debbo oo nii naywi sanne. O haɓɓanaama illa omo surbaajo. Duuɓi jeɗɗi gaɗa dewngal makko, goriiko maayi.
O jooɗii o walaa goriiyo faa o naywi, duuɓi makko duu no ngaɗa lasooji-nay e nay (84). O faddaaki koyngal makko abada he *Juulirde mawne. Omo teddina Alla, omo suumoo. Omo du'oo jemma e nyalooma.
Nder wakkati mum, kanko duu o wari, omo yetta Alla. Omo haalana heɗiiɓe coptinol *Ursaliima fuu, habaru cukalel ngeel.
Wakkati saarooɓe Iisa kumnunoo ko Joomiraawo wi'unoo nder *Tawreeta fuu, ɓe coƴƴi Nasaratu.
Cukalel ngeel no mawna no semmbiɗa. Ingel heewaa hakkillo, moƴƴere Alla duu no wondi he maggel.
Hitaane fuu he *Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe, saarooɓe Iisa no njeha *Ursaliima.
Wakkati Iisa wannoo duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi, ɓe njehi *Ursaliima hano no ɓe mboowrunoo, ɓe njaari Iisa gaɗa maɓɓe.
Amma ɓe ngiitaay mo. Nden ɓe coƴƴi *Ursaliima ngam tefude mo.
Balɗe tati gaɗa mum, ɓe ngiiti mo nder *Juulirde mawne. Omo jooɗii hakkune jannginooɓe *Tawreeta, omo hettinanii ɓe, omo waɗana ɓe ƴamɗe.
Nanuɓe ƴamɗe makko, faamo makko e njaabaaki fuu makko ɗum haayɗini ɗum'en.

Wakkati saarooɓe makko ngi'unoo mo hakkune jannginooɓe *Tawreeta ɓee, ɗum haayɗini ɓe sanne. Sey inniiko wi'i mo: —Iisa am, no waɗi ko ngaɗɗaa min huune ndee? Miin e bammaa, hakkillooji amin fuu ummake sanne. Min tinni miɗen tefe.
Nden Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Ɗume tefanton kam? On anndaa ko no tilsi mi hinnoo golleeji *Baaba am naa?
Amma saarooɓe ɓeen paamaay haalaaji makko ɗii.
Nden o tokki ɓe, ɓe kooti Nasaratu. Omo ɗowtanoo ɓe. Inniiko jogii kujje ɗee fuu nder ɓerne mum.
Iisa no mawna, hakkillo mum no ɓeydoo. Omo weli Alla e himɓe fuu.
Ko nii waɗi haala Alla ka wanngi yahde he makko, sey Yahaaya ummii yehi nder leyɗe tawaaɗe hadde maayo Urdun. Omo nodda himɓe tuuba ngam hakkeeji maɓɓe njaafee, ɓe njaɓa ngaɗanee *batisma
hano no ɗum winndiraa nder dewtere annabi *Esaaya wi'aa: Daane no huuɓa nder ladde yeeruure no wi'a: Ciryee laabi ɗi Joomiraawo tokkata, moƴƴinee ɗi ngam garki makko.
Naɗɗere fuu hebbinee, waamnde e ƴolde fuu leynee, guurti oonyiiɗi ndartinee, laabi bonuɗi moƴƴinee.
Neɗɗo fuu hi'an kisinam Alla.
Himɓe ɗuɓɓe ngari to Yahaaya ngam o waɗana ɓe *batisma. Nden o wi'i ɓe: —Onon ɓiɓɓe bolle ! Moy wi'i ndogganon tikkere Alla waroore?
Ngaɗee ko hollata on tuubii. Nde on mbi'i nder ɓerɗe mooɗon on jippotooɓe he *Ibrahim, miin mi wi'an on: Alla no waawi wayli kaaƴe ɗee, ɗe laatoo taaniraaɓe *Ibrahim.
Joonin jammbere aagaama ngam soppude ɗaɗi leɗɗe. Ndenne, lekki fuu ki rimataa ɓiɓɓe lobbe, no soppetee, faɗɗee nder hiite.
Himɓe ɗuɓɓe ƴami mo, mbi'i: —Ndenne, ɗume min kaani waɗude?
Nden o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i: —Neɗɗo fuu jogiiɗo toggooje ɗiɗi, hokka mo walaa worre. Jogiiɗo nyaamdu duu, waɗa hano non.
*Jaɓooɓe janngal duu ngari faa ngaɗanee *batisma, ɓe ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Moodibbo, ɗume min kaani waɗude?
Yahaaya jaabii kamɓe duu, wi'i: —To ɓeydee dow ko mbi'aɗon njaɓon.

Soogeeji gom duu ƴami mo, mbi'i: —Minen nee, ɗume min kaani waɗude? O jaabii ɓe, o wi'i: —To teetiree njawdi neɗɗo fuu semmbe semmbe. To tuumee neɗɗo fuu dow fewre ngam njaɓon ceede he mum. Ndaree he njobdi mon.
Himɓe kaaɓi ngi'aay *Almasiihu. Neɗɗo fuu no ƴama hoore mum no wi'a naa Yahaaya woni *Almasiihu?
Nden Yahaaya wi'i ɓe: —Miin, ndiyam ngaɗirananmi on *batisma, amma ɓurɗo kam baawɗe no wara. Mi fotaay baa fiirtude ɓoggi paɗe makko. Kanko kay, *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo e hiite o waɗiranta on *batisma.
Omo jogii ƴarorde makko ngam ƴaraade alkamaari makko faa laaɓa. O hawra gabbe makko, o loowa nder ƴeelu. Nden o wula nyaane ndeen nder hiite nge nyifataa abada.
Yahaaya no waajoo himɓe dow *Habaru lobbo, omo hollita ɓe dow kujje ɗuɗɗe.
*Hirudus, teeti mawnum debbo mum bi'eteeɗo Hirudiya. Nden Yahaaya feli mo, o feli mo duu dow kujje bonɗe fuu ɗe o waɗannoo.
Sey *Hirudus ɓeydi waɗude bone kaden, o uddi Yahaaya.
Wakkati himɓe fuu ngaɗantee *batisma, Iisa duu waɗana *batisma. Wakkati o du'otonoo, sey kammu omtii,
*Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippii dow makko nder nanndi wuugaanu. Daane gom ƴuwi dow, wi'i: —Aan woni Ɓiyam korsuɗo. Aan naniranmi belɗum.
Wakkati Iisa fuɗɗi golle mum, o faanake duuɓi woronja (30). Nder miilooji himɓe Iisa no ɓii-Yusufu. Yusufu duu no ɓii-Eli,
Eli ɓii-Mattat, Mattat ɓii-Lewi, *Lewi ɓii-Melki, Melki ɓii-Yannaay, Yannaay ɓii-Yusufu,
Yusufu ɓii-Mattatiya, Mattatiya ɓii-Amos, Amos ɓii-Nahum, Nahum ɓii-Hesli, Hesli ɓii-Naggaay,
Naggaay ɓii-Maata, Maata ɓii-Mattatiya, Mattatiya ɓii-Semeyin, Semeyin ɓii-Yosek, Yosek ɓii-Yoda,
Yoda ɓii-Yowanan, Yowanan ɓii-Resa, Resa ɓii-Jorobaabiila, Jorobaabiila ɓii-Salaatiyel, Salaatiyel ɓii-Neeri,
Neeri ɓii-Melki, Melki ɓii-Addi, Addi ɓii-Koosam, Koosam ɓii-Elmadam, Elmadam ɓii-Eri,
Eri ɓii-Iisa, Iisa ɓii-Eliyeser, Eliyeser ɓii-Yoorim, Yoorim ɓii-Mattat, Mattat ɓii-Lewi,
*Lewi ɓii-Simeyon, Simeyon ɓii-Yahuuda, Yahuuda ɓii-Yusufu, Yusufu ɓii-Yonam, Yonam ɓii-Eliyakim,
Eliyakim ɓii-Meleya, Meleya ɓii-Menna, Menna ɓii-Mattata, Mattata ɓii-Natan, Natan ɓii-Daawda,
Daawda ɓii-Yesa, Yesa ɓii-Yobed, Yobed ɓii-Bo'es, Bo'as ɓii-Sala, Sala ɓii-Naason,
Naason ɓii-Aminadabu, Aminadaabu ɓii-Admin, Admin ɓii-Arni, Arni ɓii-Hesruna, Hesruuna ɓii-Fares, Fares ɓii-Yahuuda,
*Yahuuda ɓii-Yakuuba, Yakuuba ɓii-Isiyaaku, Isiyaaku ɓii-Ibrahim, *Ibrahim ɓii-Tera, Tera ɓii-Nakor,
Nakor ɓii-Seruku, Seruku ɓii-Ragaw, Ragaw ɓii-Faleka, Faleka ɓii-Eber, Eber ɓii-Sala,
Sala ɓii-Kayinan, Kayinan ɓii-Arfakasada, Arfakasada ɓii-Sem, Sem ɓii-Nuhu, Nuhu ɓii-Lemek,
Lemek ɓii-Metusela, Metusela ɓii-Enok, Enok ɓii-Yaret, Yaret ɓii-Maleliyel, Maleliyel ɓii-Kayinan,
Kayinan ɓii-Enos, Enos ɓii-Setu, Setu ɓii-Aadamu, Aadamu ɓii-Alla.
Iisa ƴuwi maayo Urdun no heewi *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo. *Ruuhu oon ɗowi mo nder ladde yeeruure.
Toon Ibiliisa sii'ii mo balɗe lasooji ɗiɗi. O nyaamaay fuy nder balɗe lasooji ɗiɗi ɗee fuu faa o rafaa.
Nden Ibiliisa wi'i mo: —Se goonga fuu a *Ɓii-Alla, tilsin hayre ndee laatoo nyaamdu.
Sey Iisa jaabii mo wi'i: —Dewtere Alla wi'i: Hanaa nyaamdu tan neɗɗo wuurdata.
Nden Ibiliisa yaari mo nokkuure toowne gom, holli mo nder maƴƴere hitere laamuuji duuniyaaru fuu,
wi'i mo: —Mi hokkete baawɗe dow majji, ɗi fuu, kanƴi e teddungal majji fuu ngam mi hokkaama ɗi. Miɗo waawi hokki ɗi mo muuyanmi fuu.
Nde a sujidanii kam, mi hokkete ɗi, ɗii fuu.
Sey Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Dewtere Alla wi'i: Alla Joomiraawo maa tan kaanɗaa sujidande. Kanko tan kaanɗaa rewude.
Nden Ibiliisa yaari mo huɓeere *Ursaliima, darni mo dow hoore *Juulirde mawne, wi'i mo: —Se goonga fuu a *Ɓii-Alla, jikku,
ngam Dewtere Alla wi'i: Alla tilsinan maleykaaɓe mum ndeene.
Ɓe taɓɓite to koyngal maaɗa fii he hayre.
Sey Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Dewtere Alla wi'i: A sii'ataako Alla Joomiraawo maa.
Wakkati Ibiliisa sii'ii mo iri cii'aaki fuu, sey dilli acci mo faa nde gom.
Iisa soƴƴii Galili, baawɗe *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo no dow makko. Habaru makko sankitii nder leydi Galili ndiin fuu.
Omo waajoo nder *baajorɗi *Yahudankooɓe, himɓe fuu no teddina mo.
Nyannde gom Iisa yehi Nasaratu, wuro ngo o mawnunoo nder mum. Nyannde mum ɗum fotodiri *nyalaane fowteteene. O naati *waajordu hano no o woowrunoo. O ummii faa o jannga,
sey o hokkaa dewtere annabi *Esaaya. O taggiti nde, o fotodiri he nokku to winndaa, wi'aa:
—*Ruuhu Joomiraawo no dow am, ngam o suɓake kam, ngam talkaaɓe mbaajee *Habaru lobbo. O lili kam ngam nanngaaɓe kaalanee joofol mum'en, wumɓe duu, bumtinol mum'en, torraaɓe keɓa dimɗinol mum'en.
Himɓe duu kaalanee wakkati mo Joomiraawo wannginta moƴƴere mum.
O taggi dewtere ndeen, o hokkiti deenoowo *waajordu nduun, o jooɗii. Wonnooɓe toon fuu puttini gite he makko.
Sey o wi'i ɓe: —Ko nanuɗon nder dewtere Alla ndee, tabbiti hannden.
Ɓe mani mo ɓe fuu. Haalaaji lobbi burtiɗi nder hunnduko makko ɗiin duu haayɗini ɓe. Nden ɓe mbi'i: —Hanaa o ɓii-Yusufu naa?
Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Sikka fuu walaa, on ngaɗanan kam banndol ngool mbi'on: « Cawroowo, sawru hoore maa ». On mbi'an kam kaden: « Ɗo duu wuro maa non. Ndenne, waɗu ko min nani ngaɗɗaa nder Kafarnahum. »
Iisa ɓeydi wi'ude ɓe kaden: —Nde goonga miɗo wi'a on, annabiijo fuu jaɓɓataake nder wuro mum.

Goonga miɗo haalana on, nder jamaanu annabi Eliya, ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en maayunoo no ɗuuɗi nder leydi *Isra'el. Wakkati ndiyam waɗunoo duuɓi tati e lebbi jeegom toɓaayno, rafo manngo gom waɗiino nder leydi ndiin fuu.
Amma Eliya lilaaka he baa gooto maɓɓe, sey he debbo mo gorum maayi gom, debbo jeyaaɗo Sarepta nder leydi Sidon.
Nder jamaanu annabi Eliisa, seppinɓe no ɗuuɗunoo nder *Isra'el. Amma baa gooto maɓɓe nyawtaaka, nde hanaa Naaman, jeyaaɗo leydi Siriya.
Wakkati wonnooɓe nder *waajordu nduun, nanunoo haala kaa, ka mettini ɓerɗe maɓɓe sanne.
Ɓe nanngi Iisa ɓe njaari mo gaɗa wuro ngoon. Ɓe njaari mo toon dow hoore waamnde nde dow mum, wuro ngoon nyiɓa, ngam ɓe tutoo mo o saama ley.
Amma Iisa feeri hakkune maɓɓe, dilli.
Iisa yehi Kafarnahum nder leydi Galili. *Nyalaane fowteteene gom o naati *waajordu omo waajoo.
Waaju makko haayɗini ɓe ngam he baawɗe o waajorii ɓe.
Gorko gom, mo ginnaaru woni dow mum no tampinaa no tawaa nder *waajordu nduun. Sey ginnaaru nduun huuɓi daane toowne, wi'i:
—Hey ! Iisa mo Nasaratu, ɗume ngiɗaa waɗude min? A wari faa mbaraa min naa? Miɗo anndi moy woni ma. A Ceniiɗo ƴuwɗo to Alla !
Sey Iisa laayani ginnaaru nduun, sajiti he mayru, wi'i: —Maɓɓu hunnduko maa, takkita mo ! Ndu liɓi gorko oon hakkune himɓe. Ndu takkiti mo, walaa to ndu nawni he ɓanndu makko.
Ɗum haayɗini himɓe ɓeen fuu. Nden ɓe tinni iɓe ƴamodira, iɓe mbi'a: —Iri kaye woni haala kaa? Ngam haala makko kaa no woodi baawɗe e semmbe. Omo dawrana baa ginnaaji, iɗi takkitoo neɗɗo.
Habaru Iisa oo sankitii nder leyɗe ɗeen fuu.
Iisa wurtii *waajordu nduun, yehi wuro Simon Piyer. Eso Simon Piyer debbo no wondi wulowulo naawngo, ɓe ƴami Iisa walla mo.
Iisa turii dow makko, tilsini wulowulo ngoon hela. Ngo heli, debbo oon yamɗiti, ummii wakkati mum da, jaɓɓii ɓe.
Ko naange yani, wooduɓe nyawɓe, nyawirɓe nyawuuji ir iriiji fuu ngaddi nyawɓe mum'en to makko. O deki juuɗe makko dow maɓɓe, o yamɗintini ɓe, ɓe fuu, gooto gooto.
Ginnaaji ɗiin no takkitoo himɓe heewɓe, no kuuɓa, no mbi'a: —Aan woni *Ɓii-Alla. Amma Iisa no sajito he majji, omo haɗa ɗi haalude, ngam iɗi anndi kanko woni *Almasiihu.
Ko weeti, Iisa wurtii Kafarnahum, yehi nder nokkuure yeewne gom. Himɓe heewɓe tinni no tefa mo faa ngiitowi mo. Ɓe njaɓaay o seeda he maɓɓe kaden.
Amma Iisa wi'i ɓe: —No tilsi mi waajoo *Habaru lobbo dow Laamu Alla nder gure feere feereeje. Ngam majjum waɗi lilowaami.
Iisa yehi no waajoo nder *baajorɗi leydi Yahudiya.
Nyannde gom, Iisa no darii dow fonngo peta Genesaret, jama'aare no dow makko no ɓillodira ngam hettinoo haala Alla.
Iisa holliri laanaaji ɗiɗi gom no panndi dow fonngo peta ngaan. Nanngooɓe liƴƴi gom mburtii nder majji no loota taaruuji mum'en.
Simon bi'eteeɗo Piyer no tawa nder maɓɓe. Sey Iisa naati nder laana makko, wi'i mo, o awƴoo ka seɗɗa, ɓe mboɗɗoo fonngo ngoon. Iisa jooɗii nder makka tinni no waajoo jama'aare ndeen.
Wakkati o hantunoo waaju makko, o wi'i Simon: —Yah to luggiɗi, paɗɗon taaruuji mon, aan e banndiraaɓe maa, nanngon liƴƴi.
Simon jaabii Iisa, wi'i mo: —Moodibbo, min mbaalii miɗen ngolla, min keɓaay baafuy. Amma ngam a haali, mi faɗɗan taaruuji ɗiin.
Wakkati ɓe paɗɗunoo ɗi, ɗi nanngi liƴƴi ɗuɗɗi faa ɗi puɗɗi serkude.
Nden ɓe noddi banndiraaɓe maɓɓe gom wonɓe nder laana feereha gom ngara mballira ɓe. Ɓe ngari, ɓe kebbini laanaaji ɗiɗi ɗiin fuu, faa ɗi kosi rufude.
Wakkati Simon hi'unoo ɗum, o diccii yeeso Iisa, o wi'i mo: —Moodibbo, woɗɗam, ngam miin mi gaɗoowo hakke.
Simon haalani Iisa haala kaa ngam kanko e wonduɓe he makko ɓeen fuu, ɗuuɗal liƴƴi nanngaaɗi ɗii haayɗini ɓe.
Yakuuba e Yahaaya ɓiɓɓe Jebede gollidooɓe he Simon ɓeen duu, ɗum haayɗini ɓe. Nden Iisa jaabii Simon wi'i mo: —Taa hulu, ɓaawo hannden a laatoto nanngoowo himɓe.
Wakkati ɓe panndini laanaaji maɓɓe, ɓe mboppi ɗi, ɗii fuu, ɓe tokki Iisa.
Nyannde gom gorko ceppinɗo gom wari, tawi Iisa nder wuro gom. Wakkati o hi'unoo Iisa, o turni yeeso makko faa he leydi, o wi'i mo: —Moodibbo, nde nii a jaɓi, aɗa waawi yamɗintinde kam.
Sey Iisa foorti junngo mum, meemi mo, wi'i: —Mi jaɓi, yamɗitin ! Wakkati mum da, gorko oon yamɗiti.
Nden Iisa wi'i mo: —To haalan ɗum neɗɗo fuu. Amma yah holloy hoore maa *cakkanoowo Alla, ngaɗaa cakkol ngol *Muusa tilsini waɗee ngam hollude himɓe ko sikka fuu walaa a yamɗiti.
Amma baa nii ko Iisa haɗi mo haalande himɓe, habaru oo sankitake nokku fuu. Jama'aare warta, no hawra to makko ngam hettinaade waaju makko e yamɗintineede he nyawuuji mum'en.
Iisa duu wakkati warde wakkati no wurto yeha nder nokkuuje jeewɗe ngam du'oo.

Nyannde gom Iisa no waajoo, tawi *Fariisa'en e jannginooɓe *Tawreeta, ƴuwɓe gure Galili, Yahudiya, e *Ursaliima fuu no njooɗii ɗoon hadde makko. Baawɗe Alla Joomiraawo no wondi he makko omo yamɗintina nyawɓe.
Woɓɓe ngaddi gorko bonnguujo gom no fukkinaa dow kooƴirngal maayɓe. Iɓe tefa nannude mo nder suudu ndu Iisa woni nder mum ngam ɓe pukkina mo yeeso makko.

Amma ɓe keɓaay fuu no ɓe nanniri mo ngam jama'aare woodi sanne. Sey ɓe ƴeenyidi he makko dow suudu nduun. Ɓe kunci ndu, ɓe njippini mo caka himɓe fuu yeeso Iisa. Omo fukkii dow kooƴirngal maayɓe ngaal.
Wakkati Iisa hi'unoo no goonɗinol maɓɓe foti, o wi'i bonnguujo oon: —Higo, hakkeeji maa njaafaama.
Sey jannginooɓe *Tawreeta e *Fariisa'en tinni no mbi'a nder ɓerɗe mum'en: —Ɗume waɗi gorko oo no bonna innde Alla? Moy waawi yaafaade hakke se hanaa Alla?
Iisa faami miilooji maɓɓe, jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Ɗume waɗi ko oɗon miiloo ir miilooji ɗii nder ɓerɗe mooɗon?
Ɗume ɓuri hoyde hakkune wi'ude bonnguujo oo « Hakkeeji mum njaafaama » naa « O ummoo, o dilla »?
Amma miɗo hiɗi paamon ko *Ɓii-Neɗɗo no jogii baawɗe yaafaade hakkeeji himɓe nder duuniyaaru nduu. Sey o wi'i bonnguujo oon: —Miɗo haalane: « Umma, hooƴu kooƴirngal maayɓe ngal ngaddireɗaa, hootu. »
Wakkati mum da, bonnguujo oon ummii yeeso himɓe fuu, hooƴi kooƴirngal mum, hooti, no yetta Alla.
Ɗum haayɗini himɓe fuu, ɓe tinni iɓe njetta Alla. Kulal nanngi ɓe, ɓe mbi'ii: —Hannden en ngi'ii haayne.
Gaɗa bonngitol gorko oo, Iisa wurtii, hi'i jaɓoowo janngal gom bi'eteeɗo Lewi no jooɗii nder suudu janngal, nden wi'i mo: —Tokkam !
Sey Lewi acci are mum fuu, ummii, tokki mo.
Lewi waɗi nyaamduuji ir-iriiji ndefaa wuro mum ngam Iisa. Jaɓooɓe janngal ɗuɓɓe e himɓe gom no nyaamda he maɓɓe.
Sey *Fariisa'en e jannginooɓe maɓɓe puɗɗi no nguuntoo, no mbi'a *aahiiɓe Iisa: —Ɗume waɗi oɗon nyaamda, oɗon njarda he *jaɓooɓe janngal, he waɗooɓe hakke ɓee?
Sey Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Nyawɗo haajaa cawroowo hanaa jamɗuɗo.
Mi waraay noddude miilooɓe kam'en no dartiiɓe. Mi waraana ngam annduɓe kam'en no waɗooɓe hakke faa ɓe tuuba.
*Fariisa'en gom mbi'i Iisa: —Aahiiɓe Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma no cuumoo sanne, iɓe ndu'oo duu, non aahiiɓe amin duu ngaɗata. Amma *aahiiɓe maaɗa kay, no nyaama, no njara !
Iisa jaabii ɓe wi'i: —Oɗon mbaawi suuminde warɓe ɓanngal, wakkati ɓaŋuɗo oon no wondi he maɓɓe naa?
Amma nyalaaɗe ngaran ɗe ɓaŋuɗo oon suutetee hakkune maɓɓe. Nder balɗe ɗeen ɓe cuumoto.

Nden Iisa waɗani ɓe kippol haala ngool, wi'i ɓe: —Neɗɗo fuu serkataa koltal kesal, itta lefol he maggal nyoota he koltal kiinngal. Nde joomum waɗi ɗum, no bonnan kesal ngaal, tawa lefol kesol ngool duu yaadaay he kiinngal ngaal.
Kaden duu, neɗɗo fuu loowataa cabiijam kesam nder sumalleeji kiɗɗi. Nde joomum waɗi ɗum, cabiijam kesam ɗaam fusan ɗi, ɗam rufa, sumalleeji ɗiin duu mursee.
Amma cabiijam kesam nder sumalleeji kesi haani loowee.
Neɗɗo fuu yari cabiijam kiɗɗam, hiɗaa kesam, ngam joomum no wi'an kiiɗɗam ɗaam ɓuri welde.
*Nyalaane fowteteene gom, Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum no peddita gese alkamaaje, sey *aahiiɓe ɓeen tinni no mborsoo camme alkama, no molma ɗe, no ƴakka.
Nden *Fariisa'en gom mbi'i ɓe: —Ko waɗi oɗon ngaɗa ko haɗaa nder *nyalaane fowteteene?
Sey Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —On njanngaay ko Daawda waɗunoo wakkati kanko he yaadiraaɓe makko fuu ndafanoo?
O naati nder suudu Alla, o adi buuru ittanaaɗo Alla oon, o nyaami. O hokki mo yaadiraaɓe makko. *Tawreeta duu wi'aana ko *cakkanooɓe Alla tan kaani nyaamude mo.
Iisa wi'i ɓe kaden: —*Ɓii-Neɗɗo woni jom *nyalaane fowteteene.
*Nyalaane fowteteene gom, Iisa naati *waajordu gom omo waajoo. Gorko gom mo junngo mum nyaamo waati no tawa nder mayru.
Jannginooɓe *Tawreeta e *Fariisa'en no kora Iisa, ngi'a nde o nyawtan goɗɗo nder *nyalaane fowteteene, nden ɓe keɓa ko ɓe pelirta mo.
Amma Iisa no anndi miilooji maɓɓe. Sey o wi'i gorko mo junngo mum waati oon: —Umma, dara yeeso himɓe. Gorko oon ummii, darii.
Iisa wi'i jannginooɓe *Tawreeta e *Fariisa'en ɓeen: —Miɗo ƴama on: Nder *nyalaane fowteteene, ɗume haani waɗeede? Ko wooɗi naa ko boni? Dannude neɗɗo naa halkude mo?
Iisa daari ɓe, ɓe fuu, nden o wi'i gorko oon: —Foortu junngo maa ! Gorko oon foorti junngo mum, ngo yamɗiti.
Ɓerne jannginooɓe *Tawreeta e *Fariisa'en metti sanne. Sey ɓe kaaldi caka maɓɓe no ɓe ngaddata he Iisa.
Nyannde gom, Iisa ƴeenyi waamnde faa du'oo. O waali omo du'oo.
Ko weeti sey o noddi *aahiiɓe makko, o suɓii sappo e ɗiɗo nder maɓɓe, o waɗi ɓe *lilaaɓe.
Simon mo o inndiri Piyer, he minyum Andiire, Yakuuba, Yahaaya, Filipa, Bartolome,
Matta, Tomas, Yakuuba ɓii-Alfee, Simon kiranoowo suudu baaba,
Yahuuda ɓii-Yakuuba, kam e Yahuuda Iskariyot, mo yahde yeeso jammboytoo Iisa. *Aahiiɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓee ngoni suɓaaɓe ngaɗa *lilaaɓe.

Iisa jippodii he maɓɓe waamnde ndeen, darii nder nokkuure yaajune gom. Ɗuɓɓe nder *aahiiɓe makko no tawa toon. Jama'aare ƴuwne leydi Yahudiya, *Ursaliima e gure tiimooje Maayo Manngo, illa Tirus faa Sidon fuu no tawaa nder nokku oo.
Ɓe ngari ngam hettinaade mo, he ngam ɓe nyawtee duu. Ɓe ginnaaji bonɗi torrunoo, coptinaama.
Himɓe ɓee fuu no ngiɗi meemude mo ngam baawɗe no mburtoo nder makko no yamɗintina ɓe, ɓe fuu.
Iisa ƴeewi *aahiiɓe mum, wi'i: —On mbelii ko'e, onon talkaaɓe, ngam onon njeyi Laamu Alla.
On mbelii ko'e, onon rafaaɓe jooni, ngam on kaaran. On mbelii ko'e, onon woyooɓe jooni, ngam on njalan.
On mbelii ko'e nde himɓe mbanyii on, mboppi on, njennii on, mbonnii inɗe mooɗon ngam *Ɓii-Neɗɗo.
Non maamiraaɓe maɓɓe torrirnoo annabiiɓe artuɓe on. Amma nyannde mum, kuuɓee ngam welwelo. Baraaje mawɗe no ndoomi on nder kammu.
On mbonii, onon riikuɓe, ngam on keɓii mbaka mooɗon.
On mbonii, onon haarɓe jooni, ngam on ndafetee. On mbonii, onon jalooɓe jooni, ngam ɓerɗe mooɗon no mettan, on mboyan.
On mbonii, nde himɓe fuu manii on, ngam non maamiraaɓe maɓɓe ngaɗannoo annabiiɓe fewreeɓe.
—Onon hettinaniiɓe kam, miɗo wi'a on: « Ngiɗee wayɓe mooɗon, ngaɗanee wanyuɓe on ko wooɗi.
Eelee Alla mbarkina naalooɓe on, ndu'anee torrooɓe on duu.
Nde goɗɗo feenyii ma dow gaɓɓugal, linnyu mo ngalto duu. Se goɗɗo teetii jabbaare maa, taa haɗu mo toggoore maa.
Ƴamuɗo ma fuu, kokkaa ɗum. Se neɗɗo teeti ko njeyɗaa, accan mo ɗum.
Ngaɗiranee himɓe no ngiɗɗon ɓe ngaɗana on.
Se hiɗuɓe on tan ngiɗoton, baraaje ɗeye keɓoton? Baa waɗooɓe hakke no ngiɗi hiɗuɓe ɗum'en.
Se waɗanooɓe on ko wooɗi tan ngaɗanton ko wooɗi, baraaje ɗeye ngiɗɗon heɓude? Baa waɗooɓe hakke non ngaɗata.
Se ɓe miiliɗon mbaawi yoɓude on tan kokkoton nyamaane, baraaje ɗeye keɓoton? Baa waɗooɓe hakke no nyalmo waɗooɓe hakke hano mum'en, ngam ɓe njoɓee nyamaane maɓɓe.

Amma onon, ngiɗee wayɓe mooɗon, ngaɗanon ɓe ko wooɗi. Nyalmee tawa on tammaay baafuy he maɓɓe, ngam Alla no wonnana ɓe njettataa, kam'en e bonɓe duu. Nde on ngaɗiri nii on keɓan baraaje mawɗe. On laatoto ɓiɓɓe Alla Toowɗo.
Laatee jom'en yurmeene hano no Alla Baabii'on laatori jom yurmeene. »
—To kiitee himɓe, on kiitataake. To ndekee gacce dow woɓɓe, onon duu on ndekantaake gacce. Njaafee himɓe, on njaafetee.

Kokkee himɓe, on kokketee. Se on kokkii, on etirantee etirgal lobbal, kebbinaangal faa no rufa. Nden ko hoddi ɗum duu mbanjaneɗon ɗum nder gawargal mooɗon. Ngam etirgal ngal etirton, kanngal etiranteɗon.
Gaɗa mum Iisa ɓeydi banndol ngool, o wi'i ɓe: —Bumɗo no waawi ɗowde bumɗo naa? Se ɗum waɗi, hanaa sey ɓe fuu ɗiɗo, ɓe caamowan nder ngayka naa?
Aahiijo ɓurataa moodibbo mum. Amma aahiijo kumnuɗo jannde mum fuu no laatoto hano moodibbo mum.
Ko waɗi ko aɗa hi'a kuɗel nder hitere bannda, amma a hi'ataa bonjariyal gonngal nder nde maaɗa?

Noy mbaawirtaa wi'ude bannda: « Banndam, accu mi ittane kuɗel gonngel nder hitere maa », amma aan kay, a hi'ataa bonjariyal tawaangal nder nde maaɗa? Munaafiki, ittu bonjariyal ngonngal nder hitere maaɗa ginan, ngam ngi'iraa no wooɗiri, nden keɓaa no ittirɗaa kuɗel tawaangel nder hitere bannda ngel.
—Lekki lobbi rimataa ko boni, non duu lekki mbonki rimataa ko wooɗi.
Ngam lekki fuu no annditiree ɓiɓɓe mum. Ibbe teɓataake he wuumoore gi'e, cabiije teɓataake he kebbe.

Neɗɗo moƴƴuɗo, ko moƴƴi ko resii nder ɓerne mum, kam hunnduko mum wurtinta. Neɗɗo bonɗo duu, ko boni ko resii nder ɓerne mum, kam hunnduko mum wurtinta. Ngam ko heewi nder ɓerne neɗɗo, wurtotoo nder hunnduko mum.
Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Ɗume waɗi oɗon noddira kam Joomiraawo mooɗon, amma on ngaɗataa ko mbi'umi on?
Neɗɗo fuu garɗo to am hettini haalaaji am, golliri ɗi, mi hollan on no joomum nanndi.
Omo nanndi he neɗɗo nyiɓuɗo suudu mum, wasi leydi faa yottii e tepaare, sinngi suudu mum dow mayre. Nde ndiyam toɓi faa ilam wubbi ndu, ɗam waawtaa yinngude ndu, ngam dow tepaare ndu nyiɓaa.
Amma kettiniiɗo haalaaji am, golliraay ɗi, no nanndi he nyiɓuɗo suudu dow leydi, dey wasanaay ndu sinngirde. Nde ilam wubbi ndu, wakkati gooto ndu saama, ndu sankitoo, ndu fuu.
Wakkati Iisa hantunoo waaju mum, o ummii o naati siire Kafarnahum.
Hooreejo soogeeji *Rooma gom no nder siire ndeen. Maccuɗo makko, korsuɗo gom nyawi faa no hosa maayde.
Wakkati hooreejo oon nanunoo habaru Iisa no waɗee, sey o lili *Yahudankooɓe dottiiɓe gom to makko, eela mo o wara, o yamɗintina maccuɗo makko oo.
Dottiiɓe ɓeen ngari to Iisa, ɓe ŋaarii mo, ɓe ŋaariti mo, ɓe mbi'i: —No haani mballaa neɗɗo oo
ngam omo hiɗi lenyol meeɗen, kanko duu nyiɓi *waajordu amin.

Nden Iisa yahdi he maɓɓe. Wakkati ɓe ɓadinoo wuro hooreejo oon, sey hooreejo oon waɗi lilaaɓe gom ngari to Iisa, mbi'i mo: —Moodibbo, taa tampin hoore maa, ngam higiimin wi'i ko kam fotaay to naataa ɓaade mum.
Ngam majjum waɗi kam miilii, ko kam e hoore mum, haani wara to maaɗa. Ndenne, haala maaɗa tan heƴi, maccuɗo makko yamɗitaa.

Ngam kam e hoore mum, kam no woodi dawranooɓe ɗum, kam duu no dawrana soogeeji *Rooma. Se kam tilsini gooto yaha, o yahan. Se kam wi'i goɗɗo wara, o waran. Se kam wi'i maccuɗo mum waɗa goɗɗum, o waɗan ɗum.
Wakkati Iisa nanunoo haala kaa, ɗum haayɗini mo, o yeeƴitii himɓe tokkuɓe mo ɓeen, o wi'i: —Miɗo haalana on, baa nder leydi *Isra'el fuu mi hi'aay ir goonɗinol ngool.
Wakkati lilaaɓe ɓeen coƴƴitino, ɓe tawi maccuɗo oon yamɗiti.
Iisa ummii Kafarnahum, yehi wuro gom wi'eteengo Nayin. *Aahiiɓe makko e jama'aare mawne gom no tokki mo.

Wakkati o ɓadinoo dammbugal wuro ngoon, sey o fotti himɓe gom no ndonndi maayɗo gom faa mooɓowa mo. Maayɗo oo, kam tan innum e bammum ndimi. Baaba oon maayi, inna oon duu haɓɓanaaka. Himɓe Nayin ɗuɓɓe no tokki debbo oon.
Wakkati Iisa hi'unoo debbo oo, nani yurmeene makko, wi'i mo: —Taa woy !
Sey Iisa ɓadii, meemi kooƴirngal maayɗo oon. Ronndiiɓe maayɗo oon ndarii, Iisa wi'i: —Jokolle, miɗo wi'e: Ummoɗaa !
Sey maayɗo oon ummii jooɗii, fuɗɗi no haala. Iisa hokkiti mo inniiko.
Kulal nanngi himɓe ɓeen fuu, ɓe puɗɗi iɓe teddina Alla, iɓe mbi'a: —Annabiijo mawɗo wanngii hakkune meeɗen. Alla warii wallude himɓe mum.
Habaru oo sankitii nder leydi Yahudiya fuu e seraaji mum.
Ko aahiiɓe Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma kaalanowi Yahaaya ko Iisa waɗi. Yahaaya noddi ɗiɗo nder maɓɓe,
lili ɓe to Iisa. O lili ɓe ƴama Iisa nde kanko woni *Almasiihu bi'aaɗo waran oon naa ɓe ndooma goɗɗo?
Nden worɓe ɓeen ngari to Iisa, mbi'i mo: —Yahaaya lili min to maa. O wi'i min ƴame nde aan woni *Almasiihu bi'aaɗo waran oon, naa min ndooma goɗɗo?
Tawi nder wakkati mum Iisa yamɗintini himɓe ɗuɓɓe nyawirɓe nyawuuji feere-fereeji. O riiwi ginnaaji bonɗi. O wumtini wumɓe ɗuɓɓe.

Sey Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Njehee, kaalanowee Yahaaya ko ngi'uɗon e ko nanuɗon fuu: Wumɓe no mbumta, laƴooɓe no njaha faa wooɗa. Seppinɓe no nyawtee, pahuɓe no pahitee. Maayɓe no ummintinee, talkaaɓe duu no pillanee *Habaru lobbo.
Barkinaaɗo woni mo woppaay goonɗinol mum ngam am.

Wakkati lilaaɓe Yahaaya ɓeen ndillunoo, Iisa fuɗɗi fillanaade jama'aare ndeen filla Yahaaya, nden o ƴami ɓe, o wi'i: —Ko njaanoɗon nder ladde yeeruure, ɗume ndaaroyɗon? Huɗo ko henndu wifata ndaaroyɗon,
naa ɗume njaaɗon daaroyde? Gorko ɓorniiɗo kolte gasuɗe naa? Ɓornotooɗo koltal gasuŋal e nanoowo belɗum nder ɓaade laamiiɗo tawetee.
Ndenne, ɗume ndaaroyɗon? Naa annabiijo njaaɗon daaroyde? Too, miɗo haalana on, Yahaaya no ɓuri annabiijo.
Kanko woni mo haala Alla haalunoo dow mum wi'i: Ndaa, mi ardinan lilaaɗo am moƴƴinane laawol maaɗa.
Miɗo haalana on, walaa dimaaɗo nder duuniyaaru nduu ɓurɗo Yahaaya. Amma fuu nii, ɓurɗo famɗude nder Laamu Alla no ɓuri mo teddude.
Himɓe fuu nanuɓe ko Iisa wi'i, faa e jaɓooɓe janngal njaɓi ko laawol Alla woni goonga. Kamɓe duu ngoni ɓe Yahaaya waɗani *batisma.
Amma *Fariisa'en e jannginooɓe *Tawreeta njaɓaay ko Alla hiɗani ɓe. Kamɓe ngonnoo caliiɓe Yahaaya waɗana ɓe *batisma.
Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe kaden: —Ndenne, he ɗume mbaawmi nanndinde himɓe jamaanu hannden oo?
Iɓe nanndi he sukaaɓe jooɗiiɓe nder luumo, no nodda higiraaɓe mum'en, no mbi'a: —Min puufanii on seeseeji, amma on mbomaay ! Min njimani on jimi jurminiiɗi, amma on mboyaay !
Wakkati Yahaaya gaɗoowo *batisma warnoo, o nyaamataa ir nyaamduuji gom, o yarataa cabiijam, amma on mbi'ii o laddaaɗo.
*Ɓii-Neɗɗo duu wari, no nyaama, no yara. On mbi'i nyaamɗe e jarɗe tan adi hakkillo makko. On mbi'i o higo *jaɓooɓe janngal e waɗooɓe hakke.
Amma goonɗinɓe hikmaaku Alla, no kolla nder mbuurnam mum'en ko laawol Alla no goonga.
Fariisaajo gom noddi Iisa wuro mum ngam ɓe nyaama. Iisa yehi wuro Fariisaajo oon, jooɗii, iɓe nyaamda.
Nder wuro ngoon, no woodunoo debbo gom anndiraaɗo pijol. Wakkati o nanunoo Iisa no wuro *Fariisaajo oon, o waddi faanu nebbam uurɗam,
o heedi sera koyɗe Iisa. Omo woya, omo leppinira koyɗe Iisa gonɗi makko. Omo wunndii ɗe, omo moytira ɗe gaasa makko, omo wuja ɗe nebbam.
Wakkati Farisaajo noddunooɗo Iisa oon hi'i ɗum, wi'i nder ɓerne mum: —Se nii goonga fuu neɗɗo oo no annabiijo, o anndannoo ko debbo meemoowo mo oo, no gaɗoowo hakke.
Sey Iisa haaldi he Fariisaajo oon, wi'i mo: —Simon, no woodi goɗɗum ko kaanumi haalande ma. Simon, Fariisaajo oon, wi'i mo: —Haalanam, Moodibbo !
Nden Iisa wi'i mo: —Nyalmotooɗo gom no tokkannoo himɓe ɗiɗo gom. Gooto, omo tokka ɗum tammaaje cardi keme joy, ooto woygu.
Amma ko ɓe keppi yoɓude mo fuu, sey o yaafanii ɓe fuu ɗiɗo nyamaane ndeen. Caka himɓe ɗiɗo ɓee moy ɓurata hiɗude mo nder maɓɓe?
Simon jaabii mo wi'i: —Miɗo miila mo o accanii nyamaane ɗuunde oon. Sey Iisa wi'i mo: —A haalii goonga !

Iisa yeeƴitii debbo oon, wi'i Simon: —A hi'i debbo oo naa? Mi naatii hoggo maa, a hokkaay kam ndiyam mi loota koyɗe am. Amma debbo oo, o leppinirii koyɗe am gonɗi mum. Nden kaden o moytirii ɗe gaasa makko.
A wunndaaki kam, amma kanko, illa naatumi, o accaay wunndaade koyɗe am.
A wujaay hoore am nebbam, amma kanko, o wujii koyɗe am nebbam uurɗam.
Ngam majjum miɗo wi'e: No hakkeeji makko ɗuuɗiri fuu, ɗi njaafaama, ngam o holli hidde mawne. Amma jaafanaaɗo seɗɗa, hidde seɗɗa hollata.
Nden Iisa wi'i debbo oon: —Hakkeeji maaɗa njaafaama.
Sey nyaamdooɓe he Iisa ɓeen puɗɗi no mbi'a hakkune mum'en: —Moy woni neɗɗo jaafotooɗo baa hakkeeji oo?
Iisa wi'i debbo oon: —Goonɗinol maaɗa hisinii ma. Yah he jam.
Iisa no fiiloo nder ci'e e gure fuu, no waajoo filla *Habaru lobbo, filla Laamu Alla. *Lilaaɓe makko sappo e ɗiɗo no ngondi he makko.
Rewɓe gom, ɓe o riiwi ginnaaji bonɗi dow mum'en he rewɓe ɓe o yamɗintini e nyawuuji mum'en gom duu, no ngondi he makko: Mariyaama mo Magdaala, mo Iisa riiwunoo ginnaaji jeɗɗi dow mum,
Yowanna, dee-Kuja, ardiiɗo gollooɓe laamiiɗo *Hirudus, Susaana, he rewɓe ɗuɓɓe gom. Rewɓe ɓee ngoni rewɓe wattuɓe njawdi mum'en mballiri Iisa e *aahiiɓe mum.
Himɓe ƴuwi nder ci'e feere-fereeje ngari kawri, ngaɗi jama'aare mawne fiilii Iisa. Nden o waɗani ɓe kippol haala ngool, o wi'i ɓe:
—Aawoowo gom dilli faa aawowa aawdiiri mum. Nder aawre ndeen, gabbe gom caami sera laawol, ɗe njaaɓaa. Nden pooli ngari coppi ɗe.
Gere majje caami nder korkaaƴe. Ɗe puɗi, amma ɗe njoori, ngam nokkuure ndeen faddataako ndiyam.
Gere majje caami to kebbe puɗata. Kebbe ɗeen puɗidi he majje, nanngi ɗe.
Gere majje caami nder leydi lobbiri, ɗe puɗi, ɗe ndimi. Wassaaŋo fuu waɗi camme hemre. Wakkati o timmini kippol haala ngool, sey o towni daane, o wi'i: —Jom nowru nanooru fuu, nana !
Sey *aahiiɓe makko ƴami mo mbi'i: —Ɗume woni maana kippol haala ngool?
Nden o wi'i ɓe: —Onon, Alla hokkii on baawɗe anndude ko suuɗi dow habaru Laamu muuɗum. Amma woɓɓe, he kippol haala ɓe kaalirantee ɗum. Baa nde iɓe ndaara, ɓe ngi'ataa. Baa nde ɓe nani, ɓe paamataa.
Piirtol kippol haala ngool nii: —Aawdiiri ndiin woni haala Alla.
Sera laawol to aawdiiri ndiin saami woni nanuɓe haala kaan. Amma wakkati ɓe nanunoo ka, Ibiliisa waran, itta ka nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe ngam ɓe keppa goonɗinde, sako ɓe kisa.
Korkaaƴe to aawdiiri ndiin saami woni nanuɓe haala kaan, njaɓɓorii ka welwelo. Amma ka waɗaay ɗaɗi nder maɓɓe. Wakkati seɗɗa tan ɓe ngoonɗinta. Nde nii ɓe cii'aama seɗɗa tan, ɓe mboppa ka.
To kebbe puɗidi aawdiiri ndiin woni nanuɓe haala kaan amma sakkulla, suuno njawdi e mbelirka duuniyaaru huma ka, ka heppa ɓenndude nder maɓɓe.
Leydi lobbiri to aawdiiri ndiin saami woni nanuɓe ka, njaɓɓori ka ɓerne worre lok. Ɓe munyi munyal manngal faa ɓe ngaɗi barke.
—Walaa kuɓɓoowo fitilla, nden hippira ka le'al naa sorna ka ley leeso. Amma nde neɗɗo huɓɓii fitilla, sey nii ɓila ka ngam ka yaynana naatooɓe.
Huune fuu ko suuɗi no wanngowan nyannde gom. Ko soomaa fuu duu no somtetee.
Ndenne, kakkilee he no nanirton kujje, ngam jogiiɗo fuu no ɓeydantee. Amma mo walaa oon, baa ko miilii no jogii ɗum, no teetetee.
Minyiraaɓe Iisa worɓe e inniiɗum'en ngari to Iisa, amma ɓe keɓaay yottaade mo ngam jama'aare woni no fiilii mo.
Nden goɗɗo wi'i mo ko inniiko e rimdaaɓe makko no ndarii yaasin no ngiɗi ngi'a mo.
Sey o jaabii, o wi'i: —Inna am e rimdaaɓe am ngoni nanooɓe e gollirooɓe haala Alla.
Nyannde gom Iisa e *aahiiɓe mum naati nder laana, sey o wi'i *aahiiɓe ɓeen: —En njolu peta ngaa. Sey ɓe njoli.
Wakkati ɓe njolannoo, sey ɗoyngol adi mo. Duydi ummii dow peta ngaan, laana maɓɓe heewi ndiyam faa ka hosi rufude.
*Aahiiɓe makko ɓattii mo, pindini mo, mbi'i mo: —Moodibbo, moodibbo, en maayan ! Sey o fini, o sappii henndu nduun e benkeƴƴe ɗeen. Ɗum fuu ɗum darii. Peta ngaan fuu waɗi siw.
Nden Iisa wi'i *aahiiɓe ɓeen: —Toy goonɗinol mooɗon? Ɗum haayɗini ɓe. Ɓe kuli, iɓe mbi'odira: —Moy woni neɗɗo oo, tilsinoowo baa henndu e ndiyam, ɗi ɗowtanoo ɗum oo?
Iisa he *aahiiɓe mum pedditi peta Galili faa panndowa leydi Gerasa.

Wakkati ɓe njippinoo gorko gom, jeyaaɗo wuro ngoon, mo ginnaaru bondu woni dow mum, wari to Iisa'en. Gorko oo ɓooydi he ginnaaru nduu faa ndu waɗi o ɓornataako, o eggi nder wuro ngoon o jooɗowi nder annyeeje.
Wakkati o hi'unoo Iisa, sey o huuɓi daane toowne, o hofi yeeso Iisa, o wi'i mo: —Iisa, *Ɓii-Alla Toowɗo, ɗume ngiɗaa waɗude kam? Mi ŋaarake ma, to torram !

Ginnaaru nduun no ƴeenyannoo dow gorko oo kile keewɗe. Indu yaara mo faa nder ladde yeeruure. Juuɗe gorko oo e koyɗe mum ɗe fuu kaɓɓiraama callali, amma omo taƴa ɗi. Iisa tilsinii ginnaaru bondu nduun jippoo dow gorko oo.
O ƴami mo, o wi'i: —Noy mbi'eteɗaa? O jaabii, o wi'i: —Miɗo wi'ee: « Jama'aare ». Ngam ginnaaji ɗuɗɗi ngoni dow makko.
Nden ɗi ŋaarii Iisa to o tilsin ɗi ɗi njaha nder ngaykaa laahara nga walaa fuu keerol.
Hadde ɗon sewre girooji mawne gom no durannoo dow waamnde. Ginnaaji ɗiin ŋaarii mo o acca ɗi njippowo dow girooji ɗiin. Iisa jaɓi, acci ɗi.
Ɗi takkiti gorko oon, ɗi njippowi dow girooji ɗiin. Sewre ndeen fuu doggi simmiti waamnde ndeen. Ɗi talliti, ɗi caamowi nder peta ngaan, ɗi njoolii.
Wakkati durooɓe girooji ɗiin ngi'ii ɗum, ɓe ndoggi, ɓe kaalanowi himɓe wuro ngoon e himɓe seraaji maggo.
Himɓe ɓeen njehi ƴeewowi ko waɗi. Wakkati ɓe njottinoo to Iisa, ɓe tawi laddanooɗo oon no jooɗii hadde koyɗe makko. Omo holti, hakkillo makko duu no huuɓi. Kulal nanngi ɓe.
Warɓe ngi'ii gorko oon kaalanowi himɓe no gorko laddanooɗo oon nyawtiniraa.
Himɓe leydi Gerasa fuu ŋaarii Iisa dilla nder leydi mum'en, ngam kulal manngal nanngi ɓe. Iisa naati laana, dilli.
Wakkati ɓe ndillannoo ndeen gorko mo ginnaaji mum ndiiwaa oon, ŋaarii Iisa acca kam tokka mo. Amma Iisa soƴƴiti mo, wi'i mo:
—Hootu wuro maa, kaalowa ko Alla waɗani ma fuu. Nden o hooti, o haalanowi wuro ngoon fuu ko Iisa waɗani mo.
Wakkati Iisa wartunoo Galili, jama'aare jaɓɓii mo, ngam illa ndeen iɓe ndoomi mo.
Sey Jayrus, hooreejo *waajordu oon, wari to Iisa, hofi yeeso makko, ŋaarii mo o wara wuro mum
ngam ɓiyum debbo gooto mo o rimi no habda he yonki. Ɓii-Jayrus debbo oo duuɓi mum ngaɗaay sappo e ɗiɗi. Wakkati Iisa fa'uno wuro Jayrus, jama'aare tokki mo faa himɓe no ɓilla mo.
Debbo gom, mo tuuni mum heppi taƴude duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi nii no tawa nder jama'aare ndeen. Ko o joginoo fuu, o watti ɗum ngam o sawree, amma neɗɗo fuu waawaay yamɗintinde mo.
Debbo oo ƴuwri Iisa har gaɗa, meemi hunnduko jabbaare makko. Wakkati mum da ƴiiƴam ɗaam taƴi.
Iisa wi'i jama'aare ndeen: —Moy meemii kam? Neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu wi'i hanaa kam non. Sey Piyer wi'i mo: —Moodibbo, himɓe ɗuɓɓe ngatti ma caka. Kamɓe ngoni no ɓille !
Nden Iisa wi'i: —Goɗɗo meemii kam, ngam mi nani baawɗe ƴuwi nder am.
Wakkati debbo oon faamunoo ko kam waawtaa suuɗaade, sey o wari omo hoɗɗa, o diccii yeeso Iisa, o haali yeeso himɓe fuu ko waɗi kam meemi Iisa, e no o yamɗitiri wakkati mum da.
Nden Iisa wi'i mo: —Banndam debbo, goonɗinol maa danni ma. Yah he jam !
Iisa no caka haala sey goɗɗo ƴuwi wuro Jayrus, wari, wi'i: —Jayrus, ɓiya debbo maayi, fotaay tampinaa moodibbo oo kaden !
Wakkati Iisa nanunoo ɗum, sey wi'i Jayrus: —Taa hulu, goonɗin tan, ɓiya daɗan.
