Nden Iisa famtini ɓe ko dewte fuu kaalunoo dow mum, illa nder *Tawreeta faa wara nder dewte annabiiɓe.
Wakkati ɓe paaniino Emmayus, sey Iisa waɗi hano wittoto.
Nden ɓe ŋaarii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Waalan min, ngam hiiri. Jemma duu naatii. Sey o tokki ɓe, o weerani ɓe.
Wakkati ɓe njooɗinoo faa ɓe nyaama, Iisa hooƴi buuru, yetti Alla, helti buuru oon, hokki ɓe.
Sey gite maɓɓe peertii, ɓe annditi Iisa. Wakkati mum da o majji yeeso maɓɓe.
Nden ɓe mbi'odiri: —Wakkati o haaldannoo en dow laawol, omo famtina en ko dewte Ceniiɗe mbi'i, en nani belɗum nder ɓerɗe meeɗen.
Ɓe ummii sabat, ɓe coƴƴi *Ursaliima, ɓe tawtowi *lilaaɓe sappo e go'o ɓeen e wonduɓe he mum'en.
Nden ɓe mbi'i kamɓe duu: —Goonga non, Joomiraawo meeɗen ummitake. O wannganii Simon Piyer.
Nden *aahiiɓe ɗiɗo ɓeen kaalani ɓe ko waɗunoo dow laawol mum'en fuu. Ɓe kaalani ɓe duu no waɗi ko ɓe annditi mo wakkati o heltannoo buuru oon.
Kiliyopas'en no caka haala, sey Iisa e hoore mum wanngi hakkune maɓɓe, wi'i ɓe: —Jam wonda he mooɗon !
Ɓerɗe maɓɓe taƴi, ɓe kuli, ɓe miili ko mbeelu maayɗo gom ɓe ngi'ii.
Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Ɗume waɗi hakkillooji mon ummi? Ɗume waɗi sikka no tawaa nder ɓerɗe mooɗon?
Ƴeewee juuɗe am e koyɗe am, paamon ko miin nii non. Meemee kam, ƴeewon. Mi hanaa mbeelu maayɗo ngam mbeelu walaa ɓanndu, walaa gi'e.
Wakkati o haaldannoo he maɓɓe, o holli ɓe juuɗe e koyɗe makko.
Amma ɗum fuu waɗaay ɓe njaɓa ko kanko non ngam iɓe keewi welwelo, haayne majjum duu no tawa he maɓɓe. Iisa ƴami ɓe wi'i: —Oɗon njogii ko nyaamee ɗo naa?
Ɓe ngaddani mo ŋoppitto linngu njuɗaangu gom.
O jaɓi ŋo, o nyaami yeeso maɓɓe.
Nden o wi'i ɓe: —Wakkati ngondunoomi he mooɗon, mi wi'iino on no tilsi kujje ɗe *Tawreeta, dewte annabiiɓe e *Jabuura kaali dow am fuu kuuɓa.
O fiirti ko'e maɓɓe, ngam ɓe paama dewte ɗeen.
O wi'i ɓe: —Nii ɗum winndiraa: No tilsi *Almasiihu torree faa maaya, ummitoo nyalaane tataɓere.
Nder innde makko duu, lenyi ɗii fuu no mbaajetee faa tuuba keɓa jaafol hakkeeji mum'en. Ɗum fuu, ɗum fuɗɗan nder *Ursaliima.
Onon ngoni seedantooɓe kujje ɗee fuu !
Miin, mi lildan *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo mo *Baaba am waɗani on alkawal dow mum. Amma njooɗee nder huɓeere ndee, faa baawɗe gonɗe dow njippoo keewa on, on fuu.
Iisa yaari *aahiiɓe ɓeen faa hadde Baytaniya. O ɓanti juuɗe, o barkini ɓe.
Wakkati o barkinannoo ɓe, sey o seedi he maɓɓe, o ƴencinaa dow.
Ɓe cujidani mo, nden ɓe coƴƴi *Ursaliima nder welwelo manngo.
Wakkati fuu iɓe tawee nder *Juulirde mawne, iɓe teddina Alla.
Illa fuɗɗorde Haala no woodi. Haala kaan no wondunoo he Alla, kanka woni Alla.
Ika wondi he Alla illa fuɗɗorde.
He makka Alla tagiri huune fuu. Huune fuu ko tagaa he makka ƴuwi.
Mbuurnam woni he makka, mbuurnam ɗaam laatanii himɓe jeyngol.
Jeyngol ngool no yayna nder nimre. Nimre ndee waawaay nyifude ngol.
No woodunoo neɗɗo gom mo Alla lilunoo bi'eteeɗo Yahaaya.
O wari hano seedeejo ngam seedanaade jeyngol ngool, heɓa himɓe fuu ngoonɗina ngol.
Hanaa kanko woni jeyngol ngool, amma o wari seedaade dow maggol.
Haala kaan woni Jeyngol goongaawol, garngol nder duuniyaaru, jaynanoowol himɓe fuu.
Ika nder duuniyaaru, sabbu makka duuniyaaru tagaa, amma duuniyaaru annditaay ka.
Ka warii to lenyol makka, amma lenyol makka jaɓaay ka.
Amma jaɓuɓe ka fuu, goonɗinɓe ka ɓeen, ka hokki ɓe baawɗe laataade ɓiɓɓe Alla.
Ɓe ndimiraaka hano no ɓiɓɓe aadama ndimirtee naa har muuyo neɗɗo, amma dimngol maɓɓe ƴuwi to Alla.
Haala kaan laatake neɗɗo. Neɗɗo oon jooɗake hakkune meeɗen, o keewɗo moƴƴere e goonga. Min ngi'ii teddungal makko, hano teddungal ngal Ɓiɗɗo bajjo heɓata to *Baaba mum.
Yahaaya seedake dow makko, huuɓi, wi'i: —Oo woni mo kaalannoomi on haala mum, mbi'umi: « Gaɗa am, artuɗo kam waran, sabu omo ɗon illa mi walaano ɗon. »
Ngam ɗuuɗal moƴƴere makko en fuu en keɓii barke dow barke.
Sabu *Muusa keɓirɗen *Tawreeta, amma moƴƴere e goonga sabu Iisa *Almasiihu heɓiraa.
Baa gooto hi'aay Alla abada, amma Ɓiɗɗo bajjo gonɗo Alla, korsuɗo kawtuɗo he *Baabiraawo, faamini en mo.
Ɗum woni seede Yahaaya wakkati mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe *Ursaliima lilunoo *cakkanooɓe Alla e *Lewinkooɓe ƴamowa mo, kanko woni moy.
O salaaki jaabaade ɓe amma o haaliranii ɓe no laaɓiri, o wi'i: —Mi hanaa *Almasiihu.
Ɓe ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Aan, a moy? A Eliya naa? O wi'i: —Mi hanaa. Ɓe mbi'i: —A annabiijo garoowo oon naa? O jaabii: —Hanaa !
Ɓe mbi'i mo: —Ndenne, a moy? Haalan min ko min kaalanoyta liluɓe min. Ɗume mbiiɗaa dow hoore maa?
O jaabii, o wi'i: —Miin woni kuuɓoowo nder ladde yeeruure no wi'a: Moƴƴinee laabi Joomiraawo hano no annabi *Esaaya wi'iri nii.
Lilaaɓe ɓee to *Fariisa'en ƴuwi.
Ɓe ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Ko saabii ko aɗa waɗana himɓe *batisma nder ndiyam tawi a hanaa *Almasiihu. A hanaa Eliya, a hanaa annabiijo oon?
Yahaaya jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Miin, miɗo waɗana himɓe *batisma nder ndiyam, amma no woodi goɗɗo hakkune mon mo on anndaa.
Kanko woni garoowo gaɗa am mo mi fotaay baa fiirtude ɓoggi paɗe mum.
Ɗum fuu ɗum waɗi Baytaniya gaɗa maayo Urdun, to Yahaaya woni no waɗana himɓe *batisma nder ndiyam.
Jaangoore mum Yahaaya hi'i Iisa no wara to mum, wi'i: —Ndaaree *Njawdiri Alla ittoori hakkeeji duuniyaaru.
Ɗum woni ko mbi'unoomi dow makko: « Neɗɗo gom waran gaɗa am, artuɗo kam, sabu omo ɗon illa mi tagaaka. »
Miin, mi anndaano mo. Amma mi wari, miɗo waɗana himɓe *batisma nder ndiyam ngam o wanngana himɓe *Isra'el.
Yahaaya seedake, wi'i: —Mi hi'i *Ruuhu Alla nder nanndi wuugaanu ƴuwi dow jippii dow makko.
Miin, mi anndaano mo. Amma lilɗo kam mi waɗana himɓe *batisma nder ndiyam oon wi'i kam: « Oon mo ngi'ataa *Ruuhu no jippoo dow mum oo, kanko woni gaɗanoowo himɓe *batisma nder *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo. »
Miin, mi hi'i, mi seedake kanko woni *Ɓii-Alla.
Jaangoore mum kaden Yahaaya no dardii aahiiɓe mum ɗiɗo gom.
O hi'i Iisa no yawta, sey o wi'i: —Ndaaree *Njawdiri Alla !
Aahiiɓe ɗiɗo ɓeen nani ko o haali ɗum, tokkitii Iisa.
Iisa yeeƴitii, hi'i iɓe tokki ɗum, wi'i ɓe: —Ɗume tefoton? Ɓe njaabii, ɓe mbi'i: —Rabbi, toy njooɗotoɗaa? Rabbi kam woni Moodibbo.
Nden o wi'i ɓe: —Ngaree, ƴeewee ! Fotodiri laasara waɗi. Ɓe njehi, ɓe ngi'ii to o jooɗoto, ɓe kiirtidi he makko toon.
Andiire, minyo Simon Piyer, no tawa nder aahiiɓe ɗiɗo tokkuɓe Iisa wakkati ɓe nanunoo haala Yahaaya.
O wari to Simon Piyer, o wi'i ɗum: —Min ngi'ii *Almasiihu. *Almasiihu maana mum woni « Cuɓaaɗo » oon.
O yaari Simon Piyer to Iisa. Iisa ƴeewi mo, wi'i: —Aan, a Simon ɓii-Yahaaya, a innditirtee Kefas. Maana Kefas e Piyer woni hayre.
Jaangoore mum Iisa haɓɓi anniya yahde leydi Galili. O fotti Filipa, o wi'i mo: —Tokkam !
Filipa no jeyaa Baytisayda, wuro Andiire e Piyer.
Filipa fotti Natanayel, wi'i mo: —Min ngiidii he oon mo habaru mum winndanoo nder *Tawreeta Muusa e nder dewte annabiiɓe, Iisa ɓii-Yusufu mo Nasaratu.
Sey Natanayel wi'i mo: —Ko wooɗi no waawi ƴuwde Nasaratu naa? Filipa jaabii mo, wi'i: —War, ƴeewu !
Wakkati Iisa hi'unoo Natanayel no wara to mum, sey wi'i: —Oo woni *Isra'ilanke jaati. Jiɓe fuu walaa he makko.
Nden Natanayel wi'i mo: —Toy annduɗaa kam? Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Mi hi'i ma ley ibbi illa Filipa noddaay ma.
Natanayel jaabii, wi'i: —Moodibbo, a *Ɓii-Alla. A Laamiiɗo *Isra'el.
Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Sabu mi wi'i mi hi'i ma ley ibbi tan ngoonɗinɗaa naa? A hi'an ko ɓuri ɗum manngu.
Nden Iisa ɓeydi wi'ude: —Goonga kaalananmi on: On ngi'an kammu no maɓɓitoo, maleykaaɓe Alla no njippoo no ŋabba dow *Ɓii-Neɗɗo.
Balɗe ɗiɗi gaɗa mum, kaɓɓal waɗi Kaana nder leydi Galili. Inna Iisa no tawanoo toon.
Iisa e *aahiiɓe mum duu noddaama to maggal.
Wakkati cabiijam maɓɓe kaɗɗam hantunoo, sey inna Iisa wi'i Iisa: —Ɓe ngalaa cabiijam.
Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Inna day, munyanam. Ɗume ngiɗɗaa mi waɗa? Wakkati am yonaay ginan.
Nden inniiko wi'i gollooɓe ɓeen: —Ngaɗee ko o wi'i on fuu.
Looɗe jeegom gaɗiraaɗe kaaƴe gom no tawaa ɗon hadde maɓɓe. Looɗe ɗee ngaɗaama ngam al'aada laaɓinol *Yahudankooɓe. Loone fuu no hooƴa ko watta liitereeji hemre.
Iisa wi'i gollooɓe ɓeen: —Kebbinee looɗe ɗee ndiyam. Ɓe kebbini ɗe faa ɗe keewi pet.
Sey Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Joonkay, nyeɗee, njaaranee ardiiɗo batu oon. Ɓe nyeɗi ɓe njaarani ardiiɗo oon.
Ardiiɗo batu oon meeɗi ndiyam mbaylitaaɗam cabiijam ɗaam. O anndaa to ɗam ƴuwii, amma gollooɓe nyeɗuɓe ɗaam kay, no anndi. Nden o noddi ɓaŋuɗo oon,
o wi'i ɗum: —Himɓe fuu cabiijam mbelɗam mboowi fuɗɗirde. Nden nde ɗam fuɗɗi nanngude ɓe, ɗam welaa ɗam waddee. Amma aan, a resi ɓurɗam welde ɗam naako joonin.
Alaama kaayɗiniiɗo oo woni alaama kaayɗiniiɗo arano mo Iisa waɗi. O waɗii mo nder wuro Kaana nder leydi Galili. O wanngini teddungal makko. *Aahiiɓe makko ngoonɗinii mo.
Gaɗa ɗum Iisa, innum, minyiraaɓe mum he *aahiiɓe mum njehi Kafarnahum. Ɓe njooɗii toon balɗe seɗɗa.
Wakkati juulɗe *Yahudankooɓe bi'eteeɗe *Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe ɓadinoo, Iisa yehi *Ursaliima.
Nder jawreeru *Juulirde Ursaliima mawne Iisa tawi sonnooɓe ga'i, baali e buugaali he weccooɓe ceede no njooɗii.
O sowi ɓoggi, o riiwi ɓe nder *Juulirde mawne ndeen, kamɓe e ga'i maɓɓe e baali maɓɓe fuu. O sankitii ceede weccooɓe ɓeen, o liɓi teburuuji maɓɓe.
O wi'i sonnooɓe buugaali ɓeen: —Ittee ɗum ɗoo ! To ngaɗee suudu *Baaba am luumorde !
*Aahiiɓe makko miccitii ko winndanoo nder dewte wi'aa: Kiranol suudu maa no huɓɓa ɓerne am sanne.
Nden mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe mbi'i mo: —Ir haayne ndeye mbaawɗaa waɗude ngam hollude min ko a foti waɗude ko ngaɗɗaa ɗum?
Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Pusee *Juulirde mawne ndee, mi nyiɓitan nde nder balɗe tati.
Ɓe mbi'i mo: —Juulirde ndee nyiɓiraama duuɓi lasooji ɗiɗi e jeegom. Dey aan, mbiiɗaa a nyiɓitan nde nder balɗe tati?
Amma Iisa kay fonndaana *Juulirde mawne ndeen e ɓanndu mum.
Ngam majjum waɗi wakkati Iisa ummitinoo, *aahiiɓe makko miccitii ko o haalunoo ɗum'en. Ɓe ngoonɗini ko winndaa wi'aa nder dewte ɗeen e konngi ɗi o haalunoo.
Wakkati Iisa yehunoo *Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe nder *Ursaliima, himɓe ɗuɓɓe ngoonɗini mo ngam ɓe ngi'ii alamaaji kaayɗiniiɗi ɗi o waɗi.
Iisa hoolaaki ɓe ngam ɓe fuu, omo anndi ɓe sanne.
O haajaaka baa gooto maɓɓe seedanoo mo dow ɓiɓɓe aadama, ngam omo anndi ko woni nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
Nder hawriine *Fariisa'en no woodunoo gorko gom bi'eteeɗo Nikodemu. Nikodemu no tawa duu nder hooreeɓe *Yahudankooɓe.
Jemma gom o yehi to Iisa, o wi'i ɗum: —Moodibbo, miɗen anndi a moodibbo mo Alla lili. Walaa baawɗo waɗi kaayɗe ɗe ngaɗataa ɗee, nde Alla wondaa he joomum.
Sey Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Miɗo haalane goonga: Walaa baawɗo hi'ude Laamu Alla se rimtaaka.
Nikodemu ƴami mo, wi'i: —Noy neɗɗo waawi rimiteede gaɗa naywi? Omo waawi soƴƴaade nder reedu inniiko, o rimitee naa?
Iisa jaabii mo wi'i: —Miɗo haalane goonga: Nde neɗɗo rimtiraaka ndiyam e *Ruuhu Alla, waawtaa naatude nder Laamu Alla.
Ɓii-aadama rimataana ɓii-aadama. *Ruuhu duu, rimataana ruuhu.
To ɗum haayɗine ngam mi wi'i no tilsi ndimiteɗaa.
Henndu no wifa to muuyri fuu. Aɗa nana bifol mayru, amma a anndaa to ndu ƴuwi, a anndaa to ndu fa'i. Hano non dimiraaɗo *Ruuhu Alla duu worri.
Nikodemu wi'i mo: —Noy ɗum laatortoo?
Iisa jaabii mo wi'i: —Baa ko a moodibbo *Isra'el mawɗo, a anndaa ɗum naa?
Miɗo haalane goonga: Minen, ko min anndi, min kaalata. Ko min ngi'ii, min ceedantoo. Amma on njaɓataa seede amin.
On ngoonɗinaay nde kaalanmi on dow kujje duuniyaaru. Noy ngoonɗinirton se mi haalanii on dow kujje kammu?
Walaa ŋabbuɗo dow kammu, se hanaa ƴuwɗo dow oon. *Ɓii-Neɗɗo kam duu woni ƴuwɗo dow oon.
Hano no *Muusa ɓantiri mboddi gaɗiraani njamndi mboɗeeri nder ladde yeeruure, hano non *Ɓii-Neɗɗo duu ɓantirtee,
ngam goonɗinɗo mo fuu heɓa mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
Ngam Alla no hiɗi duuniyaaru sanne waɗi o hokkitiri *Ɓiyiiko bajjo, heɓa goonɗinɗo mo fuu to halku, amma heɓa mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
Alla lilaay Ɓiyum nder duuniyaaru ngam o hiitoo ndu, amma ngam ndu hisaa daliila makko.
Goonɗinɗo mo fuu hiitataake. Amma mo goonɗinaay mo hiitaama jaati, ngam goonɗinaay *Ɓii-Alla bajjo.
Ndaa kiite maɓɓe nii: Jeyngol warii nder duuniyaaru, amma himɓe ngam golleeji mum'en bonɗi ngiɗi nimre ɓurde ngol.
Bonɗo golle fuu hiɗaa jeyngol, omo wurtoo nder maggol, ngam omo hula to golleeji makko bonɗi mbanngu.
Amma golliroowo goonga waran nder jeyngol heɓa golleeji ɗi waɗi ngam Alla ɗii mbanngaa.
Gaɗa mum Iisa yahdi *aahiiɓe mum Yahudiya. O joddii he maɓɓe wakkatiyel, omo waɗana himɓe *batisma.
Yahaaya duu no waɗana himɓe *batisma nokkuure wi'eteene Aynon hadde Salim. Toon ndiyam no ɗuuɗi sanne. Himɓe no njaha toon no ngaɗanee *batisma.
Wakkati mum Yahaaya nanngaaka kasu.
Sey geddi dow farillaaji laaɓinol ɓanndu naati hakkune aahiiɓe Yahaaya he Yahudanke gom.
Ɓe njehi to Yahaaya, ɓe mbi'i mo: —Moodibbo, aɗa miccitoo gorko gondunooɗo he maa toon gaɗa maayo Urdun, gorko mo ceedaninoɗaa oon? Kanko duu, omo waɗana himɓe *batisma. Himɓe fuu no njaha to makko !
Nden Yahaaya jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Neɗɗo waawtaa heɓude goɗɗum se hanaa Alla hokki ɗum.
Onon e ko'e mooɗon, on seedeeɓe am ngam mi wi'i mi hanaa *Almasiihu amma miɗo arti mo lileede.
Gaddanaaɗo ɓaŋaaɗo, kam woni ɓaŋuɗo. Higo ɓaŋuɗo oon no darii, no hettinani mo. Se nanii daane makko no welnan sanne. Iri welwelo ngoo nananmi faa noy walaa.
No tilsi Iisa ɓeydoo, miin duu mi ɓuytoo.
Ƴuwɗo dow oon, no ɓuri huune fuu. Ƴuwɗo nder duuniyaaru oon, duuniyaaru jeyi ɗum. Haala mum duu no haala jeyaaɓe nder mayru. Ƴuwɗo dow kammu oon, kam ɓuri huune fuu.
Ko o hi'i e ko o nani, kam o seedantoo, amma baa gooto jaɓataa seedaaku makko.
Jaɓuɗo seedaaku makko, tabbintini ko Alla no goongaajo.
Mo Alla lili fuu, ko Alla haali haalata, ngam Alla hokki mo *Ruuhu mum mo walaa keerol.
*Baabiraawo no hiɗi Ɓiɗɗo oon faa watti huune fuu nder junngo makko.
Goonɗinɗo Ɓiɗɗo oon heɓi mbuurnam nduumiiɗam. Amma caliiɗo goonɗinde Ɓiɗɗo oon heɓataa ɗam, mone Alla woodani joomum.
*Fariisa'en nanii Iisa no waɗana himɓe *batisma, omo heɓa *aahiiɓe ɗuɓɓe ɓurde Yahaaya.
Amma nde goonga, Iisa e hoore mum kay, waɗanaay baa gooto *batisma. *Aahiiɓe makko tan ngaɗanannoo himɓe *batisma.
Wakkati Iisa nanunoo haala *Fariisa'en, o dilli Yahudiya, o soƴƴii Galili.
Ko o ummii yahde Galili, sey o tokkiri *Samariya.
Nder leydi *Samariya, o wari wuro Sikar hadde ngesa nga Yakuuba hokkunoo ɓiyum Yusufu.
Nder Sikar, Yakuuba wasiino ɓunndu gom. Caka nyalooma Iisa yottii dow ɓunndu nduun, jahaangal ngaal duu tampinii mo. Nden o jooɗii daane mayru ngam o fowta.
Nden debbo oon wi'i mo: —Noy ! Noy aan, Yahudanke, ƴamirtaa kam ndiyam njareteeɗam miin, ɓii-leydi *Samariya debbo? Ngam potal walaano caka *Yahudankooɓe e himɓe leydi *Samariya.
Iisa jaabii mo wi'ii: —Nde aɗa anndi kokkal ngal Alla hokkata he kaden duu nde aɗa anndi duu ƴamuɗo ma ndiyam njareteeɗam, a ƴamannoo mo, o hokke ndiyam buurɗam.
Sey debbo oon wi'i mo: —Moodibbo, a walaa cawgal, ɓunndu nduun duu no luggiɗi. Toy keɓataa ndiyam buurɗam ɗaam?
Aɗa ɓuri maama amin Yakuuba accanɗo min ɓunndu nduu manngu naa? Kanko e hoore makko, ɓiɓɓe makko e dabbaaji makko fuu, njari he mayru.
Nden Iisa jaabii mo wi'i: —Neɗɗo fuu jarɗo ndiyam ɗaam, no ɗomɗetee kaden,
amma jarɗo ndiyam ɗam kokkanmi ɗam, ɗomɗataake faa abada. Ngam ndiyam ɗam kokkanmoomi ɗam, no laatanto mo ndiyam iloojam kokkoojam mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
Debbo oon wi'i: —Moodibbo, hokkaram ndiyam ɗam heɓa to mi ɗomɗee kaden, to mi wartu ƴoogude ɗo duu.
Iisa wi'i mo: —Yah noddoy gora, ngardon !
Debbo oon jaabii mo wi'i: —Mi walaa goriiyo. Iisa wi'i mo: —Aɗa woodi goonga ko mbiiɗaa a walaa goriiyo.
A waɗiino goriraaɓe joyo. Gorko mo ngonduɗaa joonin oo duu, hanaa gora. Ndenne, a haalii goonga.
Debbo oon wi'i mo: —Moodibbo, mi faamii a annabiijo.
Maamiraaɓe amin no ndewanno Alla dow waamnde ndee. Amma onon *Yahudankooɓe, oɗon mbi'a *Ursaliima toon Alla haani reweede.
Iisa wi'i mo: —Banndam debbo, jaɓu ko kaalananmaami: Wakkati waran, ko hanaa dow waamnde ndee naa *Ursaliima ndewoton *Baabiraawo.
Onon ɓiɓɓe leydi *Samariya, oɗon ndewa ko on anndaa, minen *Yahudankooɓe nee, ko min anndi min ndewata, ngam to *Yahudankooɓe kisinam ƴuwata.
Wakkati no waran, o wari jaati, nde rewooɓe goonga e goonga no ndewiran *Baabiraawo ruuhu mum'en e goonga. Hano ir rewooɓe ɓee jaati *Baabiraawo hiɗi.
Alla no *Ruuhu. Rewooɓe mo ɓeen duu no kaani rewirde mo ruuhu e goonga.
Debbo oon wi'i: —Miɗo anndi *Almasiihu waran, kanko woni Cuɓaaɗo Alla. Nde o warii, o faaminan min huune fuu.
Iisa wi'i mo: —Miin, kaaldoowo he maa oo, woni mo.

Ɓe kantaay haala kaan, ko *aahiiɓe ɓeen ngartii tawi ɓe. Ɗum haayɗini *aahiiɓe ɓeen ko Iisa no haalda he debbo oon. Amma baa gooto nder maɓɓe suusaay wi'ude debbo oon: « Ɗume ngiɗaa? » naa ƴamude Iisa wi'a: « Ɗume kaaldantaa he makko? »
Debbo oon resi loone mum, soƴƴii nder wuro ngoon, haalanowi himɓe wi'i:
—Ngaree, ƴeewee gorko kaalanɗo kam ko ngaɗunoomi fuu. Naa kanko woni *Almasiihu?
Himɓe mburtii wuro ngoon, njehi to Iisa.
Wakkati debbo oon dillunoo *aahiiɓe ɓeen eelii mo mbi'i: —Moodibbo, nyaamu !
Sey o jaabii ɓe o wi'i: —Miɗo jogii nyaamdu ndu on anndaa.
*Aahiiɓe ɓeen tinni no ƴamodira no mbi'a: —Moy woni gaddanɗo mo ko nyaamee?
Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Nyaamdu am woni waɗude muuyo lilɗo kam e humnude golle makko.
Onon, oɗon mbi'a: « Lebbi nay koddani kettol. » Amma miin, miɗo wi'a on: Ɓantee gite mon, ƴeewon ko gese ɗeen ɓenndi, ɗe poti hetteede.
Kettuɗo fuu no heɓan baraaje, hawran gabbe ngam mbuurnam nduumiiɗam, ngam aawɗo e kettuɗo mbelnida.
Iɗum tabbintina banndol bi'ungol: « Goɗɗo no aawa, goɗɗo no hetta. »
Mi lilii on kettowon to on ngollaay. To woɓɓe ngolli, onon, on naati nder barke golle maɓɓe.
Nder wuro ngoo, ɓiɓɓe leydi *Samariya ɗuɓɓe ngoonɗinii Iisa ngam haala debbo ceedaniiɗo mo wi'i: —O haalanii kam ko ngaɗunoomi fuu.
Ngam majjum waɗi wakkati ɓiɓɓe leydi *Samariya njottinoo to Iisa, ɓe ŋaarii mo o jooɗo to maɓɓe. Nden o waɗani ɓe balɗe ɗiɗi.
Ɗuɓɓe ngari ɓeydake he goonɗinɓe mo wakkati nanunoo haala makko.
Ɓe mbi'i debbo oon: —Joonin, hanaa ngam haalaaji maaɗa tan min ngoonɗini. Minen e ko'e amin, min nanii haala makko, miɗen anndi ko kanko jaati woni kisinoowo duuniyaaru nduu.
Iisa waɗi balɗe ɗiɗi nder wuro leydi *Samariya nden yawtiri leydi Galili,
ngam kanko e hoore makko o wi'i: —Annabiijo teddintaake nder wuro mum.
Wakkati o yottinoo Galili, ɓiɓɓe Galili njaɓɓorake mo juuɗe ɗiɗɗiɗi, ngam kamɓe duu ɓe njehiino *Ursaliima to *Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe. Ɓe ngi'ii duu ko o gollunoo toon.
Sey Iisa warti kaden Kaana, to o waylitinnoo ndiyam, ɗam laatii cabiijam. Fotodiri kawjotooɗo laamu *Rooma nder wuro Kafarnahum ɓiyum gorko yamɗaa.
Kawjotooɗo oon nani ko Iisa ƴuwii Yahudiya, wartii Galili. Nden o yehi to Iisa, o ŋaarii ɗum wara yamɗintinowa ɓiyiiko gonɗo no habda he yonki.
Iisa wi'i mo: —Abada on ngoonɗintaa, se on ngi'aay alamaaji naa ko haayɗini.
Kawjotooɗo oon wi'i mo: —Moodibbo, en njaha illa ɓiyam maayaay.
Sey Iisa wi'i mo: —Hootu, ɓiya daɗii ! Gorko oon goonɗini ko Iisa haalani ɗum, dilli.
Gollooɓe makko potti mo dow laawol, mbi'i mo: —Ɓiya daɗii !
O ƴamii ɓe wakkati mo ɓiyiiko yamɗiti. Ɓe njaabii mo ɓe mbi'i: —Keeŋa juura, wulowulo ngoon heli.
Baaba oon annditi wakkati oon jaati Iisa wi'i mo: « Ɓiya daɗii ! » Nden kanko e ɓaade makko fuu, ɓe ngoonɗini Iisa.
Ɗum woni alaama kaayɗiniiɗo ɗiɗaɓo mo Iisa waɗi Galili wakkati o ƴuwnoo Yahudiya.
Gaɗa majjum juulɗe *Yahudankooɓe gom no ngaɗa. Iisa yehi *Ursaliima.
Toon *Ursaliima, hadde dammbugal bi'eteengal Dammbugal baali, no woodi luggere ndiyam gom inndirteene Baytijata nder ibrankoore. Tendeeje joy no piili nde.
Nyawɓe ɗuɓɓe no pukki nder majje: Wumɓe, laƴooɓe e bonnguuɓe. [Iɓe ndoomi faa ndiyam ɗaam irtee.
Ngam himɓe no miila maleykaajo Alla no jippoo wakkati warde wakkati nder luggere ndee, no irta ndiyam ɗaam. Nyawɗo artuɗo naati nder majjam wakkati ɗam irtaa, no yamɗitan ir nyaw ngu wondi fuu.]
Gorko nyawirɗo duuɓi woronja e jeetati gom no tawa toon.
Ko Iisa hi'i omo fukkii, annditi ko o ɓooydii he nyaw nguun, nden ƴamii mo, wi'i: —Aɗa hiɗi yamɗintineede naa?
Nyawɗo oon jaabii mo, wi'i: —Moodibbo, mi walaa balloowo kam mi naata nder luggere ndee wakkati ndiyam ɗam wona no irtee. To mbi'anmi mi yahan fuu, tawan goɗɗo artii kam juurude.
Nden Iisa wi'i mo: —Umma, hooƴu daago maa, dillu !
Wakkati mum da gorko oon yamɗiti, hooƴi daago mum, dilli. Ɗum fotodiri he *nyalaane fowteteene.
Nden mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe mbi'i jamɗintinaaɗo oon: —Hannden *nyalaane fowteteene non, haanaa ndoondoɗaa daago maa.
Sey o jaabii ɓe, o wi'i: —Jamɗintinɗo kam oon wi'i kam hooƴu daago maa, dillu !
Ɓe ƴamii mo ɓe mbi'i: —Moy woni neɗɗo bi'uɗo ma kooƴaa daago maa, ndillaa?
Amma jamɗintinaaɗo oon anndaa moy yamɗintini ɗum, ngam Iisa halkii nder jama'aare tawanoone nder nokkuure ndeen.
Gaɗa ko Iisa nyawti mo, fotti he makko nder *Juulirde mawne, wi'i mo: —Ƴeewu, joonkay, a yamɗiti. Taa waɗu hakke kaden ngam to ko ɓuri ɗum bonde heɓe.
Sey gorko oon yehi haalanowi mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe ko Iisa woni nyawtuɗo mo oon.
Mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe puɗɗi habdude Iisa ngam o nyawti gorko oo nder *nyalaane fowteteene.
Sey Iisa wi'i ɓe: —*Baaba am no golla faa jooni, miin duu, miɗo golla.
Haalaaji ɗi Iisa haali ɗii waɗi mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe adi anniya warude mo. Hanaa ngam o bonnii *nyalaane fowteteene tan, amma ngam o wi'i Alla woni Baabiiko duu. Ndenne o fonnii hoore makko he Alla.
Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Miɗo haalana on goonga: Ɓiɗɗo waawaa waɗude baafuy, kam tan, sey ko o hi'i *Baabiraawo no waɗa. Sabu ko *Baabiraawo waɗata fuu, kam Ɓiɗɗo oon duu waɗata.
*Baabiraawo no hiɗi Ɓiɗɗo oon, no holla mo ko waɗata fuu. O hollan mo golleeji ɓurɗi golleeji ɗii fuu manngu heɓa kaayɗineɗon.
Ngam hano no *Baabiraawo ummitinirta maayɓe wuurna ɓe nii, hano non Ɓiɗɗo oon duu wuurnirta mo muuyi.
*Baabiraawo oon kay, hiitantaako baa gooto, amma o hokkii Ɓiɗɗo oon baawɗe hiitaade huune fuu,
ngam himɓe fuu teddina Ɓiɗɗo oon hano no ɓe teddinirta *Baabiraawo. Neɗɗo fuu mo teddinaay Ɓiɗɗo oon, teddintaa *Baabiraawo lilɗo mo oon duu.
Miɗo haalana on goonga: Nanuɗo haala am, se goonɗini lilɗo kam oon, heɓi mbuurnam nduumiiɗam. O walaa e kiite kaden, o ƴuwii e maayde, o warii e mbuurnam.
Miɗo haalana on goonga: Wakkati no wara, o yottake jaati, nde maayɓe nanata daane *Ɓii-Alla oon. Nanuɓe nde ɓeen mbuuran.
Hano no *Baabiraawo laatorii asili mbuurnam, hano non o hokkiri Ɓiɗɗo oon duu baawɗe laataade asili mbuurnam.
O hokkii mo baawɗe hiitaade, ngam kanko woni *Ɓii-Neɗɗo.
To ɗum haayɗin on. Wakkati waran mo maayɓe wonɓe nder annyeeje fuu no nanan daane makko,
mburtoo. Golluɓe golle lobbe ummitanoo mbuurnam, golluɓe ko boni duu ummitanoo kiite.
Miin e hoore am, walaa fuu ko mbaawmi waɗude. Ko nanumi ɗum, kiitortoomi. Kiite am no dartii, sabu mi waɗataa muuyo am, amma muuyo lilɗo kam oon ngaɗanmi.
—Nde mi seedanake hoore am, seede am hanaa goonga.
Amma goɗɗo seedantoo kam. Miɗo anndi seede makko dow am no goonga.
Onon, on lili lilaaɓe to Yahaaya, o seedanake on goonga.
Miin, mi haajaaka seede ɓiɓɓe aadama, amma mi wi'i on ɗum ngam kison tan.
Yahaaya laatakeno hano fitilla kuɓɓaaka, njaynooka. On njaɓi welnude wakkati seɗɗa nder jeyngol makka.
Amma miin, miɗo jogii seede dow am ɓurɗo mo Yahaaya manngu: Golleeji ɗi *Baabiraawo tilsini kam mi waɗa ɗii, kanƴi jaati ceedantoo kam ko *Baabiraawo lili kam.
*Baabiraawo lilɗo kam oon e hoore mum seedantoo kam. Abada on nanaay daane makko, abada on ngi'aay mo.
Haala makko naataay on, sabu on ngoonɗinaay mo o lili oon.
Oɗon pincitoo dewte ngam oɗon miila ko ɗe kokkan on mbuurnam nduumiiɗam. Kanƴe jaati ceedantoo kam.
Amma, baa ko non waɗi, on ngiɗaa warde to am faa keɓon mbuurnam.
Mi walaa miɗo tefa himɓe mana kam.
Miɗo anndi on jaati, miɗo anndi hidde Alla walaa nder ɓerɗe mooɗon.
Miin, mi wari dow innde *Baaba am, amma on njaɓɓaaki kam. Dey se goɗɗo wari dow innde mum, on njaɓɓoto ɗum !
Noy ngoonɗinirton, onon giɗuɓe manodirde, tawi on mbaawaay tefude manoore ƴuwne to Alla gooto?
To miilee hala miin felata on yeeso *Baabiraawo. *Muusa, mo ndekuɗon tammude mooɗon dow mum oon, kam felata on.
Nde nii goonga fuu on ngoonɗiniino *Muusa, on ngoonɗinanno kam, miin duu, sabu miin jaati o sappinoo nder dewte makko.
Se on ngoonɗinaay ko o winndunoo ɗum, noy ngoonɗinirton haala am?
Balɗe seɗɗa gaɗa juulɗe *Yahudankooɓe gaɗaaɗe Ursaliima, Iisa joli peta Galili wi'eteenga Tiberiya.
Jama'aare ɗuunde no tokki mo sabu ɓe ngi'ii kaayɗe ɗe o waɗi wakkati o yamɗintinnoo nyawɓe.
Iisa nyakki dow waamnde, jooɗodii he *aahiiɓe mum.
Juulɗe *Yahudankooɓe bi'eteeɗe *Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe ɓadake.
Iisa ɓanti hoore mum, sey holliri jama'aare mawne gom no wara to mum. Nden o wi'i Filipa: —Toy coodoyten nyaamdu ngam himɓe ɓee fuu?
Tawi o fiyi hunnduko Filipa tan o nana ngam omo anndi ko o siini waɗude.
Filipa jaabii mo: —Baa buuru ko tammaaje keme ɗiɗi cooduɗen, woɓɓe nder maɓɓe keɓataa ŋoppitto.
Gooto nder *aahiiɓe Iisa bi'eteeɗo Andiire, minyo Simon Piyer, wi'i mo:
—Suka gorko gom nii jogiiɗo buuruuje joy e liƴƴi ɗiɗi, amma ɗume ɗum nafirta himɓe ɓee fuu?
Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Mbi'ee ɓe, ɓe njooɗoo ! Nokkuure ndeen no heewi huɗo, ɓe njooɗii. Worɓe tawaaɓe nder jama'aare ndee tan no ngaɗa ujunaaji joyo.
Iisa hooƴi buuruuje ɗeen, yetti Alla, yeddani wonɓe toon ɓeen. Noon duu o waɗi he liƴƴi ɗiin. O hokki ɓe, ɓe nyaami faa ɓe kaari.
Wakkati ɓe nyaamunoo faa ɓe kaari, sey Iisa wi'i *aahiiɓe mum: —Kawree ko hoddi ɗum, to baa ŋoppitto bonu.
Ɓe kawri ko himɓe nyaami koddi nder buuruuje joy ɗeen, ɗum hebbini kandeeje sappo e ɗiɗi.
Wakkati himɓe ɓeen ngi'unoo haayne nde Iisa waɗi, mbi'i: —Kanko jaati woni annabiijo bi'anooɗo no waran nder duuniyaaru.
Wakkati Iisa annditinnoo iɓe ngiɗi ɓe ngatta mo semmbe-semmbe nder laamu, sey o dilli. O nyakki waamnde, kanko tan.
Nde hiirunoo, *aahiiɓe Iisa njuuri nder peta ngaan.
Ɓe naati laana faa ɓe njola, yahde Kafarnahum. Jemma fuɗɗii naatude, Iisa duu heewtaaki ɓe.
Henndu mawnu no wifa faa benkeƴƴe ummii.
Ɓe awƴi laana kaan faa ɓe keɓi hano kilooji joy naa jeegom. Nden ɓe kolliri Iisa no dilla he koyɗe mum dow peta ngaan, no fonndii ɓe. Sey ɓe kuli.
Amma Iisa wi'i ɓe: —To kulee, miin noon !
Ɓe muuyi o naata laana kaan. Amma wakkati mum da ɓe njottii fonngo ngo ɓe pa'i, nden ɓe panndi.

Weeti jaangoore mum, jama'aare hoddinoonde gaɗa peta ngaan, paami ko laana goota tan wari nder nokkuure ndee. Ɓe ngi'ii duu ko *aahiiɓe ɓeen tan naati nder makka, awƴii ka, ndilli, Iisa duu naataay ka. *Aahiiɓe ɓeen tan ndilli.
Sey laanaaji gom nii ngari ƴuwi Tiberiya, ɗi ngari hadde to ɓe nyaamunoo buuru toon gaɗa ko Iisa yetti Alla nder du'aa'u.
Wakkati jama'aare ndeen hi'unoo ko Iisa e *aahiiɓe mum fuu ngalaa toon, ɓe naati laanaaji ɗiin, ɓe pa'i Kafarnahum tefoyde Iisa.
Wakkati ɓe tawoynoo Iisa gaɗa peta ngaan, ɓe mbi'i mo: —Moodibbo, nde ngarɗaa ɗoo?
Iisa jaabii ɓe wi'i: —Goonga non, hanaa ngam on ngi'ii kaayɗe ɗe ngaɗaama toon waɗi oɗon tefa kam. Amma ko tefanton kam woni ngam on nyaami faa on kaari.
To ngollanee nyaamdu bonooru. Ngollanee nyaamdu nduumotoonu, kokkooru mbuurnam nduumiiɗam. Kayru woni ndu *Ɓii-Neɗɗo hokkata on, sabu Alla *Baabiraawo deki lammba baawɗe mum dow makko.
Nden ɓe ƴami mo: —Ɗume min ngaɗata ko min ngolla golleeji ɗi Alla hiɗi?
Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Golle ɗe Alla hiɗi ɗeen ngoni ngoonɗinon mo o lili oon.
Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Too, haayne ndeye ngaɗataa ngam min ngi'a, min ngoonɗine? Golle ɗeye ngaɗataa?
Maamiraaɓe amin nder ladde yeeruure nyaamii nyaamdu wi'eteenu *manna, hano no ɗum winndiraa nder dewte wi'aa: O hokkii ɓe nyaamdu ƴuwnu dow kammu.
Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Miɗo haalana on goonga: Hanaa *Muusa hokkunoo on nyaamdu ƴuwnu dow kammu. Amma *Baaba am hokki on nyaamdu goongaaru ƴuwnu dow kammu.
Ngam nyaamdu ndu Alla hokkata nduun woni ƴuwooru dow kammu kokkooru duuniyaaru mbuurnam.
Sey ɓe mbi'i mo: —Moodibbo, hokku min ir nyaamdu nduu nyannde fuu.
Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Miin woni nyaamdu kokkooru mbuurnam. Garɗo to am fuu, rafataake faa abada. Goonɗinɗo kam oon duu ɗomɗataake abada.
Amma mi haalaniino on: « On ngi'ii kam, dey on ngoonɗinaay. »
Mo *Baabiraawo hokki kam fuu, waran to am. Garɗo to am fuu, mi riiwataa ɗum sam.
Sabu hanaa faa mi waɗa muuyo am, waɗi ƴuwmi dow kammu, amma ngam mi waɗa muuyo lilɗo kam oon.
Ndaa, muuyo lilɗo kam oon nii: To baa gooto nder ɓe o hokki kam ɓeen majju, amma mi ummintina ɓe nyannde darŋal.
Muuyo *Baaba am nii: Neɗɗo fuu gi'uɗo Ɓiɗɗo oon, goonɗini mo, heɓan mbuurnam nduumiiɗam. Mi ummintinan ɗum nyannde darŋal.
Sey *Yahudankooɓe ɓeen puɗɗi no nguuntoo hakkune mum'en, ngam Iisa wi'i ɓe: « Miin woni nyaamdu ƴuwnu dow kammu nduun. »
Ɓe mbi'i: —Hanaa Iisa ɓii-Yusufu mo annduɗen innum e bammum on non naa? Noy o wi'irta hannden dow kammu o ƴuwi?
Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Accee nguuntaade hakkune mooɗon !
Walaa baawɗo warde to am, se *Baabiraawo lilɗo kam oon, fooɗaay mo. Miin duu, mi ummintinan mo nyannde darŋal.
Ɗum winndaama nder dewte annabiiɓe wi'aa: Ɓe fuu Alla ekkintinii ɓe. Neɗɗo fuu hettinnani ko *Baabiraawo ekkintini, waran to am.
Walaa gi'uɗo *Baabiraawo, se hanaa oon ƴuwɗo to makko, kanko tan hi'i *Baabiraawo.
Miɗo haalana on goonga: Goonɗinɗo kam fuu, heɓi mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
Miin woni nyaamdu kokkooru mbuurnam.
Maamiraaɓe mooɗon nyaamii *manna nder ladde yeeruure, dey haɗaay ɓe maayi.
Amma nyaamdu ƴuwnu dow kammu nduun kay, nyaamɗo hen fuu maayataa.
Miin woni nyaamdu wuurnu ƴuwnu dow kammu. Nde goɗɗo nyaami he mayru, no wuuran faa abada. Nyaamdu ndu kokkanmi nduun woni ɓanndu am hokkaanu ngam duuniyaaru heɓa mbuurnam.
Haala kaa ummini geddi hakkune *Yahudankooɓe, iɓe mbi'a: —Noy o waawri hokkude en ɓanndu makko, nyaamen?
Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Miɗo haalana on goonga: Nde on nyaamaay ɓanndu *Ɓii-Neɗɗo, on njaraay ƴiiƴam mum, mbuurnam walanaa on.
Neɗɗo fuu nyaamɗo ɓanndu am, nde yari ƴiiƴam am, heɓi mbuurnam nduumiiɗam. Mi ummitinan ɗum nyannde darŋal.
Ngam ɓanndu am woni nyaamdu wuurnu, ƴiiƴam am duu woni cemmbam buurɗam.
Neɗɗo fuu nyaamɗo ɓanndu am, nde yari ƴiiƴam am, wondi he am, mi wondan he mum.
*Baabiraawo lilɗo kam oon no wuddu mbuurnam. Sabbu makko mbuurumi. Hano non nyaamɗo ɓanndu am fuu no wuuran sabbu am.
Nyaamdu ƴuwnu dow kammu nduun nii: Ndu hawtaa he ndu maamiraaɓe mon nyaamunoo nduun, ndu haɗaay ɓe maayde. Nyaamɗo nyaamdu nduu, no wuuran faa abada.
Waaju oo, Iisa waɗi nder *waajordu Kafarnahum.
Wakkati *aahiiɓe Iisa nanunoo haalaaji ɗii, ɗuɓɓe nder maɓɓe mbi'i: —Konngi ɗii no tiiɗi. Moy waawi jaɓude ɗi?
Iisa he hoore mum faami dow ko *aahiiɓe mum ngoni no nguuntoo, wi'i ɓe: —Ɗum laatanake on fergere naa?
Ndenne ɗume waɗata, se on ngi'ii *Ɓii-Neɗɗo ŋabbitii to wonnoo illa arannde?
*Ruuhu Alla woni ko hokkata mbuurnam, ɓanndu walaa baawɗe baafuy. Konngi ɗi kaalanmi on ɗii ngoni ruuhu, kanƴi ngoni mbuurnam duu.
Amma no woodi nder mooɗon ɓe ngoonɗinaay. Tawi illa arannde Iisa no anndunoo ɓe ngoonɗinaay ɓeen e jammboytooɗo mo oon.
O ɓeydi wi'ude: —Ngam majjum mbi'umi on: Baa gooto waawtaa warde to am nde *Baabiraawo waddaay mo.
Illa ndeen ɗuɓɓe nder *aahiiɓe makko coƴƴiti, acci tokkude mo.
Nden Iisa ƴami *lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen wi'i: —Onon duu, oɗon ngiɗi dillude naa?
Simon Piyer jaabii mo wi'i: —Joomam, to moy min njahata? Hanaa aan jogii konngi kokkooji mbuurnam nduumiiɗam naa?
Min ngoonɗinii, miɗen anndi ko aan woni Ceniiɗo ƴuwɗo to Alla.
Iisa jaabii ɓe wi'i: —Hanaa miin suɓii on, onon sappo e ɗiɗo ɓee naa? Amma gooto nder mooɗon no seyɗan.
Dow Yahuuda, ɓii-Simon Iskariyot, gooto nder *lilaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓeen o haali. Kanko woni jammboytooɗo Iisa.
Iisa tinni no fiiloo nder leydi Galili. O hiɗaa fiilaade nder leydi Yahudiya ngam mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe no tefa warde mo.
Juulɗe *Yahudankooɓe bi'eteeɗe kowaaɗe ɓadake.
Sey minyiraaɓe Iisa worɓe mbi'i mo: —Dillu ɗo, njahaa leydi Yahudiya ngam *aahiiɓe maa ngi'a golle ɗe ngaɗataa.
Neɗɗo fuu hiɗi anndee, suuɗataa ko waɗata. Nde aɗa waɗa ir golle ɗee, wannginan himɓe hoore maa.
Baa minyiraaɓe makko e ko'e mum'en ngoonɗinaay mo.
Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Wakkati am yonaay ginan, amma to mooɗon, wakkati fuu no wooɗi.
Himɓe duuniyaaru mbaawtaa wanyude on. Amma miin, iɓe mbanyi kam ngam miɗo seedoo ko golleeji maɓɓe no mboni.
Onon, njehee to juulɗe ɗeen. Miin, mi yahataa sabu wakkati am yonaay ginan.
Gaɗa o haalani ɓe ɗum, o jooɗii nder Galili.
Wakkati minyiraaɓe Iisa ndillirii juulɗe ɗeen, Iisa duu njehi to majje amma nder cuccukka, o hollaay hoore makko.
Mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe no tefa mo nder jama'aare ndeen, no mbi'a: —Toy o woni?
Himɓe ɗuɓɓe no nguuntoo dow makko. Gere no mbi'a: —Neɗɗo oo o lobbo ! Woɓɓe no mbi'a: —Aa'a, o majjinoowo himɓe.
Walaa cuusuɗo towni haali dow makko, sabu iɓe kula mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe.
Wakkati Iisa yehunoo tawi juulɗe ɗeen pecciri, o fuɗɗi omo waajoo nder *Juulirde mawne.
*Yahudankooɓe kaayɗinaa, sey ɓe mbi'i: —Noy waɗi ko neɗɗo oo heɓi anndal dewte, kanko mo janngaay?
Iisa jaabii ɓe wi'i: —Waaju mo mbaajotoomi oo, ƴuwaay to am. Amma to lilɗo kam oon, o ƴuwi.
Giɗɗo waɗude muuyo Alla fuu, no annditan nde waaju oo to Alla ƴuwi naa to am.
Kaaloowo miilo hoore mum, hoore mum tefanta teddungal. Amma tefoowo teddungal lilɗo ɗum, goonga haalata, ko boni fuu walaa he mum.
Hanaa *Muusa hokki on *Tawreeta naa? Amma baa gooto nder mooɗon waɗaay ko *Tawreeta wi'i. Ɗume waɗi oɗon tefa warde kam?
Himɓe njaabii mo, mbi'i: —Aan, a laddaaɗo. Moy tefata warde ma?
Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Gollal gootal tan ngaɗumi, on fuu, on kaayɗinaama.
*Muusa wi'i ngaɗon juulnol. Oɗon njuulna neɗɗo baa *nyalaane fowteteene. Maamiraaɓe mooɗon puɗɗi ngol, hanaa *Muusa fuɗɗi ngol.
Nde neɗɗo no juulnee *nyalaane fowteteene ngam to bonnu *Tawreeta Muusa, ɗume tikkanton kam sabu mi yamɗintinii neɗɗo bumbuujo nder *nyalaane fowteteene?
To on kiitoree no ngiirruɗon, kiitoree goonga.
Gere nder himɓe *Ursaliima mbi'i: —Hanaa oo woni mo ɓe tefata warde oon naa?
Amma ndaa, omo darii omo waajoo yeeso himɓe fuu, ɓe mbi'aay mo baafuy. Tawte mawɓe meeɗen potii dow kanko woni *Almasiihu oon?
Oo kay, eɗen anndi to ƴuwi, amma nde *Almasiihu oon wari, baa gooto anndataa to o ƴuwata.

Iisa no waajoo nder *Juulirde mawne ndeen, sey o towni daane, o wi'i: —On mbi'ii oɗon anndi kam naa? Oɗon anndi to ƴuwmi? Amma hanaa miin waddi hoore am. Lilɗo kam oon woni goongaajo, kanko woni mo on anndaa.
Miin, miɗo anndi mo sabu to makko ƴuwmi, kanko lili kam.
Nden ɓe tefi nanngude mo, amma junngo baa gooto yottaaki mo, ngam wakkati makko yonaay ginan.
Ɗuɓɓe nder jama'aare ndee ngoonɗini mo, mbi'i: —Kee nde *Almasiihu oon wari, omo waawi waɗude kaayɗe ɓurɗe ɗe gorko oo waɗi naa?
*Fariisa'en nani ko himɓe ɓeen ngoni no nguuntoo dow Iisa. Hooreeɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla e *Fariisa'en lili dogariiɓe nannga Iisa.
Sey Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Miin, mi wondan he mooɗon wakkati seɗɗa ginan. Gaɗa mum, mi soƴƴoo to lilɗo kam oon.
On tefan kam, amma on ngiitataa kam, ngam on mbaawtaa yahde to ngonmi.
Mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe ƴamodiri mbi'i: —Toy o yahata ko en mbaawtaa hiitude mo? O tefowan himɓe meeɗen sankitiiɓe nder lenyi janaani, o waajoo lenyi ɗii naa?
O wi'i en tefan mo, en ngiitataa mo, sabu en mbaawtaa yahde to o tawetee toon. Ɗume woni maana haala kaa?
Nyalaane ɓurde teddude nder juulɗe ɗeen fuu woni nyalaane nde juulɗe ɗeen timmata. Nyannde mum Iisa darii huuɓi, wi'i: —Ɗomɗuɗo fuu wara to am, yara.
Goonɗinɗo kam fuu, maayooji ndiyam mbuurnoojam no ilan nder ɓerne mum hano no ɗum winndiraa nder dewte nii.
Dow *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo Iisa woni no haala. *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo oo kam woni ko goonɗinɗo mo fuu heɓata. Amma wakkati mum *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo hokkaakano ngam Iisa teddinaakano ginan.
Wakkati himɓe gom nanunoo haala kaa nder jama'aare ndeen, mbi'i: —Sikka fuu walaa kanko woni annabiijo oon.
Woɓɓe duu mbi'i: —Oo nii woni *Almasiihu oon. Amma woɓɓe mbi'i kaden: —*Almasiihu oon ƴuwan Galili naa?
Hanaa Dewtere Alla wi'i ko nder lenyol Daawda *Almasiihu ƴuwata? Hanaa nde wi'i kaden Baytilaama wuro Daawda o ƴuwata?
Haalaaji jama'aare ndee luurodiri dow Iisa.
Nder maɓɓe no woodi hiɗuɓe nanngude mo, amma junngo baa gooto yottaaki mo.
Wakkati dogariiɓe ɓeen ngartunoo, hooreeɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla e *Fariisa'en ƴami ɓe, mbi'i: —Ko waɗi on ngaddaay mo?
Dogariiɓe ɓeen njaabii ɓe, mbi'i: —Abada goɗɗo waajoraaki hano no neɗɗo oo waajori.
Sey *Fariisa'en njaabii ɓe, mbi'i: —Kaari ! Baa onon duu, on eytaama naa?
Naa on ngi'ii goɗɗo nder hooreeɓe *Yahudankooɓe naa nder *Fariisa'en goonɗinɗo mo non?
Amma jama'aare ndee no kuɗaane, nde anndaa *Tawreeta Muusa !
Nikodemu, gooto nder *Fariisa'en jehunooɗo to Iisa, wi'i ɓe:
—*Tawreeta meeɗen waawaa hiitaade neɗɗo nde nanaay ko joomum haali, naa ko waɗi.
Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Aan duu, a ɓii-Galili naa? Fincita haala Alla, a hi'an ko annabiijo fuu wanngataa Galili. [
Gaɗa majjum neɗɗo fuu hooti wuro mum,
Iisa duu yehi waamnde Jaytun.
Illa subaka kecco Iisa warti nder *Juulirde mawne ndeen. Himɓe fuu ngari to makko. O jooɗii, omo waajoo ɓe.
Jannginooɓe *Tawreeta e *Fariisa'en ngaddi debbo tawaaɗo no yeena gom. Ɓe ndarni mo hakkune jama'aare ndeen.
Ɓe mbi'i Iisa: —Moodibbo, debbo oo maɓaama no yeena.
Too, *Muusa tilsinii min nder *Tawreeta min mbarda ir rewɓe ɓee kaaƴe. Aan nee, ɗume mbiiɗaa?
Ɓe ngaɗi ƴamɗe ɗee ngam ɓe tunna mo ɓe keɓa laawol ngol ɓe njukkirta mo. Amma Iisa jimminii no diidira honndu mum dow leydi.
Wakkati ɓe tokkiri Iisa ƴamɗe ɗee, nden o ɓanti hoore, o wi'i ɓe: —Mo waɗaay hakke abada nder mooɗon arta bugaade mo hayre.
Nden Iisa yeeƴi jimmini, no diida dow leydi.
Wakkati ɓe nanunoo ɗum, sey ɓe cortorii gooto gooto. Nayeeɓe ɓeen artii. Iisa he debbo dariiɗo yeeso mum oon tan acca toon.
Nden Iisa ɓanti hoore mum, wi'i mo: —Banndam debbo, toy ɓe ngoni? Walaa jukkuɗo ma naa?
O jaabii Iisa o wi'i: —Moodibbo, baa gooto. Nden Iisa wi'i mo: —Miin duu, mi jukkataa ma. Yah, amma taa waɗu hakke kaden.]
Iisa haaldi he himɓe kaden, wi'i: —Miin woni jeyngol duuniyaaru. Tokkuɗo kam fuu, dillataa nder nimre abada, amma no heɓan jeyngol mbuurnam.
Sey *Fariisa'en mbi'i mo: —Aan, aɗa seedanoo hoore maa, seede maa hanaa goonga.
Iisa jaabii ɓe wi'i: —Baa nde mi seedanake hoore am, seede am no goonga, sabu miɗo anndi to ƴuwmi, miɗo anndi to njahanmi. Amma onon, on anndaa to ƴuwmi, on anndaa to njahanmi.
Onon, oɗon kiitoroo dabareeji himɓe, miin kay, mi hiitataako baa gooto.
Amma baa nde miɗo hiitoo, kiite am no goonga, sabu mi hiitataako miin tan, *Baabiraawo lilɗo kam oon, no wondi he am.
No winndaa nder *Tawreeta mooɗon wi'aa: Seede himɓe ɗiɗo no goonga.
Too, miɗo seedanoo hoore am. *Baabiraawo lilɗo kam oon duu, no seedanoo kam.
Sey ɓe mbi'i mo: —Toy *Baaba maa oon woni? Iisa jaabii ɓe wi'i: —On anndaa kam, on anndaa *Baaba am oon. Se nii oɗon anndunoo kam, on anndannoo *Baaba am oon duu.
Iisa haalii konngi ɗii wakkati o waajotonoo nder *Juulirde mawne, hadde to ceede ndesetee. Amma baa ko non waɗi, walaa nannguɗo mo, ngam wakkati makko yonaay ginan.
Iisa wi'i ɓe kaden: —Mi yahan, on tefan kam, amma on maaydan he hakkeeji mooɗon. To pa'umi toon, on mbaawtaa yahde toon.
Kanƴum waɗi mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe mbi'i: —Tawte o waran hoore makko waɗi o wi'i en mbaawtaa yahde to o fa'i toon?
Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Onon, ley njeyaaɗon, amma miin, dow njeyaami. Onon, nder duuniyaaru nduu njeyaaɗon, amma miin, mi jeyaaka nder mayru.
Ngam majjum waɗi mbi'umi on: On maaydan he hakkeeji mooɗon. Sabu se on ngoonɗinaay ko Miin woni oon mo ngonmi, on maaydan he hakkeeji mooɗon.
Nden ɓe ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Aan woni moy? Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Miin woni mo mbi'unoomi on ngonmi illa arannde.
Onon, kujje ɗuɗɗe no ngoodi ɗe mbaawmi haalude dow mooɗon, mi hiitoo on duu. Amma lilɗo kam oon woni goongaajo. Ko nanumi to makko, kaalananmi duuniyaaru nduu.
Ɓe paamaay ko dow *Baabiraawo o woni omo haalana ɓe.
Ɗum waɗi Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Nde on ɓanti *Ɓii-Neɗɗo fuu, on paaman ko Miin woni oon mo ngonmi. Mi waɗataa baafuy ngam hoore am. Ko *Baabiraawo anndini kam tan kaalananmi on.
Lilɗo kam oon no wondi he am, o accaay kam feere am, ngam ko weli mo tan ngaɗanmi nyannde fuu.
Wakkati Iisa haalirannoo nii, ɗuɓɓe ngoonɗini mo.
Iisa wi'i *Yahudankooɓe goonɗinɓe mo ɓeen: —Se on tinnake oɗon njogii haalaaji am, on laatoto *aahiiɓe am goongaaɓe.
On anndan goonga, goonga oon duu no rimɗinan on.
Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Minen, min jippotooɓe he *Ibrahim, walaa marɗo min abada. Noy mbi'irtaa min ndimɗan?
Iisa jaabii ɓe wi'i: —Miɗo haalana on goonga: Gaɗoowo hakke fuu, no maccuɗo hakke.
Abada maccuɗo duumataako nder hoggo, amma ɓiɗɗo no duumoto nder maggo faa abada.
Ngam majjum, nde Ɓiɗɗo oon rimɗinii on, on laatoto rimɓe goongaaɓe.
Miɗo anndi ko on jippotooɓe he *Ibrahim, amma oɗon tefa warde kam, ngam konngi am naataay on.
Miin, miɗo haala ko ngiirumi *Baaba am, amma onon, oɗon ngaɗa ko narruɗon baabii'on.
Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Baabiimin woni *Ibrahim. Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Se nii on jippotooɓe he *Ibrahim, on ngaɗataana golleeji *Ibrahim.
Amma jooni oɗon tefa warde kam, miin kaalanɗo on goonga mo narrumi Alla. *Ibrahim kay, waɗaay ir ɗum.
Onon, golleeji baabii'on ngaɗoton. Ɓe mbi'i mo: —Minen, min kanaa ɓiɓɓe henndu. *Baabiraawo gooto min ngoodi, kanko woni Alla.
Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Se goonga fuu Alla wonnoo Baabii'on, on ngiɗan kam, ngam to Alla ƴuwmi, ngarmi to mooɗon. Mi waddaay hoore am, kanko lili kam.
Ɗume waɗi ko on paamataa haala am? On paamataa ka ngam ika daɗi hakkillo mon.

Onon, Ibiliisa woni baabii'on. Oɗon ngiɗi waɗude muuyo baabii'on. O baroowo himɓe illa fuɗɗorde. Abada o daraaki dow goonga, ngam goonga walaa he makko. Se o feni, jikku makko non, sabu o penoowo, o baaba fewre.
Amma miin, ngam miɗo haala goonga, waɗi ko on ngoonɗinaay kam.
Moy e mooɗon waawi seedaade ko mi waɗi hakke? Ndenne ɗume waɗi se mi haalii goonga, on ngoonɗintaa kam?
Neɗɗo Alla kay no hettintoo haala Alla. Onon nee, on kettintaako ngam on kanaa himɓe Alla.
*Yahudankooɓe mbi'i Iisa: —Hanaa goonga amin ko min mbi'unoo a ɓii-leydi *Samariya, a laddaaɗo?
Iisa jaabii ɓe wi'i: —Mi hanaa laddaaɗo, amma miɗo teddina *Baaba am. Onon, oɗon pamɗina kam.
Hanaa miin tefanta hoore am teddungal. No woodi tefanoowo kam ngal, oon woni kiitotooɗo.
Goonga kaalananmi on: Jogiiɗo haala am fuu, maayataa abada.
Nden *Yahudankooɓe mbi'i mo: —Joonkay min tabbintini ko a laddaaɗo. *Ibrahim e annabiiɓe fuu maayi, dey aan, mbi'aa jogiiɗo haala maa fuu, maayataa abada.
A wonaana aɗa miila ko aɗa ɓuri baabiimin *Ibrahim manngu naa? O maayi, annabiiɓe duu maayi. Moy ngonɗaa aɗa ada hoore maa nii?
Iisa jaabii ɓe wi'i: —Miin, se hoore am teddinanmi, teddungal am no meere. *Baaba am, mo mbi'oton Alla mooɗon, teddinta kam.
Onon, on anndaa mo. Miin, miɗo anndi mo. Nde mi wi'i mi anndaa mo, mi laatake penoowo hano mooɗon. Amma miɗo anndi mo, miɗo jogii haala makko.
Baabii'on *Ibrahim no welwelta sanne ngam heɓa hi'a nyalaane am. O hi'i nde, o nani belɗum.
*Yahudankooɓe mbi'i mo: —A waɗaay baa duuɓi woygu ginan, dey mbi'aa a hi'i *Ibrahim?
Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Miɗo haalana on goonga: Illa *Ibrahim rimaaka, miɗo ɗon.
Ko Iisa haali haala kaa sey ɓe adi kaaƴe faa ɓe mbugoo mo. Amma o moli, o wurtii *Juulirde mawne ndeen.
Wakkati Iisa woni no yawta, sey o hi'i gorko dimiraaɗo mbumdam gom.
*Aahiiɓe makko ƴami mo mbi'i: —Moodibbo, ko o rimaa nder mbumdam ɗam, kanko waɗi hakke naa saarooɓe makko?
Iisa jaabii ɓe wi'i: —Hanaa kanko, hanaa saarooɓe makko ngaɗi hakke. Amma ɗum heewtake mo heɓa baawɗe Alla mbannga dow makko.
No tilsi ngaɗen golle lilɗo kam illa nder nyalooma. Ngam nde jemma wari, baa gooto waawaa gollude.
Nde miɗo nder duuniyaaru nduu, miin woni jeyngol mayru.
Gaɗa o haali haala kaa, sey o tutti dow leydi, o hawrodiri ndi e joode, o wuji e gite bumɗo oon.
O wi'i mo: —Yah lootoy yeeso maa to luggere Silowam. Maana Silowam woni « Lilaaɗo. » O lootowi yeeso makko, o warti, omo hi'a.
Wondiraaɓe makko, he anndunooɓe ko o bumɗo piyoowo bara ndenno, mbi'i: —Tawte hanaa oo woni jooɗinooɗo no fiya bara naa?
Woɓɓe mbi'i: —Kanko non ! Woɓɓe duu mbi'i: —Hanaa ! Nanndi makko nii non ! Amma gorko oon e hoore mum wi'i: —Miin nii non !
Nden ɓe ƴami mo ɓe mbi'i: —Noy mbumtirɗaa?
Neɗɗo oon jaabii ɓe wi'i: —Gorko bi'eteeɗo Iisa, waɗi kecciri, wuji e gite am, wi'i kam mi yaha to luggere Silowam, mi lootowa yeeso am. Lootoymi yeeso am, sey mbumtumi.
Ɓe ƴami mo ɓe mbi'i: —Toy gorko oon woni? O wi'i: —Mi anndaa !
Nden himɓe njaari bumtinaaɗo oon to *Fariisa'en.
Tawi *nyalaane fowteteene non, Iisa waɗunoo kecciri wumtini mo.
Ngam majjum *Fariisa'en duu ƴami mo no o wumtiri. O jaabii ɓe o wi'i: —O wuji kecciri e gite am, lootumi yeeso am, mbumtumi.
Gere nder *Fariisa'en mbi'i: —Gorko oo ƴuwaay to Alla ngam o hoddanaay *nyalaane fowteteene. Amma woɓɓe mbi'i: —Noy gaɗoowo hakke waawi waɗude ir kaayɗe ɗee? Ɗum waddi rafi potal caka maɓɓe.
Nden *Fariisa'en ƴami bumtinaaɗo oon kaden mbi'i: —Ɗume mbi'ataa dow bumtinɗo ma oon? O jaabii, o wi'i: —O annabiijo.
Mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe ɓeen kay njaɓaay ko o bumnooɗo e ko o wumti jooni, naako ɓe noddi saarooɓe makko.
Ɓe ƴami ɓe, ɓe mbi'i: —Gorko oo, no ɓiyii'on naa? On mbi'i ko mbumdam o rimdaa naa? Ndenne noy waɗi ko o wumti joonin?
Saarooɓe ɓeen njaabii, mbi'i: —Miɗen anndi ko o ɓiyiimin, miɗen anndi duu ko mbumdam o rimdaa.
Amma min anndaa noy o wumtiri. Min anndaa bumtinɗo mo oon duu. Ƴamee mo ! Kanko duu o mawɗo. Omo waawi jaabanaade hoore makko.
Saarooɓe makko njaaborake nii sabu iɓe kula mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe. Ngam ɓe potii dow ko neɗɗo fuu goonɗini ko Iisa woni *Almasiihu, ɓe ndiiwan joomum nder *waajordu.
Ngam majjum waɗi saarooɓe ɓeen mbi'i: « O mawɗo. Ƴamee mo ! »
*Fariisa'en nodditi bumtinaaɗo oon, mbi'i mo: —Hulu Alla ! Minen kay, miɗen anndi ko gorko oo no gaɗoowo hakke.
O jaabii ɓe: —Se o gaɗoowo hakke duu, miin kay, mi anndaa. Gootel tan woni ko anndumi: Ndenno mi bumɗo, jooni mi wumti.
Ɓe ƴamtini mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Ɗume o waɗani ma? Noy o wumtiniri ma?
O jaabii ɓe, o wi'i: —Mi haalaniino on ɗum, amma on njaɓaay. Ɗume waɗi oɗon ngiɗi nantude ɗum kaden? Tawte onon duu, oɗon ngiɗi laataade *aahiiɓe makko non?
Ɓe njenni mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Aan nii woni aahiijo makko ! Minen kay, min aahiiɓe *Muusa.
Minen, miɗen anndi Alla haaldii he *Muusa, amma neɗɗo oo kay, min anndaa fuu to o ƴuwata.
Gorko oon jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Haba? Hannden mi hi'i haayne. On anndaa to o ƴuwi, dey o wumtinii kam !
Eɗen anndi Alla hettintaako waɗooɓe hakke, amma omo jaabanoo kuloowo mo, gaɗoowo muuyo makko.
Illa fuɗɗam duuniyaaru walaa nanuɗo bumtinɗo dimdaaɗo mbumdam.
Se nii hanaa to Alla gorko oo ƴuwi, o waawtaa waɗude baafuy.
Ɓe njaabii mo: —Aan, laatiiɗo a fuu nder hakke ndimeɗaa, aan waajoto min naa ! Ɓe ndiiwi mo.
Iisa nani ɓe ndiiwii mo, sey yehi tawowi mo, wi'i mo: —Aan nee, a goonɗini *Ɓii-Neɗɗo naa?
O jaabii, o wi'i: —Moodibbo, moy woni *Ɓii-Neɗɗo? Hollan mo faa mi goonɗina mo?
Nden Iisa wi'i mo: —A hi'i mo, kanko jaati woni no haalda he maa.
Sey o jaabii Iisa o wi'i: —Joomiraawo, mi goonɗini. O sujidani Iisa.
Nden Iisa wi'i mo: —Mi wari nder duuniyaaru ngam kiite ngaɗaa, wumɓe ngi'a, hi'ooɓe mbumaa.
Woɓɓe nder *Fariisa'en wonɓe hadde makko, nanuɓe haala kaa, ƴami mo mbi'i: —Ndenne, min wumɓe naa?
Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Se on wumɓe, nden on gaɗataano hakke. Amma ko mbi'uɗon joonin oɗon ngi'a, hakkeeji mooɗon tabbitii.
Iisa wi'i: —Miɗo haalana on goonga: Neɗɗo fuu naatoowo hoggo baali dey naatiraay dammbugal, kam woni gujjo, kam woni teetoowo.
Amma naatiroowo dammbugal oon woni duroowo baali ɗiin.
Deenoowo dammbugal oon no maɓɓitanan mo, baali ɗiin duu no nanan daane makko. O noddiran mbaalu makko fuu he innde mum, o wurtina ɗi yaasi.
Nde o wurtini ɗi ɗi fuu, o ardoto, ɗi tokka mo ngam iɗi anndi daane makko.
Ɗi tokkataa koɗo sam, amma ɗi ndoggan mo sabu ɗi anndaa daane makko.
Iisa hippani ɓe haala kaa, amma ɓe paamaay maana makka.
O ɓeydi wi'ude: —Miɗo haalana on goonga, miin woni dammbugal hoggo baali.
Artuɓe kam fuu no wuyɓe e teetooɓe, baali ɗiin nanaay daaɗe maɓɓe.
Miin woni dammbugal, neɗɗo fuu naatirɗo kam, hisan, no oornan heɓa duurduɗe, jaaƴina.
Gujjo warataana ngam wujja, itta yonki, bonna, amma miin, mi warii faa himɓe keɓa mbuurnam ngam ɓe keɓira ɗam no ɗuuɗiri.
Miin woni duroowo lobbo. Duroowo lobbo woni cottoowo yonki mum ngam baali mum.
Amma duroowo joɓeteeɗo hanaa duroowo goongaajo. O hanaa jom baali, illa o holliri suunu no wara, o doggan o acca ɗi. Nden ndu saama e majji, ɗi cankitoo.
O doggan ngam o duroowo joɓeteeɗo tan, walaa fuu ko hilli mo he baali ɗiin.
Miin woni duroowo lobbo. Miɗo anndi baali am, baali am duu no anndi kam.
Hano no *Baabiraawo anndiri kam, non anndirmi *Baabiraawo. Miɗo sotta yonki am ngam baali am.
Miɗo woodi baali gom kaden ɗi ngalaa nder hoggo ngoo. Kanƴi duu no tilsi mi waddowa ɗi. Ɗi nanan daane am, ɗi laatoto sewre worre nde duroowo gooto.
Ko waɗi *Baabiraawo no hiɗi kam woni ngam mi sottan yonki am faa mi heɓita ki kaden.
Walaa ittoowo ki, ngam miin e hoore am hokkata ki. Miɗo woodi baawɗe hokkude ki. Miɗo woodi baawɗe heɓtude ki. Ɗum woni tilsinoore nde keɓumi to *Baaba am.
Haalaaji ɗii ɓeydi senndude *Yahudankooɓe.
Ɗuɓɓe nder maɓɓe no mbi'a: —O kaaŋaaɗo kuɓɗo ! Ko saabii oɗon kettinanii mo?
Gere maɓɓe duu mbi'i: —Haala kaa hanaa haala laddaaɗo. Laddaaɗo no waawi wumtinde bumɗo naa?
*Juulɗe cenɗinol Juulirde mawne ngaɗi *Ursaliima. Ɗum fotodiri he dabbune.
Nder *Juulirde mawne ndeen, Iisa no yaha no warta ley danki Suleymaanu.
Sey *Yahudankooɓe piili mo, mbi'i: —Faa nde tinnotoɗaa aɗa jogii min nder wemmbere? Se aan woni *Almasiihu, laaɓinan min.
Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Mi arti mi haalanii on ɗum, amma on ngoonɗinaay. Golleeji ɗi ngaɗumi dow innde *Baaba am ɗiin, kanƴi jaati ceedantoo kam.
Amma onon, on ngoonɗinaay ngam on kanaa baali am.
Baali am no nana daane am. Miɗo anndi ɗi, iɗi tokka kam.
Miɗo hokka ɗi mbuurnam nduumiiɗam, ɗi mbaatataa abada. Walaa baawɗo teetirde ɗi semmbe semmbe nder junngo am.
*Baabiraawo kokkuɗo kam ɗi oon, no ɓuri huune fuu. Walaa baawɗo teetirde ɗi semmbe semmbe nder junngo *Baabiraawo.
Miin e *Baabiraawo fuu, min go'o.
Sey *Yahudankooɓe adi kaaƴe faa paɗɗa mo.
Amma Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Yeeso mooɗon, baawɗe *Baabiraawo ngaɗirmi golle ɗuɗɗe lobbe sanne ɗe fuu. Nder golle ɗe ngaɗumi ɗe fuu, ngam gollal ngale ngiɗɗon faɗɗude kam kaaƴe?
*Yahudankooɓe njaabii mo mbi'i: —Hanaa ngam golle lobbe min ngiɗi warirde ma kaaƴe. Ko waɗi miɗen ngiɗi warude ma woni a famɗini Alla. Aan a tagaaɗo, dey a adi hoore maa Alla.
Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Hanaa no winndaa nder *Tawreeta mooɗon ko Alla wi'i: Onon, on allaaɓe?
Eɗen anndi ko haala Alla sottataa. Nde Alla noddiri ɓe o suɓii ɓeen « allaaɓe »,
too, miin mo Alla senɗini, lili nder duuniyaaru nduu, noy haala am laatortoo pamɗinol Alla ngam mi wi'i: « Miin, mi *Ɓii-Alla »?
Se nii mi waɗaay golleeji *Baaba am, to ngoonɗinee kam.
Amma se miɗo waɗa ɗi, baa se on ngoonɗintaa kam, ngoonɗinee golleeji ɗii, ngam paamon, njaɓon duu no wooɗiri ko *Baabiraawo no wondi he am, miɗo wondi he makko.
Nden ɓe tefi nanngude mo kaden. O soptii ɓe.
Iisa soƴƴii toon gaɗa maayo Urdun nokkuure to Yahaaya waɗanannoo himɓe *batisma, o jooɗii toon.
Himɓe ɗuɓɓe ngari to makko, iɓe mbi'odira: —Yahaaya waɗaay haayne baa wootere. Amma, ko o haali dow gorko oo fuu no goonga.
Toon ɗuɓɓe ngoonɗini Iisa.
Nder wuro Baytaniya no woodi gorko bi'eteeɗo Laajaru, Laajaru oo yemaaki. Omo woodi sakiraaɓe makko rewɓe ɗiɗo gom, Marta e Mariyaama.
Mariyaama woni debbo bujunooɗo nebbam uurɗam dow koyɗe Iisa, moytiri ɗe gaasa mum. Too, Mariyaama oo banndum gorko woni Laajaru oo.
Sakiraaɓe Laajaru rewɓe ɗiɗo ɓee lili goɗɗo wi'a Iisa: —Moodibbo, war ! Giɗo maaɗa yamɗaa.
Nde Iisa nanunoo ɗum, sey wi'i: —Nyaw nguu hanaa nyaw mbaroowu. Amma ngu wari ngam wannginde teddungal Alla, heɓa *Ɓii-Alla oon duu teddinee.
Iisa no hiɗi Marta, Mariyaama e sakiike maɓɓe gorko Laajaru.
Baa nii ko Iisa nanii Laajaru yamɗaa, ɗum haɗaay mo jooɗaade to o wonnoo toon balɗe ɗiɗi.
Gaɗa ɗum o wi'i *aahiiɓe makko: —En coƴƴoo leydi Yahudiya !
*Aahiiɓe ɓeen mbi'i mo: —Moodibbo, ɓooyaay ko *Yahudankooɓe tefi faɗɗude ma kaaƴe nder leydi ndiin. Toon ngiɗaa soƴƴaade kaden naa?
Iisa jaabii ɓe wi'i: —Hanaa jamɗe sappo e ɗiɗi ngoni nder nyalooma gooto naa? Dilloowo nyalooma fuu fergataako ngam no hi'a jeyngol duuniyaaru.
Amma dilloowo jemma fergoto ngam jeyngol walaa he makko.
Gaɗa o haalii haalaaji ɗii, o wi'i ɓe: —Higii'en Laajaru ɗaanake, mi yahan, mi findinowa mo.
Nden ɓe mbi'i mo: —Moodibbo, se tawaama o ɗaaniiɗo, ndenne o daɗan.
Maayde Laajaru o haalani ɓe. Amma kamɓe kay, ɓe miilataana ko filla ɗoyngol allawol ngool nii o wondi.
Nden Iisa laaɓinani ɓe, wi'i: —Laajaru laatake !
Mi nani belɗum ngam mooɗon ko mi tawaaka toon. Ɗum laatanto on sabaabu goonɗinol. Amma en njaha to makko.
Nden Tomas bi'eteeɗo Funeejo wi'i *aahiiɓe ɓeeto: —Accee, njehen enen duu baa nde en maaydan he makko non.
Wakkati Iisa yottii, tawi Laajaru waɗi balɗe nay he mooɓeede.
Hakkune Baytaniya e *Ursaliima ɓuraa kilooji tati.
*Yahudankooɓe ɗuɓɓe ngari kinniri Mariyaama e Marta maayde Laajaru.
Wakkati Marta nanunoo Iisa no wara, o acci Mariyaama no jooɗii nder suudu, o yehi o jaɓɓitowii mo.
Marta wi'i Iisa: —Joomam, se nii aɗa wonnoo ɗo, banndam gorko maayataano.
Amma miɗo anndi baa joonin, ko ƴamɗaa Alla fuu, o waɗante ɗum.
Nden Iisa wi'i mo: —Bannda gorko no ummitoto.
Marta wi'i: —Miɗo anndi ko o ummitittoo nyannde darŋal.
Iisa wi'i mo: —Miin woni ummitaaki maayɓe, miin woni mbuurnam duu. Neɗɗo fuu goonɗinɗo kam, baa se maayi, no wuuran.
Buurɗo goonɗinɗo kam fuu, maayataa abada. A goonɗini ɗum naa?
Marta wi'i mo: —Ayyo, Joomam ! Mi goonɗini aan woni *Almasiihu, *Ɓii-Alla, bannganɗo duuniyaaru nduu.
Gaɗa ko o haali ɗum, o yehi o noddowi sakiike makko, Mariyaama. O nyo'ani mo, o wi'i: —Moodibbo oon warii, omo nodde.
Illa ko Mariyaama nanunoo ɗum, o yaawɗi o yehi to Iisa.
Wakkati mum fuu Iisa naataay wuro ngoon ginan. Omo wonnoo to Marta fottunoo he makko.
*Yahudankooɓe wondunooɓe he Mariyaama nder suudu no cawrina mo, wakkati ɓe ngi'unoo o yaawɗi o wurtii, sey ɓe tokki mo, ngam ɓe miilii to annyeere ndeen o fa'i faa o woyowa.
Nde Mariyaama yottii to Iisa woni, illa o hi'i mo, o hofi yeeso makko, o wi'i: —Joomam, se nii aɗa wonnoo ɗo, banndam gorko maayataano.
Wakkati Iisa hi'unoo Mariyaama e *Yahudankooɓe wondunooɓe he mum ɓeen no mboya, ɓerne makko metti sanne.
O wi'i: —Toy mooɓuɗon mo? Ɓe mbi'i mo: —Moodibbo, war, ƴeewu !
Sey Iisa fusi gonɗi.
Nden *Yahudankooɓe gom mbi'i: —Ƴeewee no o hiɗiri mo.
Amma woɓɓe maɓɓe duu mbi'odiri: —Bumtinɗo bumɗo no waawaa haɗude gorko oo maayde naa?
Ɓerne Iisa metti kaden, nden o yehi tiimoyde annyeere ndeen. Annyeere ndeen, lowol maɓɓiraangol hayre non.
Nden Iisa wi'i: Ittee hayre ndee ! Marta sakiike maayɗo oon wi'i mo: —Joomam, hannden tawan henndu makko waylake, sabu hannden woni balɗe makko nay he maayde.
Iisa jaabii mo, wi'i: —Hanaa mi wi'i ma, se a goonɗini, a hi'an baawɗe Alla naa?
Ɓe itti hayre ndeen. Iisa tiggitii, wi'i: —*Baabiraawo, mi yettii ma ngam a hettinake kam.
Miin kay, miɗo anndi nyannde fuu aɗa hettinanii kam. Amma mi haaliri nii sabu himɓe dariiɓe ɓee, ngam ɓe ngoonɗina aan lili kam.
Gaɗa haalaaji ɗii, o ɓanti daane makko, o huuɓi sanne, o wi'i: —Laajaru, wurta !
Sey maaynooɗo oon wurtii. Juuɗe mum e koyɗe mum no kaɓɓaa leppi, yeeso mum no suddii. Nden Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Piirtee mo o yaha !
Ɗuɓɓe nder *Yahudankooɓe warnooɓe to Mariyaama, hi'uɓe ko waɗi, ngoonɗini Iisa.
Amma gere maɓɓe njehi to *Fariisa'en, kaalani ɓe ko Iisa waɗi.
Nden *Fariisa'en e hooreeɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla ngaɗi hawriine mawne, ɓe mbi'i: —Noy ngatten? Ngam gorko oo no waɗa kaayɗe ɗuɗɗe.
Se en accirii mo nii, ɓe fuu, ɓe ngoonɗinan mo. Nden himɓe *Rooma ngara, nannga *Juulirde meeɗen mawne e lenyol meeɗen.
Gooto maɓɓe bi'eteeɗo Kayafas laatiiɗo mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla nder hitaane ndeen, wi'i ɓe: —Onon, on anndaa baafuy.
On anndaa ko neɗɗo gooto maayana himɓe fuu no ɓuri wooɗande en dina lenyol ngool fuu halka.
Hanaa muuyo makko o haaliri haala kaa, amma annabaaku o waɗi ɗoon. Hitaane ndeen kanko woni mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla, nder annabaaku nguu o wi'i ko Iisa no maayanan lenyol ngool.
Hanaa lenyol ngool tan o maayanta, amma ngam o hawra ɓiɓɓe Alla sankitiiɓe ɓeen fuu laatoo gootum.
Illa nyannde mum, hooreeɓe *Yahudankooɓe caawodiri dow no ɓe mbardata mo.
Ɗum duu waɗi Iisa acci fiilaade hakkune *Yahudankooɓe. Nden o yehi Efrayim, wuro wonngo har ladde yeeruure. O jooddii he *aahiiɓe makko.
Juulɗe *Yahudankooɓe gom bi'eteeɗe *Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe ɓadake. Sey himɓe ɗuɓɓe nder leydi ndiin njehi *Ursaliima faa laaɓina ko'e mum fadde juulɗe ɗee fuɗɗude.
Ɓe ndarii nder *Juulirde mawne ndeen, iɓe tefa Iisa, ɓe mbi'odiri: —Ɗume miiloton? O waran to juulɗe ɗee naa noy?
Tawi mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla e *Fariisa'en kokki tilsinoore wi'ude annduɗo to o woni fuu, haala faa o nanngee.
Balɗe jeegom fadde *Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe yottaade, Iisa yehi Baytaniya to Laajaru mo o ummintinnoo he maayde oon.
Ɓe njonngani mo hiraane, Marta woni no yeddana ɓe nde. Laajaru no wondi he nyaamdooɓe he Iisa ɓeen.
Nden Mariyaama hooƴi feccere liteereeru nebbam uurɗam, nebbam caadiɗam, ɗam hawrodiraaka he huune fuu, wuji koyɗe Iisa, moytiri ɗe gaasa mum. Suudu nduun fuu uuri.
Sey Yahuuda Iskariyot, gooto nder *aahiiɓe ɓeen, jammboytooɗo Iisa, wi'i:
—Ɗume waɗi nebbam ɗaam sonnaaka, ceede ɗeen kokkee talkaaɓe? Ngam ceede majjam no yoɓa gollooɓe keme tato.
Hanaa ngam yurmeene talkaaɓe waɗi o wi'i haala kaa, amma ngam o gujjo. Kanko wonnoo jogiiɗo mbasu ceede maɓɓe. Omo wujjanno duu he majje.
Amma Iisa wi'i: —Takkita debbo oo. O resi ɗam ngam nyalaane mooɓeteemi.
Talkaaɓe no tawdee he mooɗon nyannde fuu. Amma miin, mi tawdataake he mooɗon nyannde fuu.
*Yahudankooɓe ɗuɓɓe nanani Iisa Baytaniya, njehi toon. Hanaa Iisa tan waɗi ɓe njehi toon, ɓe njehi duu ngam ɓe ngi'a Laajaru ummintinaaɗo oon.
Mawɓe *cakkanooɓe Alla ngaɗi daane worre ngam warude Laajaru duu.
Ngam daliila Laajaru, *Yahudankooɓe ɗuɓɓe ceedi he mawɓe mum'en, ngoonɗini Iisa.
Jaangoore mum jama'aare ɗuunde, warde to juulɗe ɗeen, nani ko Iisa no wara *Ursaliima.
Sey ɓe taƴi licce dabinaaje, ɓe njaɓɓitowii mo. Iɓe kuuɓa, iɓe mbi'a: —Hosanna ! Barkinaaɗo woni garɗo dow innde Joomiraawo, Laamiiɗo *Isra'el !
Iisa duu heɓi arel gom, waɗɗii, hano no ɗum winndiraa nder dewte wi'aa:
Himɓe huɓeere *Siyon, to kulee ! Ndaaree da: Laamiiɗo mon no wara, no waɗɗii arel.
Arannde fuu *aahiiɓe makko paamaayno ko woni no waɗa. Amma wakkati ɓe ngi'unoo Iisa teddinaa, nden ɓe miccitii ko ɓe ngaɗani mo ɗum fuu winndaanooma dow makko nder dewte.
Jama'aare tawanoone toon wakkati o noddanno Laajaru wurtoo nder annyeere ndeen, e ko o ummintini mo fuu ceedake dow ko ɓe ngi'ii ɗum.
Ɗum duu waɗi himɓe ɗuɓɓe njaɓɓiti mo, wakkati ɓe nanunoo haayne nde o waɗi.
Nden *Fariisa'en mbi'odiri: —On ngi'ii, walaa fuu ko mbaawɗen waɗande mo. Duuniyaaru nduu fuu no dogga gaɗa makko.
Gerekankooɓe gom ngari *Ursaliima to juulɗe ɗeen ngam ndewa Alla.
Ɓe ɓattii Filipa jeyaaɗo Baytisayda, nder leydi Galili. Ɓe mbi'i ɗum: —Mawɗo, miɗen ngiɗi min ngi'a Iisa.
Filipa haalanowi Andiire, ɓe fuu ɗiɗo njehi kaalanowi Iisa.
Iisa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: —Wakkati teddinol *Ɓii-Neɗɗo warii.
Miɗo haalana on goonga: Wabbere alkama fusataa nder leydi se nde ufaaka. Amma se nde ufaama, nde fusan. Nden nde fuɗan, nde rima faa ɗuuɗa.
Giɗɗo yonki mum fuu no mursan ki, jeebiiɗo ki nder duuniyaaru nduu, no heɓan mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
Giɗɗo gollande kam fuu, sey se tokki kam. To ngonmi fuu, ɗon golloowo am duu tawetee. *Baabiraawo no teddinan gollanoowo kam fuu.
Joonkay, mi wemmbaama. Ɗume mbi'anmi? Mi wi'a *Baabiraawo hisinam e wakkati oo naa? Aa'a, mi waawtaa wi'ude ɗum ngam sabbu wakkati oo jaati ngarmi.
*Baabiraawo, teddin innde maa. Sey daane gom ƴuwi dow, wi'i: —Mi teddiniino nde, mi teddinan nde kaden.
Himɓe dariiɓe toon nani ko waɗi, nden mbi'i ɗum riggaaŋo kammu. Woɓɓe mbi'i maleykaajo haaldi he makko.
Iisa wi'i ɓe: —Ɓeydaari mooɗon waɗi daane ndee nanaa amma nde nanaaka ngam ɓeydaari am.
Joonin woni wakkati kiite duuniyaaru nduu. Joonin, Ibiliisa laamiiɗo duuniyaaru nduu riiwetee.
Miin, se mi ƴencinaama dow, mi fooɗan himɓe fuu ngara to am.
Iisa haaliri nii ngam hollude no kam maayirta.
Nden himɓe ɓeen njaabii mo mbi'i: —Winndaama nder *Tawreeta: *Almasiihu oon maayataa abada. Noy mbi'irtaa *Ɓii-Neɗɗo no ɓantetee dow? Moy woni *Ɓii-Neɗɗo oo?
Iisa jaabii ɓe: —Oɗon nder jeyngol ginan, amma ɗum ɓooyataa. Ndillee illa oɗon nder jeyngol, ngam to nimre juhu on. Sabu dilloowo nder nimre anndaa fuu to yahata.
Ngoonɗinee jeyngol illa oɗon nder maggol heɓa laatoɗon ɓiɓɓe jeyngol ngool. Gaɗa Iisa haaliri nii, yehi, suuɗowii.
Baa ko o waɗi kaayɗe ɗuɗɗe ɗee fuu yeeso maɓɓe, ɓe ngoonɗinaay mo.
Ɗum fuu waɗi ngam humnude haala *Esaaya mbi'uka: Joomiraawo, moy goonɗini waaju meeɗen? Moy Joomiraawo wannginani baawɗe mum?
*Esaaya haali duu ko waɗi himɓe ɓee mbaawtaa goonɗinde, o wi'i:
Alla wumnii ɓe, yoornii ɓerɗe maɓɓe, ngam to gite maɓɓe ngi'u, to ɓerɗe maɓɓe paamu, sako ɓe tuuba faa mi danna ɓe.
*Esaaya wi'i ɗum, ngam o hi'ino teddungal Iisa, o haali dow makko duu.
Amma baa ko nii waɗi ɗuɓɓe nder hooreeɓe *Yahudankooɓe ngoonɗinii Iisa. Dey ngam kulal *Fariisa'en waɗi ɓe ceedanaaki mo ngam to ɓe ndiiwee nder *waajordu.
Iɓe coofi teddinde himɓe ɓurde teddinde Alla.
Nden Iisa huuɓi, wi'i: —Neɗɗo fuu goonɗini kam, hanaa miin tan goonɗini, amma lilɗo kam oon joomum goonɗini.
Gi'uɗo kam fuu, hi'i lilɗo kam.
Min woni jeyngol, mi wari nder duuniyaaru heɓa goonɗinɗo kam fuu to tawee nder nimre.
Nde goɗɗo nani haalaaji am, goonɗinaay, hanaa miin hiitoto mo. Ngam mi waraay hiitaade duuniyaaru nduu, amma mi wari faa mi hisina ndu.
Caliiɗo kam jaɓataa haalaaji am, heɓi ko hiitoto ɗum. Haala ka kaalumi kaa, kanka hiitoto joomum nyannde darŋal.
Mi walaa miɗo haala muuyo hoore am, amma *Baabiraawo lilɗo kam, kam hokki kam ko kaalanmi e ko mbaajotoomi.
Miɗo anndi ko waaju mo o halfini kam oo no hokka mbuurnam nduumiiɗam faa abada. Ngam majjum waɗi ko kaalumi fuu, miɗo haalira ɗum, hano no *Baabiraawo haalirani kam ɗum.

Fadde *Juulɗe dimɗinol Isra'ilankooɓe yottaade, Iisa anndi ko wakkati mo o dillata nder duuniyaaru o soƴƴoo to *Baabiraawo yottake. Omo hiɗi himɓe makko wonɓe nder duuniyaaru, omo hiɗi ɓe keerol baawɗe makko.
Wakkati Iisa e *aahiiɓe mum ngoni no kiirtoo, tawi Ibiliisa re'i watti anniya jammbaade mo nder ɓerne Yahuuda Iskariyot ɓii-Simon.
Iisa no anndi ko Alla watti huune fuu nder junngo mum. Omo anndi duu to Alla kam ƴuwi, to Alla kam soƴƴoto.
O ummii, o ɓorti jabbaare makko, o hooƴi lefol, o tuundi.
Nden o wanji ndiyam nder tummbude, o fuɗɗi lootude koyɗe *aahiiɓe makko, omo moytira ɗe lefol ngol o tuundi.
Wakkati o yottinoo to Simon Piyer, Simon Piyer wi'i mo: —Joomam, aan lootata koyɗe am?
Iisa jaabii mo wi'i: —A faamataa ko ngaɗanmi jooni, amma a faamowan yeeso seɗɗa.
Piyer wi'i mo: —A lootataa koyɗe am abada ! Iisa jaabii mo: —Se nii mi lootaay ɗe, a walaa mbaka to am.
Sey Simon Piyer wi'i mo: —Joomam ! Se non ɗum worri, taa haaɗu he koyɗe am tan, lootu juuɗe am e hoore am duu.
Iisa wi'i mo: —Lootiiɗo fuu no laaɓuɗo. Koyɗe makko tan o haajaa lootude. Onon on laaɓuɓe, amma hanaa on fuu.
Iisa no anndi jammbotooɗo ɗum, kam waɗi o wi'i hanaa ɓe fuu ngoni laaɓuɓe.
Nde Iisa lootidinnoo koyɗe maɓɓe, o hooƴi jabbaare makko, o jooɗii, nden o wi'i: —On paamii ko ngaɗanmi on ɗum?
Oɗon noddira kam Moodibbo e Joomiraawo. On penaay, sabu miin woni ɗum fuu.
Ndenne, se miin gonɗo Joomiraawo e Moodibbo mooɗon, se mi lootii koyɗe mooɗon, onon duu oɗon kaani lootodirde koyɗe.
Ko kollumi on ɗum no laawol non ngam onon duu ngaɗon hano ko ngaɗanmi on ɗum.
Miɗo haalana on goonga, maccuɗo ɓurataa joomum, lilaaɗo ɓurataa lilɗo ɗum.
Jooni ko annduɗon ɗum, se on ngollirii ɗum, on mbelii ko'e.
—Mi walaa miɗo haalda he mooɗon, on fuu, miɗo anndi ɓe cuɓiimi. Amma no tilsi ko winndaa nder dewte ɗum huuɓa, kam woni: Junngo nyaamdoowo he am ngoon fiyi kam.
Miɗo haalana on ɗum illa jooni fadde majjum yottaade, ngam nde ɗum yottake fuu, ngoonɗinon ko « Miin woni oon mo ngonmi » !
Miɗo haalana on goonga: Neɗɗo fuu jaɓɓiiɗo mo lilumi, miin jaɓɓii. Neɗɗo fuu jaɓɓiiɗo kam, jaɓɓake lilɗo kam oon duu.
Gaɗa ko o haaliri nii, ɓerne makko metti sanne, o wi'i: —Goonga kaalananmi on: Gooto nder mooɗon jammboto kam.
*Aahiiɓe ɓeen ƴeewodiri, ɓe anndaa dow moy o woni omo haala.
Gooto nder *aahiiɓe ɓeen mo Iisa hiɗi oon, no wahinoo hadde makko.
Simon Piyer fiyani mo hitere ngam o ƴama Iisa moy o wondi.
Nden aahiijo oon ɓaggi Iisa, ƴami mo: —Joomam, moy non?
Iisa jaabii mo wi'i: —Mi suuwan ŋoppitto buuru, mo kokkanmi ngo, woni mo. Nden o hooƴi ngo, o suuwi, o hokki Yahuuda Iskariyot, ɓii-Simon.
Illa o jaɓi ŋoppitto ngoon Ibiliisa naati nder ɓerne makko. Iisa wi'i mo: —Waɗu ko ngaɗataa law law !
Nder wahinooɓe toon ɓeen baa gooto faamaay ngam ɗume o haali ɗum.
Ngam Yahuuda no joginoo mbasu ceede nguun, woɓɓe miili ko Iisa lili mo o soodowa ko ɓe kaajaa ngam juulɗe ɗeen, naa kaden ngam o heɓa ko o hokki talkaaɓe.
Yahuuda jaɓi ŋoppitto ngoon tan, wurtii. Tawi jemma naati.
Nde Yahuuda wurtinoo, Iisa wi'i: —Joonkay *Ɓii-Neɗɗo teddinaama, Alla duu teddinaama ngam makko.
Se Alla teddinaama ngam makko, Alla e hoore mum duu no teddinan mo. Alla teddinan mo jooni jooni.
Sukaaɓe am, no hoddanii kam wakkati seɗɗa mo ngondanmi he mooɗon. On tefan kam, amma hano no mbi'irnoomi mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe mbaawtaa yahde to pa'umi toon, non, onon duu, mbi'iranmi on ɗum jooni.
Miɗo hokka on tilsinoore heyre: Ngiɗodiree ! Hano no ngiɗirmi on nii, onon duu ngiɗodiree !
Nde hidde no hakkune mooɗon, ɗum waɗan himɓe fuu anndita ko on *aahiiɓe am.
Simon Piyer wi'i mo: —Joomam, toy njahataa? Iisa jaabii mo wi'i: —To pa'umi toon, a waawtaa tokkude kam jooni. Amma yahde yeeso a tokkan kam !
Piyer wi'i mo: —Joomam, ngam ɗume waɗi ko mi waawtaa tokkude ma joonin? Mi siryake mursude yonki am sabu maaɗa.
Iisa jaabii, wi'i: —A siryake mursude yonki maa sabu am naa? Goonga kaalananmaami: Fadde ndontoori jogginde, a wi'an a anndaa kam kile tati !
Iisa wi'i *aahiiɓe mum: —To accee ɓerɗe mon mbona, ngoonɗinee Alla, ngoonɗinon kam, miin duu.
Cuuɗi ɗuɗɗi no nder hoggo *Baaba am. Mi yahan toon, mi siryanoo on nokkuure. Se hanaa goonga non, mi haalantaa on ɗum.
Ndenne, nde mi siryanake on nokkuure, mi wartanan on, mi yaara on ngam to ngonmi fuu, ngonden.
Oɗon anndi laawol jehoowol to njahanmi toon.
Sey Tomas wi'i mo: —Joomam, min anndaa to njahataa. Noy min anndirta laawol ngol?
Iisa jaabii mo wi'i: —Miin woni laawol, miin woni goonga, miin woni mbuurnam duu. Walaa jehoowo to *Baabiraawo se tokkiraay to am.
Se oɗon anndunoo kam, on anndannoo *Baaba am duu. Illa jooni oɗon anndi mo, on ngi'ii mo.
Filipa wi'i mo: —Joomam, hollu min *Baabiraawo, ɗum ɗon tan heƴii min.
Iisa wi'i mo: —Filipa, no ɓooydirmi he mooɗon nii fuu, a anndaa kam naa? A anndaa ko giiɗo kam fuu, hi'i *Baabiraawo naa? Noy mbaawɗaa wi'ude hollu min *Baabiraawo?
A goonɗinaay ko miɗo hawti he *Baabiraawo, *Baabiraawo duu no hawti he am naa? Haalaaji ɗi kaalanmi on ɗi fuu, ƴuwaay to am. *Baabiraawo gonduɗo he am, waɗata golle mum.
Ngoonɗinee kam se mi wi'i: Miɗo hawti he *Baabiraawo, *Baabiraawo duu no hawti he am. Baa se on ngoonɗinaay haala am, ngoonɗinee ngam golle am.
Miɗo haalana on goonga: Neɗɗo fuu goonɗinɗo kam, no waɗan golleeji ɗi ngaɗumi ɗii. O waɗan baa ko ɓuri ɗi sabu mi yahan to *Baabiraawo.
Mi waɗanan on huune fuu ko eelirɗon innde am. Mi waɗan ɗum ngam *Baabiraawo teddinee sabu Ɓiɗɗo oon.
Ko eelirɗon innde am fuu, mi waɗan ɗum.
—Se oɗon ngiɗi kam, on tokkan tilsinooje am.
Mi ŋaaroto *Baabiraawo hokka on Balloowo gom. O wondan he mooɗon faa abada.
Kanko woni *Ruuhu goonga. Duuniyaaru nduu waawtaa jaɓude mo, ngam ndu hi'ataa mo, ndu anndaa mo. Amma onon, oɗon anndi mo sabu omo jooddii he mooɗon, o wondan he mooɗon.
Mi accataa on, onon tan hano alatuumi'en, mi wartanan on.
Se ɓooyii seɗɗa duuniyaaru nduu hi'ataa kam. Amma onon, on ngi'an kam, sabu mi buurɗo, onon duu on mbuuran.
Nyannde mum on paaman ko miɗo hawti he *Baabiraawo, oɗon kawti he am, miɗo hawti he mooɗon.
Annduɗo tilsinooje am, nden golliri ɗe, kam woni giɗɗo kam. Giɗɗo kam, *Baaba am hiɗan ɗum. Miin duu, mi hiɗan mo, mi wannganan mo.
Nden Yahuuda, mo hanaa Yahuuda Iskariyot, wi'i Iisa: —Joomam, noy ɗum laatorto mbannganaa min, tawee a wanngantaa duuniyaaru fuu?
Iisa jaabii mo wi'i: —Giɗɗo kam fuu no golliran haala am, *Baaba am duu hiɗan ɗum. Miin e *Baabiraawo, min ngardan to joomum, min cinnga jooɗorɗe amin to makko.
Neɗɗo fuu mo hiɗaa kam, gollirta haala am. Haala ka nanoton kaa ƴuwaay to am, amma ka ƴuwaana to *Baabiraawo lilɗo kam.
Ɗum fuu, mi haalanii on ɗum, illa miɗo wondi he mooɗon.
Balloowo oon, woni *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, mo *Baabiraawo lildanta on dow innde am, kanko anndinta on kujje fuu. O miccintinan on ko kaalannoomi on fuu.
Jam accidanmi on, mi hokkan on jam am. Hanaa hano no duuniyaaru nduu hokkirta on, kokkiranmi on. To hakkillo mon ummoo, to kulee.
On nanii nii ko mbi'umi on: Mi yahan, mi wartan to mooɗon. Se oɗon ngiɗunoo kam, on mbelnan dow jaaki am to *Baabiraawo, sabu kanko ɓuri kam manngu.
Too, miɗo haalana on joonin, illa ɗum waraay ginan, ngam se ɗum warii, ngoonɗinon.
Gaɗa hannden mi haaldataa he mooɗon sanne, sabu Ibiliisa laamiiɗo duuniyaaru no wara. O waawanaa kam baafuy.
Amma sey duuniyaaru nduu annda ko miɗo hiɗi *Baabiraawo, ndu annda duu ko miɗo waɗa ko *Baabiraawo tilsini kam. Ummee, ndillen ɗo.
—Miin woni cabiihi goongaahi, *Baabiraawo woni demoowo ngesa cabiije.
Liccal am ngal rimataa fuu, o taƴan ngal. Dimoowal fuu, o saltoto ngal, ngam ngal ɓeyda rimude.
Onon, jooni jaati laaɓuɗon sabu waaju mo ngaɗanmi on.
Kawtee he am, miin duu mi hawtan he mon. Liccal fuu waawtaa rimde feere mum nde ngal sinngaaki he cabiihi kiin, hano non, onon duu on mbaawtaa waɗude ko woodi barke se on kawtaay he am.
Miin woni cabiihi kiin, onon ngoni licce ɗeen. Se neɗɗo hawti he am, miin duu mi hawtan he mum, o waɗan ko ɗuuɗi ko woodi barke. Sabu on mbaawtaa waɗude baafuy se ɗum ƴuwaay to am.
Mo hawtaay he am, no faɗɗetee nder ladde hano liccal jorngal. Licce joorɗe ɗeen no kawretee, paɗɗee nder hiite, mbulee.
Se on kawti he am, se waaju am duu no duumii nder mon, nden kay ko ƴamuɗon fuu, on keɓan.
Se on ngaɗi ko ɗuuɗi ko woodi barke, ɗum hollan ko on laatake *aahiiɓe am. Ndenne *Baaba am teddinaama.
Hano no *Baabiraawo hiɗiri kam nii, hano non ngiɗirmi on. Kawtee nder hidde am.
Se on tokkii tilsinooje am, on kawtan nder hidde am, hano no kawtirmi nder hidde *Baaba am nii, ngam mi tokki tilsinooje makko.
Mi haalanii on ɗum ngam welwelo am jooɗo nder mon, nden welwelo mon duu huuɓa.
Tilsinoore am woni ngiɗodiron hano no ngiɗirmi on nii.
Walaa hidde fotune neɗɗo sotta yonki mum ngam higiraaɓe mum.
Se on ngaɗii ko tilsinmi on, onon ngoni higiraaɓe am.
Mi yeeƴataako mi noddira on maccuɓe kaden, sabu maccuɗo anndaa ko joomum waɗata. Amma mi noddiran on higiraaɓe sabu mi anndinii on ko narrumi *Baaba am fuu.
Hanaa onon cuɓii kam, amma miin suɓii on. Mi lilii on faa njehon, ngaɗon ko woodi barke, barke mon duu duumoo. Nden *Baabiraawo hokkan on ko ŋaariɗon mo fuu nder innde am.
Ndenne, ko tilsinanmi on woni ngiɗodiron.
—Se duuniyaaru nduu wanyii on, anndee ko miin ndu artii wanyude.
Se nii on laatakeno ɓe duuniyaaru, duuniyaaru hiɗanno ko jeyi. Amma on njeyaaka he mayru. Miin suɓii on, senndi on he duuniyaaru nduu. Ngam majjum waɗi ndu wanyi on.
Miccitee ko mbi'unoomi on: « Maccuɗo ɓurataa joomum. » Se ɓe torrii kam, ɓe torran on, onon duu. Se ɓe njogake haala am, ɓe njogoto haalaaji mooɗon.
Amma kujje ɗee fuu, ɓe ngaɗan on ɗe sabu innde am, ngam ɓe anndaa lilɗo kam.
Nde mi waraayno kaaldumi he maɓɓe, hakkeeji maɓɓe limataakeno. Amma jooni ɓe ngalaa no ɓe kisirta hakkeeji maɓɓe.
Banyuɗo kam fuu wanyii *Baabiraawo duu.
Nde mi waɗaayno golleeji ɗi neɗɗo fuu meeɗaay waɗude hakkune maɓɓe, hakkeeji maɓɓe limataakeno. Amma jooni ɓe ngi'ii ɗi, ɗi fuu, baa ko non waɗi, ɓe accaay wanyude kam, miin e *Baabiraawo.
Amma ɗum waɗi ngam humnude ko winndaano nder *Tawreeta maɓɓe, wi'aa: Ɓe mbanyii kam ngam meere.
Nde Balloowo mo lildanmi on warii, kanko woni *Ruuhu goonga ƴuwoowo to *Baabiraawo, kanko seedantoo kam.
Onon duu, on ceedanto kam sabu oɗon ngondi he am illa fuɗɗorde.
—Mi haalanii on ɗum fuu ngam to on pergo.
Ɓe ndiiwan on nder *baajorɗi. Wakkati waran, ko barɗo on fuu miilan waɗi ko Alla hiɗi.
Ɓe ngaɗan non sabu ɓe anndaa *Baabiraawo, ɓe anndaa kam, miin duu.
Mi haalanii on ɗum, ngam nde wakkati oon wari, miccitoɗon ko mi haalaniino on ɗum. —Mi haalanaay on kujje ɗee illa arannde sabu miɗo wondunoo he mooɗon.
Joonin miɗo ɗon miɗo hoota to liluɗo kam oon, dey baa gooto nder mooɗon ƴamataa kam to njahanmi.
Amma ɓerɗe mooɗon metti ngam mi haalanii on kujje ɗee fuu.
Amma nder ɗum fuu, miɗo haalana on goonga, yahdu am ɓuri wooɗande on. Nde mi yahaay, Balloowo oon warataa to mooɗon. Amma nde mi yehi, mi lildanan on mo.
Nde o warii, o faamtinan himɓe duuniyaaru nduu ko ɓe mboofi har ko daarta hakke, foccitaare e kiite.
Har ko daarta hakke, ɓe mboofi ngam ɓe ngoonɗinaay kam.
Har ko daarta foccitaare, ɓe mboofi ngam ɓe paamaay coƴƴitaaki am to *Baabiraawo kolloohi foccitaare am. On ngi'ataa kam kaden.
Har ko daarta kiite, ɓe mboofi ngam ɓe paamaay ko Ibiliisa laamiiɗo duuniyaaru re'i hiitaama.
Miɗo woodi kujje ɗuɗɗe ɗe kaalananmi on, amma on mbaawtaa faamude ɗe joonin.
Wakkati *Ruuhu goonga oon wari, o ɗowan on nder goonga oon fuu, ngam o haaldataa he muuyo hoore makko, amma o haalanan on ko o nani, o wannginanan on ko warata fuu.
O haalanan on ko o nani to am fuu, hano non o wannginirta teddungal am.
Ko *Baaba am jeyii fuu, miin jeyii, ngam majjum waɗi mbi'umi ko *Ruuhu goonga oon no faaminan on ko o nani to am fuu.
—Nder wakkati seɗɗa on ngi'ataa kam, nder wakkati seɗɗa kaden on ngi'an kam.

Gere nder *aahiiɓe makko ƴamodiri, mbi'i: —Ɗume woni maana haala makko kaa: « Nder wakkati seɗɗa on ngi'ataa kam, nder wakkati seɗɗa kaden on ngi'an kam? » E ko o wi'i: « Ngam mi yahan to *Baabiraawo? »
Ɓe mbi'odiri: —Ɗume woni maana haala kaa: « Nder wakkati seɗɗa »? Min paamaay ko ɗum hiɗi wi'ude ɗo.
Iisa faami iɓe ngiɗi ƴamude ɗum, wi'i ɓe: —Oɗon ƴamodira maana haala am kaa: « Nder wakkati seɗɗa on ngi'ataa kam, nder wakkati seɗɗa kaden on ngi'an kam. »
Miɗo haalana on goonga: Onon, on mboyan, on mboytoto, tawaa duuniyaaru nduu no nder welwelo. Ɓerɗe mon no mettan, amma mettal ɓerɗe mooɗon no waylititto welwelo.
Nde ŋatawere caawɗo yottake, o nanan naawɗum sanne ngam wakkati torra makko wari. Amma nde o rimii, o yeggitan torra makko, o welnan ngam cukalel kesel naati duuniyaaru.
Onon duu hano non nanirton naawɗum jooni, amma en ngiidowan. Wakkati mum, on nanan belɗum, kaden walaa baawɗo ittude welwelo mooɗon.
Nyannde mum, on ƴamataa kam dow baafuy. Miɗo haalana on goonga, ko ŋaariɗon *Baabiraawo dow innde am fuu on kokketee.
Faa joonin, walaa fuu ko eeluɗon dow innde am. Ŋaaree, on keɓan ngam welwelo mooɗon huuɓa.
—Ko kaalanmi on ɗum fuu nder haala kippaaka kaalirmi ɗum. Amma wakkati waran ko mi hippataa haala, no laaɓiri kaalirananmi on dow *Baabiraawo.
Nyannde mum on ŋaaroto *Baabiraawo he innde am. Mi wi'aay mi ŋaaranto on *Baabiraawo,
ngam *Baabiraawo he hoore mum no hiɗi on. Omo hiɗi on sabu oɗon ngiɗi kam, on ngoonɗinii to Alla ƴuwumi.
Mi ƴuwii to *Baabiraawo, mi warii nder duuniyaaru. Jooni duu mi accan duuniyaaru mi soƴƴoo to *Baabiraawo.
Sey *aahiiɓe makko mbi'i mo: —Joonkay, a haalii faa laaɓii, a acci hippude haalaaji maa.
Joonin miɗen anndi ko walaa fuu ko suuɗanii ma, sabu aɗa anndi ko neɗɗo ƴamata illa o ƴamaay ma. Ɗum waɗi min ngoonɗini ko a ƴuwɗo to Alla.
Iisa jaabii ɓe wi'i: —Joonkay ! On ngoonɗinii naa?
Too, wakkati no wara, wakkati oon yottake, nde on fuu on cankitoto, neɗɗo fuu dogga hoota wuro mum, joofon kam, miin tan. Amma mi wonaa miin tan, sabu *Baabiraawo no wondi he am.
Mi haalanii on ɗum, ngam keɓon jam nder kawtal mooɗon he am. Oɗon ngondi he torra nder duuniyaaru. Amma cemmbiɗee, sabu mi jaalake duuniyaaru.
Wakkati Iisa laaɓinani *aahiiɓe mum to fa'i, sey o tiggitii kammu, o wi'i: —*Baabiraawo, wakkati oo yonii, wanngin teddungal Ɓiya, faa Ɓiya duu wanngina teddungal maa.
A hokkii mo baawɗe dow himɓe fuu, ngam o hokka, ɓe kokkuɗaa mo fuu mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
Mbuurnam nduumiiɗam woni ɓe annde, aan Alla gooto goongaajo, ɓe annda mo lilɗaa oon duu, Iisa *Almasiihu.
Mi teddinii ma nder duuniyaaru, mi humnii golle ɗe kokkuɗaa kam mi golla.
Joonkay, *Baabiraawo, teddinam teddungal ngal ngoodunoomi to maaɗa illa duuniyaaru tagaaka.
Mi wannginii ma to himɓe duuniyaaru ɓe kokkuɗaa kam. Aan jeynoo ɓe, a hokkii kam ɓe. Ɓe tokki haala maa.
Joonkay, ɓe anndii ko kokkuɗaa kam fuu, to maaɗa ɗum ƴuwi.
Mi yottinanii ɓe haala ka kaalanɗaa kam kaan. Ɓe njaɓi ka, ɓe tabbitinii ko to maaɗa ƴuwumi, ɓe ngoonɗinii aan lili kam.
Ngam maɓɓe ndu'otoomi. Mi du'ataako ngam duuniyaaru nduu. Amma miɗo du'oo ngam ɓe kokkuɗaa kam ɓee, sabu aan jeyii ɓe.
Huune fuu ko njeymi, aan jeyii ɗum, huune fuu ko njeyɗaa, miin jeyii ɗum. Teddungal am wanngi hakkune maɓɓe.
Mi jooɗotaako nder duuniyaaru, mi wartan to maaɗa. Amma kamɓe, iɓe nder duuniyaaru. Aan *Baabiraawo Ceniiɗo, reenir ɓe innde maaɗa nde kokkuɗaa kam, ngam ɓe laatoo gooto hano no laatoriɗen gooto.
Wakkati ngondunoomi he maɓɓe nder duuniyaaru, mi reenirii ɓe innde nde kokkuɗaa kam. Mi reenii ɓe, baa gooto halkaay se hanaa kalkuɗo ngam ko sappaa wi'aa nder dewte ɗum huuɓaa.
Joonkay miɗo fa'i to maa. Miɗo haala haalaaji ɗii illa miɗo nder duuniyaaru ngam welwelo am heewa nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
Mi haalanii ɓe haala maa. Amma duuniyaaru wanyii ɓe, sabu ɓe njeyaaka nder duuniyaaru, hano no mi jeyiraaka nder duuniyaaru nii.
Mi ŋaaraaki mburtinaa ɓe nder duuniyaaru, amma miɗo eela ndeenaa ɓe e bonɗo.
Ɓe njeyaaka nder duuniyaaru, hano no mi jeyiraaka nder duuniyaaru nii.
Haala maa woni goonga. Ndenne, senɗinir ɓe goonga oon.
Hano no lilirɗaa kam nder duuniyaaru nii, non miin duu lilirmi ɓe nder duuniyaaru.
Miin e hoore am mi hokkii ma hoore am ngam kamɓe duu ɓe kokka ko'e maɓɓe nder goonga.
Hanaa sabu maɓɓe tan ndu'otoomi. Amma miɗo du'oo duu sabu goonɗinɓe kam har waaju maɓɓe.
*Baabiraawo, miɗo eela ngam ɓe laatoo gootum. Ɓe kawta e meeɗen hano no kawtirɗaa he am, e no kawtirmi he maa. Ɓe fuu ɓe laatoo gootum heɓa duuniyaaru goonɗina aan lili kam.
Miin, mi hokkii ɓe teddungal ngal kokkuɗaa kam, ngam ɓe laatoo gootum, hano no laatoriɗen gootum nii.
Miɗo wondi he maɓɓe, aɗa wondi he am, ngam ɓe laatoo gootum, faa duuniyaaru annda ko aan lili kam. Aɗa hiɗi ɓe duu hano no ngiɗirɗaa kam nii.
*Baabiraawo, miɗo hiɗi ɓe kokkuɗaa kam ɓeen tawee to ngonmi fuu ngam ɓe ngi'a teddungal ngal kokkuɗaa kam ngaal, sabu a hiɗii kam illa duuniyaaru diidaaka.
*Baabiraawo dartiiɗo, duuniyaaru anndaa ma, amma miin kay miɗo anndii ma, ɓeeɗo duu anndii aan lili kam.
Mi anndinii ɓe ma. Mi anndinan ɓe ma kaden ngam hidde nde ngiɗirɗaa kam tawee nder maɓɓe, miin duu mi wonda he maɓɓe.
Gaɗa du'aa'u oo, Iisa yahdi he *aahiiɓe mum gaɗa gooruwol bi'eteengol Kedoron. Toon no woodi koogol gom, o naddi he *aahiiɓe makko nder maggol.
Yahuuda jammbotooɗo mo oon no anndi nokkuure ndee, sabu Iisa e *aahiiɓe mum no mboowi yahde toon.
Yahuuda ardii oorngal soogeeji e dogariiɓe ƴuwɓe to *cakkanooɓe Alla e *Fariisa'en gom. Ɓe naati koogol ngool, iɓe njogii yulbaaji, fitillaaji e kaɓirɗe.
Tawi Iisa no anndi huune fuu ko heɓata ɗum, taɓɓitii ɓe, wi'i: —Moy tefoton?
Ɓe njaabii mo, ɓe mbi'i: —Iisa mo Nasaratu. Nden o wi'i ɓe: —Miin non ! Yahuuda jammbotooɗo mo oon no dardii he maɓɓe.
Nde Iisa wi'unoo « Miin non ! » Ɓe coƴƴorii gaɗa, ɓe caami e leydi.
Iisa ƴamii ɓe kaden wi'i: —Moy tefoton? Ɓe njaabii, ɓe mbi'i: —Iisa mo Nasaratu.
Iisa jaabii ɓe wi'i: —Mi wi'i on, miin non. Se miin tefoton, accee himɓe am kay ndilla.
Noon ɗum laatorii ngam haala Iisa kaa tabbita: « Walaa kalkuɗo nder ɓe kokkuɗaa kam ɓeen. »
Nden Simon Piyer no joginoo takubaahi gom, sorti ki, soppi Malkus gollanoowo mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla gom, taƴi nowru makko nyaamo.
Sey Iisa wi'i Piyer: —Wattu takubaahi maa nder hulgo mum. No tilsi mi yara nyeɗerde torra nde *Baabiraawo fodanii kam.
Oorngal soogeeji e hooreejo mum, kam e dogariiɓe *Yahudankooɓe nanngi Iisa, kaɓɓi mo.
Ɓe artii yaarude mo to Annas, esoo Kayafas. Nder hitaane ndeen, Kayafas woni mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla fuu.
Kayafas faamtiniino mawɓe *Yahudankooɓe ko no ɓuri wooɗude, neɗɗo gooto maayana himɓe fuu.
Simon Piyer e aahiijo gom tokki Iisa. Ko nii waɗi mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla oon no anndi aahiijo oon, sey aahiijo oon naddi he Iisa nder hoggo mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla oon.
Amma Piyer darii dammbugal ɓaade ndeen. Aahiijo anndaaɗo oon, wurtii haaldi he korɗo deenoowo dammbugal oon, nden debbo oon acci Piyer naati hoggo ngoon.
Korɗo deenoowo oon wi'i mo: —Aan nee, a hanaa gooto nder *aahiiɓe gorko oo naa? Piyer jaabii mo: —Mi hanaa !
Tawi jaaŋol waɗi. Gollooɓe e dogariiɓe ɓeen kuɓɓi hiite no ƴilfoo. Piyer duu darii hadde maɓɓe no ƴilfoo.
Mawɗo *cakkanooɓe Alla fuu ƴamii Iisa dow *aahiiɓe mum e dow ko o waajotoo.
Iisa jaabii mo: —Mi wannginanii duuniyaaru nduu fuu waaju am. Mi waajake nder cuuɗi *baajorɗi e nder *Juulirde mawne to *Yahudankooɓe kawrata nyannde fuu. Walaa fuu ko kaalumi nder cuccukka.
