Amma *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo kay, ko rimanta en woni: Hidde, welwelo, jam, munyal, yurmeene, moƴƴude, hoolaare,
ɓerne feewne, he dawranol hoore mum. Hakiika, tilsinoore fuu walaa haɗude kujje ɗee fuu ngaɗee.
Ɓe *Almasiihu jeyii fuu mbari suunooji ɓalli mum'en bonɗi, he ko nanndititta he mum'en dow *bardugal.
Nde nii *Ruuhu Alla keɓirten mbuurnam kesam, ndenne no haani tawee *Ruuhu Alla oon woni no ɗowa en.
To neɗɗo meeɗen fuu fii gabaare wi'a kam no goɗɗum. Accen fitina he haasidaaku hakkune meeɗen.

Banndiraaɓe am, nde nii goɗɗo mooɗon nanngaama nder gaɗol hakke, onon ɓe *Ruuhu Alla wondi he mum'en, ngartiree mo dow laawol. Ngattee hakkillo he leesinaaku, ngartiron mo heese heese. Amma onon duu, kakkilee dow tefol wartirde mo, to njehon ngaɗon hakke.
Mballodiree hakkune mooɗon, ɗum hollata ko on tokkii tilsinoore nde *Almasiihu hokki on ndee no wooɗiri.
Nde nii goɗɗo fiyi gabaare wi'i ko kam no goɗɗum, tawi joomum hanaa fuy, too joomum hoore mum woni no jammboo.
Amma neɗɗo mooɗon fuu tayko gollal mum daara. Nde nii gollal joomum wooɗii, joomum no waawi fiyude gabaare mum dow maggal, hanaa sey to joomum fiyi hoore mum he goɗɗo.
Neɗɗo fuu donngal muuɗum ronndotoo.
Neɗɗo fuu ekkitaa goɗɗum dow haala Alla, no haani fecca njawdi mum, itta mbaka ekkintinɗo mo oon.
To njammbee ko'e mooɗon, Alla jaltintaake. Ko neɗɗo aawi fuu, hettata.
Neɗɗo fuu aawi ko welnataa ɓerne mum, hettan maayde. Amma neɗɗo fuu aawi ko weli *Ruuhu Alla, hettan mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
To en comu waɗude ko wooɗi. Ngam nde nii en comaay, en kettan nyannde fuu wakkati oon waɗi.
Ndenne nder wakkati mo hoddi oo, ndurwen ngaɗanen neɗɗo fuu moƴƴere. Amma ko ɓuri woni, ngaɗanen banndiraaɓe meeɗen goonɗinɓe *Almasiihu.
Ndaaree binndi ɓutti binndaaɗi ɗii, miin he hoore am winndani on ɗi he junngo am.
Wonɓe no tilsina njuulneɗon ɓee, himɓe non donndiiɓe ko'e, tefooɓe wi'ee kam'en no goɗɗum. Iɓe tilsina on ngam iɓe ndogga ɓe torree daliila waaju dow maayde Iisa *Almasiihu dow *bardugal.
Wonɓe no tilsina njuulneɗon ɓee, kamɓe he ko'e maɓɓe ɓe tokkaay ko *Tawreeta wi'i. Iɓe ngiɗi njuulneɗon tan, ngam ɓe piya gabaare daliila ɓe keɓii on njuulnaama.

Miin kay, huune worre piiranmi gabaare, kanƴum woni maayde Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen dow *bardugal. Har maayde makko, kujje duuniyaaru fuu ngartii meere to am. Miin he hoore am, miin duu mi wartii meere to majje.
Juulneede e rafi juulneede fuu no go'o, amma ko ɓuri woni, Alla waɗi en himɓe tagitaaɓe.
Jam e moƴƴere Alla tabbita he neɗɗo fuu tokkuɗo laawol ngol njannginmi ngool. Jam e moƴƴere tabbita duu dow Isra'ilankooɓe, himɓe Alla goongaaɓe.
Ɓaawo hannden to neɗɗo fuu torru kam, ngam ɓatatte gonɗe dow ɓanndu am daliila Iisa *Almasiihu.
Banndiraaɓe, moƴƴere Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen wonda e mooɗon. Aamiin !
Miin Pol mo, Alla suɓii, waɗi lilaaɗo Iisa *Almasiihu winndani on ɗerol ngool, onon himɓe Alla tawaaɓe nder Efeesu, wattuɓe hoolaare mum'en he Iisa *Almasiihu.
Alla *Baaba meeɗen he Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen kokka on jam he moƴƴere.
Jettooje ngoodani Alla, *Baaba Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen. Alla mo nder kawtal meeɗen he *Almasiihu, jippini dow meeɗen iri barke fuu taweteeɗe hakkune beɗi kammu ɗe *Ruuhu makko hokkata.
Daliila kawtal meeɗen he Iisa *Almasiihu waɗi fadde duuniyaaru tageede, Alla suɓii en, wartiri en feere ngam hoore mum, waɗi en ɓe ngalaa fuu feloore yeeso mum. Alla no hiɗi en waɗi
o hoddiri illa arannde, laatoɗen ɓiɓɓe makko daliila Iisa *Almasiihu. Ɗum wonnoo muuyɗe makko, ɗum duu woni ko weli mo.
Ndenne en njetta mo, teddinen mo ngam moƴƴe makko mawɗe ɗe o hokki en daliila Ɓiyiiko korsuɗo.
Ɓiɗɗo mo har ƴiiƴam mum ndufaaɗam, ɓiɗɗo mo nder kawtal meeɗen he mum, ndimɗinaɗen, hakkeeji meeɗen njaafaa. Alla waɗii ɗum fuu ngam moƴƴere makko no mawni sanne.
Moƴƴe ɗe Alla hokkata en ngalaa keddi, o hokkiri en ɗe hikmaaku he anndal kuuɓungal.
O wannginani en sirri makko, siri cuuɗiiɗo, siri belɗo mo, mo o nufi illa arannde humnirde har *Almasiihu.
Ko Alla nufi woni: Nde nii wakkati oon waɗi, o hawran huune fuu ko woni dow he ko tawa ley, o waɗa *Almasiihu hooreejo majjum.
Nder kawtal meeɗen he Iisa *Almasiihu, Alla hokki en mbaka mo o fodani en, ngam o suɓake en illa arannde nder siri makko. Omo tabbintina huune fuu no o hiɗiri ɗum he no o muuyiri ɗum.
Ndenne, enen artuɓe ngatti tammude mum'en fuu he *Almasiihu, en njetta Alla teddinen mo.

Onon duu, wakkati kettiniɗon *Habaru lobbo, habaru goonga e goonga oo, habaru gaddanɗo on kisinam, on ngartii himɓe Alla. On ngattii hoolaare mooɗon he *Almasiihu, Alla duu fiyi haatimiire *Ruuhu mum dow mooɗon, *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo mo o fodaniino on.
*Ruuhu Ceniiɗo oo woni mbaka meeɗen arano nder ndonu ngu keɓoyten to Alla. Nyannde fuu ndimɗinaɗen he gaɗol ko boni, en njoddoto he makko. Ndenne en njetta Alla, teddinen mo.
Illa ko keɓumi habaru no ngoonɗinirɗon Iisa Joomiraawo meeɗen, he ko nanumi hidde nde ngoodanɗon goonɗinɓe mo,
illa ndeen, wakkati fuu mo ngaɗanmi du'aa'u, miɗo yetta Alla ngam mooɗon.
Miɗo eela Alla Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen, *Baabiraawo Jom teddungal hokka on *Ruuhu mum, Ruuhu oon janngina on hikmaaku he laawol taykaaki. O holla on laawol anndude mo no wooɗiri.
Miɗo eela Alla uddita ɓerɗe mooɗon heɓa paamon tammude nde o hokki on wakkati o noddunoo on. Paamon duu no ɗuuɗirka he wodde ndonu himɓe makko poti.
Miɗo eela Alla uddita ɓerɗe mooɗon heɓa paamon baawɗe ɗe o itti ngam wallude en, enen dekuɓe tammude mum'en dow makko ngalaa walde. Baawɗe ɗe o itti
ngam wallude en, kanƴe o wattunoo o ummintini Iisa *Almasiihu he maayde. O ƴencini mo, o joƴƴini nyaamo makko hakkune beɗi kammu.

Ndenne, *Almasiihu no heedani huune fuu dow, nde laamu non naa nde semmbe gom non, nde ardiiɗo non no semmbe mum foti fuu. Innde fuu hokketeene, innde makko ɓuri ɗum. Kanko heedani ɗe dow nder duuniyaaru nduu, kanko duu heedanta ɗe dow nder duuniyaaru warooru.
Alla wattii huune fuu ley baawɗe *Almasiihu. Alla wattii mo o dawrana huune fuu, o waɗii mo hoore hawriine goonɗinɓe.
Hawriine goonɗinɓe woni ɓanndu *Almasiihu, inde heewi mbuurnam makko. Omo nder huune fuu, nokku fuu to ɗum tawaa.
Ko on ngoonɗinaayno, on nanndaana hano maayɓe ngam on ɗowtanaaki Alla, oɗon nii nder waɗude hakke.
Nder wakkati oo, oɗon tokkitii laabi duuniyaaru bonɗi, ɗowtaniɗon Ibiliisa gonɗo no laamii hakkune dow e ley, gonɗo no uppa ɓerɗe caliiɓe ko Alla wi'i.
Ndenno en fuu nii ngonnoɗen, eɗen tokkitii giɗaale ɓerɗe meeɗen, eɗen ngaɗa ko ɗe kolliti en. Ndenne har ɓii-aadamaaku meeɗen tikkere Alla warannoo dow meeɗen hano no nde warirnoo dow woɓɓe.
Amma Alla no keewɗo yurmeene, hidde makko nde o woodani en duu no mawni sanne.
O hawri en, enen he *Almasiihu, o hokki en mbuurnam kesam. O hokkii en ɗam baa nii ko wakkati mum, en nanndaana maayɓe ngam en murtuɓe he Alla. Ngam omo moƴƴi waɗi o hisini on.
Enen he *Almasiihu fuu o hawri o ummintini, o jonni hakkune beɗi kammu.
Alla waɗii ɗum ngam hollude jamanuuji garooji ko moƴƴe mum, ɗe o waɗani en daliila Iisa *Almasiihu ɗuuɗirka mum walaa walde.
Moƴƴere ndee duu waɗi o hisini on ngam on ngoonɗini *Almasiihu. Kisinam ɗaam ƴuwaay to mooɗon, ɗam kokkal Alla.
Alla hokkaay on ɗam ngam golle mooɗon heɓa to neɗɗo mooɗon fuu fiyu gabaare mum wi'a kam no goɗɗum.
En gollal Alla lobbal sanne. Enen he ko'e meeɗen kanko waɗi en. Daliila kawtal meeɗen he Iisa *Almasiihu, o heyɗintinii en ngam ngollen golle lobbe, ɗe illa arannde o siryi ngaɗen.
Miccitee fa, no ngonnoɗon ndenno. On ndimaaka *Yahudankooɓe, *Yahudankooɓe no mbi'a kam'en no juulnaaɓe, onon on kanaa juulnaaɓe. Juulnol huune waɗeteene he ɓanndu non.
Miccitee, ko wakkati mum on ngondaano he *Almasiihu. On ngalaa fuu baawɗe gom hakkune *Yahudankooɓe. On ngalaano nder amaana mo Alla waɗani himɓe mum, tammude fuu walanaa on, on ngalaano ko ndewoton.
Onon, ɓe illa ndenno, on woɗɗinooɓe Alla, amma hannden dow ƴiiƴam Iisa *Almasiihu ndufaaɗam on ɓattinaama Alla.

*Almasiihu he hoore mum waddi jam hakkune *Yahudankooɓe he ɓe kanaa *Yahudankooɓe, o wartirii ɓe sewre worre. Wakkati o mursunoo yonki makko, o liɓi koogol paliingol hakkune maɓɓe. Kam woni o itti huune fuu ko waddata nganyaandi hakkune maɓɓe.
Semmbe *Tawreeta he tilsinooje *Yahudankooɓe fuu o itti ɗum, o wartiri potal hakkune *Yahudankooɓe he ɓe kanaa *Yahudankooɓe. Nder kawtal makko he maɓɓe, o waɗi ɓe sewre worre.
Har maayde makko dow *bardugal, o itti nganyaandi hakkune *Yahudankooɓe he ɓe kanaa *Yahudankooɓe, o hawri ɓe, o waɗi sewre worre. O wartiri potal hakkune maɓɓe he Alla.
*Almasiihu wari waajaade on habaru mo jam, onon ɓe kanaa *Yahudankooɓe, ɓurɓe woɗɗaade Alla. O wari waajaade duu *Yahudankooɓe ɓadiiɓe Alla.
Daliila *Almasiihu waɗi *Yahudankooɓe he ɓe kanaa *Yahudankooɓe fuu keɓi laawol darowaade yeeso Alla *Baabiraawo meeɗen nder balla *Ruuhu gooto.
Ndenne, onon ɓe kanaa *Yahudankooɓe, on kanaa weerɓe, himɓe ƴuwɓe to gom. Amma hannden on ɓiɓɓe leydi, jeyaaɓe Alla, wonduɓe he suɓaaɓe makko.
On nyiɓaama dow diidol ngol *lilaaɓe he annabiiɓe ndiidi. Iisa *Almasiihu he hoore mum woni bonjariyal nyibdi ndiin.
Kanko duu, o waɗi ndi fuu ndi nanngodiri faa ndi toowi, ndi laatii *Juulirde mawne, seniine waɗanaade Joomiraawo.
Nder kawtal mooɗon he makko, on ngattidaama onon he ɓeeto nder nyibdi ndiin heɓa ndi laatoo *Juulirde mawne to *Ruuhu Alla jooɗii.
Ngam majjum waɗi miin Pol, uddaaɗo daliila golle ɗe Iisa *Almasiihu halfini kam hakkune mooɗon ngam nafude on, onon ɓe kanaa *Yahudankooɓe, miɗo yetta Alla ngam mooɗon.
Sikka fuu walaa on nani habaru golle ɗe Alla nder moƴƴere mum halfini kam ngam nafude on.
Alla wannginani kam siri mum cuuɗiiɗo. Mi winndanii on duu seɗɗa dow majjum.
Nde nii on njanngi ɗum, on paaman ko miɗo anndi siri mo o waɗirta har *Almasiihu.
Nder jamanuuji bittiiɗi, siri oo haalanaaka ɓiɓɓe aadama. Amma joonin kay Alla watti *Ruuhu mum wanngini mo yahde he *lilaaɓe mum seniiɓe. O wannginaama yahde he annabiiɓe makko seniiɓe.

Ndaa siri oo nii: Har *Habaru lobbo oon, *Yahudankooɓe he ɓe kanaa *Yahudankooɓe kawta moƴƴere nde Alla resani himɓe mum, ɓe laatii sewre worre, ɓe keɓii fodoore nde Alla waɗi daliila Iisa *Almasiihu.
*Habaru lobbo oo waɗi laatiimi gollanoowo Alla. Ɗum duu woni moƴƴere nde Alla hokki kam nder moƴƴuki mum he har baawɗe mum.
Baa nii ko miin ɓuri famɗude nder himɓe Alla, miin Alla suɓii, hokki teddungal waajaade hakkune ɓe kanaa *Yahudankooɓe barke ɗe limtataako tawaaɗe nder *Habaru lobbo, habaru dow *Almasiihu.
Alla hokkii kam duu baawɗe hollude neɗɗo fuu faa laaɓa tar noy o humniri siri oo. Alla, taguɗo huune fuu he hoore mum, suuɗi siri oo illa fil'ajal.

Ndenne jooni, daliila hawriine goonɗinɓe Iisa *Almasiihu, laamu fuu naa baawɗe fuu tawaaɗe hakkune beɗi kammu waawan faamude ko Alla no jom hikmaaku. Hikmaaku nguu duu, omo holla ngu nder laabi re'ataa
hano no o siryori ɗum illa fil'ajal. Siri oo, o humnii ɗum har Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
Kawtal meeɗen he Iisa *Almasiihu e goonɗinde mo hokki en laawol ɓadaade Alla nder hoolaare mawne.
Ndenne, to torraaji ɗi ngonmi miɗo yara daliila mooɗon waɗu coƴƴoroɗon gaɗa ngam yahde yeeso ɗi ɓeydaari mooɗon.
Torraaji am no ɓeydaari mooɗon, waɗi miɗo hofano *Baabiraawo,
ɗaɗol lenyi gonɗi dow he ley fuu.
Mi eelii mo kanko jom teddungal manngal, nder baawɗe *Ruuhu makko, o semmbinɗina ɓerɗe mooɗon.
Mi eelii Alla, waɗa *Almasiihu wara jooɗoo nder ɓerɗe mooɗon ngam goonɗinol mooɗon. Mi eelii mo duu o sinnga hidde mawne hakkune mooɗon,
heɓa onon he himɓe Alla fuu paamon noy hidde *Almasiihu mawniri, noy nde luggiɗiri he no nde yaajiri faa nde walaa keerol.
Miɗo hiɗi duu anndon hidde *Almasiihu no ɓuri to hakkillo neɗɗo waawi nanngude ngam jikku Alla heewa on kap.
Teddungal laatanoo Alla, mo baawɗe mum no ɓuri to hakkillo neɗɗo waawi nanngude ɗum. Alla mo har baawɗe mum gonɗe nder meeɗen, no waɗa kujje ɓurɗe ko eeluɗen ɗum.
Teddungal laatanoo mo daliila Iisa *Almasiihu, daliila hawriine goonɗinɓe, nder jamanuuji fuu faa abada abadin. Aamiin !
Miin Pol, uddaaɗo ngam golle Joomiraawo, mi eeli on mbuuron mbuurnam njaadoojam he noddol ngol Alla noddi on.
Mi eeli tawdeɗon leesinaaku, ɓerne fewne, munyal he hidde walloore on ngiɗodiron.
Ndurwee njogoɗon potal ngal *Ruuhu Alla hokki on, daliila hakkillo fukkiiŋo wonngo hakkune mooɗon.
On terɗe ɓanndu worru, *Ruuhu gooto duu woni no ɗowa on. Tammude nde Alla noddani on duu no worre.
Joomiraawo gooto woodi, goonɗinol gootol woodi, gaɗol *batisma duu no gootol.
Alla no gooto, kanko woni *Baaba himɓe fuu, laamiiɗo huune fuu, gonɗo nder ɓerne neɗɗo meeɗen fuu, golliroowo neɗɗo fuu.
Neɗɗo meeɗen fuu heɓii moƴƴere Alla ndee, dey-dey no *Almasiihu hokkiri joomum,
hano no ɗum winndiraa wi'aa: Wakkati o ƴenci dow, o jaalii wayɓe makko, o waɗi ɓe maccuɓe, o waɗani himɓe kokke.
Ndenne, ɗume woni maana « o ƴenci dow »? Maana majjum woni, *Almasiihu jippake, wari nder duuniyaaru.
Jippinooɗo oon, kam duu ƴeenyi faa hewti beɗi kammu fuu, ngam hebbina huune fuu.
Jippinooɗo oon duu suɓii woɓɓe, waɗi *lilaaɓe, woɓɓe duu o waɗi ɗum'en annabiiɓe. O waɗi woɓɓe baajotooɓe, woɓɓe o waɗi ɗum'en paster'en, woɓɓe duu jannginooɓe.
O waɗi ɗum ngam siryaade himɓe Alla golla golle makko heɓa tokkuɓe mo cemmbiɗaa.
Enen duu, laatoɗen daane worre nder goonɗinol meeɗen he nder anndal *Ɓii-Alla. Laatoɗen mawɓe ko'e meeɗen, ndaroɗen darne worre hano *Almasiihu.

Ɗum waɗaama heɓa to en ngartu hano sukaaɓe hiileteeɓe, naa hano laana ka benkeƴƴe njaarata to ngiɗi fuu. En accataa jannginooɓe fewre gom ngara mbaylita ɓerɗe meeɗen, ƴoyna en itta en dow laawol goonɗinol meeɗen.
Nde nii eɗen kaalana himɓe goonga nder kollol hidde, en ɓuran ɓadaade *Almasiihu. En ngartan aahiiɓe ɓennduɓe nder goonɗinol mum'en yeeso *Almasiihu, hooreejo goonɗinɓe fuu.

Daliila makko waɗi hawriine goonɗinɓe kappa kuula mum nanngodiri, laatii hano ɓanndu worru. Nde nii terɗe ɓanndu fuu no nanngodiri, no ngolla no haaniri. Too, ɓanndu nduun fuu semmbiɗan, nyiɓo nder hidde.
Too, ko eelanmi on woni: Ngam barke Joomiraawo, to nyemminee ɓe anndaa Alla. Himɓe sinnguɓe mbuurnam mum'en dow miilooji ko'e mum'en ɗi he meere fuu no go'o.
Yoora ɓernaaku he rafi anndal maɓɓe waɗi ɓerɗe maɓɓe mbumi, ɓe kakkitaa he mbuurnam ɗam Alla hokkata neɗɗo.
Ɓe cemtataa, ɓe naatii faa noy walaa nder waɗude ko nyiddinii, ɓe naatii suuno he ko nanndititta he mum.
Amma onon, hanaa ɗum woni ko njannginaɗon dow *Almasiihu.
On nani habaru Iisa *Almasiihu. On ekkintinaama no haaniri ngaɗon mbuurnam mooɗon dey-dey he goonga gonɗo no jannginee dow makko.
Ndenne, oɗon kaani mboppon jikku mooɗon kinngu, kewngu majjere, jikku ndimoongu mursere.
Accon *Ruuhu Alla heyɗintina hakkillooji mooɗon,
ɓorna on neɗɗaaku kesu ngu Alla waɗi nder nanndi mum. Neɗɗaaku kesu ngu o mahi nder dartinaaku he senaare ƴuwne he goonga.
Ndenne, celee fewre, neɗɗo fuu to fenan gondo mum, ngam en fuu en terɗe ɓanndu worru.
Nde ɓerne mooɗon ummake, to ngaɗee hakke. To naange yanu tawa nde jippaaki.
To accee Ibiliisa heɓa laawol he mooɗon.
Gujjo woɗɗoo guyka, gollira semmbe mum ngam wuurda no haaniri, heɓa kam duu ko walliri talkaaɓe.
To haala mbonka fuu wurto nder kunndule mooɗon. Kaalee ko wooɗi tan, ko nafata, ko semmbinɗinta neɗɗo, ko rimanta wonɓe no ndeki gite dow mooɗon, moƴƴere.
To mettinee ɓerne *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, haatimiire nde Alla fiyi dow mooɗon. *Ruuhu mo Alla watti dow mooɗon ngam hollude ko nyannde darŋal kam jeyii on, o hisina on.
Accee yaawa ɓernaaku fuu, ittee borondi fuu nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, gaabaaki, habdo, jennodirol, he gollal bonngal fuu nder ɓerɗe mooɗon.
Moƴƴinodiree hakkune mooɗon, njurmodiron, njaafonodiron hano no Alla yaafori on daliila kawtal mooɗon he *Almasiihu.
Nder ko ngatton fuu nyemminee Alla ngam joonin on ɓiɓɓe makko horsuɓe.
Tokkee laawol hidde hano no *Almasiihu hiɗiri en faa mursi yonki mum ngam meeɗen. O waɗi hoore makko hadiya he *sadaka urɗo belɗo Alla.
On himɓe Alla, ndenne haanaa jeenu, ko nyiddinii, naa suuno tawee baa seɗɗa he mooɗon, ngam kujje ɗee njaadataa he senaaku.
Haanaa haalaaji puuyɗi, haalaaji ɗi ngalaa hoore, naa haalaaji nyiddiniiɗi tawee hakkune mooɗon. Amma ko haani woni njetton Alla.

Sikka fuu walaa, jeenoowo naa gaɗoowo golle nyidduɗe naa cuunaaɗo suuno bonngo, paamee ko tabbat ir neɗɗo oo ronataa Laamu Alla he *Almasiihu. Guugaaɗo fuu duu naatataa nder maggu, ngam hiɗande hoore mum tan huune, kam duu hano sujidande tooruure non.
To accee neɗɗo fuu ƴoyna on, majjinira on haalaaji mum belɗi, ngam ir nii he banndum fooɗata tikkere Alla dow tottitiiɓe mo.
Ndenne, to tokkodiree he ir maɓɓe.
Ndenno nder nimre ngonnoɗon, amma hannden daliila kawtal mooɗon he Joomiraawo, oɗon nder jeyngol. Ndenne sey njooɗoɗon jonnde wonɓe nder jeyngol.
Mi haalani on ɗum ngam jeyngol rimataana waɗude moƴƴere, dartinaaku e goonga.
Ndurwee paamon ko welata Joomiraawo.
To ngattee juuɗe mooɗon nder golle jaayɗe, golle gatteeɗe nder nimre, golle ɗe ngalaa fuu nafakka gom. Amma ko haani woni kollon ko ɓe ngaɗata ɗum wooɗaa baa isilam.
Ko woni no waɗee nder cuccukka, ɗum no semtini baa haaleede.
Amma wakkati huune fuu waddaa nder jeyngol anniya maɓɓe no foti fuu no anndetee.
Jeyngol no holla huune fuu, ngam majjum waɗi wi'aa: « Finu ! Aan ɗaaniiɗo. Aan maayɗo, ummita. Jeyngol *Almasiihu wannginoyte. »
Ndenne, paamee no njooɗortoɗon hakkune himɓe, to on ngaɗee ko'e mooɗon ɓe ngalaa hakkillo amma laatee jom'en hikmaaku.
Wakkati fuu mo mbaawɗon waɗude ko wooɗi, ndurwee ngaɗee ɗum, ngam nder jamaanu bonɗo ngonɗen.
Ndenne to ngartee loɓi, amma ndurwee paamon muuyɗe Joomiraawo.
Celee jarɗe cabiijam faa ko'e mooɗon copto, ngam iɗam watta neɗɗo waɗa ko ummanaaki, amma accee Alla heewnira on he *Ruuhu mum.
Cemmbinɗinodiree hakkune mooɗon he jimi Jabuura, jimi teddinooji Alla naa jimol fuu ngol Alla watti nder ɓerɗe mooɗon. Njimanon Joomiraawo, njetton mo he ɓerɗe mooɗon fuu.
Wakkati fuu njetton Alla *Baaba meeɗen ngam huune fuu, dow innde Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
Neɗɗo mooɗon fuu ɗowtanoo banndum ngam sabbu teddungal *Almasiihu gonngal to mooɗon.
Onon rewɓe, ɗowtanoɗon goriraaɓe mooɗon hano no ɗowtirantoɗon Joomiraawo.
Ngam gorko woni hooreejo deekum hano no *Almasiihu woniri hooreejo hawriine goonɗinɓe ɗum. Hawriine goonɗinɓe mo woni ɓanndu makko, kanko duu woni kisinoowo maɓɓe.
Rewɓe no kaani ɗowtanaade goriraaɓe mum'en nder huune fuu hano no hawriine goonɗinɓe ɗowtiranto *Almasiihu.
Onon worɓe, ngiɗee deekiraaɓe mooɗon no *Almasiihu hiɗiri hawriine goonɗinɓe mum, faa mursi yonki mum ngam maɓɓe.
O lamnirii ɓe ndiyam he haala makko ngam wartirde ɓe himɓe Alla.

*Almasiihu waɗii ɗum ngam darnude hawriine goonɗinɓe ɗum yeeso mum, hawriine nde no wondi teddungal, nde walaa fuu to jancirtee, naa ko welaa fuu gom hi'ataake he mayre. O waɗii ɗum ngam nde warta seniine, nde walaa fuu feloore gom.
Nii gorko haani hiɗira deekum. O hiɗaa mo no o hiɗiri ɓanndu makko. Neɗɗo fuu hiɗi deekum, hoore mum hiɗi.
Walaa banyoowo ɓanndu mum, amma sey hakkiloo he mayru, nyawta ndu. Joomum watta hakkillo mum fuu he mayru hano no *Almasiihu hakkiliri hawriine goonɗinɓe ɗum,
ngam en fuu, en goonɗinɓe mo, en terɗe ɓanndu makko.
Hano no ɗum winndiraa wi'aa: Gorko accan innum he bammum, nanngondira he deekum, ɓe fuu ɗiɗo ɓe laatoo ɓanndu worru.
Nder ko winndaa wi'aa ɗo, kippol haala mawka waɗa ɗon. Miin, miɗo wi'a ko no *Almasiihu he hawriine goonɗinɓe ɗum ngorri hippa ɗon.
Dey haala kaa, ika daara on, onon duu. Ndenne neɗɗo mooɗon fuu, hiɗa deekum no hiɗiri hoore mum. Debbo fuu duu teddina gorum.
Onon sukaaɓe, ngam barke Joomiraawo, ɗowtanee saarooɓe mooɗon ngam kanƴum woni ko haani.
Teddin inna maa he bammaa. Tilsinoore ndee woni tilsinoore arandeere feŋodiraade he fodoore.
Fodoore ndee woni: Nana belɗum, ngaɗaa sabbuŋo junngo.
Aan baaba, to uppu ɓiɓɓe maaɗa murta. Eltu ɓe, njannginaa ɓe dow laawol Joomiraawo.
Onon maccuɓe, ɗowtanee joomiraaɓe mooɗon. Kulee ɓe, teddinee ɓe he ɓerne worre hano no teddinirton *Almasiihu.
Ɗowtanee ɓe, hanaa ngam oɗon ley gite maɓɓe, hanaa duu ngam ɓe njetta on. Amma ɗowtanee ɓe he ɓerne worre hano no Alla hiɗiri maccuɓe *Almasiihu ngaɗa.
Ngolliranee ɓe anniya lobbo hano Joomiraawo ngollanton, hanaa ɓiɓɓe aadama ngollanton.
Oɗon anndi neɗɗo fuu golli ko wooɗi, nde joomum no dimo naa joomum no maccuɗo, Joomiraawo yoɓan ɗum dey-dey golle mum.
Onon marɓe maccuɓe, onon duu no tilsi ngaɗanon maccuɓe mooɗon ko ɓe kaani waɗaneede. To mbi'ee on piyan ɓe, ngam oɗon anndi ko mawɗo gooto ngooduɗon gonɗo dow, mo walaa fuu hedran-hedran.
Banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe, walaa ko hoddi se hanaa wi'ude cemmbiɗon nder kawtal mooɗon he Joomiraawo, tuugoɗon dow baawɗe makko.
Njogoɗon kaɓorɗe fuu ɗe Alla hokki on, heɓa tittinkinoɗon, njaaloɗon Ibiliisa he dabareeji mum.
Hanaa tagaaɓe kabdeten, amma ko kabdeten ɗum woni seyɗaniiji bonɗi gonɗi hakkune beɗi kammu, gooduɗi baawɗe e laamu nder duuniyaaru, duuniyaaru ndu jamaanu nimre.
Ngam majjum waɗi miɗo wi'a on kooƴon kaɓorɗe fuu ɗe Alla hokki on, heɓa tittinkinoɗon, ndurwon ngam nyannde fuu nyalaane sattune ndeen wari, taweɗon oɗon ndarii, oɗon njogii kaɓorɗe mooɗon fuu.
Ndenne, ummee ndaree, tunndoɗon goonga, ɓornoɗon dartinaaku hano toggoore mooɗon njamndi.
Ɓornee anniya waajaade *Habaru lobbo, habaru dow Iisa *Almasiihu gaddoowo jam hano paɗe mooɗon.
Nder ko tawaɗon fuu njogee goonɗinol mooɗon kam duu hano wawaade. Wawaade nde mbaawirton taɓɓoraade kure hiite ɗe Seyɗan fiɗɗirta on.
Adee kisinam hano hufuneere njamndi, njogee haala Alla duu hano takubaahi ki *Ruuhu Alla hokki on.
To comee du'aade, ndu'ee, eelon Alla hano no *Ruuhu makko holliri on. Tittinkinee nder du'aa'u, to njeggitee du'anaade himɓe Alla.
Miin duu, ndu'anee kam Alla hokka kam hikmaaku mi heɓa cuusal haalude sirri tawaaɗo nder *Habaru lobbo, habaru Iisa *Almasiihu.
Baa nii ko miɗo faddaa nder kasu, miɗo faasano *Habaru lobbo oon. Ndu'anee kam ngam mi waajoroo mo cuusal, hano no ɗum tilsiniraa dow am.
Tikikus, banndii'en korsuɗo, gollanoowo Joomiraawo he holnaare, humpitan on dow no ngontirmi fuu.
Mi lilii mo he mooɗon o haalana on no min ngorri, o semmbinɗina ɓerɗe mooɗon.
Banndiraaɓe, Alla *Baaba meeɗen he Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen kokka on jam, hidde, he goonɗinol.
Moƴƴere Alla laatanoo woodanɓe Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen fuu hidde nde timmataa.

Miin Pol e Timote, minen maccuɓe Iisa *Almasiihu, mbinndani on, onon hawriine goonɗinɓe huɓeere Filipi. Miɗen canna on, onon ardiiɓe e wallooɓe hawriine goonɗinɓe. Miɗen canna on, on fuu, seniiɓe jeyaaɓe Iisa *Almasiihu.
Alla *Baabiraawo men e Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo men hokka on jam e moƴƴere.
Miɗo yetta Alla am wakkati fuu nde miccitiimi on.
Wakkati fuu mo ngaɗananmi on du'aa'u, on fuu, he welwelo ngaɗiranmi ɗum,
ngam on mballii kam sankitidde *Habaru lobbo nder duuniyaaru, illa nyanndere arandere nde nanuɗon mo faa hannden.
Mi tabbintinii ko Alla puɗɗuɗo golle lobbe nder mooɗon, tinnotoo no waɗa ɗe faa ɗe kuuɓa nder nyalaane nde Iisa *Almasiihu wartoyta.

No haani mi miilanoo on, on fuu, ir miilooji ɗii ngam mi wattii on nder ɓerne am. On fuu on naatii nder moƴƴere nde Alla hokki kam, wakkati uddaami naa wakkati noddaami ngam heedannde *Habaru lobbo naa ngam tabbinɗinde mo.
Alla no seedii ko miɗo hiɗiri on, on fuu, he yurmeene Iisa *Almasiihu mawne.
Wakkati ndu'otoomi fuu, miɗo ƴama Alla ɓeyda hidde mooɗon, nde ɓeydoroo nder anndal e paamal lobbal
ngam mbaawon senndirde no laaɓiri goonga e fewre cuɓoɗon ko wooɗi sanne. Ndenne, on laatoto laaɓuɓe ɓe ngalaa feloore nder nyalaane nde *Almasiihu wartoyta,
hebbinaa on golleeji dartiiɗi ƴuwɗi to Iisa *Almasiihu, ngam Alla teddinee, yettee.
Banndiraaɓe am, miɗo hiɗi paamon ko torra ka ngonmi nder mum kaa yaarii *Habaru lobbo yeeso.
Ngam hakkiltooɓe kasu ɓeen fuu e himɓe nokkuuje ɗuɗɗe no anndi ko mi uddaama ngam goonɗinol am nder *Almasiihu.
Uddol am ngool waɗi ko ɗuɓɓe nder banndiraaɓe am duu ɓeydi hoolaade Joomiraawo. Ɓe kulataa kaden, amma he cuusal ɓe kaalirta haala Alla.
Goonga non, ko woɓɓe no mbaajoroo habaru *Almasiihu oon he kirodirol e pooɗodirol, amma woɓɓe no ngaɗira ɗum he anniyaaji lobbi.
Iɓe ngollira hidde ngam iɓe anndi Alla halfini kam hakkilanaade *Habaru lobbo oon.
Amma ɓeeto no mbaajoo habaru *Almasiihu he pooɗodirol, anniyaaji maɓɓe duu laaɓaa, ko ɓe miilotoo kaden, kam woni ɓeydude torra am nder uddol am ngool.
Ɗum kay bonnataa baafuy ! Ko hennon fuu, se nii ɗum laatake fewre naa goonga, nde habaru *Almasiihu waajaama, miɗo nana belɗum. Goonga non, mi nanan belɗum kaden,
ngam miɗo anndi ko nder torraaji ɗii fuu, ko waɗi fuu, ɗi ndimanan kam kisinam daliila du'aa'uuji mooɗon e balla *Ruuhu ƴuwɗo to Iisa *Almasiihu.
Ngam majjum, ko ngiɗumi sanne e ko ndekumi gokka dow mum woni mi semtataa dow baafuy. Amma miɗo hoolii sanne mi teddina *Almasiihu nder am illa jooni faa abada, mbuurmi naa maaymi.
Ngam he giiɗe am, *Almasiihu woni mbuurnam am, maayde am duu no riiba.
Amma mbuurnam am nder duuniyaaru no ɓeydanan kam waɗude golle nafooje. Ndenne, mi anndaa ko cuɓotoomi.
Hakkillo am senndake ɗiɗi, miin kay ko ɓurmi hiɗude woni mi yaha mi jooɗidowoo he *Almasiihu, ɗum jaati ɓuri wooɗude.
Amma ngam naforoɗon kam mi wuura nder duuniyaaru ɓurani on.
Mi tabbintinii ko mi jooɗoto mi wonda he mooɗon, on fuu, ngam ɓeydon yahde yeeso he welwelo nder goonɗinol mooɗon
faa gartol am hakkune mooɗon ɓeydana on teddinde Iisa *Almasiihu ngam am.

Onon, ko waɗi fuu, mbuuree nder *Habaru lobbo, filla Iisa *Almasiihu he ndimaaku ngam se mi warii tuntaade on naa se mi waraay, mi nana habaru mooɗon, mi annda oɗon ngondi he anniya gooto ndaroɗon kabdon he ɓerne worre ngam goonɗinol *Habaru lobbo.
To on accee wayɓe mooɗon kulƴina on dow huune fuu. To maɓɓe ɗum laatoto alaama halkere, amma onon, ɗum laatanto on alaama kisinam mooɗon. Ɗum fuu ƴuwi to Alla.
Ngam har ko daarata *Almasiihu, Alla hokki on moƴƴere, hanaa ngam ngoonɗinon mo tan amma ngam torroɗon sabu makko duu.
On naatii nder habdo ngo ngi'unoɗon miɗo waɗa e ngo nanuɗon miɗo haɓee dow mum faa jooni.
Se oɗon ngoodi semmbe ngam Iisa *Almasiihu, e cemmbinɗinol nder hidde Alla, se oɗon ngoodi kawtal he *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, se oɗon ngoodi yurmeene e moƴƴere.
Nden kam, kuumnee welwelo am heɓa kawton nder jonnde mooɗon: Njoddee hidde worre e ɓerne worre e daane worre.
To on ngaɗee baafuy he pooɗodirol naa mawnitaare, amma nder leesinaaku adee neɗɗo fuu no ɓuri on.
To gooto mooɗon tefu ko nafata ɗum kam tan, amma tefa ko nafata woɓɓe duu.
Njogee nder mooɗon miiloo ngo Iisa *Almasiihu woodunoo:
Baa ko omo nder nanndi Alla, o miilaay fonndude hoore makko he Alla hano ko o haani teetude.
Dey o adi hoore makko hano baafuy, o nanndinii hoore makko maccuɗo, o laatii hano tagaaɓe, o annditaama hano neɗɗo hakkune himɓe.
O leyni hoore makko, o tokki Alla faa o maayi, maayde dow *bardugal.
Ngam majjum Alla mawnini mo sanne, hokki mo duu innde ɓurne inɗe fuu,
ngam innde Iisa howru fuu no hofoto yeeso makko nde nder kammu non, nde dow leydi non naa nde hakkune maayɓe non,
heɓa ɗemngal fuu seedoo ko Iisa *Almasiihu woni Joomiraawo, ngam Alla *Baabiraawo men teddinee.

Noon, giɗaaɓe am, nde ngondunoomi he mooɗon, oɗon tokki kam wakkati fuu. Baa jooni ko mboɗɗiimi on duu, tokkee. Tinnee nder golle ngam kisinam mooɗon. Tittinkinee nder waɗude mbuurnam lobbam nder kulal Alla manngal
ngam Alla no golla nder ɓerɗe mooɗon ngam ngiɗon, ngaɗon ko weli mo.
Ko ngaɗoton fuu, to ngaɗiree ɗum nguntaaki naa jeddodirol,
heɓa laatoɗon laaɓuɓe ɓe ngalaa feloore, laatoɗon ɓiɓɓe Alla ɓe ngalaa gacce hakkune himɓe jamaanu oonyiiɗo e bonɗo. On njaynan hakkune maɓɓe hano no koode njaynirta nder kammu nii
njogoɗon haala mbuurnam no wooɗiri. Nden on laatoto hollooɓe welwelo am nyalaane nde *Almasiihu wartoyta ngam golle am e tampiri am to laatoo ko nafataa.
Baa se ƴiiƴam am rufaama hano cakkol ngol ngaɗanmi on to Alla ngam goonɗinol mooɗon yaha yeeso, mi nandan belɗum he mooɗon, on fuu.
Onon duu, naniree belɗum hano non, nanidee belɗum he am.
Se nii Joomiraawo men Iisa jaɓi, mi lildanan on Timote nder wakkati seɗɗa heɓa nde nanumi habaruuji mooɗon, miin e hoore am, ɗum semmbinɗinan ɓerne am.
Ngam kanko tan wallata kam miilaade dow miilooji am e miilooji mon.
Hoddiiɓe fuu ko'e mum'en tan miilantoo, hanaa Iisa *Almasiihu.
Amma oɗon anndi ko Timote hollii dartinaaku mum. Ɗum waɗi o walli kam waajaade *Habaru lobbo hano no ɓiɗɗo wallirta baaba mum nii.
Kanko ngiɗumi lilude wakkati paamumi no jonnde am laatoto ɗo.
Miɗo hoolii ko Joomiraawo hokkan kam laawol, miin e hoore am, mi wara to mooɗon nder wakkati seɗɗa.

Mi miili no haani mi lildana on banndii'en Epaforoditus, gollidoowo am. O wallii kam nder habdo ngam sankitidde *Habaru lobbo nder duuniyaaru. Kanko woni mo lilunoɗon faa waddana kam ko humtataa haajuuji am.
On fuu, omo beeganoo hi'ude on, o wemmbaama jaati ko o faami oon nanii o yamɗaa.
Goonga non, o nyawiino faa o hosi maayde. Amma Alla yurmake mo, hanaa kanko tan, miin duu Alla yurmake kam, ngam to mi heɓu mettal ɓerne dow mettal ɓerne.
Ɗum waɗi miɗo hari faa mi lila mo to mooɗon, ngam nanon belɗum se on ngi'ii mo, miin duu mettal ɓerne am no ɓuytoto.
Ndenne, njaɓɓoree mo he welwelo hano no wonduɓe he Joomiraawo njaɓɓitortee nii. Teddinee ir himɓe ɓee
ngam golle *Almasiihu ɗee waɗi o hosi maayde. O hokkitiri yonki makko faa o waddana kam balla mo on mbaawtaa waddande kam ngam on ngondaa he am.
Ndenne, banndiraaɓe am, mbelnee ngam oɗon ngondi he Joomiraawo. Ɗum tampintaa kam baa seɗɗa mi winnditano on kujje ɗee, ngam kanƴe kokkata on hoolaare.
Kakkilee e dawaaɗi, kam woni gollooɓe ko mboni, iɓe tilsina himɓe njuulnee ngam iɓe miila kanƴum hisinta en.
Ngam enen ngoni juulnaaɓe goonga e goonga, enen rewuɓe Alla he *Ruuhu muuɗum, eɗen teddina Iisa *Almasiihu, en ngattaay hoolaare meeɗen dow ko'e men.
Miin kay, miɗo waawunoo dekude hoolaare dow am. Se woɓɓe miilii ko kam'en no mbaawi dekude hoolaare dow ko'e mum'en, miin, miɗo ɓuri ɓe waawude ɗum.
Ngam mi juulnaama illa he nyanndere am jeetataɓere, mi Isra'ilanke ƴuwɗo e lenyol Benyamin, mi Ibranke ɓii-Ibranke. Har ko daarta *Tawreeta Muusa miɗo jeydaa e *Fariisa'en,
har ko daarta hiraane diina, mi torriino goonɗinɓe Iisa, har ko daarta dartinaaku, baa gooto waawaano yinngude kam ngam miɗo foccitanii *Tawreeta.
Amma ko ndaarannomi riiba fuu, joonin mi adi ɗum hano ɓolum ngam *Almasiihu.

Goonga mi adi ɗum fuu no ɓolum, ngam anndude Joomiraawo am Iisa *Almasiihu no ɓurani kam kujje ɗee fuu. Ngam makko waɗi mboppumi ko njoginoomi fuu, miɗo daara huune fuu hano buudi ngam Iisa *Almasiihu no laatanoo kam riiba.
Ko ngiɗumi kam woni mi wonda he makko, hanaa ngam dartinaaku am ƴuwngu he *Tawreeta, amma ngam dartinaaku ƴuwngu nder goonɗinde *Almasiihu, dartinaaku ngu Alla hokki goonɗinɓe ɗum.
Ko ngiɗumi woni anndude *Almasiihu, e faamude baawɗe ɗe Alla ummintiniri mo, mi hawta e makko torraaji, mi nannda he makko maayde
ngam miin duu, se Alla jaɓi, mi heɓa ummintineede hakkune maayɓe nyannde darŋal.

Mi wi'aay ko mi yottake keerol durwo am, mi wi'aay duu ko mi laatake mo walaa feloore, amma miɗo wondi he doggudu hano no himɓe daɗodirta nii faa mi heɓa mi nannga ɗum hano no Iisa *Almasiihu nanngirnoo kam nii.
Aa'a, banndiraaɓe am, mi wi'aay ko mi heewtake ɗum. Amma ko ngaɗanmi nii: Miɗo yeggita ko witti fuu, miɗo fooɗanoo ko warata.
Miɗo doggira har keerol ngool faa mi heɓa njobdi ndi Alla Toowɗo noddi kam faa mi heɓa nder kawtal e Iisa *Almasiihu.
En fuu laatiiɓe ɓennduɓe nder goonɗinol, ir miilooji ɗii haani ardoo en, dey se woɓɓe njeddodiri dow goɗɗum, Alla no lamnanan ɓe ɗum.
Amma no wa'i fuu, tinnoɗen eɗen tokka laawol ngool hano no tokkirnoɗen ngol faa jooni.
Banndiraaɓe am, ngaɗee hano no ngaɗumi nii, ƴeewee ekkitee mbuuron hano no min mbuurdunoo hakkune mon nii.
Ngam ɗuɓɓe no mbuuri hano wayɓe *bardugal *Almasiihu. Mi haalanii on ɗum kile ɗuɗɗe, mi haaliranan on ɗum jooni duu e gonɗi.
Timmorde maɓɓe woni halkere, deeɗi maɓɓe ngoni reweteeɓe maɓɓe, ko haani semtinde ɓe woni ko ɓe nyaaƴirta, kujje duuniyaaru tan ngoni nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
Amma enen, wuro meeɗen woni nder kammu, eɗen ndoomi Kisinoowo meeɗen ƴuwoowo ton oon, kanko woni Joomiraawo meeɗen Iisa *Almasiihu.
Kanko, o waylitowan ɓalli meeɗen tampuɗi ɗii, ɗi laatoo hano ɓanndu makko ndu teddungal nduun, ngam omo woodi baawɗe gaɗooje huune fuu hofo yeeso makko.
Ngam majjum banndiraaɓe am ɓe ngiɗumi, on njewnii kam sanne. Onon laatiiɓe welwelo am e lefol am, onon ɓe piiranmi gabaare. Hano nii, giɗaaɓe am, tiiɗee no wooɗiri nder tokkol Joomiraawo.
Mi ŋaarake Ewodi e Sintis laatoo daane worre ngam Joomiraawo.

Aan Sinsigis, gollidoowo am kolniiɗo oo duu, mi ƴamii maa mballaa rewɓe ɗiɗo ɓee, ngam ɓe mballii kam nder habdo waaju *Habaru lobbo, kamɓe, Keleman e gollidooɓe am gom, ɓe inɗe mum'en mbinndaa nder dewtere mbuurnam.
Wakkati fuu mbelnee ngam Joomiraawo. Miɗo wi'a kaden, mbelnee ngam makko !
Himɓe fuu annda peewirka ɓerɗe mooɗon. Gartol Joomiraawo no ɓadii.
To on cuulee dow huune fuu, amma ko hennon fuu anndinee Alla haajuuji mon fuu nder du'aa'u, ngaɗiree ɗum e yettoore duu.
Nden Alla no hokka on jam ɓurɗo faama tagaaɓe fuu, jam oo no jogoto ɓerɗe mooɗon e miilooji mooɗon ngam on ngondii he Iisa *Almasiihu.
Banndiraaɓe am, joonkay, miilooji mon tiiɗa e ko laatii goonga fuu, ko rimɗi fuu, ko dartii fuu, ko laaɓi fuu, ko haani hiɗeede e ko foti yetteede. Miilee dow ko wooɗi e ko heewi teddungal fuu.
Ngolliree ko ekkitiɗon to am e ko keɓuɗon to am, ko narruɗon kam e ko ngiiruɗon kam. Se on ngaɗii non, Alla mo jam wondan he mooɗon.
Ɓerne am no weli sanne ngam Joomiraawo. Jooni on keyɗintinii miilooji mooɗon har am. Baa ko wakkati mum duu, miilooji mooɗon no ngonnoo e am, amma on keɓaayno wakkati hollude kam ɗum.
Hanaa goɗɗum kaajaa mi waɗi kaalumi ɗum, amma mi arti mi ekkitake heƴude hoore am nder ko ngonmi fuu.
Miɗo waawi wuurde nder talkaaku naa nder riiku. Wakkati fuu, nokku fuu, mi ekkitake wuurde nder haarande naa nder rafo, nder ɗuuɗal naa nder rafi.
Miɗo waawi huune fuu ngam *Almasiihu cemmbinɗinoowo kam.
Amma, on ngaɗii ko wooɗi wakkati mballunoɗon kam nder torra am.
Onon himɓe Filipi, oɗon anndi ko illa wakkati ndiilunoomi leydi Makedoniya, wakkati puɗɗunoɗon nanude *Habaru lobbo, walaa hawriine goonɗinɓe wallude kam, hokki kam goɗɗum se hanaa hawriine mooɗon.
Ngam baa wakkati ngonnoomi wuro Tesalonika duu, on lildii kam ko kaajaami fuu, hanaa nde wootere, hanaa nde ɗiɗi !
To on miilee ko kokkal ngonmi miɗo tefa e mooɗon. Aa'a. Keɓon riiba ngonmi miɗo tefa.
Ko lilduɗon Epaforoditus ɗum heƴi, huumtii haajuuji am fuu, ɗum heƴi faa wittake. Kokkal mooɗon ngal laatake uurngol mbelngol hano cakkol lobbol ngol Alla jaɓi nii.
Alla am huumtiran haajuuji mooɗon fuu he riiku makko manngu ngam Iisa *Almasiihu.
Teddungal laatanoo Alla *Baabiraawo meeɗen faa abada abadin. Aamiin !
Cannee laaɓuɓe jeyaaɓe Iisa *Almasiihu fuu. Banndiraaɓe wonduɓe he am ɓeen duu no canna on.
Laaɓuɓe ɓee fuu no canna on, sako gollooɓe nder hoggo Kaysar, laamiiɗo *Rooma.
Moƴƴere Joomiraawo meeɗen Iisa *Almasiihu wonda he mooɗon !
Miin Pol mo, Alla suɓii waɗi lilaaɗo Iisa *Almasiihu he banndii'en Timote mbinndani on ɗerol ngool, onon himɓe Koloosi.
Miɗen njewta on, onon jeyaaɓe Alla, banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe feŋiiɓe he *Almasiihu wonɓe Koloosi. Alla *Baabiraawo meeɗen hokka on jam e moƴƴere.
Miɗen njetta Alla *Baaba Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen daliila mooɗon. Miɗen ndu'anoo on wakkati fuu.
Min keɓii habaru goonɗinol mooɗon dow Iisa *Almasiihu. Min keɓii habaru hidde nde ngoodanɗon jeyaaɗo Alla fuu.
Nde goonga on ngattii tammude he ko o siryanii on dow kammu. Wakkati *Habaru lobbo, habaru goonga e goonga warnoo to mooɗon, o anndinii on tammude ndee.

*Habaru lobbo oo no ɗon no waɗa barke. Omo ɗon omo sankitoo nder duuniyaaru fuu, hano no o sankitirnoo hakkune mooɗon wakkati puɗɗuɗon nanude habaru moƴƴere Alla, paamuɗon duu no nde wa'i goonga e goonga.
Epafaras banndii'en korsuɗo kam waɗani on filla habaru moƴƴere Alla ndee. Minen he makko, min fuu, min gollanooɓe *Almasiihu. O kolniiɗo, kanko woni no golla hakkune mooɗon nokku amin.
O waɗanii min filla hidde himɓe nde *Ruuhu Alla watti nder ɓerɗe mooɗon.

Illa wakkati min nanunoo filla kaa, miɗen ndu'anoo on. Miɗen eela Alla, min accataa eelude mo duu ngam mooɗon. Miɗen eela, o holla on dalla-dalla muuyɗe makko ngam keɓon hikmaaku ƴuwngu to *Ruuhu Alla, keɓon faamude muuyɗe makko ɗeen duu faa wooɗa.
Miɗen ndu'anoo on ngam mbuuron no weliri Joomiraawo, ngaɗon ko o hiɗi fuu. Ngaɗon barke nder gollal golle lobbe feere-fereeje, ɓeydon yahde yeeso nder anndol Alla.
Miɗen eela Alla watta baawɗe mum tedduɗe semmbinɗina on laatoɗon ɓe huune fuu waawaa hepporde ɗum'en, mbaawon munyude huune fuu ko wari he mooɗon.
Nder welwelo, njetton Alla *Baabiraawo gaɗuɗo on fotuɓe heɓude ndonu wonngu nder laamu mum ngu darja, ndonu desanaagu jeyaaɓe mum.
O soptini en baawɗe gonɗe nder nimre, o nanni en nder laamu Ɓiyiiko korsuɗo
mo nder sabbu mum ndimɗinaɗen he maccangaaku hakke, hakkeeji meeɗen njaafaa.
*Almasiihu woni nannduɗo Alla mo hi'ataake, afo ɓurɗo huune fuu ko tagaa.
Ngam har makko huune fuu ko tawaa dow he ley tagaa: Ko hi'etee he ko hi'ataake, maleykaaɓe he ruuhuuji ko woodi baawɗe e laamu. Ko waɗetee fuu, waɗaama har makko he ngam makko.
Omo ɗon illa huune fuu walaano, har makko duu huune fuu duumoto.
Kanko woni hoore hawriine goonɗinɓe mo, laatiine ɓanndu makko. Kanko woni wuddu mayre, kanko duu woni arano maayɗo, ummitii, ngam wartude ardiiɗo nder huune fuu.
Alla muuyi ko woni he mum fuu wona he makko,
kanko duu waɗi laawol wattude potal hakkune mum he duuniyaaru. Har ƴiiƴam makko ndufaaɗam dow *bardugal, Alla waddii potal hakkune mum he ko tawaa dow e ley fuu.
Ndenno on fuu on woɗɗinooɓe Alla, on wayɓe makko nder ko miilotoɗon he nder golle mooɗon bonɗe.
Amma joonin har maayde Ɓiyiiko jarɗo torra nder ɓanndu mum, o wartiri potal hakkune mooɗon he makko ngam laatoɗon seniiɓe, ɓe ngalaa fuu laru e ko felirtee yeeso Alla.

On ngartan jeyaaɓe Alla nde nii on tittinkinake nder goonɗinol mooɗon, ɓerɗe mooɗon cemmbiɗaa. To accee mboɗɗineɗon he tammude mooɗon nde nanuɗon nder *Habaru lobbo. *Habaru lobbo oo waajaama hakkune duuniyaaru fuu. *Habaru lobbo oo miin Pol ngollananmi.
Jooni miɗo nana belɗum torraaji fuu ɗi njarmi daliila mooɗon. Torraaji am ɗii ngoni torraaji ɗi kawtidinmi Iisa *Almasiihu ngam nafude hawriine goonɗinɓe mo fuu, hawriine tinndinoore ɓanndu makko.
Alla suɓii kam ngam mi laatoo gollanoowo hawriine goonɗinɓe Iisa *Almasiihu. O suɓake kam ngam mi waajoo *Habaru makko lobbo oon fuu hakkune mooɗon.
Haala kaa, sirri cuuɗanaaɗo jamanuuji re'ataa non illa ko ɓooyi. Amma joonin haala kaa wannginaama ngam jeyaaɓe Alla fuu.

Ngam ko Alla anniyi woni anndinde ɓe kanaa *Yahudankooɓe moƴƴere wonnde no suuɗi nder sirri oo. Moƴƴere nde sirri oo wondi woni *Almasiihu no hakkune mooɗon, kanko hokkata tammude naatude Laamu Alla ngaroowu, ngu teddungal.

Filla *Almasiihu oo min mbaajoo. Miɗen pooɗa hakkillo himɓe, miɗen njanngina ɓe ko Alla anndini min fuu, nder ir hikmaaku fuu ngam waddude neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu yeeso Alla, tawee joomum ɓenndi nder kawtal mum he *Almasiihu.
Golle majjum ndurwananmi keddi semmbe e baawɗe *Almasiihu gonɗe no ngolla faa noy walaa nder am.
Miɗo hiɗi anndon durwo manngo ngo ndurwanmi daliila mooɗon, daliila himɓe Lawdikiya he ɓe ngi'aay kam abada.

Ko ndurwananmi woni hidde hawra on, ɓerɗe mooɗon cemmbiɗaa, ngam nii watta ko keɓon barke mawɗe keɓeteeɗe har anndal goonga e goonga. Anndon sirri Alla oo, kam woni anndon ko *Almasiihu he hoore mum woni sirri oo.
Kanko *Almasiihu oon duu tan woni baawɗo hokkude on hikmaaku e anndal kuuɓungal dow hoore mum.
Ko waɗi miɗo haalana on ɗum woni to goɗɗo hiilir on haalaaji belɗi.
Ngam baa nii ko miɗo woɗɗi, hakkillo am no he mooɗon. Miɗo nana belɗum hi'ude narral gonngal hakkune mooɗon, he no peŋoriɗon he goonɗinde *Almasiihu.
Ko nii waɗi on njaɓi Iisa *Almasiihu woni Joomiraawo mooɗon, ndenne sey tinnoɗon tokkon mo.
Tinnee tefee semmbe mooɗon fuu nder kawtal mooɗon he makko, cinngon mbuurnam mooɗon fuu dow makko. Tittinkinoɗon nder goonɗinde mo hano no min ekkintiniri on, njetton Alla wakkati fuu.

Tinnee to neɗɗo fuu wattu anndal mum feere'al gom hiila on, woɗɗina on laawol goonga. Iri anndal ngaal walaa ko nafirta, nde hanaa majjinde himɓe. Iri anndal ngaal ƴuwaay to *Almasiihu, ngal finaa-tawaa himɓe e dabareeji ginni marɗi baawɗe duuniyaaru.
Ko woni he Alla fuu no hi'ee he *Almasiihu.
Kanko woni hooreejo laamu fuu e baawɗe fuu. Onon duu, nder kawtal mooɗon he makko mbuurnam mooɗon fuu huuɓi.
Kawtal mooɗon he *Almasiihu waɗi njuulneɗon, juulnol ngool hanaa iri ngol neɗɗo waɗataa. Amma juulnol ngool woni ngol *Almasiihu waɗani on, juulnol ittoowol giɗaale ɓerne he mooɗon.
Nder gaɗol *batisma mooɗon, hano nii on ufidaama he *Almasiihu, on ummitidake he makko ngam on ngoonɗini baawɗe Alla ummintinɗo mo.
Ndenno on maaynooɓe ngam hakkeeji mooɗon he ngam on kanaa himɓe Alla. Amma joonin Alla wattii mbuurnam mum nder mooɗon har kawtal mooɗon he *Almasiihu, o yaafi hakke meeɗen fuu.
O moyti ko winndaa nder ɗerol kiite tuumooje en ngol, o itti ɗe wakkati *Almasiihu tontanoo dow *bardugal.
Dow *bardugal ngaal o heɓi jaalorgal dow ginni e baawɗe fuu gonɗe dow e ley. O teeti baawɗe maɓɓe, o semtini ɓe yeeso himɓe fuu.
Ndenne, to neɗɗo fuu felir on ko nyaamton naa ko njarton. To neɗɗo fuu felu on ngam juulɗe naa daarɗe lewru naa ngam *nyalaane fowteteene.
Kujje ɗee fuu no alamaaji kollooji ko waroyta non, amma *Almasiihu woni goonga majje.
Ndenne, to accee cujjidanoowo maleykaaɓe, gaɗoowo hano kam no leesiniiɗo fuu haɗa on jaalorgal. Iri neɗɗo oo, ko hi'i nder koyɗi fiirirta gabaare, miila ko kam no ɓuri neɗɗo fuu.
Iri neɗɗo oo wondaa he *Almasiihu laatiiɗo hooreejo hawriine goonɗinɓe fuu. Tawi duu he Almasiihu hawriine ndeen fuu woni no jokki, no mawna no Alla hiɗiri daliila potal he nanngodirol goonɗinɓe fuu.

On maaydii he *Almasiihu, on ceedi he ginni bonɗi fuu ngonɗi no laamii nder duuniyaaru. Nde nii goonga fuu on ceedi he majji, ndenne ɗume waɗi oɗon ndeki mbuurnam mooɗon fuu dow duuniyaaru hano kayru jeyii on. Ɗume waɗi oɗon tokka tilsinooje jannginooɓe fewreeɓe bi'ooje:
« To meemu, to hooƴu, to meeɗu. »
Iri tilsinooje ɗe kaalataana dow kujje, ɗe ɓooyataa nde ɗe nawtoraama ngam ɗe golle ɓiɓɓe aadama he ekkintinooje mum'en.

He giiɗe himɓe, iɗe nanndi he ko woodi hikmaaku. Iɗe ekkita neɗɗo wattude semmbe mum fuu dow tilsinooje diina. Iɗe ekkintina leesinaaku fewrehu, iɗe ekkintina ekkitol ɓanndu torra. Amma iri tilsinooje ɗee, tilsinooje non laatiiɗe ngalaa fuu nafakka gom nde hanaa humtude giɗaale ɓerne ɓii-aadama.
Ko nii waɗi Alla ummintini on, onon he *Almasiihu, ndenne tefee kujje gonɗe dow kammu to *Almasiihu woni no jooɗii nyaamo Alla.
Ndekee hakkillo mooɗon dow kujje gonɗe dow, to accee kujje duuniyaaru ada hakkillo mooɗon,
ngam on maayɓe, mbuurnam mooɗon kesam duu no suuɗii nder juuɗe *Almasiihu gonɗo hadde Alla.
Nyannde fuu *Almasiihu, mo mbuurnam mooɗon fuu sinngi dow mum wanngi on mbanngidan he makko nder teddungal makko.
Mboppee kujje duuniyaaru fuu gonɗe nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, kam woni mboppee jeenu, golle nyidduɗe, suuno, miilooji bonɗi, e hidde seedere ngam hidde seedere kam duu hano ir dewol tooruure non.
Ngam waɗude ir kujje bonɗe ɗee no jippinan tikkere Alla dow saliiɓe goonɗinde mo.
Onon duu ndenno nii mbuurduɗon.
Amma joonin mboppon kujje ɗee fuu kam woni mboppon ir tikkere fuu, ɓerne ɓaleeraaku, to accee ƴettoore naa haala mbonka wurtoo nder kunndule mooɗon.
To neɗɗo mooɗon fuu fenan banndum, ngam joonin on mboppi jikku mooɗon kinngu he ko ngu gollata,
aduɗon jikku kesu. Alla taguɗo jikku kesu nguun, tinnotoo no heyɗina ngu faa ngu nannda he mum, ngam anndon ɗum no wooɗiri.

Ko nii waɗi on keɓi jikku kesu, ndenne joonin walaa fuu ko feerodiri hakkune mooɗon. Yahudanke he mo hanaa Yahudanke fuu no go'o. Juulnaaɗo he mo juulnaaka fuu no go'o. Walaa ko feerodiri hakkune mo janngaay he neɗɗo ladde, naa ko feerodiri maccuɗo he dimo. Walaa ko feerodirta himɓe ɓee fuu ngam *Almasiihu woni huune fuu, kanko duu woni nder ɓerne goonɗinɗo fuu.
Ko nii waɗi Alla suɓake on, waɗi on seniiɓe, ɓe o hiɗi sanne sanne, ndenne njurmodiree, moƴƴonodiron, leesinoɗon, ɓerɗe mooɗon peewaa, munyon.
Munyodiree, nde nii goɗɗo waɗani banndum gacce, njaafonodiree. Hano no Joomiraawo yaafori on, onon duu njaafodiree hano non.
Nder kujje ɗee fuu, ko ɓuri woni ngiɗodiree, ngam hidde kam haɓɓodirta himɓe fuu faa wooɗa.
Accee jam *Almasiihu dawrana miilooji mooɗon, daliila jam oo waɗi Alla noddi on ngam nanngodiron, laatoɗon terɗe ɓanndu worru, laatoɗon duu jettooɓe mo wakkati fuu.

Accee haala *Almasiihu jooɗo nder ɓerɗe mooɗon faa noy walaa. Neɗɗo mooɗon fuu janngina banndum, neɗɗo mooɗon fuu naforoo anndal he hakkillo hollita banndum. Njettee Alla he ɓerɗe mooɗon fuu. Njimee jimi *Jabuura, jimi teddinooji Joomiraawo he jimi ɗi *Ruuhu Alla hokki on fuu nder ɓerɗe mooɗon.
Huune fuu ko mbaawton haalude naa waɗude, kaalee ɗum naa ngaɗee ɗum dow innde Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen. Ngaɗee ɗum daliila makko, oɗon njetta Alla *Baaba meeɗen.
Onon rewɓe, ɗowtanee goriraaɓe mooɗon hano no tokkuɓe Joomiraawo ngaɗata.
Onon worɓe, onon duu, ngiɗee deekiraaɓe mooɗon, to tinnanee ɓe.
Onon sukaaɓe, ɗowtanee saarooɓe mooɗon nder huune fuu, ngam kanƴum weli Joomiraawo.
Onon saarooɓe, onon duu, to tinnanee sukaaɓe mooɗon faa ɓerɗe maɓɓe metta.
Onon maccuɓe, ɗowtanee joomiraaɓe mooɗon nder huune fuu. Ɗowtanee ɓe hanaa ngam oɗon ley gite maɓɓe, hanaa duu ngam ɓe njetta on. Amma ɗowtanee ɓe he ɓerne worre nder kulal Joomiraawo.
Huune fuu ko ngatton, ngaɗiree ɗum ɓerne lamnde, ngam Joomiraawo ngollanton hanaa goɗɗo ngollanton.
Paamee ko Joomiraawo woni joɓoowo on, on keɓan moƴƴereeji ɗi o resani himɓe makko. *Almasiihu ngollanton hanaa goɗɗo ngollanton.
Gaɗɗo ko boni fuu no jukketee daliila bone mo waɗi, hedran-hedran fuu walaa nder majjum.
Onon rimɓe, njogoree maccuɓe mooɗon jogaaɗe lobbe, to ɓurdinee ɓe. Paamee ko no maccuɗo woodiri joomiiyo non, onon duu ngoodirɗon Joomiraawo gonɗo dow.
Tinnee he du'aa'u, to comee yettude Alla.
Ndu'anee min, minen duu, heɓa Alla omtana min laawol min mbaajoo haala mum kaa. Min mbaawa haalande himɓe dow sirri mo Alla wanngini har Iisa *Almasiihu, mo ngam mum uddaami hannden ley kasu.
Eelee Alla heɓa mi waajoo sirri oo faa laaɓa tar.
Wakkati fuu mo kawruɗon he ɓe ngoonɗinaay, laatee jom'en hikmaaku hakkune maɓɓe. Nawtoree he wakkati mo o hokki on.
Accee duu haala mooɗon laatoo wakkati fuu haala pewnooka ɓerne, haala lamsuka, ngam keɓon no nootoriɗon gooto maɓɓe fuu.
Tikikus, banndii'en korsuɗo, kolniiɗo ley golle Joomiraawo, gollidoowo he am waran itta kumpa mooɗon dow am.
Ko waɗi lilumoomi he mooɗon woni o famtina on no min ngorri, heɓa hakkillooji mooɗon pukko.
O wardan he Onesimus, ɓii-leydi mooɗon. Banndii'en korsuɗo, mo min kooli sanne. Kamɓe ɗiɗo, ɓe ngaran ɓe kumpita on dow ko woni no waɗa ɗo fuu.
Markus denɗu Barnabas mo mbi'unoomi nde wari to mooɗon njaɓɓoɗon ɗum, no yewta on. Aristarkus uddidaaɗo he am, kam duu no yewta on.
Iisa noddirteeɗo Yustus duu no yewta on. Kamɓe tan ngoni *Yahudankooɓe gollidooɓe he am dow habaru Laamu Alla. Ɓe cemmbinɗinii kam sanne.
Epafaras, gollanoowo Iisa *Almasiihu, no yewta on. Kanko duu o ɓii-leydi mooɗon. Wakkati fuu omo tinni he du'aa'u ngam ndartoɗon, laatoɗon huuɓuɓe, waɗooɓe ko Alla hiɗi.
Miin he hoore am mi seedake, mi hi'i no o woni omo tampana on, no o woni omo tampana himɓe Lawdikiya he himɓe Hiyerapolis.
Demas he Luka, lokotoroojo mo min korsini, no njewta on.
Miɗen njewta banndiraaɓe wonɓe Lawdikiya fuu, miɗen njewta Nimfa he hawriine goonɗinɓe hawroore nder suudu makko.
Nde nii on njanngi ɗerol ngool, lildee ngol hawriine goonɗinɓe Lawdikiya ngam kamɓe duu ɓe njannga ngol. Onon duu, njanngee ɗerol, ngol goonɗinɓe wonɓe Lawdikiya lildoyta on.
Mbi'ee Arkipus durwa humna golle ɗe Joomiraawo halfini ɗum ɗeen.
Miin Pol he junngo am mbinndanmi on cannooje ɗee. Nder kasu ngonmi, to njeggitee ndu'anoɗon kam. Moƴƴere Alla wonda he mooɗon !

Miin Pol, Silas he Timote kawri mbinndani on ɗerol ngool, onon jeyaaɓe Alla *Baabiraawo e Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen. Onon hawriine goonɗinɓe Iisa *Almasiihu wonnde huɓeere Tesalonika, jam e moƴƴere Alla wonda he mooɗon.
Miɗen njetta Alla wakkati fuu ngam mooɗon, on fuu. Miɗen miccitoo he mooɗon wakkati fuu nder du'aa'u amin.

Yeeso Alla *Baabiraawo meeɗen, miɗen miccitoo wakkati fuu he golle goonɗinol mooɗon. Miɗen miccitoo he tittinkinaaku mooɗon manngu ngu ngatton nder hidde. Miɗen miccitoo no tiɓinoriɗon sanne sanne tammude mooɗon dow Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
Banndiraaɓe, miɗen anndi ko Alla no hiɗi on. O suɓake on duu o wartiri on jeyaaɓe makko,

ngam *Habaru lobbo mo min ngaddani on oo, wardaay haala ɓola tan. Amma o wardidaana baawɗe, *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo he tammude mawne nde wondaa sikka fuu. Kaden on tabbintini ko habaru oo no goonga. Oɗon anndi no min njooɗori hakkune mooɗon ngam nafude on.
On nyemmini min, on nyemmini Joomiraawo meeɗen duu ngam on njaɓɓake haala Alla nder torraaji mawɗi, on njaɓɓorake ka duu belɗum ɓerne mo *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo hokkata.
Nii ngaɗon ko laataniiɗon goonɗinɓe wonɓe nder leyɗe Makedoniya he Akaya fuu ko ƴeewetee ekkitee.
Ngam to mooɗon haala Joomiraawo fuɗɗirii faa ka yottowi nder leyɗe Makedoniya e Akaya. Filla goonɗinol mooɗon dow Alla nanaama nokkuuje ɗee fuu, ndenne fotaay min njeccoo.
Himɓe he ko'e mum'en ngoni no kaala dow no njaɓɓoriɗon min, dow no mboppirɗon tooruuje mooɗon, ngartuɗon he Alla, Alla goongaajo, duumiiɗo, ngaɗuɗon ko'e mooɗon maccuɓe makko,
oɗon keɗi gartol Ɓiyiiko ƴuwde dow kammu, Iisa *Almasiihu ummintinaaɗo he maayde, kisinoowo en he tikkere Alla waroore.
Banndiraaɓe, onon he ko'e mooɗon, oɗon anndi ko taɓɓitaaki mooɗon ki ngaɗanɗon min laataaki meere.
Fadde amin warde to mooɗon, min torraama, min njennaama nder huɓeere Filipi. Amma Alla hokki min semmbe waajaade *Habaru mum lobbo he cuusal hakkune mooɗon baa nii ko himɓe heewɓe no he haɗude ɗum.
Ngam waaju amin tiigaaki dow fewre, ko boni naa hiila gom fuu tawaaka nder ɓerɗe amin.
Amma ngam Alla etii ɓerɗe amin daari, halfini min waaju *Habaru mum lobbo, ndenne miɗen mbaajoo mo, hanaa ngam welude himɓe amma ngam welude Alla etoowo ɓerɗe himɓe.
Oɗon anndi ko waaju amin hanaa filla mbelirka ɗemngal non, non duu Alla no seedi, min cuuɗaay suuno njawdi fuu nder ɓerɗe amin.
Min ngalaa miɗen tefa himɓe teddina min, min tefaay teddinon min, min tefataa woɓɓe duu teddina min.
Baa nii ko miɗen mbaawnoo dekude teddirka amin dow mooɗon ngam min *lilaaɓe *Almasiihu, min ngaɗaay ɗum. Wakkati min ngondunoo he mooɗon, min kakkilake he mooɗon hano no inna hakkilorto ɓiyum.
Miɗen korsini on sanne, ngam majjum waɗi min ciryinoo waddande on *Habaru lobbo, hanaa *Habaru lobbo oon tan, min ciryakeno duu mursude yonkiiji amin ngam mooɗon ngam oɗon korsi he amin.

Banndiraaɓe, wakkati min mbaajotonoo *Habaru lobbo ƴuwɗo to Alla hakkune mooɗon, oɗon miccitoo golle ɗe min ngolli he tampiri ndi min ngi'ii. Jemma e nyalooma, miɗen nder golle ngam to min tilsin neɗɗo mooɗon fuu.
Onon goonɗinɓe, on ngi'irii gite mooɗon, Alla duu no seedi ko min kolli jikku lobbu hakkune mooɗon, on fuu, min kolli on dartinaaku, walaa ko goɗɗo waawi felirde min.
Oɗon anndi duu ko min ngaɗanii on keddi baawɗe ɗe baaba waawi waɗande ɓiyum.
Min kolliti on, min cemmbinɗini on, min eeli on mbuurdon no weliri Alla nodduɗo on, ngaron naaton nder laamu he nder teddungal mum.

Daliila gom nii kaden mo ngam mum miɗen njetta Alla wakkati fuu. Daliila oo woni wakkati ngoonɗinɗon haala Alla, haala ka min mbaajii on, on adaay ka hano huune ƴuwne to ɓii-aadama amma on adi ka hano ko ƴuwi to Alla. Tabbat haala kaa, ka ƴuwka to Alla, kanka duu woni no golla nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, onon goonɗinɓe.

Banndiraaɓe, on nyemminii kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Alla, tokkuɗe Iisa *Almasiihu gonɗe nder Yahudiya. On njari torra nder juuɗe lenyi mooɗon, hano no kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe Yahudiya njariri torra ngam *Yahudankooɓe.
*Yahudankooɓe mbari Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen he annabiiɓe gom. Kamɓe duu torri min, minen he ko'e amin. Waɗude ko welata Alla adaay hakkillooji maɓɓe, ɓe wayɓe himɓe fuu.

Iɓe kaɗa min waajaade *Habaru lobbo hakkune lenyi ɗi kanaa *Yahudankooɓe ngam to ɗi keɓu kisinam. Nii ɓe ngaɗata, iɓe kebbinira eterɗe maɓɓe hakke wakkati fuu. Amma ko sakitii, borondi Alla saami dow maɓɓe.
Banndiraaɓe, en ngaɗii wakkati ko en ngiidaay. On mboɗɗake gite amin amma on mboɗɗaaki ɓerɗe amin. Miɗen ngiɗi sanne wartude tuntaade on, min ndurwi ngam majjum keddi semmbe amin.
Miɗen ngiɗi warde to mooɗon. Nde goonga, miin Pol, mi tefiino kile keewɗe warde to mooɗon, amma Seyɗan haɗii min.
Dow moy'en tammude amin woni? Moy'en ngoni belɗum ɓerɗe amin? Moy'en min piyirta gabaare yeeso Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen, nyannde fuu o warti, nde hanaa onon?
Nde goonga onon ngoni teddungal amin, onon ngoni belɗum ɓerne amin.
Ko nii waɗi min mbaawaa munyude min ngi'aay on, min mbaawaay warde to mooɗon duu sey min ngi'ii ko ɓuri wooɗude woni min njooɗoo huɓeere Ateena, minen tan.
Nden min lili Timote banndii'en, gollanoowo Alla, baajotooɗo *Habaru lobbo, filla Iisa *Almasiihu, ngam o semmbinɗina on nder goonɗinol mooɗon.
O semmbinɗina on ngam torraaji mooɗon ɗii, heɓa to neɗɗo mooɗon fuu accu torra kaan jaaloo ɗum. Onon he ko'e mooɗon, oɗon anndi ko kujje ɗee fuu podaama ngam meeɗen.
Oɗon anndi ɗum ngam wakkati min ngonnoo hadde mooɗon, walaa ko min cuuɗi on. Min kaalani on, ko en fuu en torretee. Non duu waɗi, oɗon anndani ɗum.
Mi waawaa munyi waɗi lilumi Timote tuntowoo on ngam mi faama no ngontirɗon nder goonɗinol mooɗon. Miɗo hula to tawee Cii'otooɗo oon jaalake on, golle amin laatoo meere.

Amma jooni ko Timote wari ƴuwi to mooɗon, o waddani min habaru belɗo. O yottinii to amin habaru goonɗinol mooɗon he hidde mooɗon. O haalanii min duu ko oɗon miccitoo he amin. On njewni min sanne hano no minen duu min njewniri on.
Ngam majjum waɗi banndiraaɓe, habaru goonɗinol mooɗon semmbinɗini ɓerɗe amin nder torra he nder ɓillaare amin.
Jooni no ndaroriɗon nder kawtal mooɗon he Joomiraawo, hokki min semmbe mbuurnam.
Iri yettoore ndeye min mbaawi waɗande Alla daliila mooɗon, he daliila welwelo ngo min nani yeeso Joomiraawo meeɗen.
Jemma e nyalooma miɗen eela Alla laawol fottude he mooɗon ngam min kumna ko jacci nder goonɗinol mooɗon.
Joonin miɗen eela Alla *Baabiraawo meeɗen he Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen fiirtana min laawol warde tuntowaade on.
Min eeli Joomiraawo ɓeyda hidde faa noy walaa hakkune mooɗon, ngiɗodiron, ngiɗon himɓe fuu hano no min ngiɗiri on.
Mi eeli Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen semmbinɗina on, laatoɗon himɓe ɓe ngalaa fuu ko jancirtee, himɓe seniiɓe yeeso Alla *Baabiraawo meeɗen nder wakkati mo o wardata he seniiɓe makko. Aamiin !

Banndiraaɓe, ko min ngiɗi hollitidde he eelude on woni ngam barke Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen mbuuree mbuurnam mbelɗam Alla hano no min njannginiri on ɗum. Baa nii ko oɗon ngaɗa ir mbuurnam ɗaam, tittinkinee ɓeydon yahde yeeso nder majjam.
Tabbat oɗon anndi kollitooje ƴuwɗe to Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen ɗe min ngaɗani on.
Ko Alla hiɗi woni senaare mooɗon, faddaade ko'e mooɗon yahde he jeenu.
Neɗɗo mooɗon fuu waawa hoore mum ngam wuurdude senaare he darja.
To neɗɗo mooɗon fuu tokku giɗaale ɓerne mum hano mo anndaa Alla tokkiri muuyɗe ɓerne mum.
To baa gooto mooɗon bonnu ɓerne banndum naa jammboo ɗum, ngam Joomiraawo woni kiitotooɗo waɗooɓe ir kujje ɗee hano no illa arannde min kaalirannoo on ɗum wakkati mo min pooɗannoo hakkillooji mooɗon.
Alla noddaay en ngam njooɗoɗen nder waɗude ko nyiddinii amma o noddaana en na ngam mbuuren nder senaare.
Ndenne, neɗɗo fuu salii ko wi'a ɗum, hanaa bi'uɗo ɗum joomum salii, amma Alla kokkuɗo on *Ruuhu mum Ceniiɗo joomum salii.
Har ko daarata giɗodirol hakkune mooɗon on kaajaaka kolliteɗon, ngam onon he ko'e mooɗon, Alla anndini on no ngiɗodirton.
Miɗen anndi oɗon ngoodani banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe tawaaɓe nder leydi Makedoniya fuu hidde. Banndiraaɓe, miɗen eela on ɓeydon yahde yeeso nder hiɗodirde.
Ndurwee njooɗoɗon nder jam, kinnoɗon he harakaaji mooɗon. Neɗɗo mooɗon fuu wuurda semmbe mum, hano no min mbi'irnoo on ɗum.
Nde nii on mbuurdirii nii, on laatoto heƴuɓe ko'e mum'en, teddinteeɓe hakkune ɓe ngoonɗinaay.
Banndiraaɓe, ngam to hakkillooji mooɗon ummoo hano ɓe ngalaa fuu tammude gom, miɗen ngiɗi paamon goonga e goonga huune fuu ko wi'aa dow maayɓe.
Nde nii en ngoonɗini maayde e ummitaaki Iisa *Almasiihu, ndenne en ngoonɗinan duu ko sikka fuu walaa Alla ummintinan goonɗinɓe Iisa *Almasiihu maayɓe, wadda ɓe to makko.
Miɗen kaalana on haala ƴuwka to Joomiraawo miɗen mbi'a, enen gi'ooɓe gartol Iisa *Almasiihu, en artataa ɓoynooɓe maayde ummitaade.
Daane mawɗo maleykaaɓe nanetee, daane luwal Alla, nden Joomiraawo he hoore mum jippoo, ƴuwa dow kammu. Maayɓe no goonɗinɓe artee umminee,
nden enen laatiiɓe wuurɓe ɓeen duu adeɗen, enen he maɓɓe sey dow duule ngam potten he Joomiraawo, ngonden he makko faa abada abadin.
Ndenne, cemmbinɗinodiree he haalaaji ɗii.
Banndiraaɓe, har ko daarata gartol Joomiraawo meeɗen fotaay mbinndaneɗon dow nyalaane he wakkati mum.
Onon he ko'e mooɗon oɗon anndi ko nyalaane Joomiraawo no juha neɗɗo hano no gujjo juhirta neɗɗo jemma.
Wakkati himɓe mbi'ata: « Jam e sago », nden balaa'u juhata saama dow maɓɓe hano no ŋatawere juhirta caawɗo. Ɓe mbaawaa daɗi baa seɗɗa.
Amma banndiraaɓe, onon on ngalaa nder nimre, ndenne nyalaane ndeen waawaa juhi on hano no gujjo moloto juha neɗɗo.
On fuu, on ɓiɓɓe jeyngol, jeyngol nyalooma. En ƴuwaay he jemma, en ƴuwaay duu he nimre.
Ndenne, to en ɗaano hano ɓeeto, amma en peertu gite meeɗen nanngen ko'e meeɗen.
Ngam ɗaanotooɓe jemma ɗaanoto, yarooɓe faa ko'e mum'en copto duu jemma njarta.
Amma enen en himɓe nyalooma non. Ndenne mbaawen ko'e meeɗen, ngatten goonɗinol he hidde laatanoo en toggoore njamndi, tammude kisinam duu laatoo hufuneere meeɗen konu.
Alla fodanaaki en tikkere mum, ko o fodani en woni keɓol kisinam daliila Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
Iisa *Almasiihu mursi yonki mum ngam meeɗen, heɓa baa nde nii tawaama en maayɓe naa en wuurɓe tawee eɗen ngondi he makko.
Ndenne cemmbinɗinodiree, mballodiree nder yaadu yeeso hakkune mooɗon hano no ngonɗon oɗon ngaɗa.
Banndiraaɓe, miɗen eela on teddinon tittinkiniiɓe no ngollana Joomiraawo hakkune mooɗon, wonɓe no ardo on, wonɓe no kollita on.
Teddinon ɓe sanne, kollee ɓe hidde ngam golle maɓɓe. Hakkillo fukkiingo duuma hakkune mooɗon.
Ngaɗee kaseeta he janɗo, cemmbinɗinon ɓe ɓerɗe mum'en keli, mballee ɓe ngalaa baawɗe. Mbaawee munyal neɗɗo maɓɓe fuu.
Tinnoɗon to baa gooto mooɗon yoptoro gacce he gacce. Amma wakkati fuu tittinkinee nder gaɗol ko wooɗi hakkune mooɗon he hakkune himɓe fuu.
Accee welwelo jooɗo wakkati fuu hakkune mooɗon,
ndu'oɗon wakkati fuu,
njetton Alla nder ko wari he mooɗon fuu. Ɗum Alla doomiri on nder kawtal mooɗon he Iisa *Almasiihu.
To kaɗee *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo waɗa golle mum hakkune mooɗon.
To njawee haalaaji annabaaku,
amma taykee huune fuu, adon ko wooɗi nder majjum,
mboɗɗoɗon bone no wa'i fuu.

Alla jom jam he hoore mum, wartira on senngo ngam hoore mum, reena neɗɗo mooɗon fuu, o reena ɓerne, yonki, e ɓanndu neɗɗo mooɗon ngam laatoɗon ɓe ngalaa fuu feloore gom nyannde gartol Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
Alla nodduɗo on no kolniiɗo, sikka fuu walaa duu o tabbintinan ɗum.
Banndiraaɓe, ndu'anee min.
Njottinee sannoore amin to banndiraaɓe meeɗen nder hidde.
Mi eelii on ngam barke Joomiraawo, njanngee ɗerol ngool hakkune banndiraaɓe meeɗen fuu.
Moƴƴere Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen wonda he mooɗon.
Ɗerol ngool ƴuwi to am, miin Pol, Silas e Timote. Miɗen njewta hawriine goonɗinɓe wonnde Tesalonika, jeyaaɓe Alla *Baabiraawo meeɗen e Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo.
Alla *Baabiraawo meeɗen he Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo barkin on, hokka on jam e moƴƴere.

Banndiraaɓe amin goonɗinɓe, no tilsi min njetta Alla wakkati fuu ngam mooɗon. No haani min njetta mo, ngam goonɗinol mooɗon no he yahde yeeso, kaden hidde wonnde hakkune mooɗon kam duu no he yahde yeeso.

Daliila kujje ɗee waɗi miɗen mbi'a nder kawriiɗe goonɗinɓe ko min nani belɗum mooɗon faa noy walaa. Miɗen mbi'a ɓe ɗum daliila munyal e goonɗinol mooɗon ngol kolluɗon nder torra e ɓillaare fuu nde tawaɗon nder mum.

Munyal mooɗon ngaal he goonɗinol mooɗon ngool ngoni seeda ko kiite Alla ngalaa fuu hedran-hedran. Ɗum duu no holla ko Alla waɗi neɗɗo mooɗon fuu potuɗo naatude nder laamu mum, laamu ngu ngonɗon oɗon torree ngam mum.
Sikka fuu walaa Alla no dartiiɗo, wonɓe no torra on ɓeen, o torran ɓe kamɓe duu ngam yoptanaade on.

Amma onon wonɓe no torree joonin ɓee, en fuu, minen he mooɗon, o hokkowan en powtiri nyannde Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen wanngata nder ɗemle hiite, wara ƴuwa dow, kanko he maleykaaɓe makko jom'en baawɗe.
Iisa *Almasiihu nde wari, jukkan saliiɓe anndude Alla he saliiɓe tokkude ko waajaa dow *Habaru lobbo filla Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
O torra ɓe torra ka hantataa faa abada, ɓe mboɗɗinee yeeso Joomiraawo e teddungal mum manngal.
Ɗum waɗowan nder wakkati mo Iisa *Almasiihu wartoyta, jeyaaɓe makko fuu teddinan mo, goonɗinɓe mo fuu, o wela ɓe sanne. On tawetee hakkune maɓɓe ngam on ngoonɗini waaju mo min ngaɗani on.

On tawetee hakkune maɓɓe, ngam majjum waɗi, miɗen ndu'anoo on wakkati fuu. Miɗen eela Alla mo ndewuɗen waɗa on fotuɓe heɓude mbuurnam ɗam o noddini on ɗam. Miɗen eela Alla nder baawɗe mum wallan on kumnon anniya mooɗon lobbo fuu e gollal ngal naatuɗon fuu daliila goonɗinol mooɗon.
Nii waɗata ko innde Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen teddaa hakkune mooɗon, keɓon teddungal to makko daliila moƴƴere Alla meeɗen he daliila moƴƴere makko, kanko Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.
Banndiraaɓe, har ko daarata gartol Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen he kawrol meeɗen to makko, miɗen mbi'a on

to accee hakkillooji mooɗon ummilawo ngam goɗɗo wi'i on nyalaane gartol Joomiraawo yottake. To kulee baa se goɗɗo wi'i on kam nani ɗum nder annabaaku gom, naa nde goɗɗo waajake ɗum, naa nde joomum wi'i minen mbinndi ɗum mbi'i.
To accee neɗɗo fuu hiilira on laawol ngool hen non fuu, ngam nyalaane garki kiin warataa nde hanaa wakkati mo himɓe heewɓe murtata he Alla oon waru non, bonɗo podanaaɗo halkere oon duu wanngaa.
Bonɗo oo no ganyo Alla, o mawninan hoore makko ɓurde ko rewetee fuu, naa ko sujidantee fuu, faa o jooɗowoo nder suudu Alla, omo wi'a ko kanko e hoore makko o Alla.
Wakkati mo ngondunoomi he mooɗon, miɗo haalanannoo on ɗum. Oɗon miccitoo naa?
Oɗon anndi joonin ko faddii bonɗo oo, ko faddii mo o wannga illa wakkati makko waraay.
Bonɗo oo baawɗe mum no ɗon no golla nder cuccukka. Amma gonɗo no faddoo ɗe oon tinnotoo no faddoo ɗe sey nyannde o sottinaa to o woni. Nyannde fuu o sottinaa,
nyannde mum bonɗo oo wanngata. Amma wakkati Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen warti, o wattan foofaango hunnduko makko o wara bonɗo oo, o watta teddungal garki makko o sankita bonɗo oon.
Wakkati bonɗo oo warta, o wardan baawɗe Ibiliisa. O waɗan kujje fewreeje kaayɗiniiɗe, o waɗan alamaaji ɗi kanaa goonga. O waɗan dobo-dobooji ngam majjinde himɓe.
O golliran huune fuu ko waawi eytude neɗɗo ngam majjinde kalkuɗo fuu. Himɓe no kalka ngam ɓe calake hiɗude goonga baawɗo hisinde ɓe.
Ngam majjum waɗi, Alla lildi majjere mawne he maɓɓe, ngam ɓe ngoonɗina pene bonɗo oon.
Alla lildi majjere ndeen duu he maɓɓe ngam hiitaade nanuɓe belɗum gaɗol golle bonɗe, calii goonɗinde goonga oon.

Banndiraaɓe horsuɓe he Joomiraawo, daliila mooɗon miɗen kaani yettude Alla wakkati fuu, onon Alla artii suɓii ngam hisinde on. On kisuɓe duu ngam *Ruuhu Ceniiɗo waɗii on seniiɓe. On kisuɓe ngam on ngoonɗinii goonga oon.
Daliila kisinam ɗaam waɗi Alla noddi on har waaju amin mo min mbaajii dow *Habaru lobbo. O noddii on ngam keɓon mbaka nder teddungal Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen.

Ndenne banndiraaɓe, kakkinkinee ko ngoonɗinton, tiɓinoɗon no wooɗiri ekkintinooje ɗe min ekkintini on he kunndule amin he ɗe min mbinndani on. To accee ekkintinol kesol gom fuu wara ada hakkilo mooɗon.
Mi eelii Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen he hoore mum, mi eelii Alla *Baabiraawo meeɗen, giɗuɗo en, moƴƴani en, fewni ɓerɗe meeɗen faa abada, hokki en tammude lobbere.
Mi eeli ɓe, ɓe pewna ɓerɗe mooɗon. Ɓe kebbina ɗe semmbe nder ko ngatton fuu he nder ko kaaloton fuu ngam ɗum laatoo ko wooɗi.
Banndiraaɓe, ndenne ko mbi'anmi on woni ndu'anee min. Ndu'ee ngam *Habaru lobbo filla Joomiraawo sankitoo law nder nokkuuje keewɗe. Ndu'ee o teddinee hano no teddinirɗon mo.
Ndu'anoɗon min duu, min kisa bonɓe gollooɓe ko wooɗaa, ngam hanaa himɓe fuu ngoonɗini.
Joomiraawo no kolniiɗo, o semmbinɗinan on, o hiina on sarri bonɗo oon.
Joomiraawo waɗi ko miɗen koolii, ko oɗon tokki hannden he ko jaaŋo duu, on tokkan tilsinooje ɗe min kokki on.
Mi eelii Joomiraawo huybita ɓerɗe mooɗon har hidde Alla, ɗe keewa tittinkinaaku hano no *Almasiihu heewiri tittinkinaaku.
Banndiraaɓe, miɗen mbi'a on ngam barke Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen, mboɗɗee banndiraaɓe meeɗen jaayɓe, saliiɓe waaju mo nanuɗon to amin.
Onon he ko'e mooɗon, oɗon anndi no nyemnirton min, ngam wakkati min ngondunoo he mooɗon on ngi'aay jaayre fuu he amin.
Walaa fuu mo min eeli hokka min nyaamdu. Jemma e nyalooma miɗen nder jaggu ngam to min laatanoo neɗɗo mooɗon fuu donngal.
Miɗen ngoodi laawol tilsinde on, adon donngal amin, amma min ngaɗaay ɗum, ngam min laatanoo on ko ƴeewetee ekkitee.
Baa nii wakkati min ngondunoo he mooɗon, miɗen kaalana on miɗen mbi'a caliiɗo gollude fuu, to nyamnee.
Min mbi'iino on ɗum ngam min nani no wi'ee ko yanɓe no tawa hakkune mooɗon, yanɓe ɓee ngalaa fuu ko keedani se hanaa naatude nder ko walanaa ɓe.
Too, iri himɓe ɓee, miɗen kollita ɓe miɗen mbi'a ngam barke Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen no tilsi ɓe ngiɗa gollal, ɓe ngolla golle kaanuɗe, ɓe mbuurda semmbe maɓɓe.
Banndiraaɓe, to comee waɗude ko wooɗi.
Nde nii no woodi caliiɗo tokkude ko min kaali nder ɗerol ngool, kollee mo himɓe, ngatton mo furyer, ngam semteene nannga mo.
To adee joomum hano ganyo, amma kollitee mo hano o banndii'on.
Mi eeli Joomiraawo jom jam, hokka on jam wakkati fuu he nder huune fuu. Joomiraawo wonda he mooɗon, on fuu.
Miin Pol he junngo am, winndi sannoore ndee yahde he mooɗon. Binndol sannoore ndee duu woni seeda am taweteeɗo nder ɗereeji ɗi mbinndumi fuu.
Moƴƴere Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen wonda he mooɗon, on fuu.
Ɗerol ngool ƴuwi to Pol, lilaaɗo Iisa *Almasiihu dow tilsinoore Alla Kisinoowo he Iisa *Almasiihu mo ngattuɗen gokka meeɗen he mum,
yahde to Timote suka am goongaajo nder goonɗinol. Alla *Baabiraawo, he Iisa *Almasiihu Kisinoowo meeɗen moƴƴane, yurme, hokke jam.
Wakkati njahannoomi nder leydi Makedoniya mi ŋaarake ma njooɗoɗaa nder huɓeere Efeesu ngam kaɗaa himɓe gom njanngina laabi oonyiiɗi.

Ɓe itta hakkillo maɓɓe he taale-taaleeji, he limtol jippotooɓe he annabiiɓe ngol re'ataa. Ngam ir miilooji ɗii pooɗataana haalaaji ir iriiji ɗi nafataa en baa seɗɗa nder siri kisinol ngol Alla fodani en nder goonɗinol.
Ko kaɗol ngool hiɗi hollude woni tefude hidde ƴuwoore nder ɓerne laaɓune, miilo dartiingo, he goonɗinol goonga e goonga.
Himɓe gom njoofii laawol meeɗen, ɓe kalki nder haalaaji meereeji.
Iɓe ada ko'e maɓɓe jannginooɓe *Tawreeta, amma ɓe anndaa ko ɓe ngoni iɓe mbi'a he ko ɓe piirata gabaare.
Eɗen anndi ko *Tawreeta no wooɗi amma say se golliraama laabi mum.
Paamen ko *Tawreeta darnaaka ngam gollooɓe ko dartii amma o waɗaama ngam bonɓe, murtuɓe, pamtinooɓe Alla, waɗooɓe hakke, ɓe teddintaa Alla he ko senii fuu, warooɓe inna he baaba, ittooɓe yonki,
yeenooɓe, luutankooɓe, sonnooɓe maccuɓe, fenooɓe, hunotooɓe dow fewre, kamɓe e waɗooɓe ko jannginoore goongaare wi'aay.
Jannde ndee no yahda he *Habaru lobbo mo kalfinaami, ƴuwɗo to Alla tedduɗo, kanko woni wuddu barke.
Miɗo yetta Iisa *Almasiihu Joomi'en kokkuɗo kam baawɗe humnude golle makko. O hoolake kam ngam o suɓake kam mi ngollana mo.
Baa ko ndenno mi bonniino innde makko, torrumi himɓe makko, njennumoomi, amma jooni o yurmake kam ngam wakkati mum nder jahillaaku tawanoomi, mi hanaa goonɗinɗo.
Joomiraawo meeɗen jippini moƴƴere mum nde walaa keerol dow am. O funni nder am goonɗinol e hidde, ɗum fuu tawaama nder kawtal ngam Iisa *Almasiihu.
Haala kaa no hoolnii, sikka fuu walaa ika haani jaɓeede: « Iisa *Almasiihu wari nder duuniyaaru ngam hisina waɗooɓe hakke. » Miin e hoore am, miɗo tawaa nder maɓɓe, mi waɗi ko jaasi ɓe.

Amma Alla yurmake kam, miin jaasuɗo waɗooɓe hakke. Ngam majjum waɗi Iisa *Almasiihu hiɗi hollude kam munyal mum manngal heɓa mi laatoo goonɗinɗo ƴeeweteeɗo ekkitee ngam hi'uɓe ekkiti keɓa mbuurnam nduumiiɗam.
Alla Joomiraawo no gooto, oo laamiiɗo duumiiɗo. Buurɗo wakkati fuu mo hi'ataake. Teddungal e darja laatanoo mo faa abada abadin. Aamiin !
Suka am Timote, mi halfinte hollitoore ndee, inde yahda he annabaaku ngaɗanoongu dow maa: Tiiga dow haalaaji ɗii, durwa durwo manngo.
Durwira goonɗinol, he miilo dartiingo ngo himɓe gom tokkaay faa goonɗinol maɓɓe yoolii.
Nder himɓe ɓeen ɗon Himene e Skandaaru ngoni, mi accidii ɓe he Seyɗan ngam to ɓe pilloo soɓude Alla.
Arannde nii miɗo ŋaarake on ndu'anee himɓe fuu, eelanon ɓe Alla, cawrinon mo ngam maɓɓe, njetton mo duu.
Ndu'anee laamiiɓe, ndu'anee neɗɗo fuu gonɗo nder nokkuuje dawrirɗe heɓa mbuuren nder jam, hakkillo fukkiingo, ndimaaku, he wondude Alla he ɓerne worre.
Ɗum woni ko wooɗi ko welata Alla Kisinoowo meeɗen,
giɗɗo neɗɗo fuu hisa, annda goonga.
Ngam Alla no gooto, neɗɗo gooto duu woni baawɗo wartirde potal hakkune himɓe he makko, kanko woni Iisa *Almasiihu
mursuɗo yonki mum ngam yoɓude nyamaane hakke men. Kanƴum woni ceedaaku ngu Iisa waɗi nder wakkati mo Alla darni.
Ngam majjum ngaɗaami baajotooɗo e lilaaɗo heɓa mi faamina ɓe kanaa *Yahudankooɓe ko woni goonɗinol goongaawol. Mi fenataa, goonga kaalanmi.
Ngam majjum waɗi miɗo hiɗi nokku fuu to worɓe ndu'otoo, ɓe ɓantira juuɗe maɓɓe dow he ɓerɗe laaɓuɗe, tawee tikkere e jeddodirol fuu walaa.
Miɗo hiɗi rewɓe duu ɓornoo kolte kaanduɗe ɓorneede, no ɗum ɓuri hoyande ɓe. To ɓe peɗoo, ɓe mooro morɗi caadiiɗi, ɓe ngatta kanŋe naa jamɗe dime naa kolte caadiiɗe
amma ɓe ngaɗa golle lobbe hano ir rewɓe teddinooɓe Alla he ɓerne worre.
Wakkati waaju, debbo fuu nannga hunnduko mum, jogoo mo nder ɓerne mum, he nder leesinaaku.
Mi hokkaay debbo fuu laawol janngina worɓe naa heɓa baawɗe dow maɓɓe. Amma o tiiɗa he hunnduko makko,
ngam Aadamu artii Haawa tageede.
Hanaa Aadamu woni eytaaɗo, amma deekiiko Haawa eytaa, murti he tilsinoore Alla.
Amma rewɓe no kisintee wakkati ɓe keɓi ɓiɓɓe, nde nii ɓe tittinkinake nder goonɗinol maɓɓe, nder hidde he nder mbuurnam ceniiɗam he leesinaaku.
Ndaa haala gasuka nii: « Giɗɗo laatoo ardiiɗo nder hawriine goonɗinɓe hiɗa golle lobbe. »
Ardiiɗo oo no haani laatoo neɗɗo mo walaa fuu feloore, gorko mo debbo gooto, dawranoowo hoore mum, gaɗoowo mbuurnam mum no haandiri, bernoowo weerɓe, tawee omo waawii jannginde duu.
O haandaa laataade jaroowo naa kaɓeteeɗo. Amma omo haani laataade neɗɗo giɗɗo himɓe, jom jam, mo seedeere adaay hakkillo mum,
baawɗo hakkilaade he wuro mum no wooɗiri, mo ɓiɓɓe mum duu martantoo nder ndimaaku manngu.
Ngam noy neɗɗo mo jogaaki wuro mum no wooɗiri waawirta hakkilaade he hawriine goonɗinɓe Alla?
Neɗɗo oo duu to laatoo goonɗinɗo keso, se hanaa non omo waawi mawnitaade, ɗum waɗan o hiitee hano no Seyɗan hiitoraa nii.
Omo haani laataade jom jikku ngasungu heɓa o teddinee hakkune ɓe ngoonɗinaay ngam to o famɗinee. Se hanaa non, o saaman nder tunnirgal Seyɗan.
Wallooɓe hawriine goonɗinɓe, kamɓe duu ɓe laatoo jom'en ndimaaku, waɗooɓe ko mbi'i fuu, to ɓe ƴaartin nder jarɗe maɓɓe, to ɓe ngiɗu njawdi ndi laaɓaa.
Nder miilo lamngo ngoo, Alla wanngini sirri goonɗinol, sirri oo ɓe kaani tiɓinaade.
Iɓe kaani eteede ginan, gaɗa ɗum nde nii hi'aaka fuu ko ɓe pelirtee, iɓe mbaawi fuɗɗude golle maɓɓe.
Non deekiraaɓe maɓɓe duu no kaani laatoo rewɓe wooduɓe ndiyam ndimaaku, ɓe kaanaa laataade rewɓe nyo'ooɓe himɓe, ɓe laatoo rewɓe waawooɓe ko'e mum'en, hoolniiɓe nder huune fuu.
Balloowo hawriine goonɗinɓe fuu no haani laataade gorko mo debbo gooto, kakkiltooɗo ɓiɓɓe mum he wuro mum,
ngam waɗooɓe golle mum'en no wooɗiri ngoni waawɓe heɓude teddinoore he hoolaare mawne ngam ɓe ngoonɗini Iisa *Almasiihu.
Mi winndanii ma ɗerol ngool nder gokka ka mi ɓooyataa mi waraay to maa.
Amma se mi ɓooyii mi waraay, binndi am ndii wallete faamude no njooɗortoɗaa hakkune lenyol Alla duumiiɗo, kam woni hawriine goonɗinɓe. Kayre woni bonjariyal goonga.

Sikka fuu walaa, sirri diina meeɗen no mawni: *Almasiihu wannginaama hano tagaaɗo, *Ruuhu Alla dartinii mo, maleykaaɓe ngi'ii mo. O waajaama hakkune lenyi, o goonɗinaama nder duuniyaaru, nder teddungal o hooƴaama dow.
*Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wanngini no laaɓiri ko nder jamaanu cakitiiɗo oo, himɓe gom accan goonɗinde Alla, tokka seyɗaniiji gonɗi no eyta ɗum'en, he jannginooje ƴuwɗe to ginnaaji.
Munafikiiɓe e fenooɓe ɓe ɓerɗe baaɗɗe kalkata ɓe.
Bonɓe ɓee no njanngina ko himɓe kaanaa dewlude naa nyaamude nyaamduuji gom. Amma Alla tagi nyaamduuji ɗii fuu ngam goonɗinɓe annduɓe goonga naforoo ɗum nder jettol Alla.
Huune fuu ko Alla tagi no wooɗi. Walaa fuu ko harmi, se nii en njaɓirii ɗum yettoore.
Ngam haala Alla e du'aa'u no lamna huune fuu yeeso makko.
Yottin ɗum to banndiraaɓe meeɗen, nden a laatoto gollanoowo Iisa *Almasiihu lobbo, ɓeydotooɗo wakkati fuu nder goonɗinol meeɗen, he jannde lobbere nde njanngunoɗaa.
Amma woppu ɓila ɓilaaji meereeji ɗi njaadataa he goonɗinol meeɗen. Eeltu hoore maa nder kulal Alla nyannde fuu.
Se goonga, connyinol ɓanndu no woodi nafa, amma kulal Alla no nafa nder huune fuu. Ngam no hokka en mbuurnam jooni e nder wakkati garoowo.
Ɗum woni haala goongaha, sikka fuu walaa ika haani jaɓeede.
Eɗen torroo eɗen durwa ngam en ngatti gokka meeɗen he Alla duumiiɗo, Kisinoowo neɗɗo fuu, sako goonɗinɗo mo.
Ɗum woni ko kaanuɗaa jannginde he hollitinde ɓe.
Neɗɗo fuu to yawe ngam cukaaku maaɗa, amma laatana goonɗinɓe ko ƴeewetee ekkitee nder haalaaji maa, nder jonnde maa, nder hidde maa, nder goonɗinol maa, he nder laaɓal maa.
Fadde am warde tittinkina he jannde Dewtere Alla, nder waaju e jannginol hakkune himɓe.
Taa yeeba kokkal tawaangal nder maaɗa, ngal *Ruuhu Alla Ceniiɗo hokki ma har annabaaku e wakkati ardiiɓe ndekunoo juuɗe dow maa ngam barkinde ma.
Wattu kujje ɗee nder ɓerne maa, durwa heɓa neɗɗo fuu hi'a ko a yehi yeeso.
Hakkila he hoore maa, kakkiloɗaa he ko njanngintaa. Taa soƴƴora gaɗa nder kujje ɗee fuu. Nde nii a waɗiri nii, a hisinan hoore maa, kisinaa hettiniiɓe maa duu.
Taa haja dottiijo fuu, amma leesin daane maa kaalda he makko hano o baaba maa. Sukaaɓe worɓe duu, ada ɓe hano banndiraaɓe maa worɓe,
yeyraaɓe hano inniraaɓe maa. Sukaaɓe rewɓe duu, ada ɓe hano sakikiraaɓe maa rewɓe he ɓerne laaɓune.
Saanu ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en maayi ɓe ngalaa fuu balla.

Nde nii nder maɓɓe debbo gom no woodi sukaaɓe naa nee taaniraaɓe, iɓe kaani ekkitaade no ɓe kakkilorto he wuro maɓɓe. Nde nii ɓe ngaɗiri nii, ɓe mbarjoto saarooɓe maɓɓe mbarjaari lobbiri. Ngam ɗum woni ko weli Alla.
Mo gorum maayi mo walaa doondiiɗo ɗum, mo walaa fuu balla gom, halfinii hoore mum he Alla, omo du'oo jemma e nyalooma, omo eela Alla walla mo.
Mo gorum maayi gattuɗo ɓerne mum he belɗum duuniyaaru no maayɗo baa ko no wuuri da.
Yottin haalaaji ɗii to maɓɓe heɓa ɓe ngaɗa mbuurnam ɗam walaa fuu feloore.
Neɗɗo fuu mo saanaay himɓe mum, sako wuro mum, jammbake goonɗinol mum, joomum jaasii mo anndaa Alla !
Rewɓe kaanduɓe limeede nder ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en maayi, ɓe hawriine goonɗinɓe haani wallude ɓeen ngoni: Rewɓe ɓe duuɓi lasooji tati yahde dow, laataniiɓe goriraaɓe mum'en dartiiɓe.
Iɓe kaani anndireede golle lobbe, marol sukaaɓe no wooɗiri, weernooɓe weerɓe, lootooɓe koyɗe goonɗinɓe, wallooɓe tawaaɓe nder ɓillaare, hiɗuɓe waɗude gollal lobbal fuu.
Amma har ko daarata sukaaɓe rewɓe, ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en maayi, taa winndu inɗe maɓɓe ngam cukaaku maɓɓe no waawi uppude ɓe, ɓe itta hakkillo maɓɓe he *Almasiihu, ɓe tefa ɓaŋiteede.
Ndenne, kiite Alla doggi dow maɓɓe ngam ɓe kuumnaay amaana maɓɓe arano mo ɓe kooƴunoo.
Gaɗa majjum ngam ɓe ngalaa fuu ko ɓe ngaɗata, ɓe tokkan suudu yahde suudu, hanaa ngam ɓe ngaɗa goɗɗum, amma ngam ɓe tinno iɓe olka, ɓe mbaawtaa faddii kunndule maɓɓe, iɓe naata nder ko daarataa ɓe.
Ngam majjum waɗi, miɗo hiɗi sanne sukaaɓe rewɓe ɓee kaɓɓanee, ɓe ndimaa, ɓe njogoo cuuɗi maɓɓe no wooɗiri heɓa to wayɓe men keɓu laawol jancude en.
Amma ɗum fuu haɗaay no woodi nder maɓɓe yoofuɓe laawol dartiingol ngool, tokki Seyɗan.
Nde nii tawaama debbo goonɗinɗo gom no woodi nder lenyi mum ɓe goriraaɓe mum'en maayi, o walla ɓe to o accu hawriine goonɗinɓe walla ɓe heɓa nde walla ɓe ngalaa balloo ɓeen.
Ardoriiɓe hawriine goonɗinɓe no wooɗiri, no kaani teddineede sanne sako waajotooɓe e jannginooɓe.
Ngam Dewtere Alla wi'i: A wattataa sumre he ngaari ngondi no sokka. Kaden, « No haani golloowo fuu heɓa njobdi mum. »
Taa jaɓu tuumol fuu gaɗaangol dow ardiiɗo gom nde hanaa himɓe ɗiɗo naa tato ceedi dow ko o tuumiraa ɗum.
Nde nii ardiiɗo gom no tittinkini nder gaɗol hakke, felu mo yeeso jama'aare fuu, heɓa ɓeeto duu kula.
Mi eeli ma yeeso Alla e yeeso Iisa *Almasiihu e maleykaaɓe mum suɓaaɓe ngollira tilsinooje ɗee. Taa naatan oo, accaa ooto, ngiɗaa ooto, accaa ooto.
Taa yaawu dekude juuɗe dow goɗɗo ngam halfinde mo golle nder hawriine goonɗinɓe. Taa haɓɓidin daane he waɗooɓe hakke. Fadda hoore maa he tuuni fuu.
Hanaa ndiyam ɓolam tan kaanuɗaa yarde amma aɗa waawi yarde cabiijam seɗɗa ngam nawalla bujugu maa e ngam nawallaaji maaɗa jehooji no ngarta.
Hakke himɓe gom no mbannga fadde kiite waɗeede. Woɓɓe duu sey gaɗa ɓe kiitaama ko ɗe mbanngaa.
Hano non duu golle lobbe mbanngirtaa. Goɗɗe wakkati mum da ngi'etee amma baa se ɗe mbanngaay no waɗi fuu nyannde gom ɗe mbanngowan.
Maccuɓe goonɗinɓe no kaani teddina rimɓe mum'en heɓa to neɗɗo fuu famɗin innde Alla he jannginol meeɗen.

Onon maccuɓe ɓe rimɓe mum'en no goonɗinɓe, to miilee ngam on fuu on goonɗinɓe on teddintaa ɓe, amma ɓuree gollande ɓe no wooɗiri ngam ɓe goonɗinɓe hiɗaaɓe haanuɓe gollaneede. Ɗum woni ko kaanuɗaa hollitinde he waajaade himɓe.
Nde nii goɗɗo no waajoo waaju mo yaadataa he haalaaji goongaaji ɗi Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen, naa se jannginol joomum no yedda laawol kulal Alla,
nden kay, joomum no keewɗo mawnitaare, o jaahili, giɗɗo haala e geddi dow karfeeje. Ɗume ɗum rimanta en se hanaa kirodirol, habdo, jennodirol, tuumodirol,
he geddi ndi hantataa hakkune himɓe ɓe hakkillooji mum'en uddaa. Ɓe njoofii goonga kaden, iɓe ada kulal Alla hano laawol heɓude njawdi.
Se goonga, kulal Alla no keɓal manngal, nde nii neɗɗo fuu no welna dow ko jogii.
Ngam juuɗe ɓole ngarɗen nder duuniyaaru, juuɗe ɓole duu coƴƴotoɗen.
Ndenne, nde eɗen ngoodi ko nyaameten he ko kolteten, iɗum haani heƴude en.
Amma tefooɓe riikude semmbe semmbe ndeki ko'e mum'en dow laawol suuno, ɓe caami nder tunnirgal e nder kujje baahiiɗe ɗuɗɗe ɗe mboɗɗaa majjinde ɓe, tutoo ɓe nder bonnere e nder halkere.
Ngam hidde seedere woni wuddu bone fuu. Woɓɓe cuunaama ɗe faa ɓe njoofi laawol goonɗinol, ɓe pooɗani ko'e maɓɓe torra mawka.
Amma aan, neɗɗo Alla, doggu kujje ɗee fuu. Tefu dartinaaku, kulal Alla, goonɗinol, hidde, tittinkinaaku e ɓerne fewne.
Durwu durwo gasungo ngam goonɗinol. Tiɓinaa mbuurnam nduumiiɗam ɗam Alla noddani ma, wakkati kokkunoɗaa ceedaaku lobbu yeeso himɓe ɗuɓɓe.
Mi eeli ma yeeso Alla wuddu mbuurnam fuu he yeeso Iisa *Almasiihu gaɗuɗo ceedaaku lobbu yeeso Pontiyus Pilaatus kawjinooɗo leydi Yahudiya, mi eeli ma,
gollir tilsinooje ɗee no wooɗiri nder rafi feloore sey nyannde Iisa *Almasiihu Joomiraawo meeɗen warti.
Gartol ngool no waɗan nder wakkati mo Alla darni. Kanko marɗo barke, Jom baawɗe mo walaa walde, Laamiiɗo laamiiɓe fuu, Joomiraawo joomiraaɓe fuu.
Kanko tan woni Duumotooɗo, jooɗiiɗo nder jeyngol ngol neɗɗo fuu suusaa ɓadaade. Neɗɗo fuu hi'iraay mo gite mum, walaa baawɗo hi'ude mo. Teddungal he baawɗe laatanoo mo faa abada abadin. Aamiin !

Hollitin riikuɓe duuniyaaru nduu ɓe kakkilo he mawnitaare to ɓe ngattu hoolaare nder njawdi maɓɓe ngam ndi tabbitittaa, amma ɓe kalfina ko'e maɓɓe he Alla mo saɗaa, kokkoowo en huune fuu ngam nanen belɗum hoore men.
Wi'u ɓe ɓe ngaɗa ko wooɗi, to ɓe cortu juuɗe maɓɓe nder golle lobbe, ɓe laatoo ɓe juuɗe mum'en caɗaa, warooɓe njawdi mum'en ngam wallude ɓe ngalaa.
Nde nii ɓe ngaɗii ɗum, sikka fuu walaa ɓe kawrani ko'e maɓɓe njawdi lobbiri laatotoondi bonjariyal maɓɓe jaaŋo, ngam ɓe tiɓinoo mbuurnam ngoongaajam.
Too Timote, joga no wooɗiri ko kalfinaɗaa. Doggu haalaaji jeddooji, he haalaaji ɗi njahdataa he laawol goonɗinol meeɗen bi'eteeɗi no goonga.
Ngam himɓe gom tokki ɗi, ƴuwi dow laawol goonɗinol meeɗen. Moƴƴere Alla wonda he mooɗon.
